The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Charlotte Hornets 126 - 111 at Oracle Arena on Wednesday . The Splash Brothers , Steph Curry and Klay Thompson , took care of business leading the Warriors ( 42 - 7 ) in a rout over the Hornets ( 23 - 27 ) at home . Golden_State scored 77 points in the first half , and the Curry-Thompson combination each scored 26 points . Curry went on to knock down 11 three pointers , while Thompson added six of his own . The Hornets had no answer for the hot shooting back court , granted , getting into a shootout with the Warriors when they are on fire is never something that has worked out for opponents in Oracle Arena . Frank Kaminsky put together the best performance for the Hornets in his bench role , as he scored 24 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , while Kemba Walker was silenced to just seven points in 25 minutes . Nicolas Batum was also held to a lowly 13 points , however , he did hit 3 - of - 4 from behind the arc . Curry went on to finish with a game high 39 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting from behind the arc . The reigning MVP added eight assists and five rebounds . Thompson scored 29 points and cooled off in the second half . Kevin Durant scored 18 points on 17 shots , but added eight assists and eight boards . Next up , the Warriors play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , while the Hornets visit the Jazz on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 95 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . Golden_State was expected to win this game easily with a 22 - point spread and they took care of business . A 100 run to end the second quarter was a huge stretch , as it gave the Warriors an 11 - point lead , which they never relinquished from there . It was a near wire - to - wire win , as Brooklyn 's only lead was a one - point advantage for less than a minute in the second quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as the Warriors recorded five more assists than the Nets , while committing five less turnovers . Golden_State also dominated the rim protection , as they recorded 11 blocks to Brooklyn 's three . The Nets ( 8 - 49 ) had a nearly impossible task here , but they did a nice job of hanging around and giving the Warriors a battle . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson was a bright spot , as he accrued 16 points and 10 rebounds in the defeat . Brook Lopez really struggled , as he could only muster up nine points , four rebounds and five assists , while committing four turnovers on 3 - of - 13 shooting . Sean Kilpatrick was a nice spark off the bench , providing 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Trevor Booker recorded a double - double off the bench as well , amassing 12 points and 10 rebounds . On deck for Brooklyn is a road matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 49 - 9 ) have made minced meat of much of the league this season and a home matchup against an eight - win Nets team is simply unfair . Stephen Curry led the team with 27 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals in the absence of Kevin Durant . Klay Thompson accumulated 24 points , four rebounds and four assists . Zaza Pachulia totaled eight points and nine rebounds , while nearly shutting out Brook Lopez . Golden_State will face the Philadelphia 76ers on the road for their next game on Monday .
The Warriors were expected to win this game easily , but this was no walk in the park . The 17 - point final margin is unfair , as the Nets never trailed by more than 19 and kept it a single - digit margin for much of the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as the Warriors recorded five more assists than the Nets , while committing five less turnovers . Rondae Holiis-Jefferson was the Nets best player , as he tallied 16 points and 10 rebounds . Sean Kilpatrick and Trevor Booker each recorded double - doubles off the bench , as Kilpatrick totaled 15 points and 10 rebounds , while Booker provided 12 points and 10 boards . Stephen Curry accumulated 27 points , five rebounds and five assists to lead the Warriors . Klay Thompson finished with 24 points , four rebounds and four assists . No one else on the roster reached double figures in scoring , as the team shot just 42 percent from the field .
Al Horford 's 14 points per game this season is his lowest scoring average since his second year in the NBA , but the big man affects the game in so many different ways beyond scoring , most of which do n't even show up in the box score . Two of those ways , however , do show up , and they are his rebounds and assists . The Celtics have great rebounding guards and wings that take the pressure off Horford , but when the big man gets on the boards and distributes , Boston has little problem finding success . Horford recorded six rebounds and six assists in Wednesday 's road victory over the Warriors , and when he has recorded those totals this season , the Celtics are 9 - 3 . Even more telling is the fact that in those 12 games , Horford is averaging just 12 points , showing that he is making an big impact , even when the scoring column does n't say so .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 99 - 86 , Wednesday at Oracle Arena . The game remained tight throughout Wednesday 's contest , with two points separating the teams as they entered the final period . It was at that point , however , where the Celtics ( 41 - 24 ) turned it on and ended up running away with the game . Courtesy of a 150 run over three minutes and a 21 - 7 run overall to end the game , Boston was able to dominate the Warriors ( 52 - 12 ) 27 - 12 in the fourth quarter . And they did n't need any heroics from Isaiah Thomas to do so , as the point guard scored just seven points in the final 12 minutes . Thomas did , however , finish with a team - high 25 points in 34 minutes , but the team 's most valuable performance Wednesday came off the bench from Kelly Olynyk , who scored 17 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting in 26 minutes as a reserve . As for the Warriors , it was a fourth quarter to forget . More specifically , it was a fourth quarter to forget for the reigning two - time MVP Stephen Curry , who was 0 - for - 1 from the field and committed two turnovers in the five minutes he managed to play in the final period . Curry still finished with 23 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting from the field to go along with six assists and five rebounds , while Klay Thompson added a team - high 25 points on 11 - of - 23 shooting . In the end , however , Golden_State 's 17 turnovers , four of which occurred in the last seven minutes of the game , were too much for them to overcome late . Up next , the Celtics will look to keep things rolling Friday against the Nuggets , while the Warriors will head to Minnesota on Friday to take on the Timberwolves .
The Warriors really took control of this game after the first quarter , as they won the second quarter , 36 - 15 . From there , Golden_State never allowed Milwaukee to get within 18 points . Shooting was decisive , with the Warriors hitting 60 percent if their shots to the Bucks 40 percent . Golden_State also dominated the defensive rebounding , winning that battle , 38 - 23 . Michael Brogdon was a lone bright spot for Milwaukee , as he led the team with 18 points , four rebounds and three assists . Greg Monroe led the bench , as he totaled 12 points and seven rebounds . Stephen Curry was the player of the game , as he accumulated 28 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Klay Thompson finished second on the team in scoring , dropping 21 points . Draymond Green flirted with a triple - double , as he collected eight points , eight rebounds and 10 assists .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 117 - 92 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . Golden_State were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this 25 - point result . The second quarter is where they separated themselves from Milwaukee , as they won that quarter , 36 - 15 . Golden_State actually led by at least 18 points for the entirety of the second half , thanks to that run . The shooting statistics were lopsided , with Golden_State hitting 60 percent of their shots to Milwaukee 's 40 percent . Defensive rebounding really helped the Warriors too , as they outrebounded the Bucks , 38 - 23 . The Bucks ( 34 - 35 ) had won eight of nine headed into this matchup , but facing the Warriors is a different animal . Michael Brogdon led the team with 18 points , four rebounds and three assists . Khris Middleton totaled just 11 points and five assists , Greg Monroe led the bench with 12 points and seven rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo had one of his worst games of the season , collecting just nine points , three rebounds and three assists . Milwaukee 's next game wo n't be until Tuesday , when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers on the road . The Warriors ( 55 - 14 ) have extended their winning streak to three games with this victory , as they appear to be getting back on track . Stephen Curry led Golden_State , as he accrued 28 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Klay Thompson finished second on the team , dropping 21 points . Draymond Green flirted with a triple - double , accumulating eight points , eight rebounds and 10 assists . Andre Iguodala was a huge spark off the bench , providing 15 points , four rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Golden_State 's next game will be on Monday , when they face the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Washington Wizards 113 - 103 at Verizon Center on Wednesday . In a game that was never separated by more than 12 points , the Raptors were able to prevail by getting to the basket at will . Both teams shot very efficiently , as they both shot over 55 percent from the field . The big difference was the interior play , as the Raptors scored 68 paint points , while holding the Wizards to just 28 . Turnovers were an issue for Washington as well , as they committed 21 and allowed the Raptors to score 31 points off those turnovers . Toronto ( 3 - 1 ) continues to score at will and they are riding the hot shooting hand of DeMar DeRozan . The shooting guard has scored at least 32 points in all four games this season and finished this outing with a 40 spot . He added five rebounds and five assists with his 40 points and shot 14 - of - 23 from the field and 11 - of - 16 from the free - throw line . Kyle Lowry was the only other starter with more than 10 , as he scored 18 points and recorded four steals in the win . Patrick Patterson and Terrence Ross were a nice spark off the bench , accumulating 25 points , five rebounds and four assists . Washington ( 0 - 3 ) has gotten off to a rough start this season , as the defense continues to struggle . In fact , they have now allowed at least 112 points in every game so far this season . John Wall did everything he could to pull out a win though , as he tallied a season - high 33 points , 11 assists and five rebounds in the loss . It was n't all sunshine and roses though , as Wall also committed nine turnovers and missed two late crucial free - throws . Otto Porter had his best game of the season , totaling 23 points and 13 rebounds on 11 - of - 13 shooting . Bradley Beal and Marcin Gortat finished with 15 points a piece as well . Both teams return to action on Friday , as the Raptors host the Miami Heat and the Wizards host the Atlanta Hawks .
The Wizards continue to be let down by their defense , as they had no rim protection in this loss . Not only did they allow the Raptors to shoot 56 percent from the field , they also allowed them to accrue 68 points in the paint . The bench production was a huge factor as well , with Toronto 's five bench players combining for 34 points , 14 rebounds , 11 assists and seven steals . In contrast , Washington 's five bench players finished with just 11 points , four rebounds and four assists combined . The 40 - point outing marks DeRozan 's fourth - straight game with at least 32 points and he 's the only player in the league to score 30 - plus in every game so far . The 33 points and 11 assists from John Wall make for his best game of the year , but the nine turnovers are a season - worst as well . Wall now has double - digit assists in all three games this season .
These two teams have really struggled this season and the 48 combined turnovers shows just that . Denver was the more inept team though , as they set an NBA season - high with 29 turnovers of their own . The shooting was n't any better , as they shot 41 percent from the field , 67 percent from the free - throw line and 22 percent from three - point range . Bradley Beal was the best player in this game , tallying 26 points , three rebounds and five assists . John Wall went just 5 - of - 14 from the field , but still finished with 15 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals . Markieff Morris also scored 15 points , as all five starters played at least 33 minutes . Nikola Jokic was the only effective Nugget on offense , finishing with 17 points and 11 rebounds . Wilson Chandler had a game to forget , as he went just 2 - of - 16 from the field , en route to five points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Denver Nuggets , 92 - 85 , at Verizon Center on Thursday . In a game between two struggling teams , there was a lot of sloppy play in this game . In fact , there were 48 combined turnovers between the two teams and an NBA-high 29 turnovers committed by the Nuggets . Denver actually took an 11 - point lead after the first quarter , but proceeded to allow Washington to win the other three quarters by at least five points each . Defense was key for the Wizards , as they held the Nuggets to 41 percent shooting and the aforementioned turnover total . Shooting was bad all - around for the Nuggets , as they went 67 percent from the free - throw line and 22 percent from three - point range . There were only two ties and six lead changes in total . Denver ( 8 - 15 ) played this game without Emmanuel Mudiay and Kenneth Faried , as the offense really could n't get anything going . Nikola Jokic was the lone bright spot though , leading the team with 17 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Danilo Gallinari was second on the team , with 13 points and four rebounds on 3 - of - 11 shooting . Jameer Nelson got the start for Mudiay and finished with 10 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Wilson Chandler had a nightmare game , going 2 - of - 16 from the field , en route to five points and eight boards off the bench . The Nuggets will look to play better on Saturday , when they travel to face the Orlando Magic . Washington ( 8 - 13 ) have had to lean heavily on their starters all season long and all five players played at least 33 minutes in this tight win . Bradley Beal led the team in scoring , dropping 26 points , three rebounds and five assists . John Wall went just 5 - of - 14 from the field , but still tallied 15 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals in the victory . Markieff Morris also scored 15 points , adding three rebounds and four assists . On deck for Washington is a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Detroit Pistons , 122 - 108 , at Verizon Center on Friday . As has often been the case this season , the Wizards ' dynamic backcourt duo of John Wall and Bradley Beal spearheaded the offensive attack . The two guards combined for 54 points on 18 - of - 30 shooting , while Marcin Gortat provided his usual solid double - double performance . Washington had the hot hand collectively , as they posted stellar success rates of 58 percent and 48 percent from the field and three - point range , respectively , on their way to a season - high point total . The Pistons ( 14 - 14 ) were led by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who posted 24 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal . Reggie Jackson and Tobias Harris turned in a pair of 14 - point efforts , with the former adding two assists and a rebound , and the latter supplying six rebounds , two assists and a steal . Andre Drummond posted a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . As usual , Jon Leuer led the bench with 19 points , seven rebounds , five assists and a steal . Wall 's 29 points paced the Wizards ( 11 - 14 ) , a total that he complemented with 11 assists , two rebounds and three steals . Beal was right behind with 25 points , four dimes and a pair of boards . Gortat 's 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double also included four assists . Even Otto Porter , who 's been struggling on the offensive end in recent games , registered 15 points to go along with eight boards and three assists . Markieff Morris , frequently facing off against brother Marcus , filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , four assists , three rebounds , a steal and a block . The Pistons head back home to face off with the Indiana Pacers on Saturday , while the Wizards also remain home and await the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday .

Kentavious Caldwell-Pope 's 24 points led the way for Detroit . Reggie Jackson and Tobias Harris turned in a pair of 14 - point efforts , and Andre Drummond posted a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . Jon Leuer unsurprisingly led the second unit with 19 points . .
The Wizards ' Otto Porter , Jr. posted a game - high 32 points , along with 13 rebounds , an assist and a block . He was in a zone shooting - wise , going 13 - of - 18 from the field , including 5 - of - 9 from beyond the arc . Beal checked in second with 22 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Wall put together an 18 - point , 16 - assist double - double , but did commit a game - high seven turnovers . Morris offered 18 points as well , while Marcin Gortat brought down 12 boards . The Washington Wizards defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 107 - 102 , at Verizon Center on Monday . The Wizards ( 14 - 16 ) have most frequently relied on their dynamic backcourt duo of John Wall and Bradley Beal for offensive production this season , but they are n't the only members of Washington 's first unit that has the ability to light up the scoreboard . Otto Porter , Jr. went through a rough stretch on offense earlier in December , but has been coming on as of late , and his resurgence culminated Monday in explosive fashion against the Bucks ( 14 - 15 ) . Capitalizing on one of the most generous defenses in the NBA against small forwards , Porter posted a game - high 32 points , while also compiling 13 rebounds , an assist and a block . He was in an impressive zone shooting - wise , going 13 - of - 18 from the field , a tally that included a 5 - of - 9 effort from three - point range . Combined with strong efforts from Wall , Beal and Markieff Morris , the Wizards shot 51 percent overall , which helped them overcome 16 turnovers . The Bucks were led once again by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who managed 22 points , 12 rebounds , seven assists and a block . Tony Snell chipped in with a season - high 20 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , an assist and a pair of steals . Jabari Parker supplied 14 points , six rebounds , four assists and a block . Matthew Dellavedova registered a modest eight points , but dished out 11 dimes , brought in three rebounds and recorded two steals . Greg Monroe led the second unit with 16 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Beal checked in second on the Wizards with 22 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Wall put together an 18 - point , 16 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . He did , however , commit a game - high seven turnovers . Morris offered 18 points as well , which he complemented with four rebounds , two steals and a block . Marcin Gortat mustered four points but did record 12 rebounds , along with three assists and a block . The Bucks hit the road again to face off with the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Wizards remain home to face the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday evening as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 118 - 95 , at Verizon Center on Friday . The Wizards ( 16 - 16 ) learned earlier in the day that Bradley Beal would rest his sprained right ankle against the Nets ( 8 - 24 ) , which pushed Sheldon McClellan into the starting lineup alongside John Wall . Beal 's absence was rather easy to overcome , however , as Washington dominated a reeling Brooklyn squad that 's only won one road game all season from the opening tip . Wall led the way for the Wizards ' first unit with a 19 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds , four steals and a block . The home team also received standout performances from Marcin Gortat and Wall 's backup Trey Burke , who paced the team overall with a season - high 27 points . Washington had the collective hot hand on offense , shooting 57 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The Nets were led by Trevor Booker , who posted 16 points , seven boards and three assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson matched Booker 's point total in 29 minutes off the bench , and added five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Bojan Bogdanovic went for 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a steal . Brook Lopez compiled 11 points , six assists , five rebounds and a steal . Sean Kilpatrick ( seven points ) and Isaiah Whitehead ( six points ) underwhelmed , however , going a combined 4 - of - 14 from the field . Caris Levert was productive in a reserve role , supplying 12 points in 24 minutes . Burke added two rebounds , two assists and two steals to his game - high scoring total . Gortat produced a 19 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Otto Porter , Jr. chipped in with 12 points , four boards , two assists , a steal and a block , while Markieff Morris registered 10 points , six rebounds and a steal . McClellan went for eight points in his spot start , and Jason Smith totaled 10 points , eight rebounds , an assist and two blocks in just 18 minutes on the second unit . The Nets head back home to take on the Utah Jazz on Monday night , while the Wizards head west to take on the Houston Rockets on Monday evening as well .
John Wall , Marcin Gortat and Trey Burke led the way for the Wizards on a night where Bradley Beal rested his sprained ankle . Washington had the hot hand on offense , shooting 57 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Burke led the way with a season - high 27 points , while Wall and Gortat turned in matching 19 - point performances to go along with 14 assists and 13 rebounds , respectively . Otto Porter ( 12 points ) and Markieff Morris ( 10 points ) rounded out the first unit . Trevor Booker 's and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson 's matching 16 - point tallies paced the Nets , while Bojan Bogdanovic went for 12 points . Brook Lopez compiled 11 points , but Sean Kilpatrick ( seven points ) and Isaiah Whitehead ( six points ) underwhelmed , going a combined 4 - of - 14 from the field . Caris Levert supplied 12 points in a reserve role .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 116 - 108 , at Verizon Center on Thursday . The Wizards ( 29 - 20 ) have been a dominant team at home all season , having secured 20 of the 28 victories they 'd come in to Thursday with at Verizon Center . However , they may have gotten more than they initially bargained for against a feisty Lakers ( 17 - 35 ) squad that battled back from a 58 - 44 halftime deficit . John Wall ultimately proved too much for the visitors , though , posting a 33 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds , three steals and one block . Los_Angeles was also done in by its inability to take care of the ball , as they committed a whopping 20 turnovers . The Lakers were led by a 20 - point effort off the bench by Jordan Clarkson , which he complemented with two rebounds and an assist . D'Angelo Russell and Luol Deng posted matching 17 - point tallies , with the former adding 11 assists , seven rebounds , two steals and a block , and the latter hauling in six boards and posting a block . Tarik Black managed a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Lou Williams was productive in a reserve role as well , supplying 15 points , four assists , two rebounds and a block . Bradley Beal complemented Wall 's effort with 23 points , four assists , a rebound , two steals and one block . Marcin Gortat submitted a 21 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and a steal . Markieff Morris also accomplished the feat , registering 12 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . Otto Porter chipped in 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Lakers next head to Beantown to tangle with the Boston Celtics on Friday night , while the Wizards remain home to face the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday evening .
John Wall 's 33 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds , three steals and one block led the way for the Wizards . The Lakers battled back from a 58 - 44 halftime deficit , but were largely sabotaged by the whopping 20 turnovers they committed . Bradley Beal complemented Wall 's effort with 23 points , and Marcin Gortat submitted a 21 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and a steal . Markieff Morris also accomplished the feat , registering 12 points and 11 rebounds . Otto Porter chipped in 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jordan Clarkson 's 20 points off the bench led the Lakers . D'Angelo Russell and Luol Deng posted matching 17 - point tallies , with the former also adding 11 assists . Tarik Black managed a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Lou Williams was also productive off the second unit , supplying 15 points .
Washington posted outstanding 58 - and - 62 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , while seeing six players tally double - digit scoring . They limited Russell Westbrook to a modest 17 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting and the Thunder to 35 percent shooting overall , including one stretch of 24 consecutive missed shots . Markieff Morris paced Washington with 23 points , while Bradley Beal followed with 22 . Otto Porter , Jr. managed an 18 - point , 12 - rebound double - double and John Wall turned in a spectacular 15 - point , 14 - assist double - double . Marcin Gortat totaled 12 points and Trey Burke led the bench with 11 . Joffrey Lauvergne matched Westbrook 's scoring total while leading the bench . Cameron Payne provided 12 points . Steven Adams posted nine points and hauled in 11 rebounds . Domantas Sabonis tallied six points , while Jerian Grant and Alex Abrines posted matching eight - point efforts off the bench .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 120 - 98 , at Verizon Center on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 33 - 21 ) knew they 'd have to hit on all cylinders to insure that they could keep pace with Russell Westbrook and company , and they managed to do that and then some Monday . Washington posted outstanding 58 - and - 62 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , while seeing six players tally double - digit scoring . Meanwhile , they did a superb defensive job on Westbrook , limiting him to a modest 17 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting , and the Thunder ( 31 - 25 ) to 35 percent shooting overall , including one stretch of 24 consecutive missed shots . Westbrook played just 24 minutes , as he sat for good in the third quarter . Westbrook added four rebounds , four assists and two steals to his scoring total . Joffrey Lauvergne matched Westbrook 's scoring total while leading the bench and added six rebounds and four assists . Cameron Payne provided 12 points , three boards , two assists and two steals as a reserve . Steven Adams posted nine points and hauled in 11 rebounds , while also recording one block and one steal . Domantas Sabonis tallied six points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Jerian Grant and Alex Abrines posted matching eight - point efforts off the bench as well . Markieff Morris paced Washington with 23 points , six rebounds , one assist and two steals . Bradley Beal posted 22 points and three assists . Otto Porter , Jr. managed an 18 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . John Wall turned in a spectacular 15 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Marcin Gortat totaled 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Trey Burke led the bench with 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Thunder heads back home to tangle with the New York Knicks on Wednesday , while the Wizards travel to Indiana to tangle with the Pacers on Thursday evening .
Washington has not been manhandled in their home building all season , but Utah took are of them easily here . In fact , they led for over 42 minutes of this game , as Washington could n't get it within six points in the second half . Rebounding was the key , as Utah won that battle , 52 - 27 . Gordon Hayward carried the load for Utah , as he tallied 30 points and nine rebounds . Rudy Gobert was a presence down low , accumulating 15 points , 20 rebounds and four blocks . George Hill finished with 21 points and six assists . John Wall led Washington in scoring , as he provided 23 points and 11 assists , despite committing nine turnovers . Bradley Beal was second on the team , finishing with 22 points , three rebounds and four assists . Bojan Bogdanovic was the only other Wizard in double figures , as he dropped 15 points off the bench .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Washington Wizards , 102 - 92 , at Verizon Center on Sunday . Washington have been one of the best home teams in the NBA this season , but this was a tough task against a feisty Utah team . The Jazz dominated from start to finish , as they led for over 42 minutes of this game and led by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where they spread it out , outscoring the Wizards , 25 - 15 . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with Utah wining that battle , 52 - 27 . They also dominated the points off turnover differential , winning that , 31 - 16 . The Jazz ( 37 - 22 ) have quietly been climbing up the standings and road wins like this should surely be opening other teams eyes . Gordon Hayward led the way for Utah , as he tallied 30 points , nine rebounds and two assists . George Hill was n't far behind , finishing with 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . Rudy Gobert finished with another double - double , totaling 15 points , 20 rebounds , three assists and four blocks . On deck for the Jazz is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday . The Wizards ( 34 - 23 ) had just seven losses at home coming into this matchup and this was easily their worst home performance of the season . John Wall did collect 30 points , 11 assists and four steals , but committed nine turnovers against this tough Utah defense . Bradley Beal was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 22 points , three rebounds and four assists . Bojan Bogdanovic led the bench , as he provided 15 points . Things do n't get any easier , as Washington hosts the Golden State Warriors for their next game on Tuesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 107 - 86 , at Wells Fargo Center on Monday evening . The 76ers ( 9 - 7 ) were coming off a disappointing defeat against the Golden State Warriors during the weekend , but they bounced back with a dominant effort over a shorthanded Jazz ( 7 - 11 ) team that did n't have key players such as Rudy Gobert and Joe Johnson . Philadelphia was so dominant that they won the first quarter 25 - 15 , and they never looked back . In fact , Philadelphia won all quarters individually in what was the best proof of how dominant they looked . Ben Simmons led the way for the Sixers with a double - double of 27 points and 10 rebounds , as the rookie once again looked like a dominant force on both ends of the court . Joel Embiid also added a double - double of 15 points and 11 boards , but he also chipped in with three assists and two blocks . J.J. Redick added 20 points , and Amir Johnson produced off the bench thanks to eight points , 13 rebounds , and four blocks . On the other hand , Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz , as the rookie once again was the team 's top scoring threat and finished with 17 points , five assists , and four rebounds . Rodney Hood added 13 points off the bench and Ricky Rubio chipped in with 12 points , but also committed six turnovers while dishing out just two assists .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 101 - 95 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday evening . The teams traded baskets through the first quarter , with the Kings taking the early advantage , up 30 - 27 after one quarter . The 76ers fired back in the second quarter , outscoring Sacramento 30 - 18 to take a 57 - 48 lead into halftime . The Sixers held on to most of their lead through the third quarter and took a 78 - 71 advantage heading into the final frame . Things took an immediate turn in the fourth , as the Kings mounted a 130 run to take a six - point advantage with just over seven minutes remaining . The Kings were able to hang on the rest of the way and snap a two - game losing streak . Zach Randolph led the way for Sacramento with 27 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , in 28 minutes . Buddy Hield followed up with 24 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Frank Mason added 16 points in 22 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 45 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Robert Covington was the high - point man for Philly , with 17 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting , in 32 minutes . Ben Simmons finished with 13 points , 12 rebounds , nine assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . Jarryd Bayless chipped in 15 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Sixers shot 42 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . This marked the third straight loss for the Sixers . The 76ers ( 14 - 16 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Raptors on Thursday . The Kings ( 10 - 20 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 94 , at Wells Fargo Center on Saturday evening . The Sixers ( 22 - 20 ) went into the contest with a built - in advantage , as both Giannis Antetokounmpo ( knee ) and Malcolm Brogdon ( personal ) were ruled out for the visiting Bucks ( 23 - 22 ) since Friday . The pair of prominent absences appeared to give Philadelphia an early boost , as they jumped out to a 37 - 29 first - quarter lead . Milwaukee battled back to outscore their hosts by a 51 - 47 margin over the second and third periods , sending them into the final 12 minutes with a very manageable 84 - 80 deficit . However , a 13 - 2 Philadelphia run over the first 3:34 of the fourth quarter gave the home squad the cushion they needed to notch a comfortable double - digit victory . The Bucks did see all five of their makeshift first unit post double - digit scoring , but they shot a mediocre 40 percent as a team . Meanwhile , the Sixers managed to drain 53 percent of their 85 shot attempts , and without the Greek Freak 's dominant presence down low , they won the rebounding battle , 45 - 35 . As has been the case in previous Antetokounmpo absences , Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks , posting a 23 - point , 14 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double that also included one steal . Tony Snell drew the start at power forward and contributed 15 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . The backcourt duo of Eric Bledsoe and Sterling Brown generated matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding three assists , five steals and one block , and the latter supplying two boards and one steal . John Henson rounded out the first unit 's productive night with 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Marshall Plumlee and Thon Maker co - led the bench with six points apiece . Joel Embiid unsurprisingly paced the Sixers with 29 points , nine rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ben Simmons registered 16 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and one steal . Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot drew the start for Jerryd Bayless ( wrist ) and matched Simmons ' scoring total while also hauling in three rebounds and dishing out a pair of dimes . Dario Saric and Robert Covington contributed 13 points each . Saric also posted seven assists , six rebounds and one steal , while Covington filled out the stat sheet with five boards , three assists , four steals and one block . T.J. McConnell led the second unit with 11 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Bucks head back home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Monday night , while the Sixers hit the road and take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday evening as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 104 - 102 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday evening . The Heat got out to a great start on the road , as they closed the first quarter on a 17 - 9 run that gave them a 29 - 20 lead heading into the second quarter . They continued the dominance in the second , as they started off with a 60 run to push their lead to 15 , just two minutes into the quarter . The Heat did not let up and pushed their lead to 62 - 39 by halftime . However , it was a tale of two halves , as the Sixers mounted a comeback in the third quarter , where they chipped away until the trailed by just eight , down 81 - 73 , heading into the final frame . They kept up the pressure into the fourth , and pulled within one point with six minutes left in the game . The Sixers then used a 12 - 5 run to take a six - point lead with 2:25 to go in the game . They were able to hang on the rest of the way en route to their fifth straight win . Ben Simmons tallied a triple - double with 18 points , 12 rebounds 10 assists , along with four steals , in 36 minutes , to lead the 76ers in the win . Dario Saric finished with 19 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Marco Belinelli poured in 17 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench , in his debut with Philadelphia . The 76ers shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , James Johnson was the high - point man for Miami , with 22 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic followed up with 18 points , four assists and three rebounds , while Hassan Whiteside finished with 16 points , 10 rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Heat shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 27 from long range . The Heat ( 30 - 28 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pelicans in New Orleans on Friday . The 76ers ( 30 - 25 ) will be right back in action , as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Thursday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 101 - 98 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 40 - 28 ) and the Sixers ( 36 - 30 ) played a game that went down to the wire and that could have easily gone to overtime , but Philadelphia missed a game - tying three - point attempt that would have extended the game . Indiana jumped to the lead in the first quarter after winning 33 - 23 , but they had to hold off Philadelphia during the rest of the game . The Sixers quickly reduced the lead and they made it a four - point game heading into the fourth quarter , but Indiana managed to survive and secured a massive win against a potential playoff contender . Myles Turner led the way for the Pacers with a strong 25 - point , six - rebound performance . Thaddeus Young added a strong double - double of 19 points and 10 rebounds . Cory Joseph chipped in with 13 points , five rebounds and five assists , while Victor Oladipo contributed 11 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Darren Collison ( 10 points ) and Lance Stephenson ( 11 points ) did a decent job off the bench . The entire starting lineup for Philadelphia scored in double digits , but Joel Embiid paved the way with 29 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks , but he also committed eight turnovers . Ben Simmons contributed with a strong triple - double of 10 points , 13 rebounds , and 10 dimes . Dario Saric had 18 points , J.J. Redick added 16 , and Robert Covington chipped in with 10 points and 10 boards .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 119 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 52 ) did n't exactly sport the brightest outlook coming into the contest , as a couple of factors stood out as immediate red flags on paper . One was simply motivation - - Memphis ' playoff dreams seemed to crash sometime before the calendar even flipped to 2018 , while the 76ers ( 40 - 30 ) came in looking to improve their already solid No . 6 standing in the Eastern Conference . The second was the matter of home/road splits . The Grizzlies had prevailed in only five of 33 games away from FedEx Forum prior to Wednesday , so they were already firmly established as a club that simply does n't travel well . Like clockwork , both factors began to manifest shortly after tip - off , as the home squad forged a 26 - 19 first - quarter lead that had grown to 58 - 44 by intermission . When they added 16 more to their advantage with a 41 - point third period , the game was essentially decided . A 36 - point surge by the visitors in the fourth dressed up the final score a bit , but it was yet another rough landing for Memphis away from the comfort of home . The Sixers drained an impressive 55 percent of their 84 attempts and saw six players - - including all five first - unit members - - hit double digits in the scoring column . Wayne Selden led the way for the Grizzlies off the bench with 18 points - - a total he supplemented with four assists and two rebounds . Deyonta Davis delivered a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists over just 21 minutes . Dillon Brooks poured in 14 points and added one assist and one steal . JaMychal Green supplied 14 as well , while also registering seven rebounds and two assists . Mario Chalmers went for 10 points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal . Jarell Martin managed eight points , five rebounds and one assist . Marc Gasol could only muster five points , six rebounds , four assists and one block . Brice Johnson was productive in reserve with nine points , four boards , one assist and one block . The Sixers were paced by a quartet of 15 - point efforts from J.J. Redick , Dario Saric , Robert Covington and Marco Belinelli , with the latter turning in his tally off the bench . Redick added three rebounds and one assist ; Saric accounted for three boards , two assists , one steal and one block ; Covington complemented his scoring with two rebounds , one assist and one steal ; and Belinelli also dished out a pair of assists and recorded one block . Joel Embiid finished with 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Ben Simmons filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and two steals . Richaun Holmes posted eight points , five rebounds and two assists in 15 second - unit minutes . The Grizzlies make the quick trip back home to take on the Charlotte Hornets on Thursday evening , while the Sixers also board a plane and land in Central Florida for a Thursday night date with the Orlando Magic .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 123 - 104 , at Wells Fargo Center on Monday . Despite the fact that Denver led for the entirety of the first half , Philly came back and cruised to an easy win . In fact , the Sixers turned an eight - point halftime deficit into a 19 - point win by outscoring Denver in the second half , 72 - 45 . Rebounding was the most lopsided statistic , with Philly outrebounding Denver , 54 - 37 . The shooting disparity was also key , with the Sixers hitting 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range while the Nuggets connected on just 42 percent from the field and 34 percent from long range . A 24 - 10 fastbreak differential and 50 - 40 points in the paint advantage were also huge statistics for Philadelphia . The Nuggets ( 40 - 34 ) were led by Will Barton , as he accrued 25 points and three assists . Jamal Murray totaled 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Paul Millsap finished with 16 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Nikola Jokic accumulated 14 points , seven rebounds and four assists while Wilson Chandler provided eight points , eight rebounds and seven assists . The Sixers ( 43 - 30 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he tallied 20 points 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Dario Saric generated 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . Ben Simmons accumulated seven points , 13 rebounds and 11 assists . Markelle Fultz had the best game of his rookie year , providing 10 points , four rebounds and eight assists off the bench . On deck for Denver is another road game against the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday . As for Philly . they play host to the New York Knicks on Wednesday for their next fixture .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Utah Jazz , 117 - 100 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that Utah grabbed the first lead in this game , Milwaukee dominated throughout . In fact , the Bucks led 29 - 19 after the first quarter , as Utah never tied or took the lead from there . Shooting was key , with the Bucks hitting 54 percent of their shots , while holding Utah to just 43 percent shooting . In addition , Milwaukee forced 16 turnovers from Utah , while committing just 11 on their end . A 33 - 26 defensive rebounding advantage was decisive for the Bucks as well . The Jazz ( 13 - 14 ) were led by Rudy Gobert , as he tallied 20 points and nine rebounds . Joe Ingles collected 12 points , four rebounds and four assists . Alec Burks had another big game off the bench , providing 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Bucks ( 15 - 10 ) had four players score at least 16 points , as Giannis Antetokounmpo led them with 37 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe amassed 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . Khris Middleton accumulated 20 points , five rebounds and five assists . Malcolm Brogdon led the bench with 16 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams are off until Wednesday , as Milwaukee travels to face the New Orleans Pelicans and Utah facing the Chicago Bulls on the road as well .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 115 - 109 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday evening . The Bucks started out well , taking an early 16 - 6 lead , however the Bulls responded instantly and pushed ahead to take a 33 - 30 lead after one quarter . The game stayed very close through the second and third quarters , with the teams trading small leads . The score was tied at 82 heading into the fourth . Little changed through most of the fourth quarter , with both teams battling until it was tied up at 104 with 3:10 left . It was here that the Bulls managed to put together a 50 run that would give them a cushion to ride to the finish . This marks the fifth straight win for Chicago . Bobby Portis led the way for Chicago , with 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , 12 rebounds and one steal , in 29 minutes off the bench . Nikola Mirotic followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , two assists , and one steal , in 29 minutes of action . Robin Lopez added 18 points and eight rebounds , while Kris Dunn finished with 17 points and seven assists . The Bulls shot 48 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks , with 29 points , 16 rebounds , four assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Eric Bledsoe followed up with 12 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal , while John Henson tallied 11 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 19 minutes . The Bucks shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from long range . The Bucks ( 15 - 12 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Saturday . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 8 - 20 ) play host to the 76ers on Monday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 122 - 101 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Wednesday evening . The Bucks got out to a great start and had a 20 - 9 lead with just over five minutes left in the first quarter . The Pacers were able to get their act together before things got much worse , but could not make much of a dent in the deficit , as they trailed 62 - 52 at halftime . The Bucks continued to play with the edge , expanding their lead to 18 in the third quarter , before taking a 93 - 76 lead into the fourth . The Bucks maintained a healthy cushion the rest of the way as they cruised to the win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee , with 31 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 27 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Malcolm Brogdon chipped in 17 points , five assists and two rebounds , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Bucks shot 59 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 17 from long range . Meanwhile , Domantas Sabonis led the Pacers with 24 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . Darren Collison finished with 17 points , three steals , two assists and two rebounds , while Lance Stephenson tallied 15 points , seven rebounds and five assists , in 34 minutes . The Pacers shot 49 percent from the field , including 3 - of - 15 from long range . The Pacers ( 19 - 19 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Bulls on Saturday . The Bucks ( 20 - 16 ) play host to the Raptors on Friday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks in overtime , 123 - 121 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Sunday . The fact that this game went into overtime shows just how close it really was , as there were 15 ties and 13 lead changes in total . In fact , no team led by more than three points for the entirety of the fourth quarter and overtime . The key for the Pelicans was scoring in the paint , as they won that differential , 66 - 56 . Rebounding was also a big factor , with New_Orleans outrebounding Milwaukee , 50 - 45 . The Pelicans ( 33 - 26 ) were led by Jrue Holiday , as he tallied 36 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Anthony Davis accrued 27 points , 13 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Rajon Rondo collected 16 points , eight rebounds and 12 assists . Nikola Mirotic led the bench with 14 points , seven rebounds and four blocks . The Bucks ( 33 - 26 ) were led by Khris Middleton , as he totaled 25 points , five rebounds and three assists . Eric Bledsoe finished with 20 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo generated 20 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jabari Parker led the bench with a season - best 18 points , six rebounds and two assists . Milwaukee returns to action on Tuesday , as they play host to the Washington Wizards . As for New_Orleans , they play host to the Phoenix Suns on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 107 - 104 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Tuesday evening . The Wizards got out to a blistering start on the road , as they outscored the Bucks , 40 - 22 , in the first quarter . The Wizards expanded their lead to as many as 19 during the second quarter , but the Bucks pushed back to make it a 14 - point game heading into the half , where they trailed 64 - 50 . The Bucks came out strong in the third , and quickly cut the lead to single digits . They outscored the Wizards 31 - 20 in the quarter , making it just a three - point game heading into the fourth . The Bucks kept battling and made it really close , as they cut the deficit to just one point midway through the quarter , however the Wizards were able to maintain that slight edge and thanks to a clutch three by Bradley Beal in the last minute , created enough separation to come away with the win . Beal led the Wizards with 21 points , eight assists , seven rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Otto Porter Jr. followed up with 17 points , seven rebounds , three steals , two assists and one block , while Markieff Morris added 14 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 32 minutes . The Wizards shot 48 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 23 points , 13 rebounds , eight assists , six blocks and three steals , in 39 minutes . Eric Bledsoe and Khris Middleton finished with 17 points each , while Jabari Parker tallied 19 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Bucks shot 46 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . The Bucks ( 33 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pistons in Detroit on Wednesday . The Wizards ( 36 - 25 ) play host to the Warriors on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 117 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Saturday . The Bucks ( 37 - 32 ) entered this game against the Hawks ( 20 - 50 ) as massive favorites and while at times it did n't look like that , in the end Milwaukee worked their way to a huge win that will give them a nice boost heading into their potential playoff race . Atlanta looked better early on , though , and they jumped to a 31 - 26 lead in the first quarter . Milwaukee answered with a 30 - 19 lead in the second quarter , and they would never look back . The Bucks added to their lead on a 39 - 37 third quarter , and while the Hawks stormed back in the fourth ( 30 - 27 ) , it was n't enough and the Bucks clinched a much - needed win at home . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with another impressive performance , as he finished with 33 points , 12 rebounds , seven assists , and two blocks . Khris Middleton added 23 points and seven boards , while Eric Bledsoe contributed 19 points , nine assists and three rebounds . John Henson and Tony Snell each had 11 points , while Jabari Parker added 15 coming off the bench . Taurean Prince was the best player for Atlanta , as he finished with a game - high 38 points and added eight rebounds . Dennis Schroder had 18 points with nine assists , while John Collins had a strong double - double of 15 points and 12 rebounds . Dewayne Dedmon had 10 points and eight boards , while Mike Muscala managed to contributed 12 points coming off the bench .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 119 - 111 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Thursday . While Milwaukee came into this game as a monster favorite , Brooklyn was in control for the majority of this game . In fact , they led for well over 40 minutes , as Milwaukee never led by more than four points . With that said , there were 12 ties and 11 lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor for Brooklyn , as they won that battle , 37 - 29 . Ball movement was also big , with the Nets recording 30 assists and the Bucks handing out just 21 on their end . Rim protection was also critical , with Brooklyn swatting away 12 shots and Milwaukee recording just two blocks . The Nets ended up shooting 55 percent from the field and 49 percent from three - point range while the Bucks hit just 44 percent from the field and 25 percent from long range . The Nets ( 26 - 53 ) were led by Allen Crabbe , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . D'Angelo Russell accrued 22 points and five assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson collected 14 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and four blocks . Joe Harris started and totaled 17 points , four rebounds and six assists . The Bucks ( 42 - 37 ) were led by Khris Middleton , as he amassed 31 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 19 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and four steals . Eric Bledsoe accumulated 18 points , three rebounds , six assists and four steals . Jabari Parker led the bench with 13 points and 10 boards . Both teams play road games on Saturday for their next outings , with Brooklyn facing the Chicago Bulls and Milwaukee playing the New York Knicks .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 107 - 106 , at United Center on Friday evening . The game got out to a quick start , as two of the league 's lowest scoring teams combined for 60 points in the first quarter , with the Bulls taking the early 31 - 29 advantage . Things stayed tight but the Kings nudged ahead in the second quarter , to take a 61 - 60 lead into halftime . Sacramento maintained the one - point advantage after three quarters , leading 82 - 81 heading into the fourth . It was still a one - point game with 3:20 left to play , when the Kings finally pulled ahead with a five - point lead . Still , the Kings ( 7 - 15 ) only narrowly escaped with the win , while the Bulls suffered their eighth straight loss for the Bulls ( 3 - 18 ) . Zach Randolph led the way for the Kings , with 25 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , 13 rebounds , three assists and one block , in 31 minutes . Bogdan Bogdanovic followed up with 19 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . Garrett Temple added 13 points , five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . The Kings shot 53 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Jerian Grant was the high - point man for Chicago , with 17 points , on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 26 minutes off the bench . Paul Zipser tallied 14 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block , in 23 minutes off the bench , while Robin Lopez finished with 14 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 29 minutes . The Bulls shot 47 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 35 from long range . The Bulls look to turn things around , as they play host to the Cavaliers on Monday . The Kings will be back in action on Saturday , when they visit Milwaukee to take on the Bucks .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the New_York Knicks , 104 - 102 , at United Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that Chicago led for the majority of this game , New_York hung around and made it close . In fact , there were six ties and 13 lead changes in total , as the Bulls never led by more than 13 points . The Bulls actually had a 10 - point lead with five minutes left , but allowed the Knicks to tie the game with eight seconds left , as they committed numerous turnovers in the final minute . Kris Dunn then played hero , as he sank two free - throws with 3 seconds left to win the game . New_York simply dug themselves too big of a hole out of the gate , as they trailed 27 - 18 after the first quarter . Chicago 's offense was on point , as they recorded 28 assists , while hitting 51 percent of their shots . The Bulls also did work on defense , recording 10 steals and seven blocks , while holding the Knicks to just six steals and three blocks . A 17 - 6 fastbreak differential was huge as well . The Knicks ( 12 - 13 ) were led by Kristaps Porzingis , as he tallied 23 points , four rebounds and two assists . Courtney Lee amassed 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Enes Kanter totaled 10 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Doug McDermott , Kyle O'Quinn and Frank Ntiiikina all scored 10 points a piece off the bench . The Bulls ( 5 - 20 ) best player was Kris Dunn , as he collected 17 points , seven rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Lauri Markkanen accrued 15 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Nikola Mirotic dropped 19 points to lead the bench . On deck for New_York is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday . As for Chicago , they play host to the Boston Celtics on Monday for their next fixture .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Orlando Magic , 112 - 94 , at United Center on Wednesday evening . The Bulls ( 10 - 20 ) have seemingly been a different team since getting Nikola Mirotic back from this preseason facial injury on Dec. 8 , as they came into Wednesday having won all six of the games he 'd played thus far . The talented fourth - year big man was at it again Wednesday , posting a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double in just 22 minutes off the bench to help lead Chicago to its seventh home win . The Bulls established some distance with a 59 - 48 halftime edge and then blew the game open in the third , outscoring Orlando by a 31 - 18 margin during the period . They got it done on both ends of the floor , shooting a stellar 50 percent from the field while limiting the visitors to a 39 percent figure . Nikola Vucevic paced the Magic with an 18 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included five assists . Elfrid Payton posted 14 points , eight assists , six rebounds and one steal . D.J. Augustin matched his fellow point guard 's scoring total off the bench while also supplying three steals and one assist . Mario Hezonja registered 12 points and two rebounds while drawing another start at power forward for Aaron Gordon ( concussion ) . Jonathon Simmons could n't get much going , shooting just 2 - for - 9 on his way to a six - point effort that also included six rebounds , one assist and one block . Denzel Valentine bounced back from a recent downturn in production to lead the way for the Bulls with a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one steal . Kris Dunn filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , seven assists , six rebounds , three steals and one block . Bobby Portis was productive off the bench with 14 points , five boards and two assists . Jerian Grant managed 13 points , six assists , two rebounds and one block . Robin Lopez provided 10 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Lauri Markkanen offered nine points , five boards and one block . The Magic return home and await the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday night , while the Bulls hit the road to face the defending Eastern Conference champion Cleveland Cavaliers on Thursday evening .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the New_York Knicks , 92 - 87 , at United Center on Wednesday evening . The Bulls ( 12 - 22 ) have progressively been clawing their way out of their considerable early - season hole , and their ability to defend the home court has been integral to that effort . Chicago came into Thursday 's contest with a respectable 8 - 8 record at United Center , but their quest to rise above .500 was looking bleak after a first quarter in which they were outscored by a 28 - 17 margin . However , the home squad turned the tables on the improved Knicks ( 17 - 17 ) in the second , rattling off 32 points to close their halftime deficit to a manageable 52 - 49 spread . A tightly contested third period in which the teams virtually matched each other basket - for - basket paved the way for an exciting final 12 minutes . Ultimately , two of the Bulls ' emerging young players flashed some steely nerve with the game on the line , as both Kris Dunn and Justin Holiday managed to drain a pair of free throws apiece over the final seven seconds to afford Chicago the final margin of victory . Notably , both teams posted identical 41 percent success rates from the field overall , but New_York connected on only 17 percent of their 23 attempts from behind the arc . Kristaps Porzingis led the way for the Knicks with 23 points , and he added six rebounds , one assist , three blocks and one steal . Courtney Lee followed with 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jarrett Jack posted 11 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Enes Kanter could n't come close to duplicating the 31 - point , 22 - rebound double - double he 'd managed in his most recent contest , as he finished with four points , 11 boards and one assist . Kyle O'Quinn contributed a bench - leading nine points and eight rebounds - - along with one assist - - in 17 minutes . Dunn paced the Bulls with 17 points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . Lauri Markkanen pitched in 12 points , two boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Robin Lopez and Holiday had matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , and the latter supplying nine rebounds , three assists and one steal . Denzel Valentine registered nine points , nine rebounds and one steal . Paul Zipser and Bobby Portis led the second unit with matching eight - point tallies . The Knicks remain on the road and head to the Lone Star State , where they 'll take on the San Antonio Spurs on Thursday evening . The Bulls remain home and await a visit from the Chicago Bulls on Friday night .

In fact , the Lakers blew a 13 - point fourth quarter lead , as Chicago grabbed a small lead with five minutes remaining . The Lakers then responded by ending the game on a 16 - 8 run . The shooting disparity was critical , with Los_Angeles shooting 45 percent and Chicago hitting under 38 percent of their shots . The Lakers also won the fastbreak differential , 33 - 11 and outscored the Bulls in the paint , 52 - 30 . The Lakers ( 19 - 29 ) were led by Brandon Ingram , as he tallied 25 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Brook Lopez totaled 17 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Julius Randle finished with 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 19 points , two rebounds and four assists .
