The Chicago Bulls defeated the Washington Wizards , 113 - 94 , at United Center on Sunday . The Bulls ( 26 - 51 ) entered this game as massive underdogs , but they managed to grind out an impressive win against a team that is already looking towards the postseason such as the Wizards ( 42 - 35 ) . Chicago jumped ahead to a 36 - 27 advantage in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Washington could not win any of the subsequent three quarters either , so they looked overmatched overall while Chicago had one of their best performances in recent weeks . Lauri Markkanen was the top scorer for Chicago since he finished with 23 points and six rebounds , while making five of his eight three - point attempts . Sean Kilpatrick did a very good job off the bench since he contributed 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Jerian Grant had 11 points with seven dimes . Justin Holiday ended with 12 points , and David Nwaba filled the stat sheet with 10 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Wizards did n't have John Wall , and the team certainly felt his absence on the playmaking aspect of the game . Bradley Beal had 15 points with five assists , four rebounds , and three steals . Otto Porter Jr. was the team 's top scorer , though , as he finished with 17 points . Marcin Gortat had 10 points and seven boards . Mike Scott delivered 14 points and five rebounds coming off the bench .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 119 - 87 , at United Center on Wednesday . In a much - needed finale for both of these teams , Detroit won in dominating fashion . A 35 - 21 first quarter really set the tone , as Chicago never got the game within an eight - point margin from there . In addition , they led by at least 20 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was drastic , with Detroit connecting on 53 percent of their shots while Chicago hit just 37 percent from the field . Defense was also key , with the Pistons recording 12 steals and four blocks while the Bulls had just eight steals and one block . That led to Detroit winning the turnover differential , 18 - 11 . The Pistons ( 39 - 43 ) were led by Luke Kennard , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds and five assists . Eric Moreland started and accumulated 16 points , 17 rebounds , four assists , four steals and four blocks . Henry Ellenson led the bench with 14 points and 10 boards . The Bulls ( 27 - 55 ) were led by Lauri Markkanen , as he accrued 20 points , eight rebounds and two steals . Sean Kilpatrick totaled 14 points , two rebounds and four assists . David Nwaba generated 13 points , six rebounds and two assists . Neither of these clubs reached the postseason , as Detroit finished ninth in the Eastern Conference while Chicago finished 13th .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 115 - 112 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday evening . The Cavaliers ( 24 - 9 ) knew they 'd have their hands full against the rapidly improving Bulls ( 10 - 21 ) , which had managed seven straight wins coming into Thursday , a stretch that encompassed all six games Nikola Mirotic had played since his season debut on Dec. 8 . The script played out more or less as expected , as Chicago literally hung with the defending Eastern Conference champs shot - for - shot until 14 seconds remaining in the contest . The visitors had closed the deficit to 113 - 112 at that point following a Denzel Valentine driving layup , but that 's when two players with six NBA championships between them stepped up to deny them victory . LeBron James drained a pair of free throws with 11 seconds left , and Dwyane Wade put his trademark defense on display by blocking Kris Dunn 's would - be game - tying 27 - foot three - point attempt and then grabbing the rebound on a subsequent Valentine three - point miss with under two ticks on the clock . As the final score implied , both teams put on an offensive display , with the Bulls draining 55 percent of their 85 attempts and the Cavs managing a 51 percent success rate of their own . Lauri Markkanen paced Chicago with 25 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Valentine followed with 18 points , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Mirotic was next with a bench - leading 15 points , a total he supplemented with five boards and one assist . Robin Lopez posted 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Dunn managed a modest 10 points but also dished out 14 assists , hauled in five rebounds and recorded one steal . Justin Holiday pitched in eight points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . James led the Cavaliers with 34 points , nine assists , six rebounds and three steals . Kevin Love totaled 27 points , seven boards and two assists . Kyle Korver led the second unit with 15 points and also registered two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Wade and Jeff Green had matching 10 - point tallies , with the former also totaling four assists , three rebounds , three steals and two blocks and the latter bringing down four boards . Jose Calderon had eight points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . The Bulls remain on the road and tangle with Celtics on Saturday night , while the Cavaliers head west for a marquee Christmas Day Finals rematch against the Golden State Warriors .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Orlando Magic , 104 - 103 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . Cleveland looked to be in control for the majority of this game , but Orlando actually fought back to make it a close game . In fact , Orlando overcame a 20 - point halftime deficit to take their one and only lead in the final two minutes . Cleveland was still able to prevail though , as Isaiah Thomas hit two big free throws late to take the lead . Orlando dominated the stat sheet , as they won the field goal percentage , assists , steals , blocks and turnover differentials . Points off turnovers was Cleveland 's only big advantage , as they won that battle , 28 - 17 . The Magic ( 13 - 32 ) were led by Elfrid Payton , as he tallied 19 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon finished with 17 points . 11 rebounds , two assists and three steals . Evan Fournier amassed 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Cavaliers ( 27 - 17 ) were led by Isaiah Thomas , as he accrued 21 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . LeBron James collected 16 points , five rebounds and six assists . Kevin Love totaled 12 points and 11 rebounds .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 115 - 108 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Friday evening . Given recent events , the Cavaliers may well have been the first 28 - 19 team in NBA history in desperate need of a victory . Cleveland came into Friday 's contest having lost six of their previous eight games , a streak with a particularly grim undertone considering their lofty expectations . However , as poor as many of their recent performances had been , the defending Eastern Conference champs came out of the gates with the hot hand . The home squad racked up an eye - popping 73 points in the first half , but their suspect defense also allowed the Pacers ( 26 - 23 ) to tally a robust 60 to keep within striking distance . The Cavs kept their foot on the gas in the third , keeping their lead large enough heading into the final period to ultimately withstand a late Indiana surge . Cleveland not only prevailed on the scoreboard , but they also triumphed in two key categories ; they outshot the visitors by a 56 percent - 47 percent margin and won the rebounding battle , 44 - 37 . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers with 25 points , a total he supplemented with seven assists , six rebounds and one steal . Darren Collison followed with 19 points , seven assists , two rebounds , six steals and one block . Domantas Sabonis produced a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Lance Stephenson managed a bench - leading 11 points while also hauling in three rebounds and dishing out two assists . Bojan Bogdanovic and Thaddeus Young turned in matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist and three steals , and the latter turning in two rebounds , four assists and one steal . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with a 26 - point , 11 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included four steals and one block . However , he also committed a game - high 11 turnovers . J.R. Smith followed with 23 points and also supplied four steals . Derrick Rose accounted for 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Isaiah Thomas posted 12 points , five assists , two rebounds and one block . Jeff Green turned in 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tristan Thompson and Kevin Love both turned in 10 - point double - doubles . Thompson added 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Love hauled in 13 boards , dished out three assists and recorded a pair of steals . The Pacers head back home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Saturday night , while the Cavaliers remain home and await a visit from the Detroit Pistons on Sunday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 120 - 88 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Saturday . It 's rare to see a Finals contender dominated so badly at home , but that 's indicative of which direction these teams are headed . In fact , it was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as the Cavaliers trailed by at least 20 points for the entirety of the second half . That can be attributed to a 65 - 39 first half in the favor of Houston , as they never got within single - digits after the first quarter either . The Rockets ended up hitting 44 - of - 93 from the field and 19 - of - 51 from three - point range . Cleveland hit just 34 - of - 87 from the field while hitting 8 - of - 30 from three - point range . The Rockets ( 38 - 13 ) were led by Chris Paul , as he collected 22 points , eight rebounds and 11 assists . Ryan Anderson totaled 21 points and eight rebounds . James Harden accrued 16 points , six rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Gerald Green led the bench with 17 points , three rebounds and three blocks . The Cavaliers ( 30 - 21 ) had no player score more than 12 points , as Isaiah Thomas led them with 12 points , five rebounds and three assists . J.R. Smith matched those 12 points , adding seven rebounds to his line . LeBron James accumulated 11 points , nine rebounds and nine assists . Both teams play road games on Tuesday for their next outings , with Houston playing the Brooklyn Nets and Cleveland facing off with the Orlando Magic .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 94 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Spurs ( 36 - 25 ) and Cavaliers ( 35 - 24 ) came into the marquee matinee with strikingly similar records but decidedly different trajectories . San_Antonio was reeling prior to Sunday , having dropped six of their previous seven contests . Meanwhile , buoyed by a plethora of prudent trade - deadline acquisitions , Cleveland had rattled off four victories in their last five games to somewhat right their ship . The first half was a testament to how evenly matched the two clubs were , as the hosts got out to a slim 53 - 50 halftime lead . Matters took a turn for the better for the visitors coming out of intermission , as they outscored the Cavs by a 26 - 21 margin during the period . The beginning of the fourth quarter would prove to be the difference in the tightly contested battle , as the Spurs ripped off a 16 - 5 run over the first 5:3 , giving them a double - digit cushion that would prove to be enough . The defending Eastern Conference champs never got closer than eight points after that juncture , and they failed to score over the final 1:21 of the contest . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 27 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , three assists and one block . Danny Green headed to the bench but thrived , pouring in 22 points and adding three rebounds , one steal and one block over 23 minutes . Dejounte Murray supplied a full line of 13 points , nine boards , five assists , four steals and three blocks . Bryn Forbes totaled 12 points , one rebound and one steal in 20 minutes on the second unit . Patty Mills and Pau Gasol provided matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out five assists , hauling in two rebounds and recording one steal , and the latter tallying seven rebounds and three assists . Kyle Anderson was solid while contributing 10 points . six rebounds , four assists , three blocks and two steals . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with a near - triple - double of 33 points , 13 rebounds , nine assists and one steal . Jordan Clarkson went for 17 points and two rebounds while leading the bench in scoring . Jeff Green posted 14 points , two boards , one assist and one steal . Tristan Thompson accounted for six points , 13 rebounds and one steal . Cedi Osman mustered just four points and one rebound , while the starting backcourt duo of George Hill ( two points , two rebounds , one assist and one block ) and J.R. Smith ( two points , two rebounds ) were significantly underwhelming . The Spurs head back home and take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday evening , while the Cavaliers remain home and await a Tuesday evening visit from the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 108 - 97 on Thursday at Quicken Loans Arena . After the 76ers ( ) led nearly the entire game , the Cavaliers ( ) went on a run in the final period and a three - pointer from Kyle Korver ultimately cut the lead to one at 95 - 94 with 2:25 remaining . Then , Philadelphia 's Dario Saric responded with a three from the corner , and that kicked off a 13 - 3 run for the Sixers to end the game and put an end to their two - game skid . It was a complete team effort from the 76ers , with all five starters scoring in double figures . J.J. Redick led the way with an impressive shooting performance , going 4 - of - 7 from behind the arc and 7 - of - 11 from the field overall en route to scoring a team - high 22 points . Ben Simmons came close to a triple - double with 18 points , nine rebounds and eight assists , while Joel Embiid posted a monster double - double of 17 points and 14 rebounds to go along with six assists . As for Cleveland , they 've now dropped three of their last five games , with their two wins coming over the lowly Grizzlies and Nets . It was a loss caused by yet another poor shooting performance from behind the arc , as these Cavaliers are starting to show how much they live and die by the three . As a team , Cleveland shot just 28 percent from downtown , with the starting backcourt of George Hill and Rodney Hood combining to go just 1 - of - 9 . The only bright spot for the Cavaliers was , once again , the play of LeBron James , who nearly recorded yet another triple - double with a game - high 30 points , nine rebounds and eight assists . The result brings these teams closer together , with the 76ers now just 2 games behind the Cavaliers for the No . 3 seed in the Eastern Conference .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 102 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Friday evening . The game was meaningful to both clubs in terms of playoff positioning , but even more so for the Pelicans ( 45 - 33 ) , which despite a sixth seed , stood precariously close tumbling out of the tight Western Conference playoff race with a couple of ill - timed losses . Accordingly , New_Orleans turned up the heat after drawing even with the Cavaliers ( 46 - 30 ) , 29 - 29 , after one quarter . They outscored their hosts by a 28 - 18 margin in the second to forge a 10 - point halftime advantage , but Cleveland came roaring back in the third with a 33 - point quarter that took them into the fourth sporting a one - point edge . The Pelicans would battle back to take an 85 - 82 lead at the 10:3 mark of the final period following a Darius Miller 26 - foot three - point jumper , but the home squad would erase it soon thereafter and would n't relinquish the lead again . Jrue Holiday led the way for the Pelicans with 25 points , a total to which he added six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Nikola Mirotic led the second unit with 20 points and supplemented them with seven rebounds and three assists . Anthony Davis had a rough shooting night , managing a modest 16 points on a 6 - for - 19 tally from the field . He also ripped down eight rebounds , dished out three assists , posted two blocks and recorded one steal . Miller finished with 11 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Rajon Rondo drew the start and mustered seven points , eight assists and one rebound . Solomon Hill and Ian Clark contributed matching seven - point tallies off the bench , with the former also collecting five rebounds and three assists , and the latter registering two assists and one rebound . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with a 27 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included nine rebounds and one steal . Jordan Clarkson followed with a bench - leading 23 points , along with four boards and two assists . Rodney Hood poured in 16 points and tallied two rebounds and two assists . Kevin Love was able to play after clearing concussion protocol but totaled a modest eight points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal over 24 minutes . George Hill matched his scoring total , while Larry Nance , Jr. offered five points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals over 15 minutes . The Pelicans head back home and face the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday evening , while the Cavaliers remain home and tangle with the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday evening as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 98 - 87 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday evening . The Mavericks got out to a strong start on the road , with an early 10 - 4 lead , and hung on to take a 25 - 18 lead into the second quarter . They stayed in control to start the second , and led down to the final minute of the half . Nonetheless , the Cavs chipped away and closed the quarter strong to claim a 48 - 47 lead by halftime . The Mavericks came back in the third quarter , and took the lead just a couple minutes in . They maintained an edge for most of the rest of the quarter and carried a 77 - 73 lead into the fourth . The tides turned in the fourth , as the Cavs overtook the lead early and ultimately outscored Dallas 25 - 10 in the quarter , to notch their third straight win . LeBron James led Cleveland with yet another triple - double , with 16 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists , in 38 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 13 points , 13 rebounds , one steal and one block , while Jordan Clarkson chipped in 16 points off the bench . The Cavs shot 41 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 30 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , in 36 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 14 points , six assists and four rebounds , while Doug McDermott added nine points and two rebounds off the bench . The Mavs shot 40 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 37 from long range . The Mavericks ( 23 - 54 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail Blazers on Tuesday . The Cavaliers ( 47 - 30 ) play host to the Raptors on Tuesday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Boston Celtics 118 - 108 on Monday at TD Garden . Monday night 's performance was among the most impressive of the season from the Pistons ( 13 - 6 ) , as they pretty much led the game from wire to wire . For every run the Celtics ( 18 - 4 ) had in them , Detroit had a response . Andre Drummond was phenomenal for the Pistons , scoring 26 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting from the field to go along with 22 rebounds , six assists and four steals . Tobias Harris continued his great 2017 - 18 campaign , scoring a game - high 31 points and grabbing eight rebounds , while Reggie Jackson scored 20 points of his own and dished out seven assists . As a team , the Pistons shot a scorching 44 percent from behind the arc and 52 percent from the field overall . Unsurprisingly , for the Celtics , it was their worst defensive performance of the season by far , with the league 's top scoring defense gave up a season - high 118 points . Boston still had a great shooting night , shooting an impressive 16 - of - 33 ( 48 percent ) from three and 52 percent from the field overall , but the Celtics committed 17 turnovers and shot just 12 - of - 21 from the free throw line . Marcus Smart came off the bench and did everything he could to keep his team in the game , shooting 6 - of - 9 from behind the arc en route to scoring a team - high 23 points in 32 minutes , but ultimately it was not enough . Kyrie Irving added 18 points and nine assists , but shot just 6 - of - 16 from the field . Up next , the Pistons will look to continue their winning ways Wednesday against the Suns , while the Celtics will remain home Thursday and play the 76ers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Boston Celtics , 107 - 95 , at TD Garden on Friday evening . The Jazz ( 14 - 15 ) came into Friday 's game looking to snap a four - game losing streak , although a road matchup against a tough Celtics ( 24 - 7 ) certainly did n't bode well for their chances of doing so . Matters then took a turn for the worse during the contest , as Rudy Gobert went down in the first quarter after teammate Derrick Favors rolled up on his left knee . Favors eventually exited the contest with his own injury , as he suffered a facial laceration that required six stitches . However , Utah 's reserves stepped up , as Jonas Jerebko celebrated his return to Boston by co - leading the bench with 17 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two steals and one block . The second unit contributed 50 points overall , and the visitors managed an impressive 48 percent success rate from the field , including 52 percent from three - point range . Meanwhile , they limited the Celtics to 41 percent shooting , and despite their shallow frontcourt , they outrebounded Boston by a 55 - 31 margin . Ricky Rubio led the Jazz with 22 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . Donovan Mitchell followed with a near double - double consisting of 17 points , nine assists and six rebounds . Rodney Hood matched Mitchell 's scoring total land added five rebounds , one steal and one block . Joe Ingles pitched in with 12 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Alec Burks was productive off the bench with eight points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with a dynamic 33 - point tally that also included six assists and four rebounds . Al Horford was next with 21 points , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals . Shane Larkin led the bench with nine points and added a rebound and a steal . Jayson Tatum posted seven points , four rebounds and two assists . Jaylen Brown mustered a modest six points , but he also hauled in six rebounds , recorded four steals and posted three blocks . The Jazz remain on the road and visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies at FedEx Forum on Saturday evening as well .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Utah Jazz , 102 - 84 , at Staples Center on Tuesday . Both the Jazz ( 2 - 2 ) and the Clippers ( 30 ) came into Tuesday 's matchup with hopes of continuing their hot starts to the season . Early on , the game seemed to be a competitive one , with multiple lead changes occurring in the first two quarters . The early going saw strong defensive play on both sides , with lock - down centers Rudy Gobert and DeAndre Jordan each impressing . After the start of the second half , however , Blake Griffin and the Clippers ' offense began to run away with the game . Los_Angeles outscored Utah 33 - 15 in the third quarter , thanks to a quick start from Griffin and the rest of the opening unit . Utah began to mount a comeback effort in the fourth , whittling the lead down to single digits , but quickly saw its hopes stamped out by tough play from the Clippers . Star defensive guard , Patrick Beverley , helped put the game out of reach with two clutch steals in the game 's final minutes , and added a dagger three - pointer on the offensive end . Overall , Los_Angeles once again relied heavily on Griffin as an offensive leader . With superstar point guard Chris Paul parting ways with the Clippers this offseason , the highly - skilled Griffin has seen the ball in his hands more than ever over the first three games . On Tuesday , Griffin helped lead the winning effort with a team - high 22 points , as well as eight rebounds and six assists . Griffin turned heads in the first quarter with an emphatic highlight - reel dunk over All-Defense center Rudy Gobert . Another one of LA 's entertaining dunkers , DeAndre Jordan , also impressed with his play . Jordan led the team with 18 rebounds and chipped in 11 points . However , the game marked an unfortunate return to form for Jordan at the free - throw line , where he shot just 1 - of - 4 after having not missed a free - throw in his first two games of the season . Utah , meanwhile , lost control of the game in the second half but still had plenty of positive takeaways from the loss . Rookie wing Donovan Mitchell had a team - best scoring performance , pouring in 19 points and helping to spark the Jazz 's comeback effort in the fourth quarter . Rudy Gobert , meanwhile , looked potent on both ends of the floor , shooting a perfect 5 - of - 5 from the field and rejecting three shots . It appears Utah has yet to find a consistent go - to scorer to replace Gordon Hayward , however , as in each of the first four games a different member of the Jazz led the team in shot attempts . Mitchell was the team 's top shot - taker on Tuesday with 20 field goal attempts . The Jazz will visit Phoenix on Wednesday , while the Clippers see Portland on Thursday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 104 - 101 , at Staples Center on Sunday afternoon . The Heat ( 4 - 5 ) came into the game still seeking their first road win of the season , and they came out of the gates seemingly locked in on accomplishing the feat Sunday . Miami forged a 34 - 20 lead by the end of the first quarter and took an 89 - 66 advantage into the fourth period . However , the Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) battled back , ultimately racking up 35 points in the final 12 minutes and even taking a 101 - 100 lead with 26 seconds remaining . A pair of clutch free throws by James Johnson allowed Miami to regain a 102 - 101 advantage with eight seconds left , and Josh Richardson sealed the deal with another pair of successful attempts from the charity stripe after he grabbed a defensive rebound off a missed Blake Griffin 17 - footer . The visitors prevailed despite getting decimated on the glass by a 50 - 37 margin . Hassan Whiteside led the way for the Heat with a 21 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , three steals and two blocks . Tyler Johnson followed with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with three assists , two rebounds and three steals . Wayne Ellington tallied 17 points , two assists , one rebound and one block . Johnson and Richardson generated matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists , two rebounds and one block and the latter supplying four assists , two rebounds and three steals . Goran Dragic managed 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Griffin led the way for the Clippers with 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Lou Williams followed with a bench - leading 22 points , which he supplemented with two boards and two assists . Austin Rivers registered 12 points , three assists , two rebounds , four steals and one block . Willie Reed was productive on the second unit against his old squad , totaling 10 points , four rebounds and one steal . DeAndre Jordan matched Reed 's point total and also hauled in 19 rebounds , dished out three assists and recorded a block . The Heat continues on their brief West Coast swing with a visit to the Golden State Warriors on Monday evening , while the Clippers tangle with the Spurs in San Antonio on Tuesday night .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Phoenix Suns , 108 - 95 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for Los_Angeles ( 12 - 18 ) , but was in line with recent matchups between the two teams . The Clippers have now defeated the Suns in six straight meetings , and have won 15 of their last 17 against Phoenix dating back to 2013 . On Wednesday , the struggling Clippers looked far removed from their recent woes , shooting a healthy 47 percent from the field and holding a double - digit lead for the majority of the game . All-Star center DeAndre Jordan enjoyed a dominant performance on the interior , finishing with 12 points and a game - high 20 rebounds . The game also marked a bounce back for recently - returned Clippers rookie Milos Teodosic . Teodosic , who missed significant time with a foot injury earlier in the season , earned the start and led the team with eight assists in the win . Phoenix ( 11 - 22 ) was coming off two straight wins before dropping to the Clippers on Wednesday . The Suns struggled mightily on the offensive end , shooting just over 36 percent on the night . Those struggles were particularly apparent early in the game , as the team scored just 11 points over the first 10:54 of play . While things began to came together more in the second half , Phoenix was unable to whittle away at the double - digit lead that Los_Angeles established early on . With star shooting guard Devin Booker ( groin ) out , the Suns relied heavily on forward T.J. Warren for scoring . Warren finished the game with 22 points and 10 rebounds , but shot an unimpressive 9 - of - 24 from the field in the game . Rookie wing Josh Jackson also shouldered some of the offensive load , taking 18 shots en route to 17 points . The Clippers will visit Houston to take on the first - place Rockets on Friday . Phoenix , meanwhile , faces the second half of a back - to - back as the Suns host the Grizzlies on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the host Sacramento Kings on Tuesday , 122 - 95 . The win was hardly ever in question for LA ( 14 - 19 ) , as the Clippers jumped out to an 18 - point lead by halftime . Strong bench play and work on the boards helped propel LA to the blowout win . The team saw multiple 20 - point outings off the bench , including a team - high 22 from big man Montrezl Harrell . All in all , the Clippers ' second unit scored a whopping 72 points , proving a crucial component of the blowout victory . LA also excelled on the glass , finishing with 22 second - chance points . This was , in part , thanks to All-Star caliber center DeAndre Jordan , who had a 13 - point , 15 - rebound double - double . The Clippers have now won three of their last four games , despite the continued absence of Blake Griffin ( knee ) . The Kings ( 11 - 22 ) had a two - game road win streak coming into Tuesday 's contest , but looked lost against a red - hot Clippers team . Only one Kings player , Willie Cauley-Stein , scored more than 10 points in the tough loss . Cauley-Stein led the team with 17 . The rest of the Kings , meanwhile , struggled to find the basket , as the team shot just 41 percent from the field in the loss . The Kings were not helped by an inability to make it to the free - throw line . The team took just 12 foul shots while allowing 27 for Los_Angeles . The Kings will host the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday , while the Clippers will square off with the Lakers on Thursday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 127 - 117 , at Staples Center on Thursday . Despite the fact that the Clippers led early on , the Thunder took control in the second half . In fact , a 31 - 20 fourth quarter was the difference , as Oklahoma_City trailed headed into the fourth quarter . Shooting was key , as the Thunder hit 54 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . The Clippers shot just 45 percent from the field and 30 percent from long range . Rim protection was also huge , as Oklahoma_City tripled up Los_Angeles in blocks , 6 - 2 . The Thunder ( 22 - 17 ) got another triple - double out of Russell Westbrook , as he collected 29 points , 12 rebounds and 11 assists . Paul George amassed 31 points , five rebounds and three assists on 12 - of - 16 from the field . Carmelo Anthony finished with 22 points , four rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 12 shooting . The Clippers ( 17 - 20 ) were led by DeAndre Jordan , as he tallied 26 points and 17 rebounds on 10 - of - 15 from the field . Blake Griffin accrued 24 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Lou Williams was huge off the bench , providing 26 points , three rebounds and 10 assists . The Clippers will return to action on Saturday in a home matchup versus the Golden State Warriors . As for Oklahoma_City , they travel to play the Phoenix Suns on Sunday for their next fixture .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 104 - 101 , at Staples Center on Monday . It was a back - and - forth game throughout , with the lead changing hands seven times by the game 's end . While Dallas led for much of the fourth quarter , LA was able to make a late push to come back to within one . After taking the lead by one point , the Clippers recovered a jump ball with 4 seconds remaining , leading to a clutch Avery Bradley lay - in to give the Clippers a three - point lead with under a second remaining . The Clippers ( 27 - 25 ) have now won four of their last five and do not seem to be missing a beat since trading star big man Blake Griffin last week . Griffin 's trade returned Avery Bradley and Tobias Harris from the Detroit Pistons . The duo has worked its way into the Clippers starting five seamlessly , and combined for 31 points in Monday 's win . The star of the show for LA , though , was Danilo Gallinari . Gallinari , who has struggled with injuries all season , was healthy and firing on all cylinders on Monday , as he scored a game - high 28 points on only 13 shot attempts . Dallas ( 17 - 37 ) is now 7 - 27 in games decided by five or fewer points this season . While the Mavericks have remained competitive with most teams , the relatively young squad remains one of the league 's bottom - tier teams due to poor clutch play . A lineup helmed by rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. closed out the game for the Mavericks , which ended up in a 10 - point lead being blown over the last 4:42 of the game . Smith , Jr. finished the game with 12 points on 5 - of - 17 shooting , committed nine turnovers , and fouled out . The Mavericks will visit Golden State on Thursday , while the Clippers face the Pistons on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 111 - 101 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . Led by Marc Gasol 's 34 points and 14 rebounds , the Grizzlies took a 19 - point lead in the third quarter before the Warriors rallied , cutting the deficit to nine points with about nine minutes remaining . That 's as close as they would get , however . Stephen Curry and Kevin Durant were both ejected with 44 seconds left ; Curry for throwing his mouthpiece and Durant for arguing with the officials . Curry led the Warriors with 37 points , six rebounds and three assists , while Durant added 29 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks . Defense was key for Memphis , as it held Golden_State to 39 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Golden_State also committed 17 turnovers . Klay Thompson struggled from the field , scoring 14 points on 5 - of - 16 shooting . No other player on the roster had more than eight points , as the Warriors fell to 1 - 2 , the first time in more than two years they have been below .500 . James Ennis totaled 13 points , four rebounds and three assists on 6 - of - 6 shooting for Memphis ( 20 ) . Mike Conley finished with 10 points and seven assists , despite going just 3 - of - 14 from the field . Both teams have road matchups on Monday for their next game , with Memphis playing the Houston Rockets and Golden_State facing the Dallas Mavericks .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 113 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . Memphis came into this game as a sizable favorite , but Indiana had none of that with a wire - to - wire victory on the road . Three-point shooting was the difference for the Pacers , as they hit 50 percent of their three 's . while holding the Grizzlies to just 25 percent . Both teams were efficient on offense though , as each team shot 51 percent from the field . The Indiana starters really dominated the Memphis starters , outscoring them , 82 - 64 . The Pacers ( 7 - 8 ) got a season - high 30 points out of Darren Collison , as he also provided two rebounds and eight assists . Domantas Sabonis led the bench with 13 points , six rebounds and four assists . The Houston Rockets defeated the hosting Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 83 , on Saturday evening . The Rockets ( 13 - 4 ) extended their positive run of results with an easy win over a Memphis ( 7 - 8 ) that was no match for Houston 's high - powered offense . Mike D'Antoni 's team quickly jumped to a 33 - 25 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . In fact , Houston won all four quarters and were in absolute control of the game from start to finish in order to clinch their eighth win in their last nine games . On the other hand , the Grizzlies dropped below the .500 mark . James Harden once again led Houston 's offense with a strong effort of 29 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Chris Paul added 17 points with six assists , and Clint Capela once again notched a double - double after finishing with 17 points and 14 boards . Ryan Anderson added 13 points , and Eric Gordon chipped in with 12 points off the bench . The Grizzlies did n't have Mike Conley , but Mario Chalmers did a decent job starting as point guard with eight assists alongside six points , four rebounds , and four steals . Chandler Parsons led the way with 17 points , while both JaMychal Green and Marc Gasol ended with 15 points apiece . Gasol ended one rebound shy of a double - double .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 94 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies started out strong , taking a 27 - 12 lead after one quarter . They carried the lead through halftime , before giving up a poor third quarter that allowed the Mavericks to take a two - point lead heading into the fourth . The Mavericks held a four - point lead with 3:30 to go in the game , before the Grizzlies battled back to tie things up with a clutch three - pointer by Marc Gasol , and then take a two - point lead with only 0 second left , thanks to a put - back jam by JaMychal Green . However , the game had room for one more highlight play , as Harrison Barnes banked in a game - winning , buzzer - beating , three - point shot , off an inbounds play with 0 second left , to steal the win for Dallas . Barnes led the way for the Mavericks ( 4 - 15 ) with 22 points , nine rebounds and one assist , in 34 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 26 minutes . J.J. Barea contributed 10 points , 11 assists and one rebound , in 24 minutes off the bench , while Devin Harris added 11 points , four steals and two rebounds , in 17 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke Evans led the Grizzlies ( 7 - 10 ) with 18 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , two steals and one block , in 30 minutes . Marc Gasol tallied 14 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and one block , while Chandler Parsons chipped in 11 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting . The Grizzlies shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 29 from long range . This marked the sixth straight loss for the Grizzlies , who take on the Nuggets in Denver on Friday . The Mavericks play host to the Thunder on Saturday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 99 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies ( 15 - 28 ) and the Knicks ( 20 - 25 ) played a very even game early on , but the Grizzlies always looked in control and grabbed right from the get go and they never looked back . Memphis built a one - point lead after the first quarter , increased it to an eight - point advantage at half time , and extended it to a 15 - point lead after three . One would have thought that Memphis would cruise the rest of the way , but New_York did n't give up that easily . The Knicks won the final 12 minutes by a nine - point advantage , but it was n't enough and the Grizzlies walked away with a huge win that pushed their winning streak to two . Meanwhile , the Knicks remain on a downward spiral and now have dropped four of their last five . As it has been the trend all season long , once again Tyreke Evans was Memphis ' best player since he finished with 23 points , 10 assists , and six rebounds . JaMychal Green delivered another strong effort , since the power forward posted a double - double of 18 points , 13 rebounds , and three assists . Dillon Brooks had 17 points , and Jarell Martin had 17 points off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis led the way for the Knicks , as the Latvian star had 21 points and nine rebounds . Enes Kanter added 20 points with nine boards , while Courtney Lee chipped in with 18 points of his own . The bench delivered a strong performance as well , since Tim Hardaway Jr. had 16 points and Michael Beasley added 18 points with seven rebounds .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 108 - 102 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . Denver needed this game a lot more than Memphis and it showed in the final minutes . In fact , the Nuggets held the Grizzlies to just 1 - of - 10 from the field to end the game , despite the fact that Memphis narrowly caught them with a 22 - 17 fourth quarter . The Nuggets actually led for over 45 minutes , as they led by at least three points from the first quarter on . Bench production was a huge factor for Denver , as they outscored Memphis ' bench , 45 - 27 . Both teams did a terrible job of taking care of the ball , as they combined for 31 steals . Shooting was also a critical difference for Denver , as they hit 55 percent of their shots while holding Memphis to just 44 percent from the field . The Nuggets ( 34 - 28 ) were led by Gary Harris , as he totaled 26 points , four rebounds and four steals on 11 - of - 18 from the field . Paul Millsap accrued 15 points , seven rebounds and four steals in a season - high 27 minutes . Nikola Jokic collected nine points , nine rebounds and five assists . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , six rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 43 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he tallied 22 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Jarrell Martin amassed 16 points and seven rebounds . Mario Chalmers accumulated 12 points , six assists and two blocks while Ben McLemore generated 12 points , three rebounds , two assists and four steals . Both teams will play road games on Saturday for their next outings , with Memphis playing the Orlando Magic and Denver facing the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 100 , at Phillips Arena on Friday evening . It was a close contest for most of three quarters , however the Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) were able to create some separation with a 15 - 7 run in the third , to take a 83 - 75 lead with just under nine minutes to play . The Nuggets upped their game in the fourth to seal the win , shooting 13 - of - 20 in the quarter , while the Hawks ( 1 - 5 ) let up on defense . Five players scored in double digits for Denver , including Gary Harris , Nikola Jokic and Will Barton , who tallied 18 points each . Jokic fortified his stat line with 15 rebounds and five assists , in 31 minutes of action . Paul Millsap and Emmanuel Mudiay added 16 points each , to help round out the Nuggets ' balanced attack . Meanwhile , Dennis Schroder was the high - point man for the Hawks , with 20 points , to go along with six assists and three rebounds , in 32 minutes . Taurean Prince continued his solid play with 19 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon recorded a double - double with 13 points and 10 rebounds , while the only other player to score in double digits for the Hawks was Marco Belinelli , with 15 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Hawks will look to bounce back when they play host to the Bucks on Sunday . The Nuggets will be in Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Sunday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 121 - 114 , at Philips Arena on Thursday evening . The Cavaliers ( 15 - 7 ) checked into Thursday as perhaps the NBA 's hottest team , having ripped off nine consecutive victories and seemingly having left their early - season struggles in the dust . Their chances at a 10th straight win appeared to be pretty solid against a Hawks ( 4 - 17 ) squad that had been able to do little right through the first 20 games of the campaign . However , as the old adage stresses , the games are played out on the court , not on the stat sheet . Atlanta surprised their visitors by bouncing back from a 42 - 35 first - quarter deficit with a 32 - 21 advantage in the second quarter that sent them into halftime with a 67 - 63 edge . Cleveland utilized intermission to regroup , however , as they regained the lead with a strong 36 - point third period before nearly matching their hosts point - for - point in the final 12 minutes to hang on for the win . The scoreboard operator was kept busy throughout the night , with each time tallying identical 52 percent success rate from the field . Kevin Love put on a second consecutive explosive performance to lead the Cavaliers , managing 25 points , 16 rebounds and two assists . LeBron James was right behind him with a 24 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Dwyane Wade produced a bench - leading 19 points and supplemented them with three assists , two rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Jae Crowder poured in 15 points and added three assists and two rebounds . Jeff Green was productive on the second unit as well with 12 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Dennis Schroder took on his usual role as offensive leader for the Hawks , leading the way with 27 points , five assists and two rebounds . Ersan Ilyasova supplied 22 points , three rebounds and five steals . Marco Belinelli registered 18 points , five assists , four rebounds and one block in 28 minutes off the bench . John Collins contributed 13 points , seven rebounds , two steals and one block in his first start for Dewayne Dedmon ( leg ) . Taurean Prince totaled 12 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Cavaliers head back home to tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday night , while the Hawks head to Brooklyn to face off with the Nets on Saturday afternoon .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 97 , at Philips Arena on Saturday afternoon . The Bulls ( 18 - 28 ) did n't have problems to record another win , demostrating that their surge during the past month or so has been the real deal . Chicago jumped to a 29 - 21 lead in the first half , and they increased it to a 55 - 38 advantage at the halftime break , as the Hawks ( 13 - 32 ) simply did n't have answers for a Bulls team that was clicking on all cylinders . Atlanta fought back in the third quarter , but the Bulls never left the foot out of the gas and cruised their way in the fourth , sealing the deal on the road and registering their fourth win in their last five games . Robin Lopez was the star of the game for Chicago , as the big man finished with 20 points ( on 9 - of - 13 from the field ) and five rebounds . Lauri Markkanen had 19 points , Bobby Portis had 14 , and Justin Holiday chipped in with 13 points , four rebounds , and four assists . Zach LaVine continue to work his way back from injury , as he contributed eight points and nine boards in 18 minutes . The Hawks had a balanced offense since 13 different players managed to score . However , Dennis Schroder was the undisputed leader of the offense since he contributed 18 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon impressed off the bench , as he finished with 11 points and 11 rebounds in 23 minutes . No other Hawks player scored in double digits .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Utah Jazz , 104 - 90 , at Philips Arena on Monday evening . The Hawks ( 14 - 32 ) delivered a strong performance on both ends of the court and as a result , they defeated a talented - - yet inconsistent - - Jazz ( 19 - 28 ) that did not have enough answers to fight back against an Atlanta team that seems to be on the rise . The first half showed both teams going back and forth , but the Hawks held a one - point lead ( 42 - 41 ) at the break . Atlanta increased their lead the rest of the way , winning the remaining two quarters by a combined 13 - point differential . The Hawks had four players scoring in double digits in this game and , as it has been the trend all season long , Dennis Schroder was the star thanks to his 20 - point performance . Taurean Prince had 17 points , three assists and three steals , while Kent Bazemore added 11 points of his own . Marco Belinelli also added 11 points off the bench . Ersan Ilyasova had five points and 11 boards . The Jazz registered five players scoring in double digits , although they featured an unsung hero coming off the bench since Alec Burks had 17 points . Donovan Mitchell had 13 points , but he only made five of his 13 shot attempts . Derrick Favors and Raul Neto had 11 points , while Royce O'Neale filled the stat sheet with 10 points , five boards , and four dimes .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 109 , at Philips Arena on Friday . The Warriors ( 49 - 14 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game and even though they managed to pull away with the win , they did n't have the kind of dominant performance many were expecting considering they were playing against one of the worst teams in the Eastern Conference such as the Hawks ( 19 - 44 ) . It 's safe to say the Warriors cruised , though , They built a 12 - point lead at halftime and never looked back , and even though Atlanta won the last two quarters ( 34 - 28 and 25 - 24 , respectively ) , Golden_State was never in danger of losing this game . Kevin Durant led the way for the Warriors with 28 points , five assists , three rebounds and two blocks . Stephen Curry also delivered 28 points , but he left the game with an ankle injury so his status going forward will likely be determined in the coming hours . Klay Thompson had 15 points , and Nick Young chipped in with 16 points off the bench . Draymond Green only had two points , but added nine assists and seven boards . Kent Bazemore was the best player for the Hawks , as he finished with 29 points while going 10 - 16 from the field . Dennis Schroder had 27 points and nine assists to go along with five rebounds . Taurean Prince had 15 points , four steals , and three rebounds . John Collins delivered a strong effort as well thanks to 16 points and eight rebounds .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Atlanta Hawks,121-113 , at Philips Arena on Tuesday evening . The 76ers ( 51 - 30 ) came into the contest with perhaps a bit more motivation than a team that already has a postseason spot well in hand , as they were looking to set a franchise record by extending their winning streak to 15 games . However , they were facing a Hawks ( 24 - 58 ) team that was coming off a pair of victories over a couple of other Eastern Conference playoff teams in the Wizards and Celtics . Accordingly , Atlanta came out ready to compete , and they trailed by a very manageable 65 - 61 score at halftime . However , Philadelphia was determined to keep their extended stretch of success unblemished , and they were able to stave off a late surge by the home squad in the fourth quarter to secure the win . The Sixers held sizable advantages in both shooting and rebounding , as they drained 49 percent of their attempts while holding the Hawks to a 42 percent figure and also won the battle on the glass by a 54 - 39 margin . J.J. Redick spearheaded the Sixers with 28 points , a total he supplemented with five assists and four rebounds . Dario Saric exited the game after suffering a lip laceration in a collision with John Collins 13 seconds into the contest , so Ersan Ilyasova played a full load of minutes and posted 26 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Marco Belinelli poured in 20 points and added four rebounds , one steal and one block . Amir Johnson posted 15 points , eight boards , five assists and one steal . Ben Simmons overcame an illness to turn in 14 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block . Robert Covington mustered six points , eight rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal . Taurean Prince led the Hawks with 27 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Tyler Dorsey managed 17 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon tallied 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Collins delivered 13 points , nine rebounds , five assists and one steal . Isaiah Taylor supplied 10 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Mike Muscala registered nine points , four rebounds and two assists , while Damion Lee and DeAndre ' Bembry generated matching seven - point efforts in the starting five . The Sixers close out their season at home against the Bucks on the Wednesday evening , while the Hawks have now wrapped up their season .
The San_Antonio Spurs came away with a win on the road , 117 - 100 , against the Miami Heat at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday night . These two long - time playoff rivals got engaged in a tight first quarter that finished with 30 points apiece . However , the Spurs pulled away when they built a 15 - point advantage entering the final 12 minutes . San_Antonio never looked back , and they closed things out to maintain their perfect start to the season . San_Antonio ( 40 ) once again did not have Kawhi Leonard ( quadriceps ) , but that did not seem to matter . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the offense with 31 points , and Kyle Anderson once again did his best Leonard impression with a double - double of 12 points and 10 rebounds . Danny Green added 12 points ( on 6 - for - 7 shooting ) , seven rebounds and three assists , while Rudy Gay contributed with 22 points coming off the bench . As for the Heat ( 2 - 2 ) , they did n't have Hassan Whiteside ( knee ) , but Goran Dragic picked up the slack . The Slovenian point guard was questionable a few hours before tip - off due to a thigh injury , though he still finished with 20 points to be one of the offensive leaders for Miami . Their highest - scoring player was Tyler Johnson , however , as the point guard exploded for 23 points ( on 7 - for - 13 shooting ) off the bench . Meanwhile , James Johnson produced a solid display on both ends of the court with 21 points , seven rebounds , and four assists .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Miami Heat , 120 - 95 , at American Airlines Arena on Sunday evening . It was a back and forth first half , with Indiana leading 58 - 55 at halftime . However the tide turned in the third quarter , where the Pacers kicked things off with a 19 - 4 run , and ultimately outscored Miami 32 - 13 in the quarter to take a 90 - 68 lead into the final frame . The Pacers were able to cruise to the finish , grabbing their third straight win . Six players scored in double digits for the Pacers ( 9 - 8 ) , led by Bojan Bogdanovic , who poured in 26 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 34 minutes . Myles Turner was huge on both ends of the floor for Indiana , and finished with 25 points , seven rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal , in 31 minutes . Victor Oladipo chipped in 15 points , while Domantas Sabonis hauled in 10 rebounds , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Pacers shot 59 percent from the field , including 48 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Wayne Ellington was on fire for the Heat ( 7 - 9 ) , as he tied his career - high with seven three - pointers , on his way to a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 24 minutes off the bench . On the other hand , Dion Waiters went 0 - of - 10 from the field , as he struggled to find his groove . Hassan Whiteside tallied 15 points and seven rebounds , while Josh Richardson also tallied 15 points . Richardson left the game after being poked in the eye and did not return . The Heat will look to bounce back as they play host to the Celtics on Wednesday . The Pacers will be looking for their fourth straight win , as they take on the Magic in Orlando on Monday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 95 - 91 , at American Airlines Arena on Friday . Despite the fact that there were only four ties and four lead changes in this game , it was n't decided until the final whistle . In fact , Miami ended the game on an 8 - 1 run over the final three minutes , as that turned a three - point deficit into a four - point win . The second and fourth quarters were decisive for the Heat , as they outscored the Hornets , 56 - 35 . The shooting disparity was vast , with Miami hitting 45 percent of their shots while holding Charlotte to under 35 percent from the field . Much of that was attributed to ball movement , with the Heat recording 25 assists while the Hornets only handed out 12 dimes . The Hornets ( 20 - 28 ) got a gem out of Kemba Walker , as he tallied 30 points , six rebounds and five assists . Dwight Howard finished with 20 points , 16 rebounds and four blocks . No other player on the Hornets reached double figures in scoring or handed out more than three assists . The Heat ( 28 - 21 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he accrued 19 points , two rebounds and five assists . James Johnson totaled 10 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Wayne Ellington was huge off the bench , providing 17 points and two rebounds . Kelly Olynyk also played well off the bench , accumulating 16 points , four rebounds and six assists . Both teams play road games on Monday for their next fixture , with Charlotte facing the Indiana Pacers and Miami traveling to play the Dallas Mavericks .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Miami Heat , 109 - 101 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday evening . The Rockets got out to a great start on the road , as they created some separation halfway through the first quarter , to take a 35 - 24 lead into the second . They pushed their lead to 17 mid way though the second quarter , but the Heat battled back to close the gap to just four , as they trailed 61 - 57 at halftime . The third quarter went back and forth , with the Heat taking a small lead at one point , but the Rockets were able to take back a three - point lead , ahead 83 - 80 , heading into the final frame . The Heat kept the pressure on and managed to take a two - point lead early in the fourth , however the Rockets jumped ahead one final time before they were able to seal the deal with a 90 run that put them ahead by seven with five minutes to go . They were able to hang on from there , to earn their sixth straight win . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 41 points on 13 - of - 25 shooting , in 36 minutes . Chris Paul followed up with 24 points , seven rebounds , seven assists and one block , in 36 minutes . Clint Capela tallied 13 points and eight rebounds , while Gerald Green added 12 points and three rebounds , off the bench . The Rockets shot 51 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Josh Richardson and Goran Dragic poured in 30 points each to lead the Heat , while Hassan Whiteside came up big with 16 points , 17 rebounds and one assist . The Heat shot 45 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 32 from long range . The Heat ( 29 - 26 ) will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Bucks on Friday . The Rockets ( 40 - 13 ) play host to the Nuggets on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 115 - 89 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Saturday night . The Heat ( 31 - 29 ) looked absolutely dominant in this game , as they remembered some of their early - season form in a game where the Grizzlies ( 18 - 40 ) simply did n't have answers to what Miami was offering . The Heat jumped ahead to a three - point lead after the first 12 minutes ( 34 - 31 ) and they never looked back ; extending it to eight after two , 22 after three , and 26 at the final buzzer . The numbers did n't lie either . Miami shot better from the field ( 46 percent against 44 ) and won the rebounding battle as well ( 51 - 39 ) . Usually , that 's a winning combination . Six Miami players scored in double digits in this game . Tyler Johnson led the way with 23 points , while Justise Winslow had 17 points and seven rebounds . Josh Richardson added 15 points , while Hassan Whiteside had 12 points , eight boards and three blocks . Wayne Ellington had 15 points off the bench , and Bam Adebayo had 13 points . Goran Dragic struggled , though , with only six points . Andrew Harrison was the top scorer for the Grizzlies with 17 points , six assists and four rebounds . JaMychal Green had 10 points and 11 rebounds , and Deyonta Davis contributed 14 points and seven boards . Those were the only three Memphis players that scored in double digits , though , and even though five players contributed on offense , neither managed to crack the 10 - point mark .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host MIami Heat , 131 - 113 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday evening . The Lakers got out to a good start on the road , leading 20 - 7 mid way through the first quarter . However , the Heat answered back by outscoring the Lakers 29 - 13 through the rest of the quarter , to take a 36 - 33 lead into the second . The Lakers took it to another level in the second though , as they used a 21 - 4 run to take a 14 - point lead mid way through the quarter . They kept the pressure on , outscoring the Heat by a total of 40 - 26 in the quarter , to take a 73 - 62 lead into halftime . The Lakers stayed strong to start the second half , as they maintained their lead through the third quarter , to take a 104 - 94 lead into the final frame . They turned up the intensity yet again in the fourth , as they quickly expanded their lead to 20 points just minutes into the quarter , allowing themselves the opportunity to cruise to their fourth straight win . Isaiah Thomas was on fire for Los_Angeles , as he led the way with 29 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , including 6 - of - 11 from long range , in 29 minutes off the bench . Julius Randle followed up with 25 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , while Brandon Ingram tallied 19 points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Lonzo Ball filled the stat sheet with eight points , seven assists , six rebounds and six steals . The Lakers shot 60 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Dwyane Wade led Miami with 25 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic tallied 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal , while Justise Winslow added 17 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Heat shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from deep . The Heat ( 32 - 30 ) will look to bounce back as they host the Pistons on Saturday . The Lakers ( 27 - 34 ) take on the Spurs in San Antonio on Saturday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Detroit Pistons , 105 - 96 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Saturday . The Pistons ( 29 - 34 ) and the Heat ( 33 - 30 ) played a tightly - contested game in the first quarter , but Detroit was n't able to keep up with Miami 's rhythm and ended losing deservedly , further extending their negative streak and putting themselves one step further from a potential playoff spot while the Heat took another step towards a postseason berth . The big difference in this game was Miami 's performance in the second quarter , as their 32 - 18 lead over that period was enough to give them a much - needed win at home . With such a healthy lead , they decided to cruise their way the rest of the game and closed things out rather comfortably . Six Heat players ended scoring in double digits in this one . Josh Richardson and Kelly Olynyk scored 17 points each , although Olynyk 's performance certainly stood out since he came off the bench and only needed 23 minutes to reach that scoring output . James Johnson had 14 points , while Goran Dragic and Justise Winslow each had 13 points . Hassan Whiteside only scored eight points , but grabbed 19 rebounds . Andre Drummond led the way for Detroit with a strong double - double of 22 points , 18 rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Blake Griffin was the top scorer of the team thanks to a 31 - point performance , but he also added six assists and four boards . Reggie Bullock had 11 points and eight rebounds . No other Detroit player scored in double digits in this one , and the team shot just 42 percent from the field overall .
The Miami Heat defeated the Washington Wizards at American Airlines Arena on Saturday night . The Heat ( 36 - 31 ) came into the contest riding a wave of strong play , as they 'd emerged victorious in five of their previous seven games . However , the Wizards ( 38 - 29 ) had proven to be a rather tough puzzle to solve for them this season , as they 'd notched wins in two of three tries against Miami . The home squad came out seemingly determined to forge a tie in the series , as they exploded for a 60 - point first half while limiting Washington to 48 . The contest was then essentially decided in the third period , as the Heat racked up a whopping 43 points to enter the final 12 minutes with a 27 - point cushion . They treaded water the rest of the way by drawing even with the visitors during the fourth quarter , allowing them to maintain the same margin by game 's end . Miami made up for the absence of Hassan Whiteside ( hip ) with a balanced offensive effort in which seven players hit double digits in the scoring column . Jodie Meeks saw extended run in the blowout loss and led the Wizards with 23 points , a total he supplemented with four boards and two assists . Bradley Beal saw only 27 minutes of action and parlayed them into 14 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Ramon Sessions logged 12 points , four assists and two rebounds . Kelly Oubre , Jr. managed 11 points , six rebounds and two steals . Otto Porter , Jr. supplied 10 points , five boards , two assists and one steal . Tomas Satoransky finished with nine points , five boards , one assist and one steal . Mike Scott collected an efficient seven points and three rebounds in 15 minutes off the bench . James Johnson paced the Heat with 20 points and added five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Wayne Ellington poured in 17 points and also tallied three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Josh Richardson , Tyler Johnson , Kelly Olynyk and Rodney McGruder contributed matching 13 - point efforts . Richardson also posted four assists , one rebound and two steals , Johnson pitched in three assists and two rebounds , Olynyk ripped down 11 rebounds , dished out two assists , notched two blocks and recorded one steal and McGruder had one assist and one steal . Goran Dragic went for 10 points , three assists and two rebounds in only 19 minutes . Justise Winslow generated 10 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Tuesday evening , while the Heat head to the West Coast to take on the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday night .
The Miami Heat defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 98 - 79 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win , Miami held the lead for the final 45 minutes of play . The first quarter really set the tone , as they outscored Cleveland , 29 - 18 . The Cavaliers actually never got the game within 10 points after that dominant first quarter . Defense was key for Miami , as they held Cleveland to 37 percent from the field and 15 percent from long range . The Heat ended up connecting on 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . Rim protection was also huge , with Miami recording nine blocks and the Cavaliers picking up just one block . Ball movement was also critical , with the Heat recording 24 assists while holding the Cavaliers to just 15 assists . The Cavaliers ( 44 - 30 ) had no player reach 20 points scored , as LeBron James led them with 18 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Jose Calderon started and totaled 11 points and two assists . Kevin Love left after just seven minutes due to an elbow to the face . Rodney Hood led the bench with 15 points and three boards . The Heat ( 40 - 35 ) were led by Kelly Olynyk , as he provided 19 points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals off the bench . James Johnson led the starters with 15 points , nine rebounds , five assists , two steals and three blocks . Josh Richardson accrued 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup versus the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . As for Miami , they play host to the Chicago Bulls on Thursday for their next fixture .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 109 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday evening . The Hornets ( 1 - 1 ) trailed by 10 after the first quarter and by seven after two quarters , however they came out of halftime with a new intensity and outscored the Hawks 60 - 35 in the second half . The Hawks ( 1 - 1 ) were held to 38 percent from the field and 23 percent from long range , and were hardly able to capitalize on the Hornets ' 21 turnovers . Dwight Howard was a man on a mission for the Hornets , as poured in 20 points and grabbed up 15 rebounds to help lead the way against his former squad . Kemba Walker was the high - point man for the Hornets , with 26 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting , and 10 - of - 12 from the foul line . Frank Kaminsky came up big for the Hornets , with 21 points six rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 33 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Dennis Schroder was the bright spot for the Hawks , with 25 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , five assists , three rebounds and a steal , in 32 minutes .
