Dwayne Dedmon and Kent Bazemore pitched in 11 points each . The Hawks look ahead to Sunday , when they take on the Nets in Brooklyn . The Hornets have a few days rest before they take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Monday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 103 - 87 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday evening . Kemba Walker , the Hornets ' most prized offensive piece , came into Saturday night 's contest partly compromised because of a wrist injury suffered in Friday 's three - point loss to the Bulls . However , the All-Star point guard battled through any discomfort to score a game - high 26 points , a total he supplemented with six assists and two rebounds . Walker was 8 - for - 17 from the field overall , including an impressive 6 - for - 9 from three - point range . The Hornets ( 6 - 9 ) also were extremely careful with the ball , committing only eight turnovers while eliciting 14 from the visiting Clippers ( 5 - 10 ) . Their defensive effort also included limiting Los_Angeles to just 40 percent shooting overall , including 28 percent from three - point range . Lou Williams paced the Clippers with a 25 - point effort off the bench , and he added four assists and two rebounds . Blake Griffin totaled 19 points , eight rebounds and four assists . DeAndre Jordan followed with a 10 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Wesley johnson and Austin Rivers provided matching nine - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal , and the latter supplying four boards , three assists and one steal . Jeremy Lamb , back on the second unit now that Nicolas Batum has returned to action , led the bench with 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Dwight Howard mustered a 16 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , two steals and one block . Batum filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , seven assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Marvin Williams tallied 10 points , four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . The Clippers next to the Big Apple to take on the New York Knicks on Monday night , while the Hornets remain home to tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on that same evening .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 110 - 99 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday evening . The Lakers ( 10 - 15 ) are quietly assembling a winning streak with their second straight victory of the campaign , and once again they looked like a competent team on both ends of the court . The Hornets ( 9 - 16 ) actually built a four - point advantage at half time , but the Lakers used a strong second - half surge to come out on top . Los_Angeles led by one entering the fourth quarter , but won the final 12 minutes by a 10 - point margin to pull away for good . Jordan Clarkson was the best player offensively for the Lakers , as he finished with 22 points , six assists , and five rebounds coming off the bench . Lonzo Ball only registered five points , but he filled the stat sheet thanks to five rebounds and nine assists . Brandon Ingram added 18 points with six boards , and both Julius Randle and Kyle Kuzma contributed with 12 points off the bench . Dwight Howard was the best player for the Hornets , as the veteran big man finished with a double - double of 21 points and 12 rebounds while shooting 9 - for - 14 from the field . Kemba Walker added 23 points with four assists and Marvin Williams chipped in with 13 , but the rest of the offense went silent . Johnny O'Bryant III surprised with 11 points and seven boards off the bench , though .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 111 - 106 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday evening . The Hornets ( 12 - 21 ) came into Saturday 's contest on a bit of a revenge mission , considering they 'd just been toppled by the Bucks ( 17 - 14 ) on Friday night in the first game of the home - and - home series . Matters were n't looking too favorable heading into the final period , despite Milwaukee being without Giannis Antetokounmpo due to knee soreness . The home team entered the fourth quarter trailing by an 85 - 81 margin , but they were able to go on a 28 - 17 run over the final 10:5 to secure their 10th home victory of the campaign . Both clubs had the hot hand from the field , with the visitors draining 48 percent of their 87 shot attempts and the Hornets posting a 49 percent success rate of their own . Khris Middleton unsurprisingly stepped up in Antetokounmpo 's absence , leading the way with 31 points and adding five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Eric Bledsoe filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , seven boards and six assists . John Henson matched Bledsoe 's scoring total and added five boards and one assist . Tony Snell poured in 11 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one block . Sean Kilpatrick matched Snell 's point total off the bench and complemented it with four boards and two assists . Malcolm Brogdon was productive on the second unit with 10 points , four dimes and one steal . Dwight Howard paced the Hornets with a 21 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Kemba Walker turned in 19 points , eight assists , one rebound and one block . Frank Kaminsky and Troy Graham co - led the bench with 14 - point tallies , with the former adding four rebounds , one assist and one steal , and the latter registering with a pair of boards . Jeremy Lamb posted 13 points , two rebounds and one assist . Nicolas Batum supplied a full line of 12 points , six assists , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Bucks head back home to tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday evening , while the Hornets remain home and await the Boston Celtics for a Wednesday night showdown .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 101 - 96 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday . It took 15 ties and 10 lead changes to determine a winner , as this was one of the most competitive games of the season . In fact , the five - point final margin was the largest team for either team across the final 30 minutes of action . Ball movement was the difference for the Pelicans , as they out - assisted the Hornets , 26 - 16 . Free-throw shooting was Charlotte 's downfall , as they went just 18 - of - 31 from the free - throw line . The Pelicans ( 26 - 21 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 19 points , six rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . Jrue Holiday matched those 19 points , adding five rebounds and four assists to his tally . DeMarcus Cousins committed eight turnovers , but still accumulated 16 points , 13 rebounds , five assists and five blocks . The Hornets ( 19 - 27 ) were carried by Dwight Howards , as he totaled 22 points , 16 rebounds and three blocks . Marvin Williams amassed 14 points and 14 rebounds . Kemba Walker accrued 20 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Frank Kaminsky led the bench with 16 points and five rebounds . Both teams play home games on Friday for their next fixture , with New_Orleans hosting the Houston Rockets and Charlotte facing the Atlanta Hawks .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 118 - 103 , at Spectrum Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets ( 28 - 33 ) have been seemingly honed in on their postseason aspirations since resuming play after the All-Star break , as they 'd rattled off victories in all three subsequent contests - - and four consecutive overall - - coming into Tuesday 's game . The outlook for the Bulls ( 20 - 41 ) was the opposite , as they 'd dropped eight of their previous 10 contests , including 23 of their 30 road tilts . However , it was Chicago that came out of the gates hot , as they took a 29 - 26 first - quarter lead . The teams were knotted at 51at the half , but that 's when Charlotte 's superior talent took over . They compiled 36 points in the third and followed up with 31 in the final period , leading to a comfortable victory . Both teams shot particularly well , with the hosts edging the visitors in that category 54 percent to 48 percent . In all , six Bulls players hit double digits in the scoring column , but none compiled more than Zach LaVine 's 21 points , which he complemented with four rebounds and four assists . Denzel Valentine followed LaVine with 14 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Cristiano Felicio provided 12 points , six boards , four assists and one steal . Bobby Portis matched his scoring total to lead the bench and also hauled in 10 rebounds , dished out one assist and recorded one steal . Lauri Markkanen and David Nwaba posted matching 11 - point efforts , with the former supplying seven boards , one assist and two steals , and the latter generating six rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Kris Dunn registered 10 points , three assists , two rebounds and two blocks . Kemba Walker turned in 31 points , five assists , two rebounds and three steals . Dwight Howard finished with 24 points , six rebounds , one assist and five steals . Jeremy Lamb accounted for a bench - leading 15 points and complemented them with five assists and one rebound . Marvin Williams totaled 14 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Frank Kaminsky was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , two rebounds and one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist was forced from the game after six minutes with a hamstring injury and was unable to return . The Bulls head back home to tangle with the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night , while the Hornets hit the road to face off with the Boston Celtics on Wednesday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 123 - 117 , at Spectrum Center on Sunday . The Pacers ( 48 - 33 ) and the Hornets ( 35 - 46 ) engaged in quite a battle as both teams wanted to end the regular season as strong as possible , but this time Indiana 's better individual quality decided the game in their favor . The Pacers quickly jumped to a 31 - 25 advantage in the first quarter , and they continued to dominate the rest of the way after winning the second and third quarters , 39 - 32 and 25 - 24 , respectively . Charlotte won the final 12 minutes by a 36 - 28 score , but it was n't enough and Indiana ended winning the game rather easily . Domantas Sabonis came off the bench for the Pacers but ended leading the team offensively thanks to 30 points ( on 13 - of - 21 from the field ) , and he also added eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Victor Oladipo filled the stat sheet as well since he finished with 27 points , five assists , three boards , and three steals . Bojan Bogdanovic had 13 points , the same tally as Cory Joseph and Glenn Robinson III . Seven Charlotte players scored in double digits , but the top scorer came off the bench as Malik Monk had an impressive effort of 22 points in only 24 minutes . Dwight Howard had 10 points and 12 rebounds , while Kemba Walker chipped in with 12 points and five assists . Marvin Williams added 16 points , and Guillermo Hernangomez delivered 14 points and eight rebounds .
The Utah Jazz took down the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday , 96 - 81 . Utah ( 3 - 3 ) evened its record after a tumultuous start to the new season . On Saturday , the team failed to eclipse 100 points for the fifth time in six games , but made up for its low scoring totals with strong defensive play . Holding Los_Angeles to just 38 percent shooting and five made three - pointers , the Jazz was able to hold a comfortable lead for the majority of regulation . Throughout the game , rookie Donovan Mitchell proved to be a tremendous bright spot for Utah . Mitchell , who ranked last in the league in True Shooting Percentage before Saturday 's game , scored a highly efficient 22 points to lead the team . The 13th overall pick in the 2017 draft came off the bench and played 27 minutes , leading the team in both scoring and shot attempts for the second time this season . Utah has struggled to find a reliable first option early in the year , so Mitchell 's confidence and efficiency for a rookie was surely appreciated . The Lakers ( 2 - 4 ) , meanwhile , saw far less impressive play from their highly - touted rookie guard . Second overall pick Lonzo Ball once again struggled to find the basket on Saturday , shooting a woeful 3 - of - 9 from the field and posting five turnovers with just four assists . The former UCLA stud delivered an impressive outing when LA faced Phoenix , but has shot under 25 percent from the field in his other five games . It was a tough shooting night for the majority of the Lakers , as the team finished just 5 - of - 22 from beyond the arc . While LA was able to outscore Utah 40 - 36 in the paint , struggles with perimeter play hampered the team 's offense all night . In addition to Ball , shooting guard Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished a dismal 2 - of - 11 from the field . Los_Angeles also would have liked to see better shooting from the free - throw line , where it went just 70 percent in total . Utah will host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday , while Los_Angeles will host the Pistons on Thursday .
The Utah Jazz took down the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 114 - 108 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Friday night . Utah ( 12 - 11 ) is back above .500 thanks to Friday 's win , which came on the back of a whopping scoring night from rookie Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell became the first rookie in the 2017 class to score at least 40 points in a game , leading the Jazz with 41 . The rookie guard posted his new career high on 13 - of - 25 shooting , including six made three - pointers . It was a much less balanced approach than on previous nights for Utah , as the team leaned heavily on Mitchell to provide offensive production . Only seven Utah players scored on Friday , and Mitchell was one of only two players to score more than 13 points . The other was bench guard Alec Burks , who recorded 24 points on the heels of a 28 - point outing on Thursday . The Jazz as a whole shot an efficient 49 percent from the field and hit 12 three - pointers on the night . New_Orleans ( 11 - 11 ) fell to .500 after dropping its third straight game on Friday . All five Pelicans starters scored in double figures , as the team took an unusually balanced approach . Still , the superstar duo of Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins led the team on both ends . Cousins was the team 's top scorer , posting 23 points to go with 13 rebounds . Davis added a double - double , scoring 19 points along with 10 rebounds . The Pelicans had issues at the line throughout the night , though , making just nine free - throws on 60 percent shooting . The Pelicans will visit Portland on Saturday , while Utah will see the Washington Wizards on Monday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Sacramento Kings 105 - 100 at Golden 1 Center on Wednesday . The Rockets played their second game of a road back - to - back after edging the Warriors in a thriller on Tuesday , and although they played without newcomer Chris Paul ( knee ) , Clint Capella and James Harden were able to muscle Houston to a 20 record to start the season . The Kings showed promise from their youthful team , playing physical basketball in the post and holding the Rockets to just 27 percent from behind the three point line . Houston took a four point lead into half , but was not able to sustain a large lead in the second half as Sacramento ( 0 - 1 ) rallied from a 10 point deficit in the third quarter behind leadership from George Hill and quality shots from Skal Labissiere and Buddy Hield . Hill finished with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Willie-Cauley Stein led the Kings with 21 points and 10 boards . Labissiere and Hield both logged 33 minutes each as starters and combined for 31 points , 15 rebounds and five assists . De'Aaron Fox , the Kings premier selection out of Kentucky in the NBA Draft , posted 24 minutes off the bench and scored 14 points , to go with four rebounds and five assists . James Harden led all scorers with 27 points , nine assists and three rebounds on 8 - of - 21 shooting . Harden , along with many other Rockets players , struggled from behind the arc and finished shooting 4 - of - 14 from deep . Capella 's 22 points and 17 rebounds , which tied a career high in rebounds for the Rockets big man , was instrumental in Houston escaping Sacramento with a second straight victory to open the season . Next up , the Kings visit the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Rockets host their home opener against the same Mavericks on Saturday .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 94 - 86 , at Golden One Center on Tuesday . Sacramento ( 2 - 8 ) bounced back from an eight - game losing losing streak on Tuesday . The Kings were bolstered on their home court by strong bench play . The team got off to a rough start , falling down by double digits before scoring a single point . Sacramento ended up leaning heavily on its second unit , setting an NBA record with 29 bench points before a single starter scored . Sophomore guard Buddy Hield wound up being the offense 's driving force , scoring a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting . Rookie guard De'Aaron Fox also impressed off the bench , shooting 5 - of - 10 for 10 points and dishing out eight assists off the bench . The Kings ultimately shot 46 percent on the night , handily out - shooting the Thunder , who finished at just 33 percent on the night . Oklahoma_City ( 4 - 6 ) , meanwhile , has not started the season as many expected it to . The Thunder are rich with star talent after the acquisition of Paul George and Carmelo Anthony , but the team has still dropped three straight games and remains winless against the Western Conference . On Tuesday , the Thunder struggled heavily from the field , shooting just over 33 percent as a team . Reigning MVP Russell Westbrook was a big part of the Thunder 's issues , as he shot just 7 - of - 21 from the field . George and Anthony fared no better , combining to shoot only 8 - of - 33 on the night . While the team found some early offense in a blazing hot start from center Steven Adams , who scored 10 first - quarter points , they failed to involve him for the rest of the night . Adams finished the game with 14 points on five shot attempts . Sacramento will host the 76ers on Thursday , while the Thunder will visit Denver .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 109 - 108 , at Golden One Center on Thursday evening . Tied at 26 after the first quarter , the game stayed tight most of the way until the fourth . The Kings ( 3 - 8 ) held a three - point lead heading into the final quarter , but the 76ers ( 6 - 5 ) started the quarter strong and quickly took the lead , which they expanded to a six - point margin with 1:30 remaining in the game . However , things took a turn once again as the Kings willed themselves to their second straight win , behind a clutch block from Willie Cauley-Stein and a game - winning jumper by De'Aaron fox . It marks the first game - winner of Fox 's young career , as he finished with 11 points , seven assists and four rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . Zach Randolph was the high - point man for the Kings , with 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , in 29 minutes . Justin Jackson contributed 19 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench , while Willie Cauley-Stein added 15 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 24 minutes . The Kings shot 43 percent from the field , including 44 percent from long range , and dished 20 assists in the contest . They also hit a season - high 12 threes . Meanwhile , the 76ers saw their five - game winning streak come to an end as they fell apart late in the game after what looked like another promising performance . All five starters scored in double digits for the Sixers , led by Robert Covington , who finished with 24 points , on 7 - of - 16 shooting , in 35 minutes . Joel Embiid followed up with 22 points and 15 rebounds , in 32 minutes , while Ben Simmons added 18 points and six assists , in 26 minutes . The 76ers will look to get back on track as they take on the Warriors in Golden State on Saturday . The Kings take on the Knicks in New York on Saturday .

The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 114 - 96 , at Golden One Center on Sunday . This was a dominating victory for the Grizzlies , as the Kings never tied or led after the first five minutes . In fact , Memphis led by 14 after the first quarter , by 18 at the half and held a 27 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . Sacramento actually never got within double - digits for the final three quarters . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor , with the Grizzlies outrebounding the Kings , 38 - 30 . The shooting disparity was huge as well , as Memphis shot 54 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . The Kings hit just 43 percent from the field and 37 percent from long range . The Grizzlies ( 12 - 25 ) got another gem out of Tyreke Evans , as he collected 26 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Marc Gasol totaled seven points , two rebounds , three assists and four blocks . The bench was huge , as Jarrell Martin , James Ennis , Wayne Selden Jr. Deyonta Davis , Mario Chalmers and Ben McLemore all scored between eight and 12 points . Garrett Temple was the only starter in double figures , as he accumulated 13 points , three rebounds and three assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic totaled eight points , five rebounds and five assists . Both teams return to action on Tuesday with Sacramento hosting the Charlotte Hornets and Memphis traveling to play the Los Angeles Clippers .

The Kings started out strong on their home court , getting to a six - point lead midway through the first and hanging on to lead 25 - 21 at the end of the quarter . They turned it up in the second , pushing their lead to as many as 14 before settling on a 56 - 46 lead at the half . The Spurs began chipping away at the lead in the third quarter , until they trailed by only three heading into the fourth . The Kings hung on as long as they could , maintaining a lead until the final three minutes , where the Spurs took over , as Davis Bertans hit a go - ahead three , followed by seven straight points from LaMarcus Aldridge to seal the deal for San_Antonio . Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 31 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting and 12 rebounds , in 36 minutes of action . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 98 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday afternoon . The Sixers ( 15 - 18 ) received some good news prior to tip - off , as Joel Embiid determined his troublesome back was in good enough shape for him to suit up for the Christmas Day clash . His presence turned out to be pivotal to Philadelphia 's success , as he led the way with a 25 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and three blocks . However , as spectacular as the big man 's final line was , he was one - upped by Enes Kanter , who posted 31 points , 22 rebounds and one assist for the Knicks ( 17 - 16 ) . Kanter put up a game - high 21 shot attempts as well , but a fourth - quarter push by the visitors , which included a clutch Embiid three - pointer with 2:23 remaining , sealed the hard - fought win . J.J. Redick was right behind Embiid in his return from a hamstring injury , pouring in 24 points and adding six rebounds , two assists and two steals . T.J. McConnell followed with a bench - leading 15 points - - a total he supplemented with five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Dario Saric supplied 10 points , three rebounds and three assists . Robert Covington tallied eight points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Ben Simmons matched his scoring total and added eight boards , three assists , one steal and one block . Kristaps Porzingis was second to Kanter on the Knicks with 22 points , seven rebounds and five blocks . Courtney Lee registered 20 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Michael Beasley led the bench with 10 points , five boards , one assist and one steal . Lance Thomas ( two points , one rebound ) and Jarrett Jack ( zero points , seven assists , two rebounds and two steals ) underwhelmed on the first unit . The Sixers remain on the road and head across the country to tangle with the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday evening , while the Knicks visit the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the New_York Knicks , 115 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Pistons ( 36 - 40 ) knew Saturday was yet another must - win situation for them , as they found themselves five games out of the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference with just seven games remaining . Standing in their way were the Knicks ( 27 - 50 ) , who 'd been effective as spoilers at times during the home stretch but were also faced with a key absence in starting center Enes Kanter ( back ) . To their credit , New_York played hard in front of the home crowd , and they trailed by just one point going into the final period . However , Detroit would never let the visitors catch them , and they sealed the victory with a pair of Luke Kennard free throws with just 9 seconds remaining . Andre Drummond led the way with a 22 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three blocks . Reggie Jackson mustered 17 points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Anthony Tolliver matched Jackson 's scoring total and added two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Reggie Bullock supplied 16 points , four boards , three assists and two steals . Stanley Johnson mustered 10 points , one rebound and three steals . James Ennis III and Henry Ellenson co - led the bench with matching nine - point tallies . Ennis added one rebound and one assist , while Ellenson supplied four boards and three dimes . Michael Beasley stepped up in Kanter 's absence to muster 32 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Tim Hardaway , Jr. and Trey Burke contributed 18 points apiece , with the former also supplying three assists , two rebounds and one steal and the latter dishing out 15 dimes , hauling in five rebounds and recording one steal . Troy Williams stepped into the starting five and finished with 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Kyle O'Quinn drew the start for Kanter and went for eight points , 15 rebounds , three assists and one block . The Pistons remain in New_York and take on the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday evening , while the Knicks remain home and await a Tuesday night visit from the Orlando Magic .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the New_York Knicks , 127 - 107 , at Staples Center on Sunday afternoon . Both teams looked like they 'd left their respective defenses in the locker room in the first half , as evidenced by the slim 67 - 63 halftime lead the Lakers ( 17 - 29 ) held . Not much changed in the third period , as the two clubs combined for another 56 points heading into the final 12 minutes . That 's when the home squad separated itself , with Los_Angeles ' 100 run between the 6:11 and 3:29 marks of the fourth quarter giving them the cushion they needed to build an insurmountable lead . As the final score implied , both teams ' shooting percentages were stellar , with the Lakers edging the Knicks ( 21 - 26 ) in that category by a 56 percent to 54 percent margin . The hosts also prevailed in two other key categories , winning the turnover battle by a 17 - 6 margin and notching a 39 - 33 advantage in the rebounding department . Kristaps Porzingis , Tim Hardaway , Jr. and Michael Beasley co - led New_York with matching 17 - point efforts . Porzingis added four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , Hardaway posted three rebounds and one block and Beasley supplied one rebound and one assist . Courtney Lee managed 16 points , two assists and one rebound . Enes Kanter generated a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Jarrett Jack mustered a modest six points but also dished out 10 assists , hauled in three rebounds and recorded one steal . Jordan Clarkson paced the Lakers with 29 points on 12 - for - 19 shooting in 38 minutes off the bench . He also contributed 10 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Julius Randle followed with a 27 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that was complemented by five assists and one steal . Kyle Kuzma poured in 15 points over just 10 minutes . Brook Lopez registered 14 points and four rebounds . Larry Nance , Jr. accounted for 13 points , five boards , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Brandon Ingram fought through an ankle issue to draw the start and tally 10 points , three assists and two rebounds . The Knicks remain on the West Coast to tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday evening , while the Lakers await a visit from the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night as well .
The Los_Angeles Lakers overcame the Cleveland Cavaliers , 127 - 113 , at Staples Center on Sunday evening . Julius Randle had a career - high 36 points to lead the Lakers ( 30 - 36 ) to victory . He added 14 rebounds and seven assists in what was a career night for the fourth - year forward . The Lakers pulled away in the second half after a 22 - 3 run in the third quarter . LA exploited the weak defense of Cleveland ( 38 - 28 ) , shooting 50 percent from the field and knocking down 13 three - pointers . Former Cavalier Isaiah Thomas played a big role in the team 's second - half success , providing a spark off the bench . He finished with 20 points and nine assists to lead the second unit . Veteran center Brook Lopez added 22 points to go with eight rebounds in the win . Kyle Kuzma , LA 's standout rookie forward , had 14 points and 10 rebounds . Five Lakers finished in double digits in the win . While LeBron James continued to excel , scoring 24 points along with 10 rebounds and seven assists , the Cavaliers could not get the job done . Former Laker Larry Nance , Jr. was the only other Cleveland starter to score in double digits , as he finished with 16 points . Jordan Clarkson , who was acquired by Cleveland in a deadline - day trade from LA , shot just 1 - of - 8 in his return to his former home court . On Tuesday , both teams will face a new adversary . LA will host the Denver Nuggets , while the Cavaliers will continue their road trip with a visit to Phoenix .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 121 - 108 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic jumped out to a great start , taking an early 20 - 10 lead , while the Thunder had five turnovers in that span . The Magic held on to take a 59 - 57 lead into halftime and expanded it further through the third quarter , so that they entered the final frame ahead 87 - 80 . After a great three quarters , the Magic still found a way to turn it up in the fourth , where they opened with a 130 run to go up 100 - 80 with just over eight minutes to play . This marks the end of a nine - game losing streak for Orlando ( 9 - 13 ) , while it is the third straight loss for the Thunder ( 8 - 12 ) . Aaron Gordon led the way for the Magic with 40 points , 15 rebounds , four assists , four steals and one block , in 44 minutes . Elfrid Payton followed up with 19 points , six assists , five rebounds , four steals and one block , in 30 minutes , while Nikola Vucevic finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Terrence Ross ( knee ) left the game and did not return for the second half . The Magic shot 59 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 37 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and five steals in 38 minutes . Paul George finished with 22 points , five rebounds , four assists , and one steal , while Carmelo Anthony tallied 16 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one block . The Thunder shot 40 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . The Thunder will look to get back on track as they play host to the Timberwolves on Friday . The Magic play host to the Warriors on Friday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Orlando Magic , 133 - 112 , at Amway Center on Friday evening . The Warriors ( 17 - 6 ) came into Friday 's contest with their Big Three carrying some sort of injury designation . However , the trio of Kevin Durant , Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson not only all made it onto the floor , they all played pivotal parts in what turned out to be a comfortable road victory . They shot a combined 30 - for - 48 while compiling 75 of Golden_State 's 133 points . In all , the visitors shot a blistering 62 percent from the field , including 50 percent from three - point range , and put together a jaw - dropping 78 - point first half . Klay Thompson led the way for the defending NBA champs with 27 points , five assists and three rebounds . Durant posted 25 points , seven assists , two rebounds and four blocks , but he was ejected late in the game for arguing with an official . Curry poured in 23 points and added 10 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Jordan Bell followed with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Draymond Green filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , 10 assists , five rebounds , three steals and one block . Omri Casspi led the bench with 11 points , six rebounds and one assist . Evan Fournier tallied 22 points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . Jonathon Simmons followed with 18 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . D.J. Augustin led the bench with 12 points , two boards , two assists and one steal . Elfrid Payton generated 10 points , nine assists , four rebounds and three steals . The Warriors continue on to South Florida to tangle with the Miami Heat on Sunday night , while the Magic head up to the Big Apple to take on the New York Knicks on Sunday afternoon .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Orlando Magic , 111 - 97 , at Amway Center on Friday . Orlando are really struggling right now , as a wire - to - wire defeat in their home building exemplifies that fact . New_Orleans actually led by at least seven points for the entirety of the second half , as Orlando could never recover from a 32 - 20 first quarter deficit . Defense was key for the Pelicans , as they held the Magic to 42 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . New_Orleans ended up hitting 50 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was also a big factor , with New_Orleans outrebounding Orlando , 48 - 40 . The Pelicans ( 16 - 16 ) were led by DeMarcus Cousins , as he tallied 26 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and three steals . Anthony Davis finished with 20 points and 11 rebounds . Jrue Holiday was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 24 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Magic 's ( 11 - 22 ) best player was Jonathon Simmons , as he accrued 22 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Nikola Vucevic totaled 21 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals . Elfrid Payton accumulated 18 points , five rebounds and six assists . On deck for Orlando is a road matchup versus the Washington Wizards on Saturday . As for New_Orleans , they also play on Saturday , as they play the Miami Heat on the road .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Orlando Magic , 120 - 113 , at Amway Center on Thursday evening . The Knicks ( 24 - 36 ) had to come from behind in this game against the Magic ( 18 - 40 ) , but they managed to secure the win to snap their losing streak at eight . Orlando got off to a good start and they won the first quarter 41 - 31 , and they held a six - point advantage heading into the second half . However , New_York did n't give up and they turned things around in the second half . After winning the third quarter 30 - 21 , they sealed the deal with a strong fourth - quarter performance ( 27 - 23 ) . As a result , the Knicks are back in the winning column while the Magic have now dropped their last four contests . Trey Burke was the best player for the Knicks in this game , as he came off the bench to deliver a strong 26 - point , six - assist , five - rebound performance in only 29 minutes of action . Tim Hardaway Jr. added 23 points and six assists , and Enes Kanter registered a strong double - double of 12 points and 12 boards . Courtney Lee had 10 points , and Kyle O'Quinn registered 14 points with eight rebounds off the bench . Augustin contributed with 13 points and four assists . Jonathon Simmons had 12 points , five assists and four rebounds . Meanwhile , Mario Hezonja contributed with 15 points coming off the bench .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Orlando Magic , 117 - 104 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 43 - 17 ) could n't afford to come into Wednesday 's contest too relaxed despite what would be considered an inferior opponent - - their slim lead over the Boston Celtics for the top spot in the Eastern Conference was down to just one game . Accordingly , Toronto came out with a considerable sense of urgency , racking up an impressive 42 points in the first 12 minutes . However , not to be outdone , the Magic ( 18 - 43 ) did their best to hang with the visitors , compiling 37 points of their own to keep their deficit to a manageable five . After the clubs battled to a virtual draw in the second , Orlando actually made up most of their six - point halftime deficit in the third , leaving them behind by a sole point entering the final period . A Shelvin Mack driving layup even gave them a short - lived 91 - 90 edge just 37 seconds in , but that would be the last lead the hosts would enjoy . The Raptors outscored them by a 27 - 13 spread the remainder of the way , holding the home squad scoreless over the final 1:6 . As their final tally implied , Toronto shot well , posting a 54 percent success rate from the field , although the Magic were n't far behind with a 48 percent figure . The two teams were deadlocked on the boards , as each hauled down 42 rebounds . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 21 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Kyle Lowry posted a 17 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds . Pascal Siakam delivered a bench - leading 14 points and added six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Jakob Poeltl supplied a full line of 13 points , eight rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals . Fred VanVleet was productive on the second unit with 12 points , three boards , three assists and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas posted 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Serge Ibaka registered nine points , two rebounds , one steal and one block . The Magic were paced by a pair of 17 - point efforts from Evan Fournier and Mario Hezonja , with the former adding four assists and two rebounds and the latter also managing two boards , one assist and two steals . Nikola Vucevic accounted for 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jonathon Simmons turned in 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Mack tallied 12 points , four assists , two rebounds and two steals in 21 minutes off the bench , while D.J. Augustin and Aaron Gordon poured in 11 points apiece . Gordon notably added 10 rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . The Raptors remain on the road and head to the Nation 's Capital , where they 'll take on the Washington Wizards on Friday night . The Magic remain home and await a visit from the Detroit Pistons that same evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Orlando Magic , 92 - 83 , at Amway Center on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 47 - 22 ) came into the contest in a little bit better shape healthwise than in their Wednesday overtime loss to the Wizards , but they were still missing two key components in Kyrie Irving ( knee ) and Marcus Smart ( thumb ) . While the Magic ( 21 - 49 ) did n't shape up as formidable opponents on paper , Boston could n't afford to take anything for granted , considering their ongoing chase for the top spot in the Eastern Conference . Fittingly , they came out of the gates focused and playing suffocating defense , forging a 48 - 31 halftime lead . They ultimately took a 75 - 52 advantage into the final period , and although Orlando got as close as 87 - 76 with 2:9 remaining , their advantage was never seriously threatened . Boston 's second unit played a key role , as they contributed a total of 39 points on the night . Terry Rozier and Greg Monroe co - led the Celtics with 17 points , with the former also supplying seven rebounds and five assists , and the latter providing five boards , two assists , three steals and one block . Al Horford was able to return to the lineup after missing Wednesday 's game with an illness and generated 15 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one steal . Marcus Morris posted nine points , 11 boards , two assists and one steal . Jayson Tatum produced eight points , eight rebounds , and one block . Augustin registered 13 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jonathon Simmons matched Augustin 's scoring total and added four boards , three assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic contributed 12 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block , and Mario Hezonja accounted for 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and three steals . The Celtics remain on the road and head west to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday night . The Magic remain home and face the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday evening .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Orlando Magic , 118 - 98 , at Amway Center on Thursday evening . The 76ers ( 41 - 30 ) were on the second game of a back - to - back set , but they had a couple of factors still working in their favor . One was their ongoing motivation to improve their playoff positioning , while the other was simply the abysmal quality of play the Magic ( 21 - 51 ) have often displayed . Both appeared to heavily play into what was a spectacular first half for the visitors , which racked up a whopping 70 points to forge a 21 - point halftime lead . That essentially made the rest of the game a formality , and by the final buzzer , the scoreboard was n't the only place that Philadelphia owned a significant advantage in . The Sixers also won the battle on the glass handily , outrebounding the Magic by a robust 56 - 40 margin . Ersan Ilyasova paced the Sixers off the bench with 18 points - - a total he supplemented with three rebounds . Joel Embiid followed with 17 points , nine rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Robert Covington turned in 15 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Wesley Iwundu collected eight points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Nikola Vucevic posted seven points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . The 76ers head back home for a showdown with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday night , while the Magic remain home to take on the Phoenix Suns on Saturday evening as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Phoenix Suns , 105 - 99 , at Amway Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that there were only four lead changes and one tie in this fixture , it came down to the final seconds . In fact , neither team ever led by more than 10 points , as it was within an eight - point margin for the entirety of the second half . The third quarter is where Orlando took the game , as they outscored Phoenix , 39 - 28 . Rebounding was the difference for the Magic , as they outrebounded the Suns , 54 - 41 . Ball movement was also huge , with Orlando handing out 29 assists and Phoenix recording just 21 assists . That led to the Magic hitting 44 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range while the Suns connected on 40 percent from the field and 24 percent from long range . The Magic ( 22 - 51 ) got a near triple - double out of Aaron Gordon , as he collected 29 points , 11 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Nikola Vucevic amassed 24 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . D.J. Augustin accrued 15 points , nine rebounds and 10 assists . Mario Hezonja totaled 14 points , eight rebounds , four assists and four steals . The Suns ( 19 - 55 ) were led by Josh Jackson , as he tallied 18 points , two rebounds , five assists and three steals . Elfrid Payton accumulated 14 points , five rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Alex Len was huge off the bench , providing 15 points , nine rebounds and two steals . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup versus the Boston Celtics on Monday . As for Orlando , they 're off until Wednesday when they play host to the Brooklyn Nets .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 110 , in overtime at American Airlines Center on Wednesday evening . The Thunder started out well , as they led for most of the first quarter and built a 32 - 21 lead heading into the second . They expanded their lead to 15 midway through the second , but the Mavericks answered back to match them with 22 points in the quarter , making it a 54 - 43 lead for the Thunder at halftime . The Mavs started the third quarter with a 9 - 2 run to cut the deficit to five . They kept the pressure on and outscored the Thunder 33 - 23 in the quarter , to make it a one - point game , trailing 77 - 76 entering the fourth . The Mavs kept up the strong play , and held a five - point lead mid way through the quarter . However , the Thunder tied it up at 98 with 3:24 left . The game stayed tied at 98 for two minutes , before the Thunder took a go - ahead basket . The Mavs managed to tie it up at the buzzer with a put - back shot by Dwight Powell , sending the game to overtime . It was a one - possession game through overtime , with the Thunder getting the game - winning point on a free throw thanks to a foul on a made basket by Russell Westbrook with 38 seconds left . Westbrook led the Thunder with 30 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and one block , in 41 minutes . Paul George followed up with 23 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Carmelo Anthony added 12 points and six rebounds . The Thunder shot 45 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 26 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Dwight Powell followed up with 21 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals , while Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 17 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Mavs shot 48 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 36 from long range . The Mavs ( 19 - 43 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Friday . The Thunder ( 36 - 27 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 80 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday . It 's rare to see a double - digit margin from the first quarter on , but that 's just how badly Memphis is struggling right now . In fact , a 31 - 13 first quarter was too much for the Grizzlies to overcome , as Dallas led by at least 17 points for the final three quarters . Defense was key for the Mavericks , as they held the Grizzlies to 36 percent from the field while connecting on 48 percent of their shots . Rebounding was a big part of that , with Dallas outrebounding Memphis . 52 - 41 . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 48 ) were without Mike Conley , Marc Gasol and Tyreke Evans for this game , as it marked their 17th - straight defeat . Dillon Brooks led the way , as he tallied 17 points and six rebounds . JaMychal Green amassed 14 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Jarrell Martin accrued 13 points , three rebounds and three assists . Ben McLemore totaled 10 points , six rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Dallas will play again on Sunday , as they play host to the Houston Rockets . As for Memphis , they play host to the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday for their next fixture .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 93 - 92 , at American Airlines Center on Friday . Despite the fact that Dallas held the lead for the entirety of the first half , Minnesota came back and prevailed with a huge win . While there were only five ties and three lead changes in this game , it was within a single - digit margin for all but one minute . Defense was key for Minnesota , as they forced 14 turnovers from Dallas while recording 10 steals . The Timberwolves also held the Mavericks to 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with Minnesota connecting on 15 - of - 17 and Dallas hitting just 5 - of - 7 . A 23 - 11 fastbreak differential was also big for the T'Wolves The Timberwolves ( 44 - 33 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he totaled 21 points and 20 rebounds . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 112 - 107 , at Barclays Center on Wednesday night . Coming into the contest , it would n't have been difficult to imagine the defensively - deficient Nets ( 3 - 2 ) as a sacrificial lamb for a Cavaliers ( 3 - 2 ) squad looking for a signature win to regain a bit of lost confidence . Cleveland 's 3 - 1 mark coming in masked some of the difficulties they 'd endured , with their latest struggles having come Tuesday night in what should have been an easy victory over the Bulls . Cleveland once again rolled out its new - look lineup Wednesday , with LeBron James manning the point and Tristan Thompson down low at center . However , the first half brought them more of the same misery , as they entered intermission trailing by a 55 - 52 margin . The deficit grew further in the third period before a fourth - quarter push by the Cavs eventually saw them take a 94 - 92 lead with 5:12 remaining . They would n't be able to sustain it , however , and Spencer Dinwiddie 's jaw - dropping 31 - foot three - pointer with 43 seconds remaining gave the Nets the lead for good . James paced the visitors with a 29 - point , 13 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included four blocks . He did also commit a game - high eight turnovers . Kyle Korver was next with a bench - leading 22 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jeff Green continued his strong play on the second unit to open the season , posting 18 points , six rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Kevin Love managed a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double , while Thompson mustered only three points but also pulled down eight boards and recorded a steal . With D'Angelo Russell ( knee ) sitting Wednesday , Dinwiddie drew the start at point guard and led the way with 22 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson supplied 19 points , six rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Allen Crabbe matched Hollis-Jefferson 's scoring total while leading the bench and also provided three assists and two rebounds . DeMarre Carroll continued his strong start to the season with 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and four steals . Joe Harris was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , while Caris LeVert , starting at shooting guard , poured in 10 points and added four assists , one rebound and one steal . The Cavaliers have until Saturday night to stew in the loss , as they 'll return action then against the New Orleans Pelicans in the Big Easy . The Nets will next take the floor against the Knicks across town on Friday night .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Orlando Magic , 98 - 95 , at Barclays Center on Monday evening . A hard - fought contest between two evenly - matched teams fittingly came down to the closing seconds , as both clubs remained within striking distance of each other throughout all four quarters . The Nets ( 14 - 23 ) could n't pull away despite outscoring the Magic ( 12 - 16 ) by a 49 - 43 margin in the middle periods , as they entered the final 12 minutes with a razor - thin 71 - 70 lead . Ultimately , it was Allen Crabbe 's two clutch free throws with 18 seconds remaining and his subsequent block of an Evan Fournier 27 - foot three - point pullup jumper that helped seal the win , although nothing was assured until D.J. Augustin also misfired on a three - point attempt with one second left . Brooklyn made Orlando work for their points , as they held the Magic to a 36 percent success rate from the field , including an unsightly 19 percent from three - point range . Aaron Gordon paced the visitors with a 20 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one steal . Elfrid Payton posted 17 points , seven assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Fournier and Bismack Biyombo had matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter hauling in 17 boards and posting a trio of blocks . Jonathon Simmons pitched in 10 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jarrett Allen led the Nets with 16 points in 20 minutes off the bench , and he complemented his scoring with six rebounds . Caris LeVert was right behind him with 15 points and added eight assists , five rebounds and two steals . Crabbe matched his scoring total and also supplied eight boards , one assist , three blocks and one steal . DeMarre Carroll turned in a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . The Magic head back home to tangle with the Houston Rockets on Wednesday evening , while the Nets remain home and await the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 98 - 97 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . This was an extremely competitive game throughout , as it took a shot at the buzzer to decide a winner . In fact , Spencer Dinwiddie hit a floater with nine seconds left to take a one - point lead , as Jimmy Butler missed a fade - away 20 - footer at the buzzer that ultimately cost the T'Wolves the game . Prior to that , there were 10 ties and seven lead changes in total , as this game was within a five - point margin for well over 30 minutes of action . Three-point shooting was the difference , as Minnesota went just 1 - of - 11 from long range , while Brooklyn hit 14 - of - 30 . The Nets ended up shooting 51 percent from the field , while winning the assist battle , 22 - 10 . The Timberwolves ( 24 - 15 ) were led by Jimmy Butler , as he collected 30 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . Andrew Wiggins finished with 17 points , two rebounds and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns totaled 16 points and 10 rebounds . The Nets ( 15 - 23 ) not only got a game - winner out of Spencer Dinwiddie , he led the team with 26 points and nine assists on 9 - of - 14 from the field . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson amassed 10 points and five rebounds before fouling out . Joe Harris was huge off the bench , as he provided 17 points and four rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Minnesota will return to action on Friday in a road matchup versus the Boston Celtics , As for Brooklyn , they also face the Celtics for their next fixture , as they play host to them on Saturday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 123 - 113 , at Barclays Center on Tuesday evening . The Rockets ( 39 - 13 ) and the Nets ( 19 - 36 ) played a tight game during the first half , but Houston pulled away for good in the second half and clinched the win against a difficult opponent on the road . After the first two quarters ended with a 65 - 63 advantage for Houston , the Rockets increased that advantage to 10 points after three . Brooklyn could n't turn things around in the final 12 minutes , and the Rockets sealed the deal to complete the season - series sweep of the Nets . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with an impressive performance of 36 points , five assists , and four rebounds , but he also made history since he reached 15,0 - career points . Chris Paul added 25 points with seven rebounds and five assists . Clint Capela had 18 points with 11 rebounds , once again emerging as a force on both ends of the court . The bench provided a spark as well , as Gerald Green ( 16 points ) and Eric Gordon ( 13 points ) did a good job in the second unit . DeMarre Carroll was the top player for the Nets , as he finished with 21 points . Spencer Dinwiddie filled the stat sheet nicely after finishing with 18 points , nine assists , and three rebounds . Jarrett Allen chipped in with 16 points . Jahill Okafor had a good performance off the bench with 15 points and six boards in 15 minutes , and D'Angelo Russell had 10 points on 4 - of - 12 from the field .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 101 , at Barclays Center on Monday evening . The Clippers got out to a good start , as they took a 6 - 5 lead and did not look back until they ended the first quarter up 34 - 22 . They not only maintained their comfortable cushion through the second , but the Clippers expanded their lead to 66 - 51 by halftime . The third quarter was more of the same , as the Clippers pushed their lead to 23 , taking a 90 - 67 lead into the final frame . The Nets finally showed some life as they started the fourth with a 14 - 6 run , which made it a 15 - point game , with 8:30 to go . However , it was too little , too late for the Nets , as they fell to their sixth straight loss . Lou Williams led the way for Los_Angeles , with 20 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench . DeAndre Jordan came up large , with 16 points , 17 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , while Austin Rivers chipped in 17 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Danilo Gallinari added 16 points , five rebounds and two blocks . The Clippers shot 56 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 16 from long range . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell and Joe Harris tallied 16 points each off the bench , to lead the Nets in scoring . DeMarre Carroll shot 5 - of - 15 from the field , and finished with 12 points , and 10 rebounds , while Allen Crabbe added 15 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 40 from long range . The Nets ( 19 - 39 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pacers on Wednesday . The Clippers ( 29 - 26 ) take on the Celtics in Boston on Wednesday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 111 - 105 , at Barclays Center on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 30 - 41 ) pulled quite an upset in this game , as they came back from a huge deficit in the first half . Brooklyn jumped to a 62 - 43 lead after the break , but Charlotte did n't sit back and they managed to turn things around in the second half . Charlotte turned things around in the third with a 32 - 25 lead in the third , and they rode the momentum to come away with the game thanks to a huge 36 - 18 advantage in the fourth quarter . It was an impressive performance from Charlotte , and they kept their slim playoff chances alive . Dwight Howard led the way for Charlotte with an impressive performance , as he finished with 32 points and an astonishing 30 rebounds , including 11 offensive boards . Kemba Walker had a very good effort as well , as he finished with 24 points , six assists , five rebounds , and two steals . Jeremy Lamb had 17 points with seven boards . Frank Kaminsky did a good job off the bench with 11 points . D'Angelo Russell led the way for the Nets , as he finished with 19 points , five assists , and four boards . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled the stat sheet nicely , as he had 13 points , five rebounds , three assists , and three steals . DeMarre Carroll delivered 11 points with six rebounds , and Spencer Dinwiddie had a great effort off the bench thanks to 13 points .
The Denver Nuggets took down the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 110 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday thanks to a strong fourth - quarter comeback effort . Denver ( 13 - 9 ) entered the fourth quarter trailing by two points , but delivered a strong fourth - quarter performance to pull off the significant victory . Denver delivered a whopping 37 points in the fourth , ultimately establishing a comfortable double - digit lead . Drama , though , ensued in the game 's final minute . As time ran out , sophomore point guard Jamal Murray dribble around Lakers rookie Lonzo Ball , a gesture that seemingly offended Lakers forward Julius Randle . Randle swung at Murray in the final seconds of the game , leading to a foul that put Murray at the line and allowed him to extend his team - high scoring total to 28 points . Besides his involvement in the late - game controversy , Murray delivered a strong performance . He not only led the Nuggets with 28 points , but delivered four assists and two steals . Murray 's offensive contribution was much - needed , as Denver remains without star big men Nikola Jokic ( ankle ) and Paul Millsap ( wrist ) . In their absence , though , several other Nuggets stepped up in addition to Murray . Trey Lyles and Will Barton led a strong showing for the Denver bench , combining for 34 points . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 14 ) has now lost nine of its last 12 games , as struggles are beginning to mount for one of the league 's youngest teams . On Saturday , the Lakers enjoyed a strong outing from sophomore star Brandon Ingram , who scored a team - high 20 points . However , highly - touted rookie Lonzo Ball did not impress to the same degree . Ball shot just 4 - of - 10 for nine points and finished with five turnovers . Ball 's adjustment to the league remains a work in progress , as his field goal percentage remains under 35 percent for the season . However , another Lakers rookie , Kyle Kuzma , has shone in his debut season . Kuzma returned from a brief injury on Saturday and delivered a double - double off the bench . Los_Angeles will host the Houston Rockets on Sunday , while Denver will see the Dallas Mavericks on Monday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 112 - 104 , at Pepsi Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets have been great at home this season and started the game out that way , leading 24 - 17 after one quarter . The Timberwolves picked up the intensity in the second quarter , first cutting the deficit , then responding to Denver 's run , so that the Nuggets led by only two , 52 - 50 at halftime . The Timberwolves managed to hang around through the third , despite the Nuggets expanding their lead to four heading into the fourth . The fourth belonged to the Timberwolves , as their big guns came alive helping to outscore the Nuggets 32 - 20 in the quarter and run off with the win . Karl-Anthony Towns helped spark the Timberwolves , scoring their first 11 points of the first quarter . Towns finished with 25 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , 10 rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 37 minutes . Jimmy Butler tallied 25 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , as he also came up big down the stretch for Minnesota . Jamal Crawford poured in 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves shot 49 percent from the field , including 33 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Jamal Murray led the Nuggets with 30 points on 10 - of17 shooting , in 37 minutes . Nikola Jokic followed up with 22 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes , while Mason Plumlee tallied 13 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and three steals , in 28 minutes . The Nuggets shot 51 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 29 from long range , however gave up 21 turnovers in the contest . The Nuggets ( 16 - 15 ) head to Portland to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday . The Timberwolves ( 19 - 13 ) head to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 99 - 91 , at Pepsi Center on Friday evening . The first quarter was a neck - and - neck battle as the teams traded baskets . The Jazz led 26 - 23 to start the second quarter but that quickly changed as the Nuggets went on a 14 - 3 run to take a 37 - 29 lead just four minutes into the quarter . The Jazz fought back and swung things again in their favor by regaining their three - point lead by halftime . The third quarter ended up being the decisive one , as the Nuggets caught fire , outscoring the Jazz 38 - 16 , to take a 84 - 65 lead into the fourth . Although the Jazz put up a fight in the fourth , outscoring Denver 26 - 15 , it was not enough to recover from the 19 - point deficit they faced with 12 minutes to go . This marks the second straight win for the Nuggets . Jamal Murray and Trey Lyles poured in 26 points each to give the Nuggets the juice they needed to move their home record to an impressive 14 - 4 . Gary Harris added 13 points , while Will Barton tallied in 12 points and eight assists , in 33 minutes off the bench . The Nuggets shot 44 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , five players scored in double digits for the Jazz , led by Donovan Mitchell and Ricky Rubio who finished with 15 points each . Derrick Favors followed up with 14 points and 10 rebounds , while Rodney Hood chipped in 12 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from long range . The Jazz ( 16 - 23 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss as they head to Miami to take on the Heat on Sunday . The Nuggets ( 21 - 17 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Saturday .
The host Denver Nuggets defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 104 - 101 , in a late - game thriller at Pepsi Center on Monday . The game was tight throughout , with the largest lead of the game being just eight for Denver early in the first quarter . The teams traded buckets back and forth for the majority of the contest , culminating in a tense final minute that decided the outcome . After an and - one from Jamal Murray gave Denver the lead , Portland held possession with 31 seconds remaining and a one - point deficit . Both C.J. McCollum and Evan Turner missed potential go - ahead jumpers , as multiple offensive rebounds were unable to save the possession for Portland . Four free - throws from Will Barton in the final seconds helped seal the win for the Nuggets . For Denver ( 24 - 23 ) , Jamal Murray 's go - ahead bucket was just one of many in the win . Murray scored a whopping 38 points on 14 - of - 19 shooting . His offense was sorely needed in what was generally a poor shooting night for Denver . The team as a whole shot just 41 percent from the field , and the Nuggets starters outside of Murray and Mason Plumlee combined to shoot just 9 - of - 38 . Portland ( 25 - 22 ) , meanwhile , snapped a three - game winning streak with Monday 's heartbreaking loss . While Damian Lillard excelled , scoring a team - high 25 points and dishing eight assists , Portland 's other star guard did not . C.J. McCollum shot just 3 - of - 14 , including a miss on an ill - advised mid - range jumper on one of Portland 's final possessions . The Blazers as a whole shot only 42 percent in the game . Portland will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday . Denver , meanwhile , will see the New York Knicks on Thursday .
The Denver Nuggets took down the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 115 - 108 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . While the defending champions held a lead for much of the early going , a fourth quarter run from the Nuggets helped push the team to victory . The Nuggets scored 38 points in the fourth , taking the lead with just over four minutes remaining and never allowing it to go away . Star big man Nikola Jokic hit a crucial three - pointer with just over two minutes left , and followed it up with a pair of free - throws on the next possession . The Nuggets were ultimately able to put the game out of reach thanks to two technical free - throws , which came after technical fouls were assessed to Nick Young and Kevin Durant with 30 seconds remaining in the game . For Denver ( 28 - 25 ) , the strong offensive night was led by combo wing Will Barton . Barton had 25 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Star center Nikola Jokic had a team - high nine rebounds , along with 19 points and five assists . One of the keys for the team was free - throw shooting , as they shot 25 - of - 29 from the stripe in the win . On the other hand , Golden_State ( 41 - 12 ) uncharacteristically struggled at the free - throw line . They went just 14 - of - 23 from the line , including rare misses from Kevin Durant and Steph Curry . Durant , nevertheless , scored a team - high 31 points on highly efficient 12 - of - 16 shooting . Curry also excelled , scoring 24 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting . Denver will host the Charlotte Hornets on Monday , while the Warriors will square off with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 119 - 114 , at Pepsi Center on Sunday evening . The Rockets got out to a dominant start , as they jumped to an early 15 - 5 lead . The Nuggets battled back to make it a five - point game , but the Rockets closed the quarter on 19 - 11 run , to take a 38 - 25 lead into the second . The Rockets kept the foot on the gas through the second quarter , not allowing Denver to catch up at all , and took a 66 - 52 lead into halftime . The third quarter was more of the same , as the Nuggets could hardly trim the deficit to single digits , before the Rockets would take off again . Houston took a 92 - 79 lead into the final frame , where the Nuggets continued their best effort to claw back . They did a great job chipping away , making it just a five - point game with 4:31 to go . However , the Rockets managed to stay a couple steps ahead in order to notch their 12th straight win . James Harden led Houston with 41 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal , in 37 minutes . Chris Paul followed up with 23 points , six assists , five rebounds and two steals , while Trevor Ariza added 14 points , six rebounds and one steal . The Rockets shot 51 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Will Barton led the Nuggets with 25 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three steals , in 36 minutes . Nikola Jokic finished with 21 points , 14 rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block , while Jamal Murray tallied 19 points , five assists and two rebounds . The Nuggets shot 48 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range . The Nuggets ( 33 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Tuesday . The Rockets ( 46 - 13 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Monday .
The visiting Los_Angeles Clippers squeaked by the Denver Nuggets , 122 - 120 , at Pepsi Center on Tuesday evening . The Clippers ( 32 - 27 ) can thank their second unit for the win , as the team 's bench combined to pour in 74 points on Tuesday . Tuesday 's win came in dramatic fashion , as the fourth quarter featured four ties and three lead changes . LA , though , managed to come out on top , despite Denver ( 33 - 28 ) bringing the game to within one with under 20 seconds remaining . After Lou Williams sank two clutch free - throws to give LA its ultimate lead , Denver was able to get the ball back with a chance to tie or win with only seven seconds left . Clippers forward Tobias Harris foiled them , though , with a clutch steal . LA re - entered the playoff picture with Tuesday 's win . The team now sits at eighth in what is proving to be a hotly - contested Western Conference . Despite the team suffering several injuries and making major mid - season shakeups , one player has been a constant rock for the Clippers : Lou Williams . The former Sixth Man of the Year impressed once again on Tuesday , leading his team with 25 points off the bench . Big man Boban Marjanovic also delivered an electrifying bench performance . He recorded a season - high 18 points in only 15 minutes of play . For Denver , meanwhile , it was the starters who got the job done . All five Nuggets starters scored at least 18 points in what was a terrific game for the starting unit . Shooting guard Gary Harris led the team with 23 points . However , the bench came up short , scoring only 24 of the team 's 120 points in the loss . Veteran All-Star Paul Millsap played for the first time in 100 days , making his return from a wrist injury that sidelined him in December . Los_Angeles will host the red - hot Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will travel to Memphis on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 120 - 113 , at Pepsi Center on Thursday evening . The first quarter was full of action as they teams traded buckets , until the Nuggets emerged with a 33 - 29 lead heading into the second . They applied more pressure in the second quarter and outscored the Pistons 32 - 22 , to take a 65 - 51 lead by halftime . The Nuggets stayed in control through the third quarter , where they matched the 33 points scored by the Pistons . The Nuggets led by 14 entering the fourth quarter and were able to keep a comfortable cushion the rest of the way , en route to the much - needed win . Jamal Murray was the high - point man for Denver with 26 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , along with nine rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 32 minutes . Nikola Jokic tallied a triple double with 23 points , 12 rebounds , 10 assists , along with three steals and three blocks , in 37 minutes . The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 88 - 82 , at Pepsi Center on Monday evening . The Nuggets got out to a good start at home with an early 12 - 3 lead , and went on to outscore the Trail_Blazers 28 - 23 through the first quarter . The Blazers bounced back in the second , as they used a 10 - 4 run to take the lead , 33 - 32 , just four minutes into the quarter . They maintained a slight edge and then closed the quarter with a 60 run , to lead 49 - 42 by halftime . The Trail_Blazers carried the momentum into the third , as they pushed their lead to double digits , just a couple minutes into the quarter . However , the Nuggets rallied back to cut the deficit to just three points heading into the final frame , as they trailed 69 - 66 . The fourth quarter went right down to the wire , as the Nuggets led by two , with 30 seconds left . The Nuggets were able to finish it off at the line , to earn their sixth straight win and keep their playoff hopes alive . Will Barton led the Nuggets with 22 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , seven rebounds and three assists , in 39 minutes . Nikola Jokic finished with 15 points , 20 rebounds , 11 assists , two steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Jamal Murray and Gary Harris chipped in 12 points each .
