The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 97 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday afternoon . The Spurs ( 4 - 2 ) came close to pull a comeback in this one , but fell short in the dying seconds after LaMarcus Aldridge 's mid - range jumper and Patty Mills ' last - second three - pointer both came up short . San_Antonio seemed to be on the verge of mounting a huge comeback after they started the fourth quarter on a 90 run , but Indiana ( 3 - 3 ) fought back and eventually came out on top . A three - pointer from Victor Oladipo with 10 seconds left and two free - throws from Cory Joseph closed the deal for the Pacers as they moved back to .500 with the win , while San_Antonio lost their second straight . Oladipo paced the Pacers ' offense in this one . Aside from scoring a key three late in the fourth quarter , the shooting guard finished the game with 23 points , five assists , and four rebounds . Domantas Sabonis added 22 points ( on 9 - of - 9 from the field ) with 12 rebounds , and Bojan Bogdanovic contributed with 15 points , eight rebounds , and two assists . On the Spurs ' side , Aldridge once again led the way in Kawhi Leonard 's absence with 26 points and eight rebounds , while Pau Gasol looked solid on both ends of the court as he finished with 17 points , seven rebounds , five assists and five blocks . Rudy Gay and Patty Mills each finished with 10 points coming off the bench , but the Spurs ' biggest sin was their shooting as they only converted 40 percent of their attempts from the field .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 121 - 109 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 12 - 9 ) received a bit of notably good news earlier in the day when they learned that Victor Oladipo would be able to return from a one - game absence due to a knee injury to face his old squad , a team he had already lit up for 29 points , nine rebounds , five assists , seven steals and two blocks on Nov. 20 . Indiana got off to a fast start , building a 33 - 25 lead after one quarter . To their credit , the Magic ( 8 - 13 ) battled back , and they entered the fourth quarter trailing by only an 85 - 84 margin . They even forged an 86 - 85 edge 15 seconds into the final period on an Evan Fournier basket before the home team regained an advantage they 'd would n't relinquish again . The Pacers ultimately prevailed in the fourth quarter , 36 - 25 , to seal the hard - fought win . Although Orlando was able to shoot relatively well , Indiana was that much more effective while draining 53 percent of their 79 attempts , including 58 percent of their 26 three - point shots . Jonathon Simmons drew the start at small forward and led the way with 21 points , three rebounds and one assist . Nikola Vucevic contributed a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and three blocks . Aaron Gordon matched Vucevic 's scoring total and added six boards , two assists , four blocks and one steal . Elfrid Payton tallied 15 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Fournier poured in 12 points overall and complemented them with four assists and a pair of boards . D.J. Augustin scored a bench - leading 11 points , dished out four assists and hauled in one rebound . Oladipo enjoyed another successful game versus his old squad , pacing Indiana with 26 points , six rebounds , five assists , four blocks and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic supplied 22 points and three rebounds . Domantas Sabonis led the second unit with 19 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Lance Stephenson was productive off the bench as well with 18 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Myles Turner matched his point total and also posted four rebounds . Darren Collison had a down game with a modest seven points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . The same was true for Thaddeus Young , who shot just 1 - for - 9 on his way to two points . He also had five rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Magic will head back home and await the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday night , while the Pacers head to the Lone Star State to take on the Houston Rockets on that same evening .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Indiana Pacers , 100 - 95 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . Neither team came into the contest with stellar records , but the game was n't short on star power and intriguing storylines by any stretch . The night marked Paul George 's first regular - season contest in the Hoosier State in an opposing uniform , while Victor Oladipo was also facing off against many of his Oklahoma_City teammates from last season . As it turned out , it was Steven Adams , who 's enjoyed a breakout campaign on the offensive end thus far , who spearheaded the Thunder ( 13 - 14 ) on a night when George and Russell Westbrook went a combined 6 - for - 31 from the field . Adams drained 11 of his 16 shots on the way to a 23 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . The visitors also definitively erased a 27 - 22 first - quarter deficit with a 29 - point second quarter that helped them forge a 51 - 46 halftime advantage . While the Pacers ( 16 - 12 ) opened the third with an 11 - 2 run , Oklahoma_City was able to battle back and eventually escaped with the hard - fought victory . Alex Abrines drew another start for Andre Roberson ( ankle ) and followed Adams with 14 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . George and Carmelo Anthony turned in matching 12 - point tallies , with the former also supplying five assists , two rebounds and three steals , and the latter adding five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Westbrook mustered a modest 10 points due to his aforementioned shooting struggles but did haul in 17 rebounds , dished out 12 assists and recorded two steals . Jerami Grant led the bench with nine points , six rebounds and three blocks . Oladipo paced Indiana with 19 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , five rebounds and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic was next with 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Darren Collison registered 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . Thaddeus Young generated an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included seven steals , three blocks and one assist . Myles Turner totaled nine points , four rebounds , two assists and three blocks , and Lance Stephenson matched his scoring total while also tallying eight rebounds and two assists . The Thunder 's next stop is in Philadelphia , where they 'll face off with the Sixers on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Pacers remain home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets in overtime , 123 - 119 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . Brooklyn looked like they were going to cruise to an easy win when they led by 16 at the half , but Indiana fought back to capture this comeback win in overtime . In fact , a 39 - 24 third quarter is what got the Pacers back in it , as they outscored the Nets , 12 - 8 , in overtime . In addition , the Pacers never trailed in the final 15 minutes of play . Shooting was key , with the Pacers hitting 52 percent of their shots and the Nets shooting just 43 percent from the field . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Indiana recording seven more assists than the Nets , while committing two less turnovers . The Nets ( 12 - 20 ) were led by Spencer Dinwiddie , as he tallied 26 points and eight assists . DeMarre Carroll amassed 20 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson accrued 18 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Caris LeVert led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Pacers ( 19 - 14 ) got another gem out of Victor Oladipo , as he accumulated 38 points , four rebounds and six assists . Myles Turner totaled 23 points , nine rebounds and six blocks . Darren Collison provided 14 points and nine assists , while Bojan Bogdanovic collected 17 points and six boards . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Indiana traveling to play the Detroit Pistons and Brooklyn playing the San Antonio Spurs on the road as well .

The first quarter looked like a dominating victory for Cleveland , but they once again collapsed at the hands of Indiana . In fact , the Pacers overcame a 34 - 12 first quarter , by outscoring the Cavaliers , 64 - 40 , in the second and third quarters . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Indiana hitting 10 - of - 21 from long range and Cleveland going just 7 - of - 34 from long range . The Cavaliers ( 26 - 16 ) were led by LeBron James , as he tallied 27 points , eight rebounds , 11 assists and three steals . Kevin Love finished second among starters , amassing 21 points , 10 rebounds and three steals . Jeff Green led the bench with 13 points and two rebounds . The Pacers ( 22 - 20 ) were led by Darren Collison , as he accrued 22 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Victor Oladipo collected 19 points and three rebounds . Lance Stephenson led the bench with 16 points , 11 rebounds and four assists .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 116 - 101 , at BankersLife Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . The Pacers ( 26 - 22 ) had an impressive performance on both ends of the court , and they did n't have lots of problems to defeat a Suns ( 17 - 31 ) team that failed to pose much of a threat overall . Indiana won the first three quarters by considerable margins ( 32 - 18 , 31 - 26 and 36 - 21 , respectively ) so they managed to build a huge 34 - point advantage after three quarters . Phoenix won the final 12 minutes by a 36 - 17 margin , but it was garbage - time play as the game was already decided . Indiana fully deserved the win as they dominated from start to finish . Thaddeus Young was the top scorer for the Indiana Pacers , as he finished with 22 points and three rebounds . Victor Oladipo filled the stat sheet thanks to 21 points , nine assists , and four rebounds . Domantas Sabonis chipped in with 19 points , eight rebounds , and three assists . Bojan Bogdanovic added 17 points and seven boards , while Al Jefferson had 10 points off the bench . Surprisingly , the top three scorers for the Suns came off the bench . Rookie Josh Jackson had 20 points , Troy Daniels added 19 , and Greg Monroe delivered a strong double - double of 16 points and 17 boards . Devin Booker contributed 19 points , six rebounds , and four assists .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 112 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 27 - 23 ) and the Magic ( 14 - 34 ) played a very intense game that went down to the wire , and it was n't until the final minutes that we found a winner . The game went back and forth , as Orlando won the first quarter 32 - 22 , and they actually extended their advantage at halftime since they were leading by 70 - 53 . Indiana answered back with a 31 - 22 third quarter , and they also won 30 - 20 in the fourth . As a result , they escaped with a huge two - point win even if at times they did n't look capable of creating a comeback . Victor Oladipo was the top scorer for the Pacers , as he finished with 24 points , six assists , and five rebounds . Thaddeus Young had 20 points with six boards , and Domantas Sabonis registered 17 points and nine boards . Darren Collison filled the stat sheet since he had 11 points , seven assists , four rebounds , and two steals . Lance Stephenson thrived off the bench thanks to a 21 - point , six - assist , five - rebound performance . Aaron Gordon was the best player for the Magic , as he finished with a strong double - double of 22 points and 11 rebounds as well as four assists . Evan Fournier added 21 points , and Elfrid Payton contributed 12 points and five assists . Khem Birch had a good performance off the bench thanks to 11 points , five rebounds , and three steals .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 101 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . The see - saw battle fittingly came down to the closing seconds , as the two clubs took their respective turns enjoying breakout quarters . The Pacers ( 29 - 23 ) were at their best during the middle periods after falling behind by a modest 25 - 21 margin in the first period . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 32 ) ultimately made a comeback from the nine - point deficit they entered the fourth quarter with , eventually taking the 101 - 100 lead on a Wayne Selden 29 - foot three - point jumper with 1:57 remaining . Their edge was short - lived , however , and Memphis ' inability to convert on multiple shot attempts in the final minute - plus played a pivotal part in their failure to ever reclaim the lead . A Jarrell Martin personal foul with 34 seconds left led to two successful Myles Turner free throws , and after Selden was ejected for a technical foul with a second remaining following a Cory Joseph block of his layup attempt , Bojan Bogdanovic converted all three of his tries from the charity stripe for the final margin of victory . In addition to Selden 's aforementioned miss , Dillon Brooks and Marc Gasol failed to find the net on a combined three shots over the final 1:14 . Selden led the way for the Grizzlies with 24 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Gasol followed with a near double - double of 23 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one steal . Andrew Harrison provided 13 points , six assists and five rebounds . Brooks finished with 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and four steals . Martin and Ivan Rabb generated matching seven - point efforts , with the former also supplying four rebounds and two assists , and the latter registering eight boards and one assist . Bogdanovic paced Indiana with 21 points and added five boards , one assist and three steals . Darren Collison managed 16 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals . Myles Turner drew the start and generated a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks and two steals . Victor Oladipo had a modest showing by his standards , tallying 13 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Lance Stephenson collected 13 points of his own to lead the bench and also posted three boards and two assists . Thaddeus Young contributed 10 points , five assists and two steals , while Domantas Sabonis matched his scoring total and complemented it with seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Grizzlies remain on the road and in the Midwest , taking on the Detroit Pistons in Motown on Thursday night . The Pacers also pack their bags and pay a Friday evening visit to the Charlotte Hornets .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 87 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 38 - 28 ) came into Friday 's contest with a couple of built - in advantages , one which was clearly the futility of their opponent on the road . The Hawks ( 20 - 46 ) had only notched five wins in 31 tries away from Philips Arena prior to landing in the Hoosier State , and the first quarter of Friday 's game played out exactly like one would expect a matchup between a playoff - caliber team and a unit with no postseason aspirations at this stage of the season would . Indiana jumped out to a 34 - 15 advantage after 12 minutes , and a 53 - 37 halftime lead . Once Indiana expanded their edge by eight additional points courtesy of a 34 - point third period , the game was effectively decided . Although the final score spoke to the extent of their dominance , the home squad particularly exerted their will down low , winning the rebounding battle by a 49 - 35 margin . Tyler Dorsey 's relatively modest 18 points in 25 minutes off the bench , which he supplemented with four rebounds , paced the Hawks . Dennis Schroder mustered 15 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal . Mike Muscala supplied 12 points , five boards , two assists and two steals . John Collins and Dewayne Dedmon generated matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds , three assists and one steal , and the latter registering seven boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Kent Bazemore ( four points , three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block ) and Taurean Prince ( three points , one rebound , one assist and one block ) struggled while draining a combined three of 14 attempts . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way for the Pacers with 21 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Cory Joseph tallied 18 points , seven boards , four assists and two steals . Victor Oladipo connected on an impressive seven of nine attempts on his way to 17 points , a total he complemented with five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Darren Collison made his return from an 11 - game absence following arthroscopic knee surgery and matched Oladipo 's scoring total while leading the second unit . He also dished out five dimes , hauled down two rebounds and recorded one steal . Thaddeus Young managed just four points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals . The Hawks head back home to tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Sunday afternoon , while the Pacers pay a visit to the Boston Celtics on Sunday evening .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 123 - 101 , at Smoothie King Center on Saturday evening . The Pelicans ( 3 - 3 ) took control early , finishing off the first quarter with a 35 - 22 lead . The Cavaliers ( 3 - 3 ) managed to close the gap with a solid third quarter , but the Pelicans still held a 89 - 83 lead heading into the fourth . The Cavaliers looked depleted as the Pelicans dominated the final frame , out - scoring the Cavs 34 - 18 , to seal the win . This marks the second straight win for New_Orleans , while Cleveland has now dropped two in a row . The Pelicans were firing on all cylinders , with four players topping 20 points . Anthony Davis was the high - point man , 30 points , along with 14 rebounds , three blocks , two steals and two assists , in 36 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins posted a complimentary 29 points , 12 rebounds , 10 assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . Jrue Holiday tallied 29 points , seven assists and four rebounds , while E'Twaun Moore chipped in 24 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting . Meanwhile , Kevin Love was the high - point man for the Cavaliers , with 26 points and 11 rebounds , in 27 minutes . LeBron James was relatively quiet , with 18 points , eight assists and five rebounds , in 30 minutes of action . The only other player to score in double digits for the Cavs was Dwyane Wade , who finished with 15 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Cavaliers will be right back in action as they play host to the Knicks on Sunday . The Pelicans play host to the Magic on Monday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 111 - 103 , at Smoothie King Center on Saturday . While New_Orleans could n't run away with this game , they were in control for the majority of it . In fact , the Pelicans led for all but five minutes , despite never leading by more than 11 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with the Pelicans outrebounding the Clippers , 51 - 37 . The shooting disparity was vast as well , as New_Orleans hit 54 percent of their shots , while holding the Clippers to just 41 percent from the field . The Clippers ( 5 - 7 ) have now lost seven of their last eight games , as they continue to free fall down the standings . Blake Griffin led Los_Angeles , as he accumulated 26 points , four rebounds and six assists , despite going just 9 - of - 26 from the field . Austin Rivers tallied 19 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . DeAndre Jordan recorded a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . The Pelicans ( 7 - 6 ) were led by DeMarcus Cousins , as he collected 35 points , 15 rebounds and five assists on 14 - of - 23 shooting . Anthony Davis amassed 25 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . E'Twaun Moore finished with 18 points , as the only other Pelican in double figures . Both teams return to action on Monday , with the Clippers hosting the Philadelphia 76ers and the Pelicans hosting the Atlanta Hawks .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 125 - 116 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . Toronto are one of the hottest teams in the league right now , a this marked their fourth win in five games . They really took control in the middle quarters , outscoring the Pelicans , 69 - 52 . The Raptors actually turned a three - point deficit into a 17 - point lead in a 10 - minute span between the third ad fourth quarters . Toronto 's offense could n't be stopped , as they shot 59 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . The Raptors ( 9 - 5 ) got a near triple - double out of Kyle Lowry , as he collected 22 points , 11 rebounds and nine assists . DeMar DeRozan led the team in scoring , tallying 25 points , nine rebounds , six assists and two steals on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Jonas Valanciunas amassed 21 points , six rebounds and two assists . C.J. Miles led the bench with 17 points . The Pelicans ( 8 - 7 ) were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who totaled 25 points , nine rebounds , five assists and four steals . Anthony Davis finished with 19 points , five rebounds and three steals . Jrue Holiday accrued 18 points , four rebounds and five assists . Rajon Rondo made his first start of the season and provided four points and eight assists in 14 minutes of action . Both teams return to action on Friday , with New_Orleans traveling to play the Denver Nuggets and Toronto hosting the New York Knicks .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 120 - 102 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday evening . The superstar - laden matchup started off as evenly matched as one would assume , given the two teams ' similarly talented lineups . However , after a tightly - contested first quarter that the Pelicans ( 11 - 10 ) emerged from with a narrow 29 - 28 advantage , the balance of power underwent a seismic shift . New_Orleans ' Anthony Davis was ejected with 4:11 remaining in the second quarter after arguing a foul call against him , leaving the home squad without an integral component . The Timberwolves ( 13 - 9 ) were able to take advantage , forging a 62 - 49 halftime lead and outscoring their hosts by a 58 - 53 margin in the second half to garner the comfortable victory . Minnesota shot an impressive 58 percent from the field and won the rebounding battle by a decisive 44 - 28 margin , an advantage that the absence of Davis undoubtedly help create . Andrew Wiggins led the way on the night for the Timberwolves , compiling 28 points on 10 - for - 18 shooting and adding eight rebounds , five assists and one block . Jimmy Butler followed with 19 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Gorgui Dieng matched Butler 's scoring total and supplemented it with six rebounds , five assists and four steals . Tyus Jones drew another start for Jeff Teague ( Achilles ) and was impressive once again , filling out the stat sheet with 16 points , six assists , four rebounds and four steals . Ageless veteran Jamal Crawford poured in 12 points and also supplied three assists and one rebound . Karl-Anthony Towns took more of a back seat than usual on the offensive end with only seven shot attempts , but he still mustered an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Taj Gibson managed a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double of his own that featured four assists and one steal . Jrue Holiday nearly matched Wiggins basket for basket while leading the Pelicans with 27 points , five assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Davis was enjoying a successful evening before getting the hook , as he 'd amassed 17 points and five rebounds in just 18 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins matched Davis ' point haul and added 10 rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . E'Twaun Moore registered just five points , two boards , one assist and one steal , while Rajon Rondo could only provide three points , six assists , one rebound and one steal in 27 minutes . Darius Miller led the bench with 12 points . The Timberwolves continue on the road and face the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday night , while the Pelicans visit the Utah Jazz on Friday evening as well .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the hosting New_Orleans Pelicans on overtime , 116 - 109 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday evening . The Kings ( 8 - 17 ) seemed to be set to lose a tight contest against the Pelicans ( 13 - 13 ) , but somehow they found a way to come out on top thanks to a huge comeback during the fourth quarter , and a dominant performance during overtime . The game went back and forth during the first 36 minutes and New_Orleans had a five - point advantage heading into the fourth , but Sacramento stormed back to even things up and later secure the win on overtime . The Kings dominated the five extra minutes of action , and their win was never in doubt during the final minutes . Zach Randolph scored a season - high mark of 35 points for the Kings , and also added 13 rebounds and three assists to his name . Rookie point guard De'Aaron Fox finished with 14 points , four assists and two steals , and Buddy Hield made a huge impact of the bench since he contributed with 18 points and seven boards . Sacramento 's bench scored 53 points in total . DeMarcus Cousins had a huge game for the Pelicans , but his efforts were n't enough and he ended on the losing end of this game despite the fact he finished with 38 points , 11 rebounds , four assists , and three steals . Anthony Davis returned to the lineup following a groin problem , and contributed with 18 points and six rebounds across 31 minutes . But the Pelicans ' bench looked awful , as they only scored 16 points as a whole .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 128 - 113 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday evening . The Pelicans ( 18 - 16 ) delivered a strong all - around effort as they cruised their way against a struggling Nets ( 12 - 22 ) that never got it going on either end of the court . New_Orleans quickly jumped to an eight - point lead in the first quarter , and by halftime they were up by 23 points . Brooklyn showed some signs of life in the second half , but it was n't enough and the Pelicans ended securing a relatively easy win at home . The passing game was the biggest difference here , as New_Orleans led 40 - 26 in the assist department . Rajon Rondo was the absolute star of the game for the Pelicans . The veteran point guard only scored two points , but registered an NBA-season-high mark of 25 assists as well as seven rebounds in 30 minutes . Anthony Davis was a force to be reckoned with on both ends of the court , as he finished with 33 points , 11 rebounds and six blocks , while DeMarcus Cousins chipped in with 27 points , 14 rebounds , and five assists . Jrue Holiday ( 23 points ) and E'Twaun Moore ( 20 points ) delivered solid offensive performances as well . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson was the only Nets starter that topped the 10 - point mark , as he finished with 15 points , seven rebounds , and four assists . The bench was extremely productive , as they outscored the starters 80 - 33 . Caris LeVert ( 22 points , seven assists , six rebounds ) and Nik Stauskas ( 21 points ) had very good performances within the second unit .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 128 - 120 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday evening . The Mavericks ( 12 - 25 ) came into Friday 's game riding a rare two - game winning streak , but their chances of extending it to a season - high three on the road looked rather bleak , considering both quality of opponent and Dallas ' own 3 - 14 record away from American Airlines Center . However , the Mavericks came out seemingly ready to make a statement , as they rattled off 36 points in the first quarter and took it up another notch with a 41 - point haul in the second . That offensive explosion led to a 77 - 60 halftime lead , which was followed by both teams lighting up the scoreboard in the third period . However , defense was the order of the day in the fourth , as both teams scored a modest 19 points apiece . The Pelicans ( 18 - 17 ) got as close as 120 - 117 after a pair of Anthony Davis free throws with 3:7 remaining , but Dallas finished the game with an 8 - 3 run to seal the win . As their final score implied , the Mavericks enjoyed a prolific night from the field , posting a 55 percent success rate , including 56 percent from three - point range . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the way for Dallas with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double that also included one steal . Wesley Matthews followed with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Devin Harris led the bench with 17 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds and one assist . Dwight Powell supplied 15 points , three rebounds and one steal . J.J. Barea had a near double - double of 14 points , nine assists , two boards , one steal and one block . Dirk Nowitzki posted a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Harrison Barnes matched his scoring total and supplied five boards . Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 33 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . DeMarcus Cousins posted a 32 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists , five blocks and two steals . Jrue Holiday poured in 23 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one block . E'Twaun Moore registered 16 points , three assists , one rebound and a steal . Rajon Rondo could n't quite follow up the explosive 25 - assist effort he 'd generated in his last game , tallying six points , eight assists , two rebounds and three steals . The Mavericks next visit the Oklahoma City Thunder for a New Year 's Eve battle on Sunday night , while the Pelicans remain home to tangle with the New York Knicks on Saturday evening .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 119 - 113 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start , with a 19 - 11 lead halfway through the first . However , the Pelicans turned it up and rallied to take a 31 - 25 lead by the end of one . The teams fought hard through the second quarter , where the Blazers were able to make up some ground and bring it to a tie game , at 61 by halftime . The third quarter was much like the first , with the Blazers getting out to a bit of a lead , before the Pelicans turned the tables , taking a two - point lead into the final frame . New_Orleans managed to maintain a one , or two possession lead the rest of the way , and pulled away in the last minutes , to seal the win . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 36 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 40 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins followed up with 24 points , 19 rebounds , eight assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes . Jrue Holiday added 25 points , six assists , five rebounds and four steals , in 36 minutes . The Pelicans shot 55 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum tallied 23 points each , while Al-Farouq Aminu finished with 19 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . Jusuf Nurkic added 19 points , five rebounds , three blocks , two assists and one steal . The Trail_Blazers shot 45 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 42 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 22 - 20 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 21 - 20 ) take on the Knicks in New York on Sunday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 111 - 104 , at Smoothie King Center on Saturday night . The Pelicans ( 24 - 21 ) and Anthony Davis appeared set to run away with things early , as they jumped out to a 34 - 18 lead after just one quarter , and the Grizzlies ( 16 - 29 ) still found themselves trailing by a 59 - 44 margin at halftime . A prolific third quarter in which they racked up 37 points left them down by just 83 - 81 heading into the final 12 minutes , but they were never able to quite catch up to their hosts . The final nail in the coffin might well have been DeMarcus Cousins ' 26 - foot three - point jumper with 3:41 remaining , a bucket that opened up New_Orleans ' lead to 106 - 99 . They then held Memphis scoreless for the ensuing 2:9 , and they finished on a 5 - 2 run following a Wayne Selden three - pointer at that point . As the final score implied , both teams shot well , with the Pelicans edging the Grizzlies in that department 50 percent to 45 percent . Selden led the Grizzlies with 31 points in 27 minutes off the bench , a total he supplemented with two boards and two assists . Marc Gasol was a distant second with 16 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Tyreke Evans produced 12 points , six assists and four rebounds . Jarell Martin tallied 11 points , four boards , two assists and one block . Ben McLemore and Dillon Brooks pitched in with matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding one assist and the latter providing five boards , three assists and one steal . JaMychal Green mustered a modest eight points but also hauled in 16 boards and recorded one steal . Jrue Holiday paced the Pelicans with 27 points , which he complemented with eight assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . DeMarcus Cousins posted a 24 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two steals and one block . Davis registered 21 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Darius Miller led the bench with 12 points and added six rebounds , one steal and one block . E'Twaun Moore ( nine points , three rebounds , two assists ) and Rajon Rondo ( seven points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal ) had relatively underwhelming nights . The Grizzlies head back home and await a visit from the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday night , while the Pelicans remain home to tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Monday evening as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 115 - 113 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start at home , with an early 14 - 9 lead , but the Rockets battled back to take a one - point , 30 - 29 , lead heading into the second quarter . The Pelicans picked up the pace in the second , and took a 10 - point lead but five minutes left in the half . They continued to the pressure and pushed their lead to 66 - 53 by halftime . The Pelicans carried the momentum into the third , where they pushed their lead to 20 , with 6:50 left in the quarter , however , the Rockets were able to avoid catastrophe by fighting back and cutting the lead to 10 , heading into the final frame . The Rockets continued to rally back and finally managed to tie it up at 104 , with 2:34 left in the game . The Pelicans quickly regained the lead and managed to hold on to a slight edge for the final minutes , en route to their fourth straight win . However , in the process , DeMarcus Cousins suffered a torn Achilles , which will keep him out for the remainder of the season . Anthony Davis led New_Orleans with 27 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting , in 37 minutes of action . Jrue Holiday followed up with 21 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , in 37 minutes , while DeMarcus Cousins tallied a triple double with 15 points , 13 rebounds and 11 assists , in 29 minutes . The Pelicans shot 54 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Chris Paul led the Rockets with 38 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting , in 33 minutes . James Harden followed up with 23 points , 11 assists , five rebounds , two steals , and a block , in 33 minutes , while Eric Gordon poured in 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , off the bench . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 36 from long range . The Rockets ( 34 - 13 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Suns on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 27 - 21 ) play host to the Clippers on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 112 - 103 , at Smoothie King Center on Sunday . This was a true tale of two halves , as Los_Angeles overcame a big halftime deficit to prevail with a win . In fact , New_Orleans led by 21 at times in the second quarter , as they led by 11 heading into the half . The Clippers then responded with a 61 - 41 second half , as Los_Angeles held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Despite an extremely close stat sheet , the biggest difference was the assist - to - turnover ratio . In fact , Los_Angeles recorded six more assists than New_Orleans while committing three fewer turnovers . That was evident with the Clippers taking 96 total shots while the Clippers took just 85 field goal attempts . The Clippers ( 25 - 24 ) got a gem out of Blake Griffin , as he tallied 27 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . DeAndre Jordan amassed 12 points and 19 rebounds . Tyrone Wallace accrued 19 points , six rebounds and six assists . Lou Williams led the bench with 22 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . The Pelicans ( 27 - 22 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 25 points , 17 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jrue Holiday accumulated 20 points . nine rebounds , seven assists and three blocks . E'Twaun Moore was the final Pelican in double figures , as he totaled 18 points and two rebounds . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with New_Orleans hosting the Sacremento Kings and Los_Angeles welcoming the Portland Trail Blazers to Staples Center .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 115 - 105 , at Smoothie King Center on Tuesday evening . The Mavericks got out to a good start on the road , as they led late in the first quarter and held on to take a 30 - 29 lead into the second . They pushed their lead to double digits early in the second , but the Pelicans rallied back to tie it up at 49 with just under four minutes left in the half . The Pelicans kept the pressure on and managed to grab a 54 - 52 lead by halftime . Things stayed tight through the third quarter , while the Mavericks outscored the Pelicans , 28 - 26 , to tie it up at 80 heading into the final frame . The Pelicans took control early in the fourth and carried on to make it decisive in the last few minutes , as they earned their second straight win . Anthony Davis led New_Orleans with 37 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Rajon Rondo had a great game , as he tallied 19 points , 14 assists , nine rebounds and three steals , in 30 minutes . E'Twaun Moore chipped in 14 points , six assists and one rebound , while Ian Clark added 19 points off the bench . The Pelicans shot 53 percent from the field including 10 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes and Dirk Nowitzki tallied 19 points each to lead the Mavericks . Yogi Ferrell added 15 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal , off the bench . The Mavericks shot 48 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . The Mavs ( 22 - 49 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Jazz on Thursday . The Pelicans ( 41 - 30 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the Pacers on Wednesday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the San_Antonio Spurs 122 - 98 on Wednesday at Smoothie King Center It was a complete team effort from the Pelicans ( 48 - 34 ) in Wednesday 's regular season finale , with all five starters and six players in total scoring in double figures in the wire - to - wire win . Jrue Holiday topped off a career - best regular season by scoring a game - high 23 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting and dishing out seven assists in 35 minutes . Anthony Davis was n't too far behind with 22 points and 15 rebounds , while Nikola Mirotic nearly matched that double - double with 21 points and 15 rebounds of his own . Rajon Rondo also got in on the double - double action with 19 points and a game - high 14 points . In the end , as shown by the individuals , it was a very efficient offensive night for the Pelicans , as they shot a scorching 59 percent from the field Wednesday . As for the Spurs ( 47 - 35 ) , it was a pretty uninspiring effort , as while six different players managed to score in double figures , nobody scored more than 11 points . LaMarcus Aldridge , Dejounte Murray and Tony Parker each reached 11 points , while Bryn Forbes , Brandon Paul and Kyle Anderson each had 10 . San_Antonio 's low offensive output was simply due to a lackluster shooting performance from the team , as they managed to shoot just 40 percent from the field and managed to commit 17 turnovers . However , even with the loss , the Spurs still sit comfortably in the playoffs as the No . 7 seed . Unfortunately for them , that means they will have to take on the defending champions in Golden State .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 116 - 88 , at Little Caesars Arena on Monday night . The Cavaliers ( 10 - 7 ) have progressively been finding their footing after a shockingly inconsistent start , checking into Monday 's contest as winners of four consecutive games . However , even in wins , they 'd often looked vulnerable thus far , particularly on defense . The complete domination they exerted in Monday 's road victory over a quality Pistons ( 11 - 6 ) squad was therefore significantly surprising , as it marked the first time that Cleveland truly looked like defending Eastern Conference champions . The visitors ambushed the home squad early , jumping out to a 36 - 23 lead after one quarter and a 73 - 46 halftime advantage . They continued cruising in the third quarter , and only a 26 - point fourth period by the Pistons after the game was out of hand prevented the final score from representing an outright massacre . Kevin Love led the way for the Cavaliers with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists . Jae Crowder and LeBron James followed with matching 18 - point efforts , with the former also providing five boards and the latter registering eight assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jose Calderon drew the start at point guard and surprised with 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist , while Channing Frye pitched in 10 points , two rebounds and two assists . As the final score implied , the Pistons ' starting five did n't enjoy the most productive of nights . Tobias Harris paced them with a modest 11 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds and three assists . Stanley Johnson managed 10 points , three rebounds and one steal . Reggie Jackson matched Johnson 's point total and added six assists and one rebound . Avery Bradley supplied nine points , three assists and two rebounds . Andre Drummond went for eight points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , but he also turned the ball over a game - high six times . Langston Galloway led the second unit with eight points , while Reggie Bullock , Anthony Tolliver , Eric Moreland and Henry Ellenson chipped in a quartet of six - point tallies . The Cavaliers return home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday night , while the Pistons visit the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday night .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Phoenix Suns , 131 - 107 , at Little Caesars Arena on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 14 - 6 ) checked into Wednesday 's game riding high after upsetting the Boston Celtics by a 118 - 108 margin on Monday night , and they faced a team in the Suns ( 8 - 15 ) that they matched up very well against , particularly in the frontcourt . There was little doubt as to which team had come to play right from the jump , as Detroit forged a commanding 36 - 19 first - quarter lead that had grown to 69 - 41 by halftime . Even with the home squad mostly putting things on cruise control in the second half , they still managed a comfortable 24 - point win while shooting a blistering 57 percent from the field , including 46 percent from three - point range . The Pistons ' reserves saw plenty of run in the second half with the large lead , as they compiled a combined 51 points . Devin Booker led the way for Phoenix with 22 points , four rebounds and one steal . Rookie Josh Jackson saw 31 minutes off the bench and managed 20 points , seven rebounds , one assist , three steals and one block . Greg Monroe filled out the stat sheet with 14 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Tyler Ulis turned in 13 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Marquese Chriss poured in 10 points and added four boards , one assist , two steals and one block . T.J. Warren was the one Suns starter not in double digits , supplying only seven points , two rebounds and one block across 23 minutes . Reggie Jackson exploited the Suns ' suspect point guard defense to register a team - leading 23 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , two steals and one rebound . Avery Bradley and Tobias Harris followed with matching 20 - point tallies . The former also posted one assist and two steals , while the latter hauled in seven boards and recorded one assist . Andre Drummond collected 13 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , one steal and one block over 28 minutes . Ish Smith led the bench with 14 points and added six assists , three rebounds and one block . Luke Kennard was productive on the second unit as well , tallying 12 points , six assists , two rebounds and two steals . The Suns next head to Beantown , where they 'll face the Boston Celtics on Saturday afternoon . The Pistons make a short trip to the Nation 's Capital to face the Washington Wizards on Friday evening .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 103 - 84 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Tuesday evening . The Pistons ( 14 - 13 ) entered this game with six straight losses and wanted to turn things around at home , but could not accomplish that feat and registered a seventh consecutive loss with another lackluster display . The Nuggets ( 15 - 12 ) dominated the game almost entirely and they never looked back after jumping to an eight - point advantage after the first quarter . Aided by a nine - point lead at the break and an 18 - point advantage after three , Denver closed it out in the fourth despite Detroit 's attempts to turn things around . The lack of confidence is severe on a Detroit team that is yet to win during December . Jamal Murray was the undisputed star of the game for Denver , as the talented guard finished with 28 points , four rebounds , and three assists . Wilson Chandler added 18 points , and Mason Plumlee came out of nowhere to post a strong double - double of 10 points and 13 rebounds . Trey Lyles was quite a scoring threat off the bench , as he ended with 20 points on 7 - for - 7 from the field . Langston Galloway led the offense for Detroit with a strong 18 - point outing , and Boban Marjanovic added a decent amount of scoring thanks to his 14 - point , five - rebound effort . Both players carried the Pistons ' offense coming off the bench , as the starters struggled badly . In fact , Reggie Jackson ( 12 points ) was the only starter who reached double digits in this one . In fact , Detroit 's bench outscored the starters 53 - 31 .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 93 - 79 , at Little Caesars Arena on Saturday night . The Spurs ( 25 - 12 ) had their entire first unit at their disposal Saturday , a development that 's been somewhat of a rarity this season due to injuries and subsequent maintenance programs , especially for Kawhi Leonard . The All-Star forward was not only in action against the Pistons ( 20 - 15 ) , but he ended up logging his highest amount of minutes of the five games he 's played thus far this season . However , his presence was nowhere near enough against a defensive - minded Detroit squad . The home team got off to a hot start with a 24 - 13 lead after one quarter , and they also forged a 30 - 22 advantage over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Pistons ultimately limited San_Antonio to a 37 percent success rate from the field , including an especially unsightly 19 percent from three - point range . Moreover , Leonard 's modest 18 - point tally served as the Spurs ' team - high figure . Leonard added three assists , two rebounds and one steal to his aforementioned scoring total . LaMarcus Aldridge turned in a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and two blocks . Bryn Forbes led the bench with 10 points . Pau Gasol mustered eight points , 10 rebounds and one assist . Danny Green poured in six points and added one rebound and one steal . Reggie Bullock led the way for the Pistons with 22 points , which he complemented with one rebound . Luke Kennard followed with a bench - leading 20 points and added one rebound , one assist and three steals . Ish Smith provided 18 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Andre Drummond dominated down low with a 14 - point , 21 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and three steals . Tobias Harris supplied 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . The Spurs are off until Tuesday evening , when they 'll take on the New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden . The Pistons hit the road and travel to South Florida , where they 'll take face off with the Miami Heat on Wednesday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 102 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Thursday . It 's rare to see a game stay within a 10 - point margin for the whole 48 minutes , but that was the case here in this close - fought battle . In fact , there were 13 ties and 21 lead changes in total , as the largest lead for either team was an eight - point margin . While Memphis was more efficient from the free - throw line , the difference in the game was Detroit 's ability to get there . The Pistons ended up going 27 - of - 37 from the free - throw line , while the Grizzlies hit 14 - of - 14 . Detroit also played some great defense , as they held Memphis to 42 percent from the field while recording eight steals . The Grizzlies recorded just three steals and forced only seven turnovers from the Pistons . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 32 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he accumulated 19 points , 14 rebounds and two assists . Andrew Harrison started and provided 18 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Dillon Brookes amassed 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Deyonta Davis and JaMycal Green combined for 20 points and 15 rebounds off the bench . The Pistons ( 23 - 26 ) got a gem out of Blake Griffin in his debut , as he collected 24 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Andre Drummond totaled 14 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and three steals . Ish Smith accrued 12 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Stanley Johnson finished with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Detroit will play host to the Miami Heat on Saturday for their next fixture , while Memphis will travel to play the Toronto Raptors on Sunday for their next game .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 110 - 87 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had an impressive performance at home and put an end to their three - game losing streak with a huge performance at home against a Bucks ( 33 - 28 ) team that never got it going . Things were quite square after the first quarter ( 32 - 32 ) , but Detroit pulled away in the second quarter ( 21 - 12 ) and the Bucks never got it back . In fact , Detroit won the remaining two quarters ( 32 - 26 and 25 - 17 , respectively ) so won quite comfortably in front of their own fans . Andre Drummond was the best player for the Pistons , as he finished with 15 points , 16 rebounds and two steals . Reggie Bullock chipped in with 16 points and three assists , and Blake Griffin had eight points , nine rebounds , and seven assists . The bench did most of the heavy lifting , though , as four players had over 10 points . Stanley Johnson ( 19 points ) and Eric Moreland ( 10 points , 12 boards ) stood out . Eric Bledsoe was the best player for the Bucks , as he finished with 19 points , six rebounds and four assists . Khris Middleton had 17 points and Giannis Antetokounmpo added 11 , but both teams struggled overall since they combined for 8 - 23 from the field . The rest of the team struggled overall , and the Bucks paid a steep prize for their problems on offense .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 119 - 114 , at Air Canada Center on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 6 - 4 ) entered the fourth quarter with a comfortable 98 - 81 lead . They started off the final frame well and pushed the lead to as many as 19 . However , the Bulls slowly and steadily chipped away throughout the fourth quarter , amassing a 20 - 9 run that brought it to an eight - point game with just under five minutes left . The Bulls ( 2 - 7 ) closed the deficit to just three points with 18 seconds left but in the end the Raptors were able to hold themselves together to save the win . DeMar DeRozan was the high - point man for Toronto , with 24 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , in 35 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas tallied a double - double with 21 points and 10 rebounds , in just 24 minutes . Kyle Lowry had a full line , with 17 points , six rebounds and six assists , in 32 minutes . The Raptors shot 54 percent from the floor , including 52 percent from long range . Meanwhile , the Bulls shot 50 percent from the floor but were not as sharp from long range , hitting 37 percent . Bobby Portis gave Chicago a great boost off the bench , as he helped propel their late run , and finished with 21 points , 13 rebounds and four assists , in 24 minutes . Robin Lopez added 20 points , while Justin Holiday chipped in 15 . Lauri Markkanen finished with 12 points , reaching double figures in scoring in all of his first nine NBA games . The Bulls go on to play host to the Pacers on Friday . The Raptors play host to the Pelicans on Thursday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Washington Wizards , 100 - 91 , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday afternoon . The Raptors ( 11 - 5 ) have enjoyed an excellent start to their season , and they 've been especially effective at home . Toronto came into Sunday having won five of their last six , with their only loss during that stretch having come by a single point . They were at it again Sunday against the short - handed Wizards ( 9 - 7 ) , who were missing All-Star point guard John Wall ( knee ) . It certainly was n't easy , however , as the two teams battled to a 28 - 28 deadlock after one quarter . The Raptors had a tight 60 - 55 lead at the half , but DeMar DeRozan ultimately proved to be too much for Washington to handle . The All-Star two - guard went 15 - for - 26 from the field on the way to 33 points , and he added eight rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block . The home team was able to overcome a strong shooting effort from the Wizards , which posted a 58 percent success rate from three - point range . The Raptors ' excellent ball security was also key to the win , as they only turned the ball over on seven occasions . In Wall 's absence , Bradley Beal led the way for the visitors with 27 points , a total he supplemented with four boards and one assist . Otto Porter , Jr. was a distant second with 15 points , six boards and one steal . Marcin Gortat contributed a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and one steal . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the bench with 10 points , two rebounds and one block , while Tim Frazier , drawing the start at point guard in Wall 's stead , pitched in six points , eight rebounds and eight assists . C.J. Miles followed DeRozan with a bench - leading 12 points . Kyle Lowry mustered 10 points , six assists , five rebounds and two steals . Fred VanVleet matched Lowry 's point total off the bench over 24 minutes and also provided five assists and three rebounds . Serge Ibaka overcame a knee injury to post nine points , eight rebounds and one block . Jonas Valanciunas had a quiet afternoon with four points , seven rebounds , one assist and two blocks . The Wizards remain on the road and next land in Milwaukee , where they 'll face the Bucks on Monday night . Meanwhile , the Raptors are off until Wednesday , when they 'll take on the New York Knicks in the Big Apple .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 87 , at Air Canada Center on Friday . Aside from a small stretch in the second quarter , Toronto were in control for the majority of this game . In fact , the Raptors won all four quarters , as they led by 10 after the first quarter and by 27 after the third quarter . The starters were key , with Toronto 's starting - five outscoring Brooklyn 's starters , 76 - 28 . That was evident in the shooting , with the Raptors hitting 56 percent of their shots , while holding the Nets to under 42 percent shooting . Toronto also recorded 11 more assists than Brooklyn , while committing 15 less turnovers . The Nets ( 11 - 17 ) did n't have a single starter reach double figures in scoring , as Rondae Hollis-Jefferson led them with nine points and four rebounds . Nik Stauskas led the team in scoring , as he provided 22 points and seven rebounds off the bench . Jahlil Okafor also came off the bench in his debut , as he amassed 10 points and four rebounds . The Raptors ( 19 - 8 ) got Kyle Lowry 's 11th triple - double of his career , as he collected 10 points , 10 rebounds , 12 assists and four steals . DeMar DeRozan led the team in scoring , accruing 31 points , three rebounds and two steals . Serge Ibaka totaled 18 points and eight rebounds , while Norman Powell and Jakob Poeltl each scored 11 points to lead the bench . Both teams have home fixtures on Sunday for their next games , with Brooklyn hosting the Indiana Pacers and Toronto inviting the Sacramento Kings north of the border .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , The Raptors ( 25 - 10 ) and the Bucks ( 19 - 16 ) engaged in a battle that needed five extra minutes to settle , but Toronto in the end came away on top and registered a franchise - record 12th staright win at home . Toronto grabbed the lead 35 - 30 in the first quarter and it seemed they would cruise for the remainder of the game , but Milwaukee had something to say about it , and sent the game to overtime with a huge performance in the fourth quarter . Defense was key for Toronto during OT , however , as they limited Milwaukee to just 13 points , and a pair of clutch free - throws from DeMar DeRozan sealed the deal for the Raptors . DeRozan had a record - setting performance in this game , registering a new franchise - record and a career - high of 52 points to go along with eight assists and five rebounds . Kyle Lowry did not want to be less , and he contributed with 26 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Serge Ibaka was a force on both ends of the court , finishing with 11 points , eight rebounds , and four blocks including a couple of key defensive stops in the final minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo had a slow first half , but picked things up after the break and finished with 26 points , nine rebounds , and seven assists . Eric Bledsoe was the team 's highest scorer , though , as he chipped in with 29 points , seven boards , four steals , and three assists . Khris Middleton had 18 points , and Thon Maker added 16 points coming off the bench .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 133 - 99 , at Air Canada Center on Thursday . This was a decisive result for the Raptors , as they won all four quarters by at least three points . The second quarter was the difference , as they outscored the Cavaliers , 35 - 16 . In addition , it was a wire - to - wire win , as Cleveland were never within 20 points for the entirety of the second half . The Raptors ended up shooting 50 percent from the field , while holding the Cavaliers to just 38 percent shooting . Rebounding was also critical , with Toronto outrebounding Cleveland , 63 - 35 . The Raptors were lights - out from long range , hitting 18 - of - 42 from three - point range . The Cavaliers ( 26 - 15 ) were led by LeBron James , as he collected 26 points , three rebounds and two blocks . Kevin Love amassed 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Isaiah Thomas really struggled , as he scored just four points on 3 - of - 15 from the field . The Raptors ( 29 - 11 ) had seven players score in double figures , with four of those coming off the bench . Fred VanVleet led them with 22 points , four rebounds and four assists . Jakob Poeltl accrued 12 points and 12 rebounds . C.J. Miles led the starters with 16 points and five rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas tallied 15 points and 18 rebounds . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup versus the Indiana Pacers on Friday . As for Toronto , they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 112 , at Air Canada Centre on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 40 - 16 ) came into the game having lost just four times over 27 home outings , so based on that trend alone , they were considered a solid favorite . Additionally , Toronto and the Heat ( 30 - 27 ) have also been trending in decidedly different directions , as the former was riding a five - game winning streak entering Tuesday , while the latter had just snapped a five - game skid in their last contest . As it turned out , none of those numbers mattered in a tightly contested first half that culminated with the home squad sporting a slim 57 - 55 advantage . The hosts then looked to have the game in hand after a 41 - point third quarter that extended their lead to 17 entering the final 12 minutes . However , Miami still had life late , as they mounted a furious 16 - 3 run over the final 4:42 that brought them as close as 114 - 112 with 7 seconds left following a Wayne Ellington three - pointer . Ultimately , C.J. Miles made one of two free throws - - one of the only three points the Raptors managed during that span , with all coming from the charity stripe - - and Josh Richardson 's would - be game - tying trey could n't find the net at the buzzer . The Heat second unit helped lead the fourth - quarter charge and posted a collective 52 points . They also outperformed the Raptors in multiple categories , but Toronto did win the key turnover battle by a 16 - 8 margin . Goran Dragic overcame a tough individual matchup against Kyle Lowry to lead the way for the Heat with a game - high 28 points , which he supplemented with four assists , two rebounds and one steal . James Johnson followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added seven rebounds . Ellington finished with 15 points , seven boards and one assist , with all of his scoring coming from three - pointers . Bam Adebayo supplied 11 points , five boards , three assists and one block . Dwayne Wade managed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included six assists in his second game back with Miami . Hassan Whiteside accomplished the feat as well with 10 points , 10 boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Richardson accounted for 10 points , five assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Tyler Johnson drew the start and mustered a modest seven points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . DeMar DeRozan paced the Raptors with 27 points , a total he complemented with four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Lowry contributed 22 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . Serge Ibaka generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Miles poured in 11 points to lead the bench , while Fred VanVleet and Delon Wright tallied matching 10 - point efforts . VanVleet also registered six assists , five rebounds and two steals , while Wright had two assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Jonas Valanciunas totaled six points , 10 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . The Heat remain on the road and tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday evening , while the Raptors also pack their bags and face off with the Chicago Bulls in the Windy City on Wednesday night as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 107 - 91 , at Toyota Center on Saturday evening . The Rockets ( 30 ) were able to keep their record unblemished despite once again playing without prize offseason acquisition Chris Paul ( knee ) , who could be out up to a month according to latest reports . His absence has shifted James Harden back to a position he enjoyed great success in last season , point guard . Harden led the way Saturday with 29 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Meanwhile , Harden 's backcourt mate Eric Gordon , who 's come into the starting lineup as part of the domino effect of Paul 's injury , had another successful outing with 18 points , two assists , and one rebound . Houston also played a strong defensive game , limiting the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) to 37 percent shooting . In what is becoming a disturbing trend for Dallas , they were once again outrebounded by an extensive 54 - 41 margin . J.J. Barea led the Mavericks despite not drawing the start , as he posted 19 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Barea had drawn the start on Friday night in place of Dennis Smith , Jr. ( knee ) and played well , but head coach Rick Carlisle had Yogi Ferrell run with the first unit Saturday . Harrison Barnes followed Barea with 14 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Wesley Matthews collected 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ferrell managed eight points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Dirk Nowitzki mustered a modest two points , five rebounds and one assist . Gian Clavell was also productive off the bench , offering nine points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Nene Hilario was next behind Harden and Gordon with 14 points and two rebounds in 10 minutes off the bench . Clint Capela totaled 11 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Trevor Ariza managed eight points , four rebounds , one assist , four steals and one block . Ryan Anderson provided only three points but also brought down 10 rebounds and dished out an assist . Luc Mbah_a_Moute supplied six points , three rebounds and two steals in 24 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks head back home to tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Monday night , while the Rockets remain home and take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday evening as well .

In fact , the Grizzlies finished the game on a 20 - 2 run to overcome a double - digit deficit . In addition , the Rockets shot just 5 - of - 18 from the field in the fourth quarter , while committing six turnovers . Three-point shooting really killed the Rockets , as they went just 9 - of - 38 from long range . The Grizzlies also dominated at the free - throw line , hitting 34 - of - 37 , while Houston went just 17 - of - 23 . The Grizzlies ( 30 ) have now won all three games by at least eight points , as they continue to impress . Marc Gasol led the way with 26 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Mike Conley finished with 17 points , three rebounds and four assists . James Ennis III recorded a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Houston came into this game as a monster favorite , but Los_Angeles rode a huge second half en route to a comeback win . In fact , the Clippers outscored the Rockets , 76 - 53 , in the second half , despite trailing by 13 at the half . Despite the fact that Houston led for the majority of this game , it came down to the final seconds . In fact , there were six lead changes alone in the fourth quarter , as Houston were able to prevail , holding the Warriors to just 17 fourth - quarter points . The first and fourth quarters were the difference , with Houston outscoring Golden_State , 64 - 45 . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the hosting San_Antonio Spurs , 94 - 87 , at AT & T Center on Friday night . The game went down to the wire , as both teams traded leads until the second half , where the Bucks ( 5 - 6 ) held on and secured a much - needed win that snapped their four - game losing streak . San_Antonio ( 7 - 5 ) tried to fight back , but Milwaukee showed enough maturity and poise to seal the deal in a tough environment . The turning point of the game for the Bucks was undoubtedly the third quarter , as Milwaukee were down 47 - 46 at the break but ended the third period up by six thanks to a 30 - 23 scoring run during those 12 minutes . As it has been the case all season long , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks offensively with a double - double of 28 points and 12 rebounds , but he also added five assists , three blocks , and one steal . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 13 points in his first start with the franchise after coming on a trade with the Phoenix Suns , and Khris Middleton contributed with 13 points and eight boards . Last but not least , John Henson made an impact on both ends of the court after ending the contest with 10 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two blocks . On the other end , LaMarcus Aldridge led San_Antonio 's offense with a 20 - point , 12 - rebound performance that also included four assists , two blocks , and one steal . Patty Mills chipped in with 14 points and four assists , and Manu Ginobili offered a vintage effort coming off the bench since the Argentinian veteran ended the game with 18 points in only 24 minutes of action .
The San_Antonio Spurs took down the visiting Detroit Pistons , 96 - 93 , at AT & T Center on Monday . San_Antonio ( 16 - 8 ) has won five of its last six games and has thrived on the backs of strong play from its big men . Both LaMarcus Aldridge and Pau Gasol recorded double - doubles on Sunday , pulling down ten rebounds each . Aldridge , who has led the team in scoring all season , posted a team - high 17 points . Gasol , meanwhile , added 15 . It was a strong top - down night for the Spurs offense , as seven players scored in double figures . The bench added 34 points in the win , shooting a respectable 12 - of - 26 . Detroit ( 15 - 9 ) has played three games in four nights , and narrowly dropped Monday 's road game . The Pistons put forth a valiant effort in San_Antonio , being led by point guard Reggie Jackson . Jackson scored a team - high 27 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Outside of Jackson , though , the Pistons largely struggled to find offense . Jackson was the only Detroit starter to shoot more than 50 percent from the field , and the team finished having hit only 41 percent of its shots on the night . Free-throw shooting also proved an issue for Detroit , as the Pistons went just 15 - of - 24 from the line . The Pistons will play in Milwaukee on Wednesday , while San_Antonio will host the Miami Heat .
The San_Antonio Spurs cruised by the Denver Nuggets on Saturday , 112 - 80 , at AT & T Center . It was smooth sailing for the Spurs ( 29 - 15 ) , who enjoyed the return of superstar forward Kawhi Leonard from a shoulder injury . Leonard played 34 minutes in a starting role , scoring 19 points and coming away with five steals . Various injuries have cost Leonard the majority of the season , but he was able to log a season - high in playing time in Saturday 's win . The Spurs as a whole had a tremendous offensive night , shooting 53 percent from the field and knocking down 14 - of - 28 from three - point range . Denver ( 22 - 21 ) , meanwhile , struggled to find offensive production . Only two Nuggets scored more than eight points - Nikola Jokic and Gary Harris . Jokic led the team with 23 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting . He added nine rebounds and five assists . Despite his stellar production , the team shot just 35 percent from the field . The Nuggets went 7 - of - 27 from beyond the arc as well in what was a poor shooting night . The Spurs will visit Atlanta on Monday , while Denver will host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 116 - 105 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The first quarter was tight , with the teams exchanging the lead a few times before the Trail_Blazers took a one - points , 33 - 32 , lead heading into the second . The second quarter was more of the same , as the teams exchanged the lead a few times before the Trail_Blazers emerged once again with the slight edge , with a 56 - 54 lead at halftime . However , the Spurs came out strong in the third , where they took the lead and held it for most of the quarter . They outscored the Trail_Blazers , 27 - 21 , in the quarter , to claim an 81 - 77 lead heading into the fourth . The Trail_Blazers tied it up early in the fourth , but the Spurs quickly reclaimed the lead and then pushed their lead to double digits . They maintained a double - digit lead for almost the entire final six minutes of the game , earning the home win and ending a two - game slide . LaMarcus Aldridge led San_Antonio with 28 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting , eight rebounds , four steals and one assist , in 37 minutes . Manu Ginobili and Dejounte Murray tallied 17 points each , while Rudy Gay chipped in 16 points , four rebounds , three assists , and one block . The Spurs shot 56 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 33 points on 11 - of - 22 shooting , five assists and three rebounds , in 35 minutes . Evan Turner followed up with 18 points , while Jusuf Nurkic finished with 12 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . The Trail_Blazers shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 28 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 32 ) will look to avoid a fourth straight loss , as they take on the Nuggets in Denver on Monday . The Spurs ( 46 - 34 ) play host to the Kings on Monday .
The San_Antonio Spurs narrowly escaped the Phoenix Suns at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday , 104 - 101 . The Spurs ( 19 - 8 ) have now earned two last - second wins in as many nights . On Friday , Manu Ginobili hit a three - point shot with 5 seconds remaining to put the Spurs over the edge against the red - hot Boston Celtics . On Saturday , Bryn Forbes was the hero for San_Antonio , sinking a shot with 21 seconds left on the clock to give San_Antonio its final lead . Forbes was one of five Spurs to score in double figures on Saturday , as the team took a balanced approach on the offensive end . Point guard Patty Mills and big man LaMarcus Aldridge tied for the team - high in scoring , putting up 20 points each . San_Antonio also benefited from a sizable rebounding advantage , as the team pulled down 20 offensive boards on the night . While it had initially been rumored that injured superstar Kawhi Leonard ( quad ) would make his return to the court , Leonard did not appear in Phoenix . The Suns ( 9 - 19 ) , meanwhile , are struggling immensely . The team has dropped eight of its last 11 games , including Saturday 's heart - breaker against San_Antonio . While the Suns are missing star scorer Devin Booker ( groin ) , the team still saw multiple strong scoring performances on Saturday . Undrafted rookie point guard Mike James led the team with 25 points . James , who recently became the first NBA player to graduate from a two - way G-league contract , shot 50 percent from the field and also came away with three steals on the defensive end . Forward T.J. Warren , meanwhile , scored 24 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . Ball movement proved to be an issue for the team , though . No Sun recorded more than three assists in the game . The Spurs will visit Dallas for a divisional showdown on Tuesday , while the Suns will also take to the road to face Sacramento that night .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 95 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Thursday evening . The first quarter was a tight one , with the Suns emerging with a one - point , 26 - 25 , lead . The Suns turned it up a notch in the second , outscoring the Grizzlies 34 - 26 , to take a 60 - 51 lead into halftime . The Grizzlies turned the tables in the third quarter , pouring in 30 points to take a two - point lead heading into the fourth . The final quarter was a nail - biter as neither team took more than a two - point lead for the entire way . The score was stuck at 95 - 94 for Memphis for three and a half minutes before the Suns hit a three that would be the game - winner . T.J. Warren led the way for Phoenix , with 27 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Troy Daniels came up big off the bench , with 14 points , including the game - winner . Josh Jackson tallied 13 points and five rebounds , while Greg Monroe finished with eight points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . The Suns shot 41 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke Evans led the Grizzlies , with 23 points , nine rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . Marc Gasol tallied 13 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and three blocks , while JaMychal Green finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies shot 44 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 26 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Saturday . The Suns ( 12 - 22 ) play host to the Timberwolves on Saturday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 114 - 100 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . Despite the fact that Oklahoma_City came into this matchup as a sizable favorite , Phoenix had other ideas . In fact , they held their lead for the final three quarters , as they led by at least five points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was key , with the Thunder hitting just 8 - of - 27 and the Suns going 17 - of - 39 from long range . Oklahoma_City also killed themselves at the free - throw line , hitting just 12 - of - 21 , while Phoenix went 19 - of - 23 . The Thunder ( 22 - 18 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 26 points , 10 rebounds and 11 assists en route to his second - straight triple - double . Paul George accrued 19 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Steven Adams amassed 18 points , five rebounds and three blocks . Carmelo Anthony was the only other OKC player in double figures , as he dropped 14 points . The Suns ( 16 - 26 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 26 points , two rebounds and four assists . T.J. Warren totaled 23 points and five boards . Tyson Chandler accumulated eight points , 13 rebounds and two assists . Dragan Bender was huge off the bench , providing 20 points , six rebounds , four assists and three blocks .
