As for Phonix , they 're off until Friday , when they host the Houston Rockets .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 124 - 116 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Friday evening . The Suns got out to a solid start at home , leading 20 - 13 mid way through the first and held on to take a 37 - 32 lead after one . They kept the momentum through the second quarter , where they expanded their lead to 10 , before settling on a 67 - 60 lead at halftime . The Suns kept up the strong play to start the third , and held a 10 - point lead at the six - minute mark of the quarter . However the Thunder powered their way back into the game with an 18 - 10 run to close the quarter , which cut the deficit to just two , so that they trailed 99 - 97 heading into the final frame . They started the fourth with a quick 50 run to overtake the lead and stayed ahead until around the two - minute mark , where the Suns pulled ahead again , owning a two point advantage with 1:40 to go . That is when Russell Westbrook struck with eight straight points to put the Thunder back on top and solidify the road win . Westbrook led the Thunder with 43 points , 14 rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block , in 39 minutes . Paul George followed up with 20 points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , while Carmelo Anthony added 14 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin Booker had another huge game for the Suns , with 39 points on 16 - of - 28 shooting , in 38 minutes . Josh Jackson and T.J. Warren added 19 points each , while Elfrid Payton finished with 18 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . The Suns shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from long range . The Suns ( 19 - 45 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Sunday . The Thunder ( 37 - 27 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Trail Blazers in Portland on Saturday .
The Detroit Pistons smashed the Phoenix Suns , 115 - 88 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Tuesday evening . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pistons ( 32 - 39 ) , who are gaining steam with their second straight win . Everything seemed to go right for Detroit on both ends in Tuesday 's win , as the team knocked down 15 three - pointers on the offensive end while playing stifling defense . Phoenix ( 19 - 53 ) was held to just 37 percent shooting from the field . Detroit tallied 12 steals as a team , leading to 19 total turnovers for the Suns on the night . All-Star big man Blake Griffin led the team with a near triple - double in the win . Griffin scored a team - high 26 points to go with nine rebounds and 10 assists . Andre Drummond added 10 rebounds and 10 points , while six players ultimately finished in double digits for the Pistons . Rookie guard Luke Kennard came off the bench for 16 points in 24 minutes of play . Phoenix , meanwhile , was without star shooting guard Devin Booker and struggled to find offense in his absence . Four players scored in double digits for the ailing Suns . Their top scorer was Alex Len , who had 19 points and 12 rebounds . Rookie wing Josh Jackson also had a big impact , scoring 15 points and grabbing 11 rebounds . The Pistons will visit Houston on Thursday , while the Suns will play in Cleveland on Friday night .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 122 - 103 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Friday evening . New_Orleans ( 45 - 34 ) took an early lead , starting the game on a 27 - 10 run in the first nine minutes of game play . The Pelicans earned the win in commanding fashion , knocking down 16 three - pointers en route to 122 points on the night . Anthony Davis scored 33 points to go with 11 rebounds and three blocks in the win . Power forward Nikola Mirotic , meanwhile , added 31 points while grabbing a team - high 16 rebounds on Friday night . Veteran point guard Jrue Holiday scored an additional 22 points , knocking down four three - pointers along the way . The win moved the Pelicans into fifth place in the Western Conference . Phoenix ( 20 - 60 ) , on the other hand , holds the league 's worst record and is likely to finish the season with the best odds in the 2018 draft lottery . Despite the commanding loss , the Suns saw a number of promising performances on Friday night . Sophomore forward Marquese Chriss led the team with 23 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Rookie wing Josh Jackson , meanwhile , added 22 points along with a team - high 11 rebounds . Despite the impressive performances from the young forwards , the team shot only 39 percent on the night . The team struggled to find offense , particularly from deep , shooting just 9 - of - 33 from beyond the arc . Both teams will face the Golden State Warriors in their next game , with New_Orleans seeing them on Saturday , while Phoenix will host the reigning champions on Sunday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 105 - 84 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Thursday evening . Russell Westbrook picked up right where he left off last season by notching a triple - double in his first game of the new season . Westbrook led the way as the new - look Thunder ( 10 ) rolled over the New_York Knicks ( 0 - 1 ) . After a tight first quarter , the Thunder pulled away by outscoring the Knicks 52 - 35 over the second and third quarters . The big three of Carmelo Anthony , Paul George and Westbrook combined for 71 points in their first regular season contest together . George was the high - point man with 28 points , while Anthony followed up with 22 points . Westbrook had a line of his own with 21 points , 16 assists and 10 rebounds . Steven Adams was also solid for the Thunder , with 12 points , five rebounds , five steals and three blocks , in 29 minutes . The Thunder shot only 43 percent from the field and 28 percent from long range , but were able to force 25 turnovers to help make up the difference . Meanwhile , the Knicks struggled mightily . Other than Kristaps Porzingis , the team was unimpressive . Porzingis led the way with 31 points and 12 rebounds , while the only other player to score in double digits was Enes Kanter , with 10 . Tim Hardaway Jr. had a really tough time , going 3 - of - 10 from the field in his first regular season game after signing a large contract in the off season . Michael Beasley left the game early in the first quarter after injuring his ankle . The Knicks look ahead to Saturday , when they play host to the Pistons . The Thunder head to Utah for a contest against the Jazz on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 114 - 96 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday evening . The Thunder capitalized on a poor shooting night from the Pacers by sharing the ball and knocking down a solid percentage of their own attempts . The Pacers hit only 33 percent from the field , while the Thunder were much more consistent , hitting 48 percent of their field goal attempts . Paul George picked up two fouls in the first quarter and was limited to only 19 minutes in the contest against his former team . Russell Westbrook notched his second triple - double of the season , with 28 points , 16 assists and 10 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Carmelo Anthony came up clutch with 28 points and 10 rebounds , in 33 minutes . Steven Adams continued his strong play this season , with 17 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and two blocks in the contest . Meanwhile , Victor Oladipo was the only player for the Pacers that hit ( minimum two attempts ) at least 50 percent from the field . Oladipo was on fire early , almost single - handedly keeping the Pacers in the game and finished with 35 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Darren Collison followed up with 18 points , three assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 37 minutes , while Thaddeus Young added 14 points , including 3 - of - 6 shooting from distance . The Pacers will look to bounce back on Sunday , when they play host to the Spurs . The Thunder take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Friday .
The host Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Chicago Bulls , 92 - 79 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday evening . The Thunder ( 7 - 7 ) got off to a slow start this season , but are back to .500 after earning a third straight win against Chicago . Wednesday 's win came in particularly ugly fashion , though , as the Thunder shot only 36 percent from the field in the game and scored over a third of their points at the free - throw line . Russell Westbrook and Carmelo Anthony were the Thunder 's two leading scorers , combining for 39 points and 18 made free - throws . Westbrook , the reigning MVP , went a reassuring 7 - of - 7 at the line after starting out the season uncharacteristically shooting under 60 percent from the stripe . In addition to free - throw shooting , the Thunder were able to secure the easy win with strong rebounding despite overall poor play . OKC held a 48 - 38 advantage on the glass by the game 's end . Chicago ( 2 - 10 ) lived up to its conference - worst record on Wednesday . The Bulls shot a dismal 35 percent from the field and managed to commit a whopping 27 fouls on the night . While rookie stud Lauri Markkanen gave the team a reason to be optimistic with his team - high 16 points , the Bulls still trailed for the entirety of the game despite OKC 's poor shooting . The team struggled to make up for its poor shooting night , finishing with only six offensive rebounds . On Thursday , Chicago will host the Charlotte Hornets , while the Thunder will visit San Antonio to take on the Spurs .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 107 - 79 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday . This was as dominating of a victory as you 'll see in the NBA , as it was a wire - to - wire win for the Thunder . In fact , they held a double - digit lead for the entirity of the second half , including at least a 20 - point lead for the whole of the fourth quarter . A lopsided first quarter really set the tone , with Oklahoma_City outscoring Utah , 25 - 9 . Shooting was a huge disparity , with the Thunder hitting 52 percent of their shots , while holding the Jazz to under 36 percent from the field . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as Oklahoma_City recorded 10 more assists than Utah , while committing five less turnovers . That was evident by the fact that the Thunder recorded a season - high 15 steals as well . The Jazz ( 14 - 18 ) only had one starter in double figures , as Rodney Hood dropped 17 points , while failing to record a rebound or an assist . Alec Burks was their best player , as he provided 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals off the bench . No other player on the roster had more than 12 points or four assists . The Thunder ( 16 - 15 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 24 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and four steals . Carmelo Anthony accrued 18 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Paul George accrued 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . On deck for the Thunder is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Friday . As for Utah , their next game is at home in a rematch versus Oklahoma_City .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 112 - 107 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Christmas Day . The Rockets started out strong , controlling the first quarter with an early 31 - 28 lead . The Thunder bounced back and outscored the Rockets in the second quarter to take a slight 58 - 57 lead by halftime . The third quarter was a tight battle , resulting in a tie at 88 heading into the fourth . The Thunder stepped it up in the fourth and closed it out down the stretch , to earn their fifth straight win . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 31 points , 11 assists , six rebounds and three steals , in 37 minutes of action . Paul George followed up with 24 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , while Carmelo Anthony tallied 20 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting . The Thunder shot 54 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 18 from deep . Meanwhile , all five starters scored in double digits for Houston , led by James Harden , who tallied 29 points , 14 assists , eight rebounds , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Trevor Ariza and Eric Gordon added 20 points each , while Clint Capela tallied 19 points and 10 rebounds . The Rockets shot 43 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 37 from long range . The Rockets ( 25 - 7 ) will look to get back on track as they take on the Celtics in Boston on Thursday . The Thunder ( 19 - 15 ) play host to the Raptors on Wednesday evening .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 112 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Sunday . The win extended OKC 's league - best winning streak to eight games . After a tumultuous first half , the Thunder ( 30 - 20 ) found themselves entering the second half with a one - point deficit . This was partially due to a slow start from reigning MVP Russell Westbrook , who shot just 6 - of - 20 in the first half of the game . Westbrook came back with a vengeance , though , exploding for 23 points and nine assists in the second half . After Philadelphia ( 24 - 22 ) began the fourth quarter on a 10 - 2 run , Westbrook checked back into the game and immediately slammed down an emphatic dunk to shift the momentum . The Thunder were able to establish a double - digit lead by midway through the fourth quarter , and Westbrook finished the game with 37 points , 14 assists , nine rebounds , and only one turnover . The win was not just a product of Westbrook 's play , though . Recently-named All-Star reserve Paul George contributed 31 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . George , who is having a career year on the defensive end , also came away with four steals . Offensive rebounding also played a huge role in the win , and the obvious difference - maker was the league 's leader on the offensive glass , Steven Adams . Adams alone had 10 offensive boards , as he decidedly won the battle against Philly 's Joel Embiid on the glass . Adams finished the game with 20 points and 13 total rebounds . Despite being one - upped by Adams on the glass , Embiid still led the Sixers with his own double - double . The All-Star center finished the game with 27 points , 10 rebounds , and two blocks . Rookie sensation Ben Simmons , meanwhile , scored 22 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting and dished out seven assists . Still , the team struggled to match Oklahoma_City 's star power . The Sixers were missing the offensive production of J.J. Redick , who sat out with a leg injury . On Monday , the Sixers will travel to Milwaukee to face the Bucks . The Thunder , meanwhile , are scheduled to visit the Washington Wizards on Tuesday .

The Thunder stayed ahead through the fourth , expanding their lead to 20 halfway through the quarter . They held on to cruise to the much - needed win , which essentially flipped the Thunder into fifth place and the Spurs down to seventh in the West . The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 119 - 116 , at Target Center on Friday . This was one of the most competitive games in recent memory , as a season - high 31 lead changes shows just how tight to the vest it was . In addition to that , there were 15 ties , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . The second half was especially competitive , as neither team led by more than five points in the final 24 minutes of action . The Thunder had a chance to tie to the game at the buzzer , but Carmelo Anthony missed missed that opportunity from the right wing . Rebounding was a huge factor for Minnesota in their win , as they outrebounded Oklahoma_City , 44 - 35 . The benches did very little , as the 13 combined bench players scored just 33 points between them . The Thunder ( 2 - 3 ) got a near triple - double from Russell Westbrook , who collected 27 points , eight rebounds and nine assists . Carmelo Anthony accrued 23 points , two rebounds and two assists . Paul George amassed 23 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Steven Adams was the only other player on the roster with more than seven points , as he tallied 20 points and eight rebounds . The Timberwolves ( 3 - 3 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who accumulated 33 points , 19 rebounds and four blocks . Jimmy Butler scored a season - high 25 points , to go with his five rebounds and seven assists . Jeff Teague totaled 17 points , four rebounds and 10 assists . Andrew Wiggins dropped 14 points , while Taj Gibson provided 16 points and eight rebounds . On deck for Oklahoma_City is a road matchup with the Chicago Bulls on Saturday . Minnesota 's next game will be on Monday , as they travel to face the Miami Heat .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 101 - 93 on Monday at Target Center . The Grizzlies entered Monday 's contest having lost four in a row and a staggering 23 of their last 24 , but they came out firing Monday night and managed to go shot - for - shot with the Timberwolves before managing to pull away at the end . Wayne Selden put together a terrific performance off the bench for Memphis , shooting 4 - of - 6 from behind the arc and 9 - of - 14 from the field en route to scoring team - high 23 points in 26 minutes . Selden led what ended up being a terrific team performance from three - point range Monday , as the team shot 48 percent from downtown . Marc Gasol , who was 4 - of - 7 from three himself , added 20 points and 10 rebounds in 34 minutes , while JaMychal Green managed to post a double - double himself with 11 points and 11 boards in a team - high 40 minutes . As for the Timberwolves , this was a loss they simply could n't afford with the postseason just around the corner . The uncharacteristic home loss puts Minnesota in a tie for the No . 7 seed with the Jazz , and the team now sits just two games ahead of the lurking Nuggets . The loss came due to an overall poor offensive effort from the Timberwolves , as they shot just 42 percent from the field and failed to score 100 points for the first time in 11 games . Jeff Teague led the way scoring for Minnesota , posting a game - high 25 points while dishing out 12 assists . Young stars Karl-Anthony Towns and Andrew Wiggins , however , could n't get anything going on the offensive end . The two combined to shoot just 12 - of - 30 from the field and score 33 points .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 103 - 99 , in a thriller at Moda Center on Sunday evening . Portland ( 6 - 4 ) earned a hard - fought win on Sunday , thanks in large part to strong play from star point guard Damian Lillard . Lillard scored a game - high 36 points and dished out 13 assists . He was also integral to closing the game for Portland , as he hit a layup and two free - throws to seal the game in the final minute . In the lead - up , Portland traded baskets with OKC in what was an extremely tight game . However , the Blazers were able to maintain the lead thanks to two clutch three - pointers from shooting guard C.J. McCollum . McCollum finished the night with six made threes , and scored 22 points to aid in the winning effort . Big man Jusuf Nurkic rounded out a strong showing for Portland 's `` big three , '' delivering 25 points and drawing a controversial flagrant foul call that resulted in the ejection of OKC star Carmelo Anthony . Oklahoma_City ( 4 - 5 ) has not had the start to the season it hoped for , dropping to below .500 after its fourth crunch - time loss in nine games . On Friday , the team saw its chances diminished after All-Star forward Carmelo Anthony was ejected for flagrant foul . The call was a controversial one , as Anthony was removed after making seemingly minor incidental contact with Portland 's Jusuf Nurkic on a layup attempt . In his absence , fellow All-Stars Russell Westbrook and Paul George took on the offensive load for Oklahoma_City . Westbrook and George scored the team 's final 18 points , but Westbrook came up unfortunately short in the clutch . The reigning MVP was fouled on a three - point attempt with under a minute remaining , but missed all three of the ensuing free - throw attempts . Westbrook also lost the ball while down three with 11 seconds left on what could have been the game - tying possession . Portland will host the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday , while the Thunder will visit Sacramento .

The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 111 , at Moda Center on Tuesday , despite a fourth - quarter comeback effort by Phoenix . The Trail_Blazers ( 23 - 21 ) went up big early on thanks to top - notch offensive play . The team dropped a whopping 66 first half points and held a 20 - point lead heading into the fourth quarter . Still , the Blazers were forced to fight until the very end as Phoenix exploded for a 39 - point fourth quarter effort . Though the gap narrowed , the Blazers were able to hang on , partially due to their lights - out three - point shooting . The team went a superb 17 - of - 35 from beyond the arc in the win . The backcourt of Damian Lillard and C.J. McCollum accounted for ten of those three - pointers , as the two stars combined for 58 points . The last 21 points of the game for Phoenix ( 16 - 29 ) came from star shooting guard Devin Booker . Booker finished the game with 43 points , but his heroics came too late to overcome the Suns ' major deficit . Phoenix rallied to cut the lead to single digits late in the game , but was unable to walk away victorious . Still , the team had a stellar offensive night . The Suns hit 16 three - pointers and went 21 - of - 22 from the free - throw line . Six of those three - pointers came from Booker 's backup , Troy Daniels , who delivered 18 points off the bench . Portland will host the Indiana Pacers on Thursday , while the Suns will visit Denver on Friday .

The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 102 , at Moda Center on Thursday evening . Portland ( 42 - 26 ) took control of the game thanks to stellar play to start the second half . After entering the third quarter leading by five points , the team quickly hit multiple three - pointers that helped them go ahead by as much as 15 . Cleveland ( 39 - 29 ) played relatively well offensively , but poor rebounding and free - throw shooting kept the team from mounting a successful comeback . While Portland pulled down 13 offensive rebounds , Cleveland had just two . The Cavs also shot just 12 - of - 21 from the free - throw line . C.J. McCollum scored a team - high 29 points for the Trail_Blazers , shooting 12 - of - 24 from the field and knocking down three three - pointers . Damian Lillard added another 24 points despite going just 1 - of - 8 on three - point attempts . Al-Faroq Aminu was a key contributor as well , scoring 11 points and grabbing four offensive rebounds . For the Cavaliers , it was all about LeBron James . James led the team with 35 points , 14 rebounds , and six assists . He added two steals and three blocks on the defensive end . While James was lights - out from the field , shooting 15 - of - 25 , he was also a major reason for the team 's free - throw struggles . He went just 4 - of - 9 at the stripe in the loss . On Saturday , the Cavaliers will travel to Chicago , while Portland will host the Detroit Pistons .

Boston ( 49 - 23 ) continues to play without its stars , as Kyrie Irving ( knee ) is sidelined in addition to Gordon Hayward ( ankle ) , who is out for the season . Marcus Smart ( thumb ) and Daniel Theis ( knee ) were also out on Friday , but the Celtics prevailed nonetheless . Tied with three minutes remaining , Al Horford hit a big three - pointer to take the lead . The game was back - and - forth over the final two minutes , but Marcus Morris sealed the win with a three - pointer to put the team up by five with under one minute remaining . Morris led the team with 30 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Terry Rozier , meanwhile , scored 16 points and had a crunch - time steal that led to clutch free - throws . Off the bench , big man Greg Monroe led the team with 10 rebounds and scored 10 points . Overall , it was an efficient offensive night for the team . The Celtics knocked down 11 three - pointers on over 60 percent shooting from beyond the arc . For Portland ( 44 - 28 ) , star point guard Damian Lillard once again played a leading role on offense . Lillard scored 26 points and dished out eight assists . Shooting guard C.J. McCollum added another 26 points , shooting 12 - of - 22 from the field . However , the Trail_Blazers struggled on offense as a team , going just 8 - of - 33 from beyond the arc . On Sunday , the Celtics will visit Sacramento , while the Trail_Blazers will travel to Oklahoma City .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 102 - 93 , at Moda Center on Wednesday evening . After taking a 3 - 2 lead , the Trail_Blazers led for the rest of the first quarter and took a 28 - 21 lead into the second quarter . They pushed their lead to double digits in the second quarter and settled on a 55 - 41 advantage by halftime . The Blazers remained the more determined team through the third quarter , where they outscored the Jazz , 25 - 18 , to expand their lead to 21 heading into the final frame . The Jazz picked up the intensity in the fourth , but the Trail_Blazers held on to go out on a high note in their final before the playoffs . Damian Lillard led the way for Portland with 36 points on 13 - of - 25 shooting , 10 assists , one rebound and one steal , in 36 minutes . C.J. McCollum followed up with 19 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steals , while Jusuf Nurkic finished with 13 points , nine rebounds , four blocks , three assists and one steal . The Trail_Blazers shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 17 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 33 minutes . Ricky Rubio tallied 17 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal , while Rudy Gobert finished with 13 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and one block . The Jazz shot 37 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . The Jazz ( 48 - 34 ) are set to take on the Thunder in the first round of the playoffs , while the Trail_Blazers ( 49 - 33 ) are set to face the Pelicans in the first round .
Two teams heading in the opposite direction squared off on Wednesday , as the Golden_State Warriors took down the Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 84 , at Oracle Arena . Golden_State ( 25 - 6 ) remains without superstar point guard Steph Curry ( ankle ) and All-NBA forward Draymond Green ( shoulder ) , but the team continues to cruise along nonetheless . On Wednesday , the Warriors earned their tenth straight win , thanks in large part to a red - hot first half from All-Star guard Klay Thompson . Thompson finished the first half with 27 points , knocking down three three - pointers along the way . While Thompson finished the game with only 29 , his hot second quarter helped the Warriors establish a lead that was maintained through the entirety of the second half . Thompson shot 10 - of - 16 on the night , contributing to Golden_State 's relatively efficient 46 percent shooting from the field . Superstar forward Kevin Durant was another major factor for the Warriors , as he poured in 22 points to go with eight rebounds . Memphis ( 9 - 22 ) has been the coldest team in the league since point guard Mike Conley injured his Achilles in early November . The Grizzlies are in one of their worst ruts in team history , having now dropped 18 of their last 20 games . On Wednesday , the team 's struggles were unfortunately apparent , as the Grizzlies shot only 33 percent from the field as a team . Marc Gasol , who shot just 5 - of - 15 , was the only Memphis player to score more than 10 points . Surprisingly , one of the only areas where the Grizzlies were able to hold an edge was three - point shooting . The normally lukewarm Grizz got hot from deep , knocking down 12 three - pointers as a team . Still , points were hard to come by , as has often been the case for the league 's 29th - ranked offense . The Grizzlies will visit Phoenix on Thursday , while Golden_State will host the Lakers on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 96 - 81 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday . Golden_State came into this matchup as a monster favorite , but Denver really put it to them in this shocking result . In fact , the Nuggets never trailed over the final three quarters , as a 31 - 21 second quarter really put separation between them and the Warriors . Golden_State had their worst offensive game of the season , as they went just 32 - of - 83 from the field and 3 - of - 27 from three - point range . In addition , the Warriors actually missed 20 - straight three 's in this defeat . Rebounding was also key , with Denver outrebounding Golden_State , 45 - 38 . The Nuggets ( 18 - 15 ) best player was Nikola Jokic , as he amassed 18 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Wilson Chandler accrued 15 points and nine rebounds . Jamal Murray accumulated 14 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Gary Harris provided 19 points , three assists and two steals . The Warriors ( 26 - 7 ) had their 11 - game winning streak snapped , as they had their worst offense game of the season . Kevin Durant led the team , as he tallied 18 points , six rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Klay Thompson totaled 15 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals . Those two combined to go just 12 - of - 38 from the field though . Draymond Green collected 10 points , five rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . On deck for Golden_State is a home matchup versus the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday , As for Denver , they play host to the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 134 - 127 , behind Steph Curry 's 44 points at Oracle Arena on Thursday . In the first game back from the All-Star Break , the Warriors ( 45 - 14 ) showcased their top - ranked offense . It was an offense - heavy game from both teams , as LA ( 30 - 27 ) nearly caught up with Golden_State 's 70 - point first half thanks to 69 points of their own in the second . Ultimately , though , it was two - time MVP Steph Curry 's night to shine . Curry hit eight three - pointers en route to a game - high 44 points . He shot 14 - of - 19 from the field . As a team , the Warriors shot a brilliant 62 percent from the field . Five players scored in double figures . All-Star forward Kevin Durant followed up his recent 50 - point game with 21 points on Friday . He added eight assists . The team also knocked down over 54 percent of its three - point attempts , making 13 as a team on the night . LA , meanwhile , showcased its own offensive acumen . Despite the loss , the team had seven double - digit scorers , including all five starters . Forward Tobias Harris , who was recently acquired in the trade that sent Blake Griffin to Detroit , scored a team - high 22 points . Offensive powerhouse Lou Williams came off the bench and delivered another strong outing , scoring 21 points . The Clippers will visit Phoenix on Friday , while Golden_State will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz took down the Golden_State Warriors , 110 - 91 , at Oracle Arena on Sunday night . The playoff - hungry Jazz ( 42 - 32 ) capitalized on an opportunity on Sunday , as Golden_State ( 54 - 19 ) was without all four of its All-Star players . MVPs Steph Curry ( MCL ) and Kevin Durant ( rib ) will be hoping desperately to get healthy before the playoffs , while Klay Thompson ( thumb ) and Draymond Green ( pelvis ) are dealing with more short - term injuries . Still , all four were absent from Sunday 's tilt , clearing a path for Utah to earn a wire - to - wire win . The Jazz knocked down 12 three - pointers , shot 48 percent from the field , and highlighted their top - tier defense , holding Golden_State to just 42 percent shooting . Donovan Mitchell once again led the Jazz in the points column , scoring 21 on the night . Center Rudy Gobert had a big double - double , scoring 17 points to go with 15 rebounds , three steals , and four blocks . Forward Joe Ingles delivered a well - rounded performance , scoring 14 points to go with six rebounds and eight assists . The ailing Warriors , meanwhile , were running with only a skeleton crew as they struggled to find any points production . Only two players scored in double digits in the loss . Quinn Cook led the team with 17 points , also dishing out eight assists . The team went just 6 - of - 15 from three - point range , a major deviation from the norm for the typically sharpshooting squad . Golden_State will host the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday , while Utah will host the Boston Celtics on Wednesday .
The visiting Milwaukee Bucks took down the Golden_State Warriors , 116 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . Superstar forward Kevin Durant made his return from a rib injury for Golden_State ( 54 - 21 ) , but his comeback was cut short by an ejection in the second quarter . Durant received two technical after a heated exchange with an official just before halftime . While the game had been a close one with Durant on the court , Milwaukee ( 40 - 35 ) capitalized on the star 's absence in the second half . The Bucks grew their nine - point halftime lead to 20 by the end of the third quarter , and successfully staved off a Warriors comeback in the fourth . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 32 points on wildly efficient 14 - of - 18 shooting from the field . The 'Greek Freak ' was also one of three Milwaukee players to record five or more assists . The team moved the ball extremely well , tallying 30 dimes in total . Khris Middleton and Eric Bledsoe added 23 and 20 points , respectively . The Warriors , meanwhile , were still without All-Stars Steph Curry ( knee ) and Klay Thompson ( thumb ) . The team 's tandem of All-Star forwards , Durant and Draymond Green , did not have the impact the team expected as they both returned from injury . The duo combined for only 21 points , including 10 from Durant before his ejection . Quinn Cook delivered an impressive performance for the shorthanded Warriors , scoring a team - high 30 points on 12 - of - 15 shooting . The Bucks will visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Warriors travel to Sacramento on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 55 - 21 ) had finally gotten some reinforcements back in their most recent contest , as both Kevin Durant and Klay Thompson had rejoined the starting five in a Saturday night victory over the Kings . That duo played a pivotal part again Sunday , as they posted the top two scoring efforts for Golden_State while shooting a combined 22 - for - 38 from the field . The Suns ( 19 - 59 ) actually put up a valiant effort , but they were n't able to overcome a disastrous third quarter in which they were doubled up by the home squad , 36 - 18 . Marquese Chriss and Josh Jackson co - led the Suns with matching 22 - point tallies , with the former adding eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter totaling five assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Danuel House , Jr. chimed in with a bench - leading 16 points and also supplied six boards , three assists and two blocks . Dragan Bender posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Tyler Ulis filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . Alan Williams was productive off the bench with eight points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Durant paced the Warriors with a 29 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists and two blocks . Thompson pitched in 23 points and added two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Quinn Cook tallied 19 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals . Draymond Green produced a 13 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds , two steals and one block . Jordan Bell pitched in 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Kevon Looney drew the start at center and finished with five points , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Suns remain home and take on the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday evening , while the Warriors pay a visit to the Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday night as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Washington Wizards , 130 - 122 , at Capital One Arena on Friday night . To say that the Cavaliers ( 4 - 5 ) were starting to get a little desperate would be an understatement of significant proportions . The defending Eastern Conference champions had dropped four straight contests coming into Friday night , all to teams that they would have been expected to handle with varying degrees of ease . With concern intensifying and a tough road matchup against a conference opponent , LeBron James decided to take matters into his own hands . He was in vintage form against a Washington team that had been vulnerable to small forwards in the early going , posting 57 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and two blocks over 43 minutes . He played an integral part of a jaw - dropping 74 - point first half for the Cavaliers , who nevertheless allowed the Wizards ( 4 - 4 ) 66 points during the first two periods as well . The shootout continued throughout the second half , but James was able to convert a key and - one with 52 seconds remaining that gave Cleveland a commanding 128 - 119 lead . As the final score implied , both teams shot superbly throughout the contest , with the visitors compiling a 56 percent success rate from the field and the home squad countering by draining 54 percent of their attempts . Derrick Rose checked in as a distant second to James with 20 points , two assists and one rebound . Jae Crowder drew the start and posted 17 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals . Kevin Love managed 11 points , eight rebounds and one steal . J.R. Smith had a small role in the offense once again , mustering only three points , one assist and one steal despite playing 30 minutes . Kyle Korver led the bench with eight points . Bradley Beal led Washington 's offensive barrage with 36 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Kelly Oubre Jr. headed back to the bench with Markieff Morris ( abdomen ) making his season debut and supplied 21 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marcin Gortat and Otto Porter Jr. registered matching 15 - point tallies , with the former adding five rebounds , one steal and one block and the latter providing five boards as well . John Wall posted a modest 13 points on 4 - for - 13 shooting , but he dished out 15 assists , hauled in six rebounds and recorded both a steal and a block . Morris generated two points , four rebounds and three assists while seeing just 14 minutes in his first game of the season . Mike Scott was productive on the second unit as well , totaling 12 points and three rebounds . The Cavaliers will look to build on Friday 's effort against the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday afternoon , while the Wizards travel north of the border to do battle with the Toronto Raptors on Sunday evening .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 95 , at Capital One Arena on Thursday evening . Both teams came out with the hot hand , as evidenced by the 37 - 34 score in favor of the Wizards ( 6 - 5 ) at the end of the first quarter . However , Washington used a strong second period to create some distance from the Lakers ( 5 - 7 ) , who may have been feeling some of the effects of an East Coast back - to - back set . The home squad was able to keep Los_Angeles at bay throughout the second half , utilizing some aggressive defense that led to a total of 19 turnovers on the part of the visitors , along with a pedestrian 36 percent success rate from the field ( including 13 percent from three - point range ) . The Lakers were able to get seven players into double figures in the scoring column , but none tallied more than 15 points . Brook Lopez and Jordan Clarkson both produced that total from the starting five and bench , respectively . Lopez added four rebounds , two blocks and one steal , while Clarkson supplied two rebounds . Kyle Kuzma and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope produced matching 13 - point tallies , with the former adding nine rebounds and one assist and the latter registering four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Julius Randle turned in a near double - double off the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . Brandon Ingram contributed 10 points , four rebounds and one assist . Lonzo Ball matched his point total but his shooting woes continued , as he drained only three of 12 from the field . He did add eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals . John Wall paced the Wizards with 23 points , eight rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals . Backcourt mate Bradley Beal followed closely behind with 22 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Otto Porter , Jr. turned in a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Markieff Morris compiled 16 points , five rebounds and one assist over 17 minutes in his best outing of the season . Marcin Gortat managed eight points , five rebounds and one assist . The Lakers continue on to Milwaukee to face the Bucks on Saturday night , while the Wizards remain home and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday evening as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 116 - 106 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday evening . The Wizards ( 17 - 14 ) had a solid performance in this game and even though they looked overmatched in the fourth quarter , they held on to secure a massive win against a Pelicans team that reacted too late to escape with a better result . The Wizards had a six - point advantage heading into halftime and a big 23 - point lead into the fourth quarter , but they held on . The Pelicans won the fourth quarter 36 - 23 , but it was n't enough and Washington ended securing a huge win that put them three games over .500 . Meanwhile , the Pelicans dropped one game below .500 as they remain quite inconsistent this season . Bradley Beal was the biggest star for the Wizards in this game , as the shooting guard finished with 26 points , five rebounds , and four assists . John Wall added a double - double thanks to 18 points and 10 assists , while Marcin Gortat also added a double - double of 10 points and 14 rebounds . One of the biggest surprises for Washington was Mike Scott , as he finished with 24 points off the bench while shooting 11 - of - 15 from the field . Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins both shone in this game for New_Orleans , but their performances were n't enough to win against a Wizards team that held on late in the game . Davis finished with 37 points and nine rebounds , while Cousins contributed with a huge double - double of 26 points and 13 rebounds . Jrue Holiday added 13 points with six rebounds and five assists .
The Washington Wizards defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 116 - 106 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday . The Spurs ( 43 - 32 ) built a decent lead against the Wizards ( 41 - 33 ) in the first half and they had some good moments overall , but once they could n't hold on to that advantage in the second half , Washington did n't have problems to run away with the game with relative ease . San_Antonio won the first quarter 24 - 21 , but Washington won the subsequent two quarters ( 38 - 21 and 29 - 21 , respectively ) so they entered the final 12 minutes with a huge 88 - 66 lead . San_Antonio won the final quarter 40 - 28 , but it was n't enough and the Wizards secured a huge win on their quest to reach a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . The Wizards had a balanced scoring output in this one , as they had seven players scoring over 10 points in this one . Markieff Morris led the way with 15 points , while Otto Porter Jr. delivered 14 points , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Marcin Gortat had 12 points with eight boards . Four bench players reached the 10 - point mark : Jodie Meeks ( 13 ) , Ramon Sessions ( 12 ) , Kelly Oubre Jr. ( 12 points , nine rebounds and four assists ) and Mike Scott ( 11 points ) . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 13 points , but he only played 18 minutes since he left the game with an injury and his status for the upcoming games is yet to be determined . Patty Mills added 11 points , six assists , three rebounds and three steals . Bryn Forbes added 12 points , six assists and three rebounds coming off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Utah Jazz , 113 - 107 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . It was a tale of two quarters in the first half for the 76ers ( 10 - 7 ) , which exploded out of the gates for a 38 - point haul over the first 12 minutes . However , as prolific as Philadelphia was in the first quarter , they had as much trouble finding the net in the second . posting only 16 points . That was the extent of their scoring drought , though , as the home squad was able to outpace the Jazz ( 7 - 8 ) by a 59 - 55 margin in the second half . The game was not won without several scares in the final period , as Utah held a 107 - 105 lead as late as the 1:37 mark of the fourth quarter before the Big Three of Ben Simmons , Jimmy Butler and Joel Embiid notched the final six points to seal the win . Donovan Mitchell paced the Jazz with 31 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds , four steals and one block . Joe Ingles provided 14 points , two rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Ricky Rubio and Derrick Favors generated matching 13 - point efforts . Rudy Gobert contributed a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Butler paced the Sixers with 28 points , a total he supplemented with seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Embiid delivered 23 points , seven rebounds , two assists , three blocks and two steals . J.J. Redick poured in 16 points . Simmons pitched in a full stat line of 10 points , eight rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block . Amir Johnson led the second unit with 11 points . The Jazz remain on the road and pay a visit to the Boston Celtics on Saturday evening . The Sixers also hit the road and tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday night as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 95 , at Wells Fargo Center on Sunday evening . The Sixers got out to a quick , 10 - 3 , lead but the Grizzlies stuck with it , leading to a , 26 - 25 , advantage for the home team , after one quarter . The 76ers stayed on top in the second , where they outscored the Grizzlies , 28 - 19 , to take a , 54 - 44 , lead by halftime . Things tightened up again in the second half , as both teams matched each other for 24 points in the third quarter , leaving the Sixers ahead by 10 heading into the fourth . The Grizzlies started the fourth quarter with a quick 9 - 1 run , to make it a two - point game . However , the 76ers answered right back , pushing their lead back to nine , with five minutes left . The Grizzlies cut it as close as a four - point deficit , but could not do better than that , as the 76ers held on to earn their fourth straight win . J.J. Redick led Philly with 24 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , in 30 minutes . Jimmy Butler tallied 21 points , three rebounds , two assists and a block . Ben Simmons finished with 19 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and two steals , while Joel Embiid added 15 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Meanwhile , Mike Conley led the Grizzlies with 21 points , five assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jaren Jackson Jr. followed up with 17 points , three rebounds , three blocks and a steal , while JaMychal Green tallied 14 points , seven rebounds and four steals . The Grizzlies ( 13 - 9 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Tuesday . The 76ers ( 17 - 8 ) take on the Raptors in Toronto on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 106 - 100 , at Wells Fargo Center on Saturday . This final scoreline makes this game look closer than it actually was , as Philly dominated throughout . In fact , the Sixers won each of the first three quarters by at least three points apiece , as they led by 17 heading into the fourth quarter . Dallas did respond with a 30 - 19 fourth quarter , as that got the lead down to four points with less than a minute remaining . Defense was critical for the Sixers , as they held the Mavericks to 43 percent from the field , 29 percent from three - point range and 65 percent from the free - throw line . Philadelphia did a ton of work down low too , outscoring the Mavericks in the paint , 62 - 52 . Philly 's starters really dominated Dallas 's starters , outscoring them , 83 - 49 . The Mavericks ( 18 - 21 ) are now 3 - 18 on the road this season , as this marks their 10th loss in their last 13 games in total . Wesley Matthews was their leading scorer in this game , as he finished with 18 points and two rebounds . Luka Doncic tallied 14 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Jalen Brunson was huge off the bench , providing 13 points , 11 rebounds and eight assists . The Sixers ( 26 - 14 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he collected 25 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . J.J. Redick amassed 20 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Ben Simmons accumulated 20 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists en route to a triple - double . Jonah Bolden got a rare start and accrued 11 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup versus the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday . As for Philly , they play host to the Washington Wizards on Tuesday for their next outing .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 121 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Hawks ( 13 - 29 ) knew they were facing an uphill battle coming into the contest , given both their futile road record and the quality of their opponent . However , their chances received a boost shortly before tip - off when it was revealed that Joel Embiid ( ankle ) would miss the contest for the 76ers ( 27 - 16 ) . Atlanta did come out of the gates hot and trailed just 56 - 54 at the half . The Hawks would then hold the lead for substantial portions of the second half , and they made an impressive comeback from a 121 - 118 deficit with under a minute remaining . Kevin Huerter knotted the game at 121 with 54 seconds remaining , a basket John Collins followed up with a 13 - footer with 10 seconds left . Jimmy Butler then missed two free throws and both Ben Simmons and Wilson Chandler misfired on tip shots in the closing seconds to seal the wild win for the visitors . Huerter led the way for the Hawks with 29 points , adding three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Collins contributed 25 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon produced 19 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Trae Young supplied 18 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . De'Andre Bembry delivered 14 points , six boards , five assists and one steal . Alex Len and Jeremy Lin co - led the bench with nine points apiece . Butler paced the 76ers with 30 points and supplemented them with five assists , four rebounds and three steals . Simmons finished with 23 points , 15 assists , 10 rebounds , two steals and one block . J.J. Redick poured in 20 points while also tallying two assists , one rebound and one steal . Mike Muscala started for Embiid and offered 16 points and three rebounds among his contributions . T.J. McConnell matched Muscala 's scoring and also dished out six assists , pulled down three rebounds and recorded two steals . The Hawks head back home and face the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday afternoon , while the 76ers pay a visit to the New York Knicks on Sunday afternoon as well .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 117 - 115 , at Wells Fargo Center on Saturday . Oklahoma_City has miraculously won 18 - straight games over Philly heading into this matchup , as this win solidifies their ownership and makes it 19 in a row . It took quite the effort to get them there though , as Paul George capitalized on a four - point play with six seconds left to take the lead and grab the win . While the Thunder led for over 40 minutes of this game , there were still five ties and nine lead changes in total . Philadelphia really killed themselves by not taking care of the ball , as they lost the turnover differential , 17 - 10 . Free-throw shooting was also critical , with the Thunder hitting 23 - of - 26 and the Sixers connecting on just 28 - of - 39 . The Thunder ( 27 - 18 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 31 points , six rebounds , five assists and three steals . Russell Westbrook accumulated 21 points , 10 rebounds and six assists . Steven Adams totaled 16 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks while Dennis Schroder led the bench with 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Sixers ( 30 - 17 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he collected 31 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Ben Simmons accrued 20 points , 15 rebounds and nine assists . J.J. Redick amassed 22 points and two rebounds while Jimmy Butler generated 18 points , three rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Oklahoma_City traveling to face the struggling New York Knicks and Philly playing host to the Houston Rockets .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 143 - 120 , at Wells Fargo Center on Sunday afternoon . The Lakers ( 28 - 28 ) were fresh off a miracle win over the Boston Celtics on Thursday night , but they were faced with just as tough a test Sunday against the 76ers ( 36 - 21 ) . Los_Angeles looked up to the task early , taking a 40 - 39 lead in a high - scoring first quarter . However , Philadelphia turned the game around in the middle periods , outscoring their visitors by a 70 - 54 margin during that stretch . The Sixers then added another eight points to their edge for good measure in the fourth . With 263 combined points , there was naturally no shortage of impressive shooting - - the Lakers drained 52 percent of their attempts , while the hosts generated a 58 percent success rate from the floor , including 50 percent from three - point range . Kyle Kuzma led the way for the Lakers with 39 points , adding three rebounds and one assist . JaVale McGee generated a 21 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Brandon Ingram tallied 19 points , four rebounds and four assists . LeBron James contributed 18 points , 10 boards and nine assists . Reggie Bullock had just two points over 31 minutes in his team debut . Joel Embiid paced the 76ers with a 37 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Tobias Harris supplied 22 points , six rebounds , six assists and a block . J.J. Redick poured in 21 points and added five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Jimmy Butler turned in 15 points , four rebounds and three assists . T.J. McConnell registered 13 points off the bench , while Boban Marjanovic furnished 10 . Ben Simmons had just eight points on 3 - for - 13 shooting and also dished out seven assists , hauled in three rebounds and recorded a steal and a block apiece . The Lakers remain on the road and visit the Atlanta Hawks on Tuesday night , while the 76ers remain home for a showdown against the Boston Celtics on Tuesday evening .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 125 - 109 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday evening . The Sixers got out to a great start at home , with a 32 - 20 lead after one quarter . They kept the same energy in the second and outscored the visitors by eight in the quarter , to take a 20 - point lead by halftime . The Bulls did not have much to offer in the third , as they were outscored by 13 in the quarter and trailed by 33 , entering the final frame . However , they pulled together in the fourth with a massive rally , outscoring the Sixers 45 - 28 in the quarter , but it was too little , too late , as the Bulls closed out their season with a third straight loss . The Sixers were able to come through with a win despite Joel Embiid ( knee ) and the rest of the usual starters ( rest ) sidelined . Jonathan Simmons led the 76ers with 20 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one block , in 29 minutes . Boban Marjanovic added 18 points , eight rebounds , six assists and two blocks , while T.J. McConnell finished with 18 points , six assists , two rebounds and a block . The 76ers shot 56 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , seven players scored in double digits for the Bulls , led by Walter Lemon Jr. , who finished with 20 points , six rebounds and four assists , in 28 minutes . Ryan Arcidiacono finished with 14 points , six rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot tallied 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . The 76ers will begin their playoff run against the Nets in the first round .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 108 - 92 , at Fiserv Forum on Monday . This was an extremely lopsided matchup , as Milwaukee won this game in wire - to - wire fashion . A 31 - 18 first quarter really set the tone , as the Bucks held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Rebounding was huge for Milwaukee , as they out - rebounded Cleveland , 58 - 46 . The shooting disparity was critical as well , with the Bucks shooting 44 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range while holding the Cavaliers to 37 percent from the field and 33 percent from long range . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 21 ) were led by Larry Nance Jr. , as he provided 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals off the bench . Collin Sexton led the starters , as he accrued 15 points , four rebounds and two assists . Jaron Blossomgame recorded a double - double off the bench , amassing 11 points and 10 boards . The Bucks ( 18 - 8 ) played this game without Giannis Antetokounmpo ( neck ) but that clearly did n't affect them in this dominating victory . Eric Bledsoe led the way , as he collected 20 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . Malcolm Brogdon accumulated 18 points , five rebounds and five assists . Khris Middleton finished with 16 points seven rebounds and three assists . Sterling Brown led the bench with 12 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Both these teams return to action on Wednesday , with Milwaukee traveling to play the Indiana Pacers and Cleveland welcoming the New York Knicks to Quicken Loans Arena .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 144 - 112 , at Fiserv Forum on Friday . Milwaukee came into this matchup as a sizable favorite and this scoreline shows just why . The first quarter really set the tone , as they outscored Atlanta , 43 - 14 , en route to a wire - to - wire win . The domination did n't end there though , as they led by 33 points at the half and by 39 points heading into the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was key , with Milwaukee hitting 55 percent of their shots while holding Atlanta to just 44 percent from the field . The Bucks also outrebounded the Hawks , 53 - 32 , while out - assisting them , 36 - 26 . Milwaukee also won the points in the paint battle , 74 - 40 , while winning the fastbreak points differential , 34 - 19 . The Hawks ( 11 - 27 ) were led by DeAndre ' Bembry , as he provided 19 points and two rebounds off the bench . DeWayne Dedmon led the starters with 14 points and two assists . Trae Young was their best player , as he tallied 13 points , three rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . John Collins finished with 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Bucks ( 27 - 10 ) had all 12 players score at least eight points , as Khris Middleton led the team with 19 points , four assists and three steals . Malcolm Brogdon matched those 19 points , adding three rebounds and two assists to his tally . Giannis Antetokounmpo accumulated 16 points , eight rebounds and 10 assists while Eric Bledsoe totaled 14 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Ersan Ilyasova led the bench with 10 points and 10 boards . On deck for Milwaukee is a home matchup versus the Toronto Raptors on Saturday . As for Atlanta , they return to action on Sunday when they play host to the Miami Heat .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Miami Heat 116 - 87 , at Fiserv Forum on Friday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , as the Bucks and Heat traded the lead through the first quarter , until the Bucks emerged with a 33 - 32 lead going into the second . The Bucks turned it up in the second , as they pushed to an 11 - point lead midway through the quarter , and went on to lead by 12 at the half . The third quarter belonged to the Bucks like the second , as the Bucks held a steady lead early , and rallied at the end of the quarter , to push their lead to 25 by the start of the fourth . The Bucks held on and cruised through to fourth , to earn their 29th home win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks , with 27 points , eight rebounds , seven assists , two blocks and a steal , in 28 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 18 points , 10 assists , eight rebounds and one steal , while Pat Connaughton chipped in six points , 10 rebounds and four assists . The Bucks shot 51 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 34 from deep . Meanwhile , six players scored in double digits for Miami , but the highest total was 14 points from Hassan Whiteside , who also chipped in nine rebounds and three blocks , in 23 minutes off the bench . Kelly Olynyk added 13 points , while Dwyane Wade and Bam Adebayo tallied 12 points each . The Heat shot 38 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 37 from long range . The Heat ( 35 - 37 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Wizards in Washington on Saturday . The Bucks ( 54 - 19 ) play host to the Cavs on Sunday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 108 - 94 , at Fiserv Forum on Tuesday . While Houston led for the first 16 minutes of this game , Milwaukee dominated from there . The Bucks did most of their damage in the middle quarters , outscoring the Rockets , 70 - 46 . That allowed them to lead by at least 12 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Milwaukee 's defense was critical , as they held Houston to 36 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range while winning the defensive rebounding battle , 50 - 38 . The Bucks also out - assisted the Rockets , 24 - 17 . The Raptors ( 47 - 28 ) were led by James Harden , as he accumulated 23 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . Chris Paul finished with 19 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Clint Capela totaled 17 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Danuel House led the bench with 15 points and four boards . The Bucks ( 56 - 19 ) were led by Eric Bledsoe , as he tallied 23 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . Giannis Antetokounmpo collected 19 points , 14 rebounds and four assists . Brook Lopez amassed 13 points and eight boards while Pat Connaughton led the bench with 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Milwaukee playing host to the Los Angeles Clippers and Houston welcoming the Denver Nuggets to Toyota Center .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 128 - 118 , at Fiserv Forum on Thursday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , with multiple lead changes in the first quarter , before the Bucks emerged with a three - point lead heading into the second . The Bucks turned it up a notch in the second , and outscored the visitors by 18 in the quarter , to take a 67 - 46 lead by halftime . The Clippers came out fighting in the third but could not make a dent in the deficit , as the Bucks actually outscored them by two in the quarter , to push the lead to 23 , heading into the final frame . However , the Clippers did not give up and made an impressive rally in the fourth , as they made it a 10 - point game with five minutes to go . However , the Bucks cut it off there , as they locked down an ensured their fourth straight win , and ended the Clippers ' six - game winning streak . Khris Middleton led the Bucks with 39 points , nine rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo tallied 34 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block , while Eric Bledsoe added 15 points , eight assists , seven rebounds and a steal . The bucks shot 53 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 37 from deep . Meanwhile , seven players scored in double digits for the Clippers , led by Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , who finished with 21 points , six rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal , in 31 minutes . JaMychal Green added 16 points , eight rebounds and two assists , while Danilo Gallinari tallied 14 points , eight rebounds , four assists and a steal . The Clippers shot 46 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 33 from long range . Lou Williams ( rest ) did not play . The Clippers ( 45 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavs on Saturday . The Bucks ( 57 - 19 ) take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Sunday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 133 - 128 , at Fiserv Forum on Saturday . This was a true tale of four quarters , as each individual quarter was decided by seven points or more . The Nets did almost all of their damage in the first and third quarters , outscoring the Bucks , 76 - 57 . They ended the game strong , finishing up with seven unanswered points . With that said , there were nine ties and 11 lead changes in total . Taking care of the ball was the difference in the game , with Brooklyn winning the turnover differential , 14 - 10 . That allowed the Nets to win the points off turnover battle , 28 - 9 . Free-throw shooting was also big , with Brooklyn hitting 18 - of - 23 and Milwaukee connecting on 14 - of - 21 . The Nets ( 40 - 40 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he tallied 25 points , two rebounds , 10 assists and two steals on 10 - of - 15 from the field . Joe Harris totaled 14 points and six boards . Rodions Kurucs accrued 11 points , five rebounds and three assists while Caris LeVert led the bench with 24 points , two rebounds and five assists . The Bucks ( 59 - 21 ) were led by Eric Bledsoe , as he collected 33 points , four rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Khris Middleton generated 24 points , four rebounds and three assists . Sterling Brown accumulated 11 points , four rebounds and five assists while Pat Connaughton led the bench with 13 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . Both teams have to play again on Sunday , with Brooklyn traveling to face the fading Indiana Pacers and Milwaukee playing host to the surging Atlanta Hawks .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 127 - 116 , at Fiserve Forum on Wednesday evening . The Thunder ( 49 - 33 ) came into the contest looking to enter the postseason on a strong note , but knew they 'd be missing star forward Paul George due to the latter 's shoulder injury . However , the Bucks were without Brook Lopez and Giannis Antetokounmpo for rest as well . Courtesy of a big second quarter , OKC took a 68 - 58 halftime lead . The two teams played a highly competitive second half as well , but the visitors ' cushion served them well and allowed them to eventually secure an 11 - point victory to close out the campaign . Dennis Schroder led the way for the Thunder with 32 points , adding five rebounds , three assists and four steals . Jerami Grant provided 28 points , five rebounds and one assist . Russell Westbrook supplied a 15 - point , 17 - assist , 11 - rebound triple - double that included one steal and one block . Markief Morris and Raymond Felton generated matching 12 - point tallies while hauling in 10 rebounds and dishing out seven assists , respectively . Terrance Ferguson and Abdel Nader furnished 11 points apiece . Tim Frazier paced the Bucks with 29 points and supplemented them with 13 assists , six rebounds and one block . Bonzie Colson and Khris Middleton posted 21 points each , with Colson also bringing down 10 rebounds . D.J. Wilson posted an 18 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Patrick Connaughton poured in 12 points and added five rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Thunder now face the Houston Rockets in the first round of the Western Conference playoffs , while the Bucks face off against the Detroit Pistons in the first round of the Eastern Conference playoffs .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 124 - 116 , at United Center on Wednesday evening . The Suns got out to a good start on the road , as they outscored the Bulls , 28 - 25 , in the first quarter . The second quarter picked up as a high - scoring period , where the Suns managed to maintain the upper hand by outscoring the Bulls , 41 - 39 , in the quarter , to take a 69 - 64 lead into halftime . The Bulls picked it up in the third , as they snuck up on the Suns and took 91 - 85 lead , with just under five minutes left in the quarter . The Bulls stayed strong and kept the edge , with a 94 - 93 advantage heading into the final frame . The Suns kept it competitive right down to the wire , as they trailed , 119 - 116 , with 1:27 to go . Nonetheless , the Bulls remained in control , as they held the Suns scoreless for the remainder of the contest . Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 29 points , six assists , one rebound and one steal , in 37 minutes . Jabari Parker followed up with 20 points , 13 rebounds , eight assists and two steals , while Ryan Arcidiacono , Wendell Carter Jr. , and Antonio Blakeney chipped in 14 points each . The Bulls shot 57 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin Booker led the Suns with 23 points , six assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 33 minutes . Deandre Ayton followed up with 18 points , 12 rebounds , five assists , one steal and a block , while T.J. Warren added 21 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting . The Suns shot 49 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 34 from long range . The Suns ( 3 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bucks on Friday . The Bulls ( 5 - 13 ) play host to the Heat on Friday .

The struggling Bulls ( 5 - 16 ) came out ready to defend home court Monday , as they matched the Spurs ( 10 - 10 ) basket for basket in the first quarter and trailed by only two at halftime . Chicago actually took a three - point lead int the final quarter , but they 'd fallen behind 108 - 101 by the 2:13 mark of the period . However , Ryan Arcidiacono would drain a pair of three - pointers over a period of 1:2 , bringing the home squad within one . After missed three - pointers by either side , the second - year guard 's 18 - foot jumper with under a second remaining could n't find the basket , leading to a Spurs win . DeMar DeRozan led the Spurs with 21 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds and five assists . LaMarcus Aldridge followed with 20 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Patty Mills led the bench with 17 points . Bryn Forbes poured in 13 points and added six assists and two rebounds . Jakob Poeltl posted 10 points , four rebounds and four assists in 18 minutes . Zach LaVine paced the Bulls with 28 points and added eight rebounds and seven assists . Arcidiacono totaled 22 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jabari Parker mustered an 18 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that included two assists and two steals . Justin Holiday filled out the stat sheet with 17 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . The Spurs remain on the road and tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night , while the Bulls travel to take on the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday evening as well .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 108 - 107 , at United Center on Wednesday evening . The 76ers got out to a good start on the road , with a 12 - 4 lead early on . However , the Bulls battled back to tie the score at 30 by the end of the first quarter . The contest stayed tight through the second , with neither team leading by more than a couple of possessions , until they sat tied at 57 , entering halftime . The contest stayed close in the third . The Bulls led by one with a minute left in the quarter , but the Sixers closed strong , to take a four - point lead into the final frame . The Sixers pushed their lead to eight , four minutes into the fourth , but the Pelicans hung around , and managed to tie it up at 98 , with 3:41 to go . The lead changed hands a few times in the final minute , before the Bulls came out on top , thanks to a game - winning bucket from Zach LaVine . LaVine led the Bulls with 39 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Robin Lopez followed up with 19 points , nine rebounds and three assists , while Otto Porter Jr. added 15 points , nine rebounds , three assists and three steals . The Bulls shot 44 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 23 from deep . Meanwhile , Jimmy Butler led the 76ers with 22 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 35 minutes . Ben Simmons added 18 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists and four steals , while J.J. Redick added 15 points , two rebounds and two assists . The 76ers ( 41 - 24 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Friday . The Bulls ( 19 - 47 ) play host to the Pistons on Friday .

The contest got out to a competitive start , with a few lead changes early on , before the Bulls emerged with a 28 - 26 lead after one quarter . However , the Raptors took over from there , outscoring the Bulls by 13 , in the second quarter to take an 11 - point lead into halftime . The Raptors carried the momentum through the third and pushed their lead to 93 - 75 , entering the fourth . They cruised through the fourth to earn their third straight win . This marks the fourth straight loss for the Bulls . Serge Ibaka led the Raptors with 23 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a block , in 28 minutes .
