The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 109 - 105 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday . Despite the fact that Cleveland led late in this game , Los_Angeles was able to prevail with victory . In fact , the Cavaliers led 99 - 91 with less than five minutes remaining , as the Lakers ended the game on an 18 - 6 run . There were 13 ties and 20 lead changes in total though , as neither club led by more than 11 points.The shooting disparity really decided the game , with Los_Angeles connecting on 51 percent of their shots while holding Cleveland to just 38 percent from the field . The Lakers also won the defensive rebounding battle , 44 - 31 , and out - blocked them , 9 - 2 . The Lakers ( 10 - 7 ) got a spectacular performance from LeBron James in his return to Cleveland , as he collected 32 points , 14 rebounds and seven assists . Lonzo Ball had one of his best game of the season , accumulating 15 points , seven rebounds and six assists on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Brandon Ingram finished with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . JaVale McGee and Kyle Kuzma scored 12 points apiece to round out the starting five . The Cavaliers ( 2 - 14 ) best player came off the bench , as Jordan Clarkson totaled 20 points , two rebounds and five assists against his former team . Tristan Thompson was the best starter , as he amassed 14 points and 15 boards . Cedi Osman accrued 21 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Collin Sexton generated 12 points , three rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Cleveland traveling to face the Philadelphia 76ers and Los_Angeles playing host to the Utah Jazz in the nightcap .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 123 - 115 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 27 - 13 ) were an absolutely dominant team during the first half of this game against the Cavaliers ( 8 - 33 ) , as they quickly took control of the game and did n't look back . Indiana won the first quarter by a 38 - 16 differential , and that 22 - point lead practically ended the game after the first 12 minutes . The Pacers would end up losing the remaining three quarters ( 25 - 27 , 29 - 36 and 31 - 36 , respectively ) but it was n't enough since Cleveland were never able to come back from such a huge deficit following the first 12 minutes of action . Thaddeus Young led the offense for the Pacers with 26 points , but he filled the stat sheet since he also added five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic contributed 23 points , and Domantas Sabonis chipped in with 15 points , nine boards , four assists and two steals in a rare start . Victor Oladipo had 17 points , and Cory Joseph delivered 11 points and six assists off the bench . Alec Burks led the way for the Cavaliers with 19 points while going 7 - 9 shooting from the field , but he also added seven rebounds to the mix . Cedi Osman and Tristan Thompson both had 15 points , but the Canadian big man did an excellent job on both ends of the court since he also added 13 rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Collin Sexton added 14 points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 107 - 102 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday evening . The Cavaliers ( 19 - 53 ) caught a break before the game even tipped off , as the Bucks ( 53 - 19 ) announced that Nikola Mirotic would miss the next several weeks with a thumb injury he 'd suffered Tuesday against the Lakers , and that Giannis Antetokounmpo would sit a second straight game due to his ankle sprain . Cleveland took advantage of the short - handed visitors early , jumping out to a 30 - 24 first - quarter lead that they 'd extended to 58 - 47 by halftime . Milwaukee did make a game of it in the third by wiping out all but one point of their deficit , but the home squad was able close out the win in the final minute on a pair of Jordan Clarkson free throws . Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks with a 26 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Eric Bledsoe followed with 24 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Brook Lopez checked in with 19 points , four rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Patrick Connaughton supplied 11 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Tony Snell and Ersan Ilyasova contributed matching eight - point tallies while also pulling down eight and seven rebounds , respectively . Collin Sexton paced the Cavaliers with 25 points , three assists and two rebounds . Clarkson poured in 23 points and added five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Brandon Knight totaled 13 points , four assists and two rebounds . Cedi Osman and Ante Zizic generated matching eight - point tallies , with the latter also notably bringing down 10 rebounds . Kevin Love pitched in six points and 10 rebounds over 18 minutes . The Bucks head back home to tangle with the Miami Heat on Friday night , while the Cavaliers remain home and face the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 116 - 106 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday . Boston came into this game as a sizable favorite , as they led for all but a few minutes . In fact , they won all four individual quarters , despite the fact that each one was decided by five points or fewer . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with the Celtics out - rebounding the Cavaliers , 46 - 36 . Their defense was key as well , as they doubled up Cleveland in steals , 8 - 4 and tripled them up in blocks , 3 - 1 , while winning the turnover differential , 15 - 10 . The Celtics ( 44 - 31 ) were led by Jayson Tatum , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . Marcus Smart matched those 21 points , adding six rebounds , four assists and three steals to his tally . Al Horford accrued 19 points , eight rebounds and five assists while Gordon Hayward led the bench with 15 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Cavaliers ( 19 - 56 ) were led by Collin Sexton , as he amassed 24 points , two rebounds and three assists . Cedi Osman accumulated 15 points , seven rebounds and two assists , Kevin Love finished with 10 points , 11 rebounds and four assists while Jordan Clarkson led the bench with 18 points , two rebounds and five assists . On deck for the Cavaliers is a road matchup versus the San Antonio Spurs on Thursday . As for the Celtics , they return to action on Friday when they play host to the Indiana Pacers .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 108 - 105 , at TD Garden on Tuesday . There were seven ties and nine lead changes in this competitive game , as it was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , Jayson Tatum executed an intentionally missed free - throw with 0 seconds left to seal the win after Detroit hit a three - pointer on their previous possession . The third quarter really made the difference for Boston , as they outscored Detroit , 25 - 13 . The Celtics defense was on point once again , as they held the Pistons to 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range while forcing 17 turnovers . Ball movement was also critical , with Boston out - assisting Detroit , 25 - 17 . The Pistons ( 4 - 2 ) got a monster double - double out of Blake Griffin , as he led the way with 24 points , 15 rebounds and three assists . Andre Drummond amassed 17 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Reggie Bullock totaled 16 points and three boards . Ish Smith led the bench with 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Celtics ( 5 - 2 ) got a season - high 31 points out of Kyrie Irving , as he did that damage on 10 - of - 16 from the field . He also added five rebounds and five assists to his impressive line . Jayson Tatum finished with 16 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jaylen Brown accumulated 14 points , five rebounds and three assists . Marcus Morris led the bench with 15 points and nine boards . On deck for Detroit is a road matchup versus the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday . As for Boston , they return to action on Thursday in a home matchup versus the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 134 - 129 , at TD Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Celtics ( 34 - 19 ) came into the contest with a stellar record , but that did n't spare them from having something to prove on their home floor against one of the opposite conference 's elite . Boston got off to a good start in that regard , turning a 31 - 29 first - quarter lead into a 66 - 58 halftime advantage over the Thunder ( 33 - 19 ) . OKC naturally hung tough , however , and the game ultimately came down to a possession in the closing seconds . The visitors were down by just one point when Russell Westbrook attempted a drive to the basket and lost the ball to Al Horford with 8 seconds remaining . Jayson Tatum 's two subsequent free throws essentially sealed the victory for the Celtics , although the win was n't iron clad until Westbrook failed to hit the rim while trying to purposely miss a second free - throw attempt with 5 seconds left . Paul George led the Thunder with 37 points , adding four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double , furnishing 22 points , 16 assists , 12 rebounds and two steals . Steven Adams and Dennis Schroder had matching 16 - point tallies , while hauling in nine and six rebounds , respectively . Jerami Grant totaled 15 points , three boards , one steal and one block . Terrance Ferguson tallied 11 points . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 30 points while also dishing out 11 assists , posting four rebounds and recording one block . Marcus Morris supplied 19 points , seven rebounds and one assist . Marcus Smart contributed 18 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals . Horford collected 17 points , nine assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Daniel Theis compiled 14 points , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jaylen Brown pitched in 12 points , while Tatum had a well - balanced line of 11 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . The Thunder heads back home to face the Orlando Magic on Tuesday night , while the Celtics visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Tuesday evening .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Boston Celtics , 97 - 92 , at TD Garden on Wednesday evening . The Trail_Blazers ( 38 - 23 ) have impressively been making short work of Eastern Conference opposition during their current road trip , but Wednesday seemingly promised a formidable challenge . Despite recent struggles , the Celtics ( 37 - 25 ) still figured to be a force to be reckoned with , yet it was Portland forging a 43 - 42 halftime lead . They then separated in the third by adding nine points to their advantage , giving them enough cushion to withstand a couple of late Boston surges in the fourth . While the home squad actually enjoyed a better shooting night by draining 46 percent of their attempts , the visitors won both the rebounding ( 48 - 41 ) and turnover ( 11 - 16 ) battles . Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 33 points , adding seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Maurice Harkless turned in 17 points , 10 boards and three steals . Jusuf Nurkic tallied 16 points , six boards , three assists , two blocks and one steal . C.J. McCollum delivered 14 points , five boards and three assists . Al-Farouq Aminu mustered just four points but brought down nine boards . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 31 points and also provided five boards , three assists and one block . Jayson Tatum posted 14 points , four rebounds and one steal . Marcus Smart and Al Horford contributed matching 13 - point , five - assist tallies and hauled in six and five rebounds , respectively . Marcus Morris had eight points on just 3 - for - 10 shooting . The Trail_Blazers next pay a visit to the Toronto Raptors on Friday night , while the Celtics remain home to face the Washington Wizards on Friday evening .
The Los_Angeles Clippers blew out the Washington Wizards 136 - 104 at Staples Center on Sunday . The Clippers had nine players finish in double figures and had no trouble looking back after posting 41 points in the second quarter to improve to 4 - 2 on the season . The rebound battle and ball movement on the Clippers end resulted in the blowout as unselfish basketball and the strength of their bench all factored into stifling the Wizards , who fell to 1 - 4 on the season . Tobias Harris led all scorers with 22 points to go with 11 rebounds , while Patrick Beverley and Avery Bradley combined for 26 points on 19 shots . One of the most productive bench players early in this season has been Montrezl Harrell , who pitched in 13 points and six rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting in just 16 minutes of action . Harrell also blocked two shots and entered the game averaging just over two swats per game . Rookie Shae Gilgeous-Alexander added 10 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting , alongside eight rebounds and seven assists in 28 minutes . The Wizards starters could not muster enough offense to pace with Los_Angeles , as Bradley Beal and John Wall combined for 38 points on 36 shots . Ian Mahinmi was getting bullied around the glass and grabbed just seven rebounds in his 29 minutes . Kelly Oubre Jr also struggled to find a rhythm off the bench as he scored nine points on 2 - of - 12 shooting . Both teams are on the road Tuesday , as the Clippers take on the Oklahoma City Thunder , while the Wizards will face the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 116 - 11 , at Staples Center on Thursday . The Clippers ( 9 - 5 ) have made a statement over the last week , with Thursday 's win serving as their third straight win after the team knocked off both the Bucks and Warriors within the last seven days . Thursday night , Los_Angeles let the Spurs ( 7 - 7 ) remain within striking distance , but it never allowed the visiting team to breakthrough . This was thanks in large part to Lou Williams in the closing moments , as his game - winning three - pointer with 40 seconds left put the Clippers up for good . Williams finished with 23 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting in 28 minutes off the bench to lead the way for the Clippers . Danilo Gallinari was close behind with 19 points , while Tobias Harris put together a great all - around performance with 18 points , eight rebounds and assists in 28 minutes . For the Spurs , it was all about DeMar Derozan , who scored a game - high 34 points on 14 - of - 30 shooting to go along with six rebounds , five assists and three steals in 41 minutes . Unfortunately for DeRozan , when the Spurs had a chance to tie the game down three points in the closing moments , their star turned the ball over , and the game was officially out of reach . DeRozan still did n't get much help Thursday night , however , as LaMarcus Aldridge shot a miserable 3 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring just 10 points in 38 minutes , but he did have a game - high 16 rebounds . Rudy Gay posted 19 points off the bench in what was the team 's third straight loss .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 132 - 111. at Staples Center on Saturday . This marks the Nuggets worst loss of the season , as the Clippers dominated throughout . In fact , they won all four individual quarters , as a 34 - 26 first quarter really set the tone . Rebounding was huge for Los_Angeles , as they won that battle , 56 - 37 . Much of that came on the defensive end , winning that differential , 43 - 24 . The Clippers ended up shooting 58 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range while holding the Nuggets to 42 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The Nuggets ( 21 - 10 ) leading scorer was actually ejected in the third quarter , as Nikola Jokic tallied 19 points , six rebounds and three assists before being handed two technicals for arguing . Jamal Murray totaled 18 points , three rebounds and two assists . Monte Morris led the bench with 15 points and five assists while Malik Beasley amassed 11 points , four rebounds and five steals . The Clippers ( 19 - 13 ) were led by Danilo Gallinari , as he accrued 21 points , four rebounds and two assists against his former team . Tobias Harris matched those 21 points , adding seven rebounds and three assists to his tally . Shai Gilegous-Alexander collected 14 points , two rebounds , six assists and two steals . Montrezl Harrell was huge off the bench , providing 20 points and 10 boards on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Both these teams have time off before their next game , as they both do n't play again until Wednesday . Denver will travel to face the San Antonio Spurs while Los_Angeles will play host to the Sacramento Kings .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 122 - 111 , at Staples Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs got out to a good start on the road as they led by two after one quarter . The Clippers evened things up through the second and the teams ended up tied at 56 by halftime . The Spurs came out on another level in the third , as they outscored the Clippers by 20 in the quarter , to bring a 20 - point lead into the final frame . The Clippers made a solid push in the fourth , outscoring the visitors by nine , however it was not enough to complete the comeback . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 38 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes . DeMar DeRozan followed up with 25 points , 13 rebounds , six assists , four steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Derrick White and Rudy Gay added 12 points each , while Marco Belinelli added 11 points off the bench . Meanwhile , Danilo Gallinari led the Clippers with 21 points , nine rebounds and two assists , in 28 minutes . Montrezl Harrell finished with 21 points , five rebounds , four steals and one assist , while Tobias Harris and Lou Williams finished with 16 points each . The Clippers ( 21 - 15 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the 76ers on Tuesday . The Spurs ( 20 - 17 ) play host to the Celtics on Monday .
The visiting Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 119 - 113 , at Staples Center on Tuesday . The 76ers ( 24 - 14 ) staved off a fourth - quarter comeback by the Clippers ( 21 - 16 ) , who cut a 15 - point deficit to as little as four points . However , the lead proved insurmountable for LA , as the team was unable to close the gap by the end of regulation . Things got testy between the two teams in the fourth quarter , as Jimmy Butler and Avery Bradley were each ejected following a spat midway through the period . The Sixers managed to close out the game without their All-Star wing , who had 16 points prior to his ejection . Philly was led by a monumental 28 - point , 19 - rebound performance from Joel Embiid . Embiid added three assists and three blocks . Ben Simmons scored 14 points and flirted with a triple - double , grabbing nine rebounds and dishing eight assists . The win brings Philadelphia to 2 - 2 over the course of its current road trip . LA , meanwhile , saw four different players score at least 20 points . Lou Williams led the team with 22 points off the bench , while the duo of Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallinari scored 21 points each . Ultimately , though , sub - par shooting sank the Clippers ' chances . LA went just 5 - of - 25 from beyond the arc in the loss . Both the Sixers and Clippers will be playing their next game in Phoenix . Philly continues its road trip with a visit to Talking Stick Resort Arena on Tuesday , while the Clippers will visit the Suns for a divisional matchup on Thursday .

While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for Detroit , they held the lead for the final 45 - plus minutes . The Pistons also recorded 12 steals while the Clippers recorded just seven thefts . Detroit 's starters really dominated the game as well , outscoring Los_Angeles ' starters , 93 - 48 . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) got a spectacular performance from Blake Griffin , as he abused his former team with 44 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals on 13 - of - 23 from the field . Andre Drummond finished with 20 points , 21 rebounds and three steals . Reggie Bullock amassed 17 points , seven rebounds and four assists . The Utah Jazz took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 129 - 109 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . It was a comfortable win for the Jazz ( 25 - 21 ) , who held a double - digit lead for the majority of regulation . Utah played a remarkably efficient game , shooting 52 percent from the field and reaching the free - throw line 37 times . Los_Angeles ( 24 - 20 ) , on the other hand , was unable to make a dent in Utah 's impressive defense . Despite boasting one of the league 's highest - scoring offenses , the Clippers shot only 45 percent from the field and tallied just 49 first - half points . Utah saw an incredible 23 - points , 22 - rebound performance from star center Rudy Gobert . The reigning Defensive Player of the Year set a new season high on the boards and also blocked four shots . The Jazz also enjoyed a team - high 28 points from sophomore guard Donovan Mitchell . The Clippers , meanwhile , were not themselves in Wednesday 's loss . LA 's combo of star forwards , Tobias Harris and Danilo Gallinari , shot just 9 - of - 28 from the field for 26 points . Big man Montrezl Harrell , fresh off consecutive 20 - point performances , scored only 11 points off the bench on the night . On Friday , Utah will host the Cleveland Cavaliers , while Los_Angeles will square off with the Golden State Warriors .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 122 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday afternoon . The Clippers ( 28 - 22 ) have now won four out of their last five games and seem to be leaving behind an ugly five - game losing run that complicated their position in the standings , and they looked like the better side against the Kings ( 25 - 25 ) right from the beginning of the contest . The Clippers quickly jumped to a huge 34 - 21 lead following the first 12 minutes of action , and they never looked back from there . Los_Angeles also won the second quarter ( 33 - 30 ) and while Sacramento showed some signs of life in the third quarter , period they won 25 - 20 , it was n't enough to put the Clippers ' win in any sort of danger . Los_Angeles won the final quarter as well , 35 - 32 , and closed things out rather comfortably . Six Clippers scored in double digits in this one and surprisingly , the top scorer came off the bench since Montrezl Harrell had 25 points and seven rebounds while going 11 - 13 from the field . Tobias Harris had 18 points , and Patrick Beverley delivered a strong double - double since he finished the contest with 16 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 17 points , five assists and four rebounds . De'Aaron Fox led the way for the Kings since he finished with 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . Marvin Bagley III had 14 points off the bench , while Bogdan Bogdanovic also impressed off the bench with 19 points in 31 minutes .
The Atlanta Hawks took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 123 - 118 , at Staples Center on Monday evening . Hawks point guard Trae Young set the bar high the last time these two teams met , delivering a season - high 17 assists against the Clippers in November . On Monday , he once again left an impression on LA , scoring a team - high 26 points to help his team earn a much - needed win . The Hawks ( 16 - 33 ) went up early thanks to strong play from Young and John Collins , who scored seven points each in the first quarter . While LA ( 27 - 23 ) fought its way back and evened the game at 71 - 71 , a late third - quarter run helped Atlanta maintain control of the game . Big man Alex Len helped spark the run by scoring eight points in under three minutes of action . The win brought Atlanta to 3 - 3 in its last six games , as the team continues to distance itself from its slow start to the season . Young has been a big part of that , averaging 18 points per game since the start of January . In addition to his strong scoring on Monday , he dished out eight assists and committed only one turnover . Collins finished the game with 22 points , while Len contributed another 19 off the bench . As a team , Atlanta shot over 50 percent from the field . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , was led by 30 points from star forward Tobias Harris . Harris also flirted with a triple - double , grabbing eight boards and dishing out seven assists . Off the bench , Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell combined for 39 points and five steals , with Williams also recording nine assists . However , the team could not quite match Atlanta 's efficient production , shooting 48 percent from the field . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Clippers . Next on the agenda for Atlanta is a trip to Sacramento on Wednesday . The Clippers , meanwhile , will shift their focus to their tilt with their crosstown rival , the Lakers , on Thursday .
The Houston Rockets cruised past the Los_Angeles Clippers , 135 - 103 , at Staples Center on Wednesday evening . Just one night after blowing out Sacramento by 25 points , the Rockets ( 51 - 28 ) won by an even wider margin against Los_Angeles ( 47 - 32 ) . While the Rockets did not match their record - setting three - point barrage from Tuesday night , Houston did knock down a whopping 18 three - pointers en route to the win . It was a wildly efficient night for the Rockets , who shot over 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Houston jumped out to a double - digit lead in the first quarter and only cemented it with a commanding second half . James Harden was the team 's leading scorer with 31 points . The Rockets ' `` big three '' of Harden , Chris Paul , and Clint Capela combined to score 84 points , as Paul put up 29 points and seven assists while Capela finished with 24 points and 15 boards . Six Houston players scored in double figures in total . Rookie guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Clippers with 20 points . LA was clearly outmatched from three - point range , making only eight shots from beyond the arc . The normally lights - out bench duo of Lou Williams and Montrezl Harrell had a relatively slow night , combining for just 27 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting . On Friday , Houston will host the New York Knicks while the Clippers will play the Lakers .

The Clippers carried the energy into the third and used an 110 run to take a one - point lead with 7:50 left in the quarter . The Grizzlies held their ground from there , as the teams went into the fourth tied at 69 . While they sliced that deficit in half during a second quarter where they thrived on both ends of the court , they still faced a double - digit halftime deficit . However , Atlanta continued to have the hot hand throughout the third quarter , posting 32 points and chipping off another three points from the Mavericks ' ( 2 - 2 ) advantage . Their persistence culminated in a dominant final 12 minutes in which they outscored Dallas by a 31 - 17 margin to secure the comeback win . While neither club shot particularly well , a 10 - point advantage in free - throw accuracy for the Hawks ( 71 percent - 62 percent ) was key to the home squad 's success . The first quarter really set the tone , with Detroit outscoring Atlanta , 40 - 20 . That allowed Detroit to take 18 more shots than Atlanta . Three-point shooting was also critical , with the Pistons connecting on 20 - of - 47 from long range while the Hawks hit just 7 - of - 28 . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 119 - 101 , at Phillips Arena on Thursday . It was n't the prettiest start for the Raptors ( 40 - 16 ) , who were without star Kawhi Leonard , on Thursday , as the team came out rather flat in the opening moments and fell behind 33 - 22 after the first quarter . The Hawks ' lead grew to as much as 17 points in the first half , but Toronto was able to trim it down to eight before heading into the locker room . From there , the Raptors just poured it on the lowly Hawks , outscoring them 59 - 33 in the second half and taking home the easy victory . The young Raptors were sensational in Thursday 's game , with Pascal Siakam scoring a game - high 33 points to go along with 14 rebounds , four assists and two steals in 40 minutes . Fred VanVleet , meanwhile , was close behind with 30 points of his own on top of five rebounds and six assists . Kyle Lowry could n't get much going from the field , hitting just three of his 13 field goal attempts , but he still managed to finish with a double - double of 13 points and 13 assists on top of eight rebounds . As for the Hawks ( 18 - 36 ) , they were very efficient from downtown , going 16 - of - 35 ( 46 percent ) from behind the arc , but they just were not able to put together a strong enough defensive effort down the stretch . Trae Young and Taurean Prince led the way for Atlanta , each scoring a team - high 19 points , while John Collins was the next highest scorer with just 12 points , but he did add 12 rebounds . Dewayne Dedmon was the only other Hawks player to score in double figures with 10 points in 24 minutes .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 129 - 120 , at State Farm Arena on Saturday night . The Hornets ( 27 - 28 ) set the tone from the opening tip , as they racked up an eye - popping 46 points in the first quarter . However , the Hawks ( 18 - 37 ) hung tough and managed to shave 10 points off a 15 - point deficit by halftime . Charlotte put any thoughts of a comeback to rest in the third quarter , however , extending their advantage back out to 20 points entering the fourth quarter . As such , even a 34 - point tally by Atlanta during the final 12 minutes was n't enough to get them within striking distance . As the final score implies , both teams shot very well , with the visitors edging the hosts in that department by a 54 percent - 54 percent margin . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 37 points , adding seven assists , one rebound and one steal . Marvin Williams turned in 27 points , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Jeremy Lamb provided 24 points , seven assists , six rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist furnished 11 points , three boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Cody Zeller managed 10 points , eight rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . John Collins paced the Hawks with 21 points , supplementing them with five rebounds , one steal and one block . Trae Young generated a 20 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also includes one rebound and two steals . Kevin Huerter poured in 17 points and added four boards , one assist and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon registered 14 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jeremy Lin and Kent Bazemore had matching 13 - point tallies off the bench . The Hornets next pay a visit to the Indiana Pacers on Monday night , while the Hawks remain home and welcome the Orlando Magic on Sunday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 125 - 122 , at State Farm Arena on Friday evening . The Pistons ( 27 - 30 ) enjoyed plenty of offensive success in the first half , but it still was n't enough to keep up with the hot - shooting Hawks ( 19 - 40 ) . Atlanta impressively racked up 70 points over the first 24 minutes , good for a two - point halftime lead . However , when Detroit built a seven - point third - quarter lead , it appeared that they might be on their way to a comfortable victory , even after losing All-Star forward Blake Griffin to ejection during the period . The hosts would persevere , though , and even held a five - point lead with just 1:53 remaining . The Pistons would finish on a 10 - 2 run from that point forward , with Thon Maker 's 23 - foot three - point jumper at the 17 - second mark the difference in the contest . Reggie Jackson paced the Pistons with 32 points , adding eight assists , five rebounds and two steals . Andre Drummond posted a 26 - point , 21 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , five steals and one block . Griffin totaled 15 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block before exiting . Bruce Brown collected 12 points , four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ish Smith finished with 10 points , four assists and one rebound . Wayne Ellington and Maker offered nine points apiece . Trae Young led the Hawks with a 30 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds . John Collins tallied 19 points , six rebounds and one block . Vince Carter delivered 16 points . Dewayne Dedmon generated a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and one steal . Kent Bazemore poured in 12 points and also posted seven boards and two steals . DeAndre ' Bembry produced an efficient 10 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Pistons remain on the road and face off with the Miami Heat on Saturday night , while the Hawks remain home to tangle with the Phoenix Suns on Saturday evening as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 121 - 105 , at State Farm Arena on Tuesday evening . While Atlanta ( 24 - 48 ) hung tight for much of the game , Houston ( 45 - 26 ) ultimately gained an edge thanks to its superior offensive play . After knocking down 21 three - pointers in their last outing , the Rockets impressed with another 19 makes from deep in Tuesday 's win . For the second straight game , too , both James Harden and Chris Paul tallied double digits in the assist column . Everything seemed to be going right for the Rockets , making it difficult for the Hawks to keep up despite their 15 made three - pointers . On top of his 10 assists , Harden scored a game - high 31 points . With that , Harden is the first player since Michael Jordan in 1987 to score 30 points against every team in a single season . It was just another notch in the belt of an already historic season for Harden , who is leading the league in scoring at 36 points per game . The Rockets also saw 26 points and 11 rebounds from Clint Capela . Danuel House pitched in another 19 points in a true top - to - bottom effort for the surging team . Budding star Trae Young led the way for Atlanta , scoring 21 points while dishing out 12 assists . It was Young 's fourth straight game scoring 20 or more . John Collins added another 20 points and 10 rebounds for the Hawks . Houston faces the second half of a back - to - back as it visits Memphis on Wednesday . The Hawks , meanwhile , will host the Utah Jazz on Thursday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 117 - 114 , at State Farm Arena on Thursday evening . The contest got out to a competitive start , as the teams traded the lead through the first quarter , before the Hawks took a 29 - 28 lead into the second . The Hawks turned it up in the second , as they started the quarter on a 13 - 5 run . The Hawks led for the entire quarter and took an 11 - point lead into halftime . The Jazz turned the tables in the third quarter , as they rallied to tie it up at 71 , halfway through the quarter . The Jazz went on to outscore the Hawks by 16 points in the quarter , to take a five - point lead into the fourth . The Hawks started chipping away to start the fourth and made it a one - point game with just over seven minutes to go . The Jazz responded and pulled ahead by a couple of possessions , however , the Hawks outscored the visitors 19 - 8 through the final five minutes , to snap a three - game losing streak . For the Jazz , it marks the end of a five - game winning streak . Trae Young led the Hawks with 23 points , 11 assists and two rebounds , in 34 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon followed up with 18 points , nine rebounds , three blocks and two assists , while Kevin Heurter added 14 points , two assists and a rebound . The Hawks shot 47 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 34 points , four rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal , in 35 minutes . Derrick Favors added 15 points , 15 rebounds , two steals , a block and an assist , while Ricky Rubio tallied 17 points , seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . The Jazz shot 43 - of - 94 from the field , including 10 - of - 32 from deep . The Jazz ( 42 - 30 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Saturday . The Hawks ( 25 - 48 ) play host to the 76ers on Saturday .

The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 27 ) have n't been anywhere near the same team on the road this season , but early indications Friday were that things would be different versus the Hawks ( 27 - 49 ) . Portland amassed 60 first - half points and held a nine - point advantage at halftime . Their steady play throughout the second half ensured Atlanta would be kept at bay , as the visitors tacked 11 more points onto their lead over the final two periods . The Blazers ' most impressive edge may have been on the boards , as they out - rebounded the home squad by a 55 - 41 margin . Damian Lillard led the way for the Trail_Blazers with 36 points , adding seven assists and three rebounds . Al-Farouq Aminu generated a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . Enes Kanter furnished 14 points , eight rebounds and one block . Seth Curry poured in 12 points to lead the bench . Jake Layman and Zach Collins posted matching nine - point tallies , with Collins also hauling in nine boards . The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Miami Heat , 123 - 113 , at American Airlines Arena on Monday . While Miami came into this game as a sizable favorite , Sacramento rode some elite offense to a road win . In fact , the Kings connected on 50 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while recording 28 assists . Despite the fact the Heat led by 11 points after the first quarter , the Kings ended up outscoring them , 77 - 55 , in the second and third quarters . Sacramento absolutely dominated down low , outscoring the Heat in the paint , 68 - 38 . Turnovers were also key for the Kings , as they forced 19 turnovers from the Heat while committing just 12 on their end . The Kings ( 4 - 3 ) were led by Willie Cauley-Stein , as he tallied 26 points and 13 rebounds . Buddy Hield finished with 23 points , eight rebounds , five assists and two steals . De'Aaron Fox accrued 20 points , four rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Nemanja Bjelica generated 19 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Heat ( 3 - 3 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he collected 31 points , three rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Goran Dragic accumulated 20 points , five assists and two steals . Hassan Whiteside finished with 16 points , 24 rebounds , two steals and five blocks . Tyler Johnson led the bench with 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . Both teams play road games on Tuesday for their next outing , with Sacramento playing the Orlando Magic and Miami facing the Charlotte Hornets .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Miami Heat , 110 - 102 , at American Airlines Arena on Friday evening . The game was a tale of two halves , with the short - handed Heat ( 5 - 6 ) forging a 59 - 51 first - half lead despite playing without Goran Dragic ( knee ) . However , the Pacers ( 8 - 5 ) turned it on coming out of intermission despite seeing Thaddeus Young get ejected for elbowing Kelly Olynyk after playing just 17 minutes . Indiana outscored Miami by a 59 - 43 margin over the final 24 minutes and excelled on both ends of the floor . The Pacers shot a stellar 54 percent from the floor while also eliciting 23 turnovers from their hosts . Both benches thrived in the contest , with the Indiana second unit generating 44 points and the Miami reserves posting 48 . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 22 points , a total he supplemented with 10 assists , five rebounds and four steals . Darren Collison and Domantas Sabonis turned in 17 points each , with the latter also supplying 11 rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 16 points , while Cory Joseph turned in 14 points , five rebounds and two assists in 32 minutes . Olynyk paced the Heat with 20 points and added four boards and two assists . Josh Richardson shifted to point guard with Dragic out and produced 18 points , six assists and two steals . Tyler Johnson supplied 15 points , five assists , two rebounds and one block . Hassan Whiteside posted an 11 - point , 20 - rebound double - double . Justise Winslow and Rodney McGruder managed 11 points and five assists apiece . The Pacers remain on the road and head to the Lone Star State , where they 'll tangle with the Houston Rockets on Sunday night . The Heat remains home and faces the Washington Wizards on Saturday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Miami Heat , 105 - 90 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . While Miami led for the majority of the first half , Orlando dominated in the second half . The third quarter was the difference , as the Magic outscored the Heat , 30 - 12 . That allowed Orlando to lead by at least five points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The Magic 's defense was key , as they held the Heat to 42 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range . Orlando was lights out from long distance , hitting 14 - of - 28 of their three 's . Getting to the free - throw line was also critical , with the Magic hitting 15 - of - 20 and Miami connecting on just 2 - of - 5 . The Magic ( 12 - 12 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , as he collected 20 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Nikola Vucevic finished with 19 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Terrence Ross was a huge spark off the bench , as he provided 19 points , three rebounds and three assists . Evan Fournier , Jonathan Isaac and D.J. Augustin all scored between 11 and 13 points as well . The Heat ( 9 - 14 ) had no player score more than 14 points , as Justise Winslow led the team with 14 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks off the bench . Hassan Whiteside led the starters with 12 points , nine rebounds and three blocks on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Kelly Olynyk also played well off the bench , totaling 13 points , six rebounds and two assists . Josh Richardson had a nightmare game , as he accrued six points , four rebounds and five assists on 2 - of - 14 from the field . On deck for Orlando is a home matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday . As for Miami , they 'll travel to play the Phoenix Suns on Saturday for their next outing .
The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 112 - 108 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . While there were only seven ties and five lead changes in this game , it came down to the wire . In fact , this game was within a four - point margin for the final eight minutes of play . With that said , Miami either held the lead or were tied for the entirety of the second half . The Heat 's offense was on point , as they shot 50 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range while holding the Grizzlies to 48 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . Ball movement played a huge factor in that , with Miami out - assisting Memphis , 25 - 18 . Bench production was also big , with Miami having four bench players reach double figures in scoring while Memphis had just two . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 23 ) were led by Mike Conley , as he tallied 22 points , three rebounds , seven assists and three steals . JaMychal Green was huge off their bench , providing 24 points and 11 rebounds . Marc Gasol finished with 15 points , five rebounds , five assists and two blocks while Jaren Jackson accrued 13 points , five rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . The Heat ( 21 - 20 ) were led by Justise Winslow , as he collected 26 points , seven rebounds and four assists on 10 - of - 16 from the field . Josh Richardson accumulated 14 points , six rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Bam Adebayo started and totaled 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Tyler Johnson , Kelly Olynyk , Derrick Jones Jr. and Dwyane Wade all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . On deck for Memphis is a road matchup versus the scorching - hot Houston Rockets on Monday . As for Miami , they 're off until Tuesday when they travel to face the equally hot Milwaukee Bucks .

Neither team won any individual quarter by more than a single point , as this game was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , there were 12 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . The shooting disparity was key , with Miami shooting 56 percent from the field while holding Atlanta to just 42 percent shooting . The Miami Heat defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 99 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday night . The Heat ( 39 - 42 ) had no shortage of motivation coming into Tuesday 's contest , needing a victory to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and also knowing that the contest would serve as Dwyane Wade 's last home game if the postseason did end up out of their reach . Meanwhile , the short - handed 76ers ( 50 - 31 ) were sitting Joel Embiid ( knee/rest ) and J.J. Redick ( back ) . With all of those factors lining up in their favor , Miami took full advantage , building a 61 - 42 halftime advantage that essentially made the second half a formality . The home squad shot an impressive 53 percent , with Wade fittingly leading the way with 30 points . Greg Monroe led the way for the 76ers with 18 points , adding five rebounds and two assists . Ben Simmons registered 16 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Jonathon Simmons furnished 14 points , eight assists , two rebounds and three steals . Boban Marjanovic delivered 12 points , five boards , two assists and two steals . Zhaire Smith finished with 11 points , two rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic mustered just six points but dished out 13 assists , brought down three rebounds and recorded one steal . The 76ers head back home to face the Chicago Bulls in their season finale on Wednesday night , while the Heat travel to Brooklyn to try and secure one more victory against the Nets on Wednesday evening as well .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 122 - 119 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday evening . The 76ers got out to a great start on the road , with a quick 12 - 4 lead , and went on to pour in 42 points in the first quarter , while holding the Hornets to 30 . The Hornets picked up the defense in the second , as they held the 76ers to 21 points , and outscored the visitors by five in the quarter . The Hornets carried the momentum into the third , where they jumped ahead with a 12 - 3 run , to take the lead . The Sixers stayed tough , but the Hornets outscored them by 11 in the quarter , to take an 86 - 82 lead into the fourth . The 76ers remained relentless , as they fought their way to take a one - point lead , five minutes into the quarter . They kept pressing and pushed their lead to 10 , with four minutes left . However , the Hornets rallied back as Kemba Walker hit two free throws just in time to tie it up at 110 , and send the game to overtime . Walker was on fire for the Hornets as he finished the night with 60 points , however his performance was negated by a wild sequence of events in overtime , where Jimmy Butler decided the game with a block , followed by the game - winning three , with 0 seconds left . Joel Embiid led the 76ers with 33 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and a steal , in 40 minutes . Ben Simmons followed up with 23 points , 11 rebounds , nine assists and two steals , while J.J. Redick tallied 23 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Butler finished with just 15 points , but they came at just the right time Meanwhile , Walker 's 60 points came on an impressive 21 - of - 34 shooting effort , in 45 minutes of action . Jeremy Lamb followed up with 20 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Cody Zeller tallied 10 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Hornets ( 7 - 8 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Celtics on Monday . The 76ers ( 11 - 7 ) play host to the Suns on Monday .

The New_York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 126 - 124 , in overtime at Spectrum Center on Friday evening . Knowing the track record of the two teams , the Hornets ' ( 14 - 14 ) body of work on their home court and the fact Charlotte jumped out to a 33 - 16 first - quarter lead , the final outcome would have been extremely difficult to envision after the first 12 minutes . However , the Knicks ( 9 - 21 ) refused to lay down , beginning their comeback with a 37 - point haul in the second quarter and continuing with a 48 - 31 second - half advantage that sent the game into overtime . In the extra period , New_York managed to pull ahead by a 126 - 121 margin with 17 seconds remaining , and a Kemba Walker misfire on a jumper at the buzzer sealed the win for the Knicks . Emmanuel Mudiay paced the Knicks with 34 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Kevin Knox provided 20 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Noah Vonleh generated a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that included seven assists and one block . Enes Kanter matched Vonleh 's scoring total and hauled in eight boards . Luke Kornet led the bench with 13 points and added six rebounds . Tim Hardaway , Jr. turned in 12 points . Nicolas Batum and Cody Zeller co - led the Hornets with 21 - point efforts . Batum also dished out seven assists and hauled in six rebounds , while Zeller hauled in 13 rebounds . Marvin Williams posted 20 points and five boards . Walker delivered 16 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Jeremy Lamb matched his scoring total and also managed nine rebounds and five assists . The Knicks next pay a visit to the Indiana Pacers on Sunday afternoon , while the Hornets remain home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Saturday evening .

The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 118 - 108 , at Spectrum Center on Sunday . The Trail_Blazers ( 39 - 24 ) and the Hornets ( 29 - 34 ) played a surprisingly tight encounter although judging how the game happened , the Blazers always looked on top of the game . Portland jumped to a 32 - 25 lead in the first quarter and they were set to cruise their way , but Charlotte responded and won both the second and third quarters , 25 - 24 and 30 - 25 , so the fourth quarter began with a one - point differential . But the Blazers stepped it up and closed things out with a strong 37 - 28 period that gave the Western Conference franchise their sixth win in their last seven games . Damian Lillard had a strong game for the Blazers and filled the stat sheet admirably , since he ended with 23 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jeremy Lamb led the way with 23 points , while Frank Kaminsky had 18 points with seven boards . Tony Parker added 14 points with five assists .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Utah Jazz , 124 - 123 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday evening . The first quarter was tight the whole way , but the Jazz emerged with a 34 - 32 lead heading into the second . The second stayed close until Jazz turned up the heat with an 18 - 8 run , to take an 81 - 69 lead into halftime . Utah was able to maintain a good cushion through most of the third , but the Warriors closed the quarter strong and cut the deficit to just six , heading into the fourth . The Jazz pushing their lead back to double digits early in the fourth , however the Warriors used an 110 run midway through the quarter to take a 112 - 111 lead . The game went back and forth down the stretch , until the Jazz led 123 - 122 with 6 seconds left and Warriors ball . The Warriors went to Kevin Durant who missed a foul - line jumper , but Jonas Jerebko was right there for a put - back layup to help the Warriors steal one in Utah . Kevin Durant led the way for Golden_State , with 38 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , one steal and a block , in 39 minutes . Stephen Curry followed up with 31 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals , while Draymond Green tallied 14 points nine rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal , in 33 minutes . The Warriors shot 57 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 19 from deep . Meanwhile , Joe Ingles was the high - point man for the Jazz , with 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , in 35 minutes of action . Donovan Mitchell followed up with 19 points , while Jae Crowder chipped in 17 points , seven rebounds . four assists and two steals , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 46 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 46 from long range . The Jazz ( 1 - 1 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Grizzlies on Monday . The Warriors ( 20 ) head to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Sunday .
The Utah Jazz blew out the Houston Rockets , 118 - 91 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Thursday Evening . Utah ( 13 - 13 ) seemed unhindered by the ejection of its star player in the first quarter . Reigning Defensive Player of the Year Rudy Gobert was ejected less than three minutes into the game after he slapped a water cup off the scorer 's table in frustration following a foul call . Despite Gobert 's absence , Utah earned its most commanding win of the season . In addition to a strong offensive night , the Jazz held Houston ( 11 - 13 ) to just 56 points through three quarters . The Rockets looked like a different team than the one that boasted the number one offense in basketball last season . Houston shot just 40 percent from the field on the night . The Jazz were led by a stellar performance from Derrick Favors , who scored 24 points and pulled down 10 rebounds . Six players scored in double figures in the win , and the team as a whole shot 51 percent from the floor . Joe Ingles dropped 18 points and grabbed two steals to help in what was an overall dominant night for the Jazz . Houston , meanwhile , saw an uncharacteristically poor night from reigning MVP James Harden . Harden shot 4 - of - 15 from the field , tallying just 13 points and committing seven turnovers . Chris Paul , too , struggled to make anything work , committing five turnovers while notching only four assists . All in all , it was a night that the Rockets will surely hope to soon forget . Next up for the Jazz is a trip to San Antonio on Sunday evening . Houston , meanwhile , will return to Texas to square off with the Mavericks in Dallas on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Utah Jazz , 107 - 106 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday evening . The Jazz got out to a strong start at home with a six - point lead after one quarter . They pushed their lead to double digits early in the second , but the Thunder were able to rally back and cut the deficit to just three , as they trailed 61 - 58 at halftime . The Thunder carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the home team by 15 , to take a 93 - 81 lead into the final frame . The Jazz kept fighting and managed to make it at four - point game with two minutes remaining . The Thunder did not score in the final two minutes of the game but were able to slip away with the one - point win . This marks the fourth straight win for the Thunder and the end of a two - game winning streak for Utah . Paul George led the Thunder with 43 points , 14 rebounds , six assists , five steals and one block , in 40 minutes . Steven Adams followed up with 15 points , 10 rebounds , one steal and one block , while Jerami Grant added 15 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and a steal . Russell Westbrook finished with eight points , 12 rebounds , nine assists and three steals . Meanwhile , Rudy Gobert tallied 20 points , 10 rebounds and one block , in 34 minutes for the Jazz . Donovan Mitchell added 20 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Ricky Rubio finished with 12 points , 14 assists , seven rebounds and three steals . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . The Jazz ( 16 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail Blazers on Tuesday . The Thunder ( 21 - 10 ) play host to the Timberwolves on Sunday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Utah Jazz , 114 - 97 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Thursday evening . The Jazz got out to a strong start at home , with a 29 - 22 lead after one quarter . However , the visitors picked it up in the second , as they rallied to outscore the Jazz 35 - 23 in the quarter and take a 57 - 52 lead at halftime . The Sixers carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the Jazz by 11 to expand their lead to 16 at the start of the fourth quarter . The Jazz put up a fight in the fourth but it was not enough to make a dent in the deficit , as the 76ers held on for their seventh road win of the season . Ben Simmons tallied a triple - double with 13 points , 14 rebounds and 12 assists , along with three steals and one block , in 31 minutes . Joel Embiid tallied 23 points , 15 rebounds , six assists and five blocks , while J.J. Redick added 24 points , five rebounds and one assist . Jimmy Butler chipped in 19 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . The 76ers shot 50 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 23 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting , four rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 33 minutes . Dante Exum followed up with 20 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 21 minutes off the bench , while Rudy Gobert tallied 17 points , 15 rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . The Jazz ( 17 - 19 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Knicks on Saturday . The 76ers ( 23 - 13 ) take on the Trail Blazers in Portland on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 116 - 112 , at Golden 1 Center on Friday evening . The Kings got out to a good start at home , leading , 16 - 9 , mid way through the first quarter . The Wizards pushed back , but still trailed by one , 28 - 27 , entering the second . The Wizards kept up the push in the second quarter , where they took the lead early on and held on to outscore the Kings by seven , to take a 61 - 55 lead into halftime . The Kings came out strong in the third and initiated a series of lead changes between the two teams , which ultimately led to them matching each other point - for - point in the quarter , and the Wizards carrying an 85 - 79 lead into the fourth . However , the Kings started the fourth on a 70 run to take a one - point lead just 2:30 into the quarter . After a couple more lead changes , the Kings took a one - point lead with 6:18 remaining , and quickly pushed the lead to five . Although the Wizards got within one point in the final seconds , the Kings were able to stay on top and earn the impressive home win . Nemanja Bjelica led Sacramento with 26 points , 12 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Buddy Hield followed up with 22 points , five rebounds , two assists and a block , while De'Aaron Fox tallied 18 points , nine assists , one rebound and one steal . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , John Wall led the Wizards with 26 points , eight assists , three steals , three blocks and two rebounds , in 36 minutes . Kelly Oubre Jr. followed up with 22 points , nine rebounds , two assists , one block and a steal , while Bradley Beal tallied 21 points , five rebounds and two steals , in 39 minutes . The Wizards shot 47 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 41 from long range . The Wizards ( 1 - 4 ) will look to bounce back as they head to L.A. to take on the Clippers on Sunday . The Kings ( 3 - 3 ) visit Miami to take on the Heat on Monday .
The Sacramento Kings took down the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 117 - 113 , at Golden 1 Center on Monday . For much of the fourth quarter , it seemed as though Sacramento ( 9 - 8 ) had the game locked up . That changed in the final minute , though , when a last - ditch Thunder ( 10 - 6 ) run closed the gap to just one possession . After leading 113 - 104 with 37 seconds remaining , a 70 run brought OKC to within two points with just five seconds remaining . Paul George capped off the run with a heavily - contested three - pointer , but it proved to be too little too late . Sacramento was able to hit its free - throws to close out the game on the final possession . Sophomore guard De'Aaron Fox scored only six points , but made up for it with a game - high 13 assists . The bulk of Sacramento 's scoring came from Buddy Hield , who poured in 25 points , and Iman Shumpert , who had a season - high 23 in the win . Rookie big man Marvin Bagley also impressed , scoring 15 points , grabbing 11 rebounds , and blocking three shots . For the Thunder , former MVP Russell Westbrook took the floor despite a lingering ankle injury . The injury did not seem to hold him back , as he led his team with 29 points , 13 rebounds , and seven assists . George , meanwhile , scored 27 points . The team as a whole , though , was relatively inefficient , shooting just 42 percent including 29 percent from three - point range . Both teams will take to the road , with the Thunder visiting Utah on Wednesday and the Kings heading down the road to Oakland to take on Golden State .
The Sacramento Kings blew out the Orlando Magic , 111 - 95 , at Golden Once Center on Monday evening . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Kings ( 20 - 20 ) , who jumped out to a double - digit lead in the second quarter . Only one Sacramento player logged more than 27 minutes , as the benches were emptied early in Monday 's blowout . Interior play was the key for the Kings , as they outscored the Magic ( 17 - 23 ) by a total of 64 - 24 in the paint . Sacramento shot 56 percent on shots inside the arc in the win . The Kings were led by a brilliant performance from sophomore guard De'Aaron Fox , who scored a team - high 20 points in just 23 minutes on the floor . Fox was also a menace on the defensive end , tallying five steals . It was truly a team effort for Sacramento , though , as 11 players scored and six Kings scored in double digits . Orlando , meanwhile , saw 20 points from veteran wing Terrence Ross . Ross went 5 - of - 10 from three - point range while playing just 23 minutes off the bench . Big man Nikola Vucevic also impressed , delivering an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Their best efforts were not enough , however , as the Magic shot just 37 percent from the floor as a team . The Kings will travel to Phoenix on Tuesday , while the Magic visit Utah on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 115 - 108 , at Golden 1 Center on Saturday evening . The Kings got out to a good start at home , as they built a 32 - 26 lead after one quarter . The Sixers managed to tie it up a few times through the second quarter , but the Kings kept a step ahead , before they pulled away to lead 62 - 52 at halftime . The Kings led through the entire third quarter , however , the 76ers chipped away and cut the deficit to seven by the start of the fourth . The 76ers kept the momentum going until they held a one - point lead with 2:34 left in the game , but the Kings outscored the visitors 11 - 3 from there , to earn their second consecutive win . Buddy Hield led the Kings with 34 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . De'Aaron Fox finished with 19 points , eight assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 34 minutes , while Marvin Bagley III came up big off the bench , with 14 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Jimmy Butler led the 76ers with 29 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 38 minutes . Joel Embiid tallied 29 points , 17 rebounds , four blocks , one assist and one steal , while Ben Simmons added 22 points , eight rebounds , four assists and a steal . The Kings ( 27 - 25 ) play host to the Spurs on Monday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Sacramento Kings , 111 - 109 , on Wednesday at Golden 1 Center . Fresh off a night where he shot 12 - of - 16 from the floor and scoring a game - high 30 points in a statement win over the Warriors , Gordon Hayward was the hero yet again Wednesday night . He may have only had 12 points , but after Hayward fouled the Kings ' Buddy Hield on a three - point attempt that led to game - tying free throws , the former All-Star marched down the floor and put up the game - winning fadeaway jumper with just a couple seconds left . Without Kyrie Irving ( thigh ) , Jayson Tatum led the way scoring for the Celtics ( 40 - 26 ) , posting a game - high 24 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Al Horford was close behind with a terrific all - around game , as the big man recorded 21 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists 31 minutes . Irving 's replacement , Terry Rozier , performed admirably as a starter , putting up 16 points and six rebounds in 32 minutes . As for the Kings ( 32 - 32 ) , the battled all fourth quarter but could n't get over the hump despite keeping the game within six and tying it late . Hield came up with some clutch shots down the stretch and finished with 23 points and eight rebounds across 38 minutes , but it was Harrison Barnes who led the way for Sacramento , scoring 24 points on 8 - of - 16 shooing and grabbing eight rebounds of his own . As a team , the Kings put together as efficient an offensive performance you could ask for , shooting 45 percent from three and 50 percent from the field overall , but Boston ended up making just one more play .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 123 - 121 , at Golden 1 Center on Tuesday . It 's extremely rare to see a team blow a 25 - point fourth quarter lead but that was the case here . Brooklyn ended up outscoring Sacramento , 45 - 18 , in the fourth quarter to pull off their comeback victory . Their only lead after the first quarter came with 1 seconds left in the game , as Rondae Hollis-Jefferson hit a game - winning lay - up to break a tied game . The Kings simply could n't shoot in the fourth quarter , as they went 0 - of - 15 on shots outside of three feet . The Nets countered that by going 7 - of - 10 from three - point range in the fourth quarter to cap off their epic comeback . The Nets ( 37 - 36 ) got a career performance from D'Angelo Russell , as he finished with 44 points , four rebounds , 12 assists and four steals . Jarrett Allen amassed 13 points and seven boards . Hollis-Jefferson led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Caris LeVert started and accrued six points , three rebounds and six assists . The Kings ( 34 - 36 ) were led by Marvin Bagley III , as he provided 28 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 12 - of - 15 from the field . De'Aaron Fox led the starters with 27 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Harrison Barnes totaled 17 points and seven rebounds . Nemanja Bjelica generated 14 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . On deck for Sacramento is a home matchup versus the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday . As for Brooklyn , they 're off until Friday when they travel to face the Los Angeles Lakers .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 112 - 103 , at Golden 1 Center on Saturday evening . The Suns got out to a great start on the road as they outscored the Kings , 32 - 19 , in the first quarter . The Kings chipped away through the second quarter but still trailed by six at halftime . The Kings came out strong in the second half and claimed the lead halfway through the third quarter , before pushing ahead to take a 79 - 75 lead into the final frame . The Suns make a quick run to take the lead early in the fourth , but the Kings responded with a 9 - 2 run , and managed to hold the lead the rest of the way . This marks the second straight win for the Kings , and the third straight loss for the Suns . Harrison Barnes and Buddy Hield led the Kings with 25 points each , while Nemanja Bjelica and Marvin Bagley III both came up big with double - doubles . De'Aaron Fox added 13 points , nine assists , four rebounds and a steal , as the Kings shot 42 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 38 from deep . Meanwhile , Devin Booker led the Suns with 32 points , 10 assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 39 minutes . The Kings ( 36 - 36 ) take on the Lakers in L.A. on Sunday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Sacramento Kings , 133 - 129 , at Golden 1 Center on Sunday evening . New_Orleans ( 33 - 48 ) ran a shallow eight - man rotation on Sunday , giving most of its usual starters the night off . The Pelicans ' young core thrived in a featured role , though , with the team 's starting five combining for 106 points . Sacramento ( 39 - 42 ) knocked down 16 three - pointers while putting up a valiant contest . However , the Pelicans ' wildly efficient 52 percent shooting proved too difficult for the Kings to overcome . Ian Clark recorded a team - high 31 points in a game that featured a number of impressive performances . Elfrid Payton stuffed the stat sheet for New_Orleans , recording 24 points , 14 assists , and three blocks in Sunday 's win . Former third overall pick Jahlil Okafor added another double - double with 23 points and 14 rebounds . For Sacramento , Harrison Barnes scored a team - high 29 points . Barnes , who was acquired by the Kings at the trade deadline this season , shot an efficient 10 - of - 19 from the floor en route to the high scoring total . De'Aaron Fox matched Payton 's double - double with one of his own , tallying 24 points , 11 assists , and three steals in 35 minutes on the floor . New_Orleans will host the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday , while the Kings will close out their season with a trip to Portland on Wednesday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 126 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . While the first quarter was competitive , New_York was able to dominate this game thanks to a monster second quarter . In fact , the Knicks rode a 49 - 25 second quarter to victory , as the Hawks never got the game within a single - digit margin for the entirety of the second half . Bench production was the difference for New_York , as they outscored Atlanta 's bench , 56 - 39 . Defense was also critical for the Knicks , as they recorded 12 steals and six blocks while winning the turnover differential , 24 - 15 . The Hawks ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Taurean Prince , as he tallied 21 points , six rebounds and six assists . Trae Young accumulated 14 points , six rebounds and five assists . Kent Bazemore provided 14 points , six boards and two steals . Vince Carter was the only other Hawk in double figures , as he dropped 12 points . The Knicks ( 10 ) got a gem out of Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he led the way with 31 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Enes Kanter totaled 16 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Trey Burke started at point guard and provided 15 points , three rebounds and four assists . Mario Hezonja , Allonzo Trier , Noah Vonleh and Kevin Knox all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams play road games on Friday for their next outings , with Atlanta facing the Memphis Grizzlies and New_York facing off with the Brooklyn Nets .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the New_York Knicks , 116 - 115 , after two overtime periods at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . Two of the weakest teams in the Eastern Conference ended playing one of the most entertaining , intense games of the 2018 - 19 NBA season thus far , as the Bulls ( 3 - 8 ) and the Knicks ( 3 - 8 ) both entered this game under .500 and playing some sloppy basketball by most standards . But this game ended being extremely intense , to the point that 58 minutes of basketball were needed to find a winner.. and the differential was only one point . In the end , Zach LaVine 's clutch free - throw with less than two seconds on the clock gave the Bulls a huge win on the road . LaVine was the game 's top scorer with 41 points , although he also committed eight turnovers , while Jabari Parker had 15 points with eight rebounds and Wendell Carter Jr. delivered 11 points , 13 boards and two assists . Antonio Blakeney contributed with 17 points in 20 minutes coming off the bench , as he filled the `` absence '' of Justin Holiday , who only scored six points while going 2 - for - 10 from the field in 47 minutes . Allonzo Trier carried the Knicks with a strong 21 - point performance , but Enes Kanter stole the show for the Knicks since he came off the bench and posted a huge double - double of 23 points and 24 rebounds , while also adding seven assists . Emmanuel Mudiay had 16 points and Mario Hezonja added 15 , both off the bench . Two starters , Frank Ntilikina and Mitchell Robinson , failed to score .

The Nets ( 10 - 18 ) got the early jump on their inter - city rivals in the first quarter by taking a 30 - 23 lead , an edge that they 'd expanded to 11 by the half . They ultimately entered the final 12 minutes with a 94 - 77 advantage that was more than enough to withstand the Knicks ' ( 8 - 19 ) best all - around quarter of the game . Brooklyn put on a shooting display , draining 49 percent of their attempts , including 50 percent from three - point range . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New_York Knicks , 119 - 117 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday evening . Charlotte ( 13 - 13 ) brought its record back to .500 with the relatively painless win on Sunday . The Hornets jumped out to a quick lead in the second quarter and brought it to double - digits with a run to start the third . While the Knicks ( 8 - 20 ) chipped away at the lead throughout the fourth quarter , Kemba Walker and the Hornets continued their strong 48 percent shooting night to earn the win . The Hornets overcame a career night for Knicks rookie Kevin Knox , who scored 26 points to go with 15 rebounds . Knox 's standout performance was accompanied by similarly strong play from Frank Ntilikina . Ntilikina had seen multiple DNPs in the last two weeks after his slow start to the season , but on Sunday , he looked ready to go . The sophomore point guard shot 7 - of - 11 from the field en route to 18 points . Still , Charlotte was able to earn the win with ease , thanks , as usual , to a strong night from Kemba Walker . Walker scored 25 points to go with six assists and four steals in the win . It was also a big night for Tony Parker . The former San Antonio Spur delivered a gut - punch to the Knicks off the bench , scoring 16 points in just 16 minutes of action . On Wednesday , Charlotte will host the Detroit Pistons while the Knicks will travel to Cleveland to face the Cavaliers .

In fact , Indiana won all four individual quarters , as a 31 - 22 first quarter really set the tone . Rebounding was also critical , with Indiana outrebounding New_York , 47 - 37 . The Pacers also went a perfect 11 - of - 11 from the free - throw line . The Pacers ( 28 - 14 ) were led by Domantas Sabonis , as he tallied 22 points , 15 rebounds and three assists . Victor Oladipo accrued 19 points , four rebounds six assists . Thaddeus Young finished with 13 points , six rebounds , three assists and four steals . The Mavs got out to a good start on the road , as they held a four - point advantage after one quarter of action . The Mavs were able to cruise from there and hang on for just their fifth road win of the season . This marks the 11th straight loss for the Knicks . The Raptors ( 53 - 23 ) came into Thursday 's game looking to avoid a trap against the hapless Knicks ( 14 - 61 ) . Toronto made sure that would n't be the case with a strong start , jumping out to a 55 - 36 halftime lead . The visitors would n't take their foot off of the gas in the second half , either , as they `` won '' the final two quarters as well by a 62 - 56 margin . As the final score implied , New_York faltered in all aspects , as they shot just 36 percent and committed 16 turnovers .
