The Detroit Pistons defeated the host New_York Knicks 115 - 89 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday evening . The Pistons got down to business right away in an important game for them , as they needed to win in order to ensure a playoff spot . Despite the importance of the game , Blake Griffin ( knee ) was forced to remain sidelined . Nonetheless , the Pistons outscored the Knicks 36 - 22 in the first quarter , and added another 10 points to their lead by halftime . They carried on in the third , to build a 33 - point lead heading into the fourth and cruise to a win and guarantee themselves a playoff spot . Luke Kennard led the Pistons with 27 points , five rebounds and two assists , in 24 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond finished with 20 points , 18 rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 27 minutes , while Reggie Jackson added 21 points , seven assist and four rebounds . The Pistons shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from deep . John Jenkins led the Knicks with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . Kadeem Allen tallied 13 points , eight assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block , while Henry Ellenson added 12 points , four rebounds and two blocks . The Knicks shot 40 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 30 from long range . The Pistons are set to face the Bucks in the first round of the playoffs .
The visiting San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 143 - 142 , at Staples Center in overtime on Monday evening . San_Antonio ( 2 - 1 ) seemingly put the nail in the coffin with just under 90 seconds remaining in regulation , as a put - back basket from LaMarcus Aldridge gave the Spurs an eight - point lead . The Lakers ( 0 - 3 ) , though , did what seemed impossible and launched an 80 run in the final 88 seconds of game time to force overtime . The run was capped by a deep , game - tying three - pointer from superstar forward LeBron James . Despite the momentum shift at the end of regulation , overtime saw plenty of back - and - forth . James had a chance to help LA seal at least a second overtime at the free - throw line , but missed both shots with 11 seconds remaining in OT . The Spurs ultimately gained the lead on a Patty Mills jumper in the final seconds of overtime . In addition to his clutch put - back , Aldridge scored a game - high 37 points in the tense win . He added 10 rebounds and five assists . His fellow All-Star , the newly - acquired DeMar DeRozan , scored 32 points and dished out a whopping 14 assists to lead the team . Rudy Gay contributed another 16 points . LA , meanwhile , was without starters Brandon Ingram and Rajon Rondo , who are currently serving suspensions for their involvement in an altercation in Saturday 's game against Houston . In their absence , James picked up the slack , scoring 32 points , grabbing eight rebounds , and matching DeRozan 's game high of 14 assists . Sophomore forward Kyle Kuzma added a whopping 37 points in the loss . The loss extended the Lakers ' losing streak to three games . The new - look team is still in search of its first win of the 2018 - 19 season . On Wednesday , San_Antonio will host the Indiana Pacers while the Lakers will travel to Phoenix to face the Suns .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 104 , at Staples Center on Sunday afternoon . The Lakers ( 11 - 8 ) and the Magic ( 10 - 10 ) played a very intense game and while Orlando seemed ready to cruise their way in the final minutes , Los_Angeles mounted a furious comeback in the final 12 minutes that saw them tie the game into the final 60 seconds of the contest . But the Magic executed better down the stretch , and that was enough to get them a huge win playing on the road as they moved back to .500 . The score for each quarter read : 19 - 29 , 32 - 23 , 35 - 19 , and 22 - 33 . The Lakers came quite close to turn things around following a dismal third quarter , but they fell short and were forced to settle with a huge home loss . Nikola Vucevic was the best player for the Magic in this one since he finished with 31 points , 15 rebounds , seven assists , three blocks and two steals , making a huge impact on both ends of the court . Aaron Gordon added 17 points with four boards , and D.J. Augustin delivered 12 points , nine assists and five rebounds . Terrence Ross ( 16 points , six rebounds ) and Jonathon Simmons ( 10 points ) had solid outings off the bench as well . LeBron James filled the stat sheet nicely for the Lakers since he finished the game with 24 points , seven assists and four boards , but also committed six turnovers . Kyle Kuzma had 21 points with five assists and four rebounds , and Brandon Ingram chipped in with 17 points and six rebounds . JaVale McGee had 12 points , seven rebounds , and seven blocks .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 113 - 100 , at Staples Center on Wednesday evening . It was LA 's eighth straight game without LeBron James ( groin ) , but the team fared well without its star on Wednesday . The Lakers ( 23 - 19 ) jumped out to a double - digit lead in the second quarter and never looked back . The team went on a quick 90 run near the end of the first half , fueled by five straight points from point guard Lonzo Ball . The Pistons ( 17 - 22 ) , meanwhile , continued to struggle with efficiency , shooting just 44 percent overall and 31 from three - point range . The story of the night was LA 's Kyle Kuzma , who tallied a career - high 41 points in just 29 minutes of play . Kuzma was remarkably efficient , shooting 16 - of - 24 from the field and knocking down five three - pointers . The second - year forward was one of six double - digit scorers for the Lakers . Lonzo Ball , meanwhile , led the team with 11 assists . Detroit , meanwhile , struggled to produce any offense in the blowout loss . All-Star big man Blake Griffin scored just 16 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , while star center Andre Drummond added only six points . In total , Detroit 's starting five scored only 58 points and accounted for eight of the team 's nine turnovers . The Pistons will visit Sacramento on Thursday , while the Lakers will take on Utah on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the visiting Chicago Bulls , 107 - 100 , at Staples Center on Tuesday . The Lakers ( 24 - 21 ) continue to press on without LeBron James ( groin ) in the lineup . The team had dropped six of its previous nine games , but on Tuesday , they earned a comfortable win over Chicago ( 10 - 34 ) . Despite recent struggles , sophomore point guard Lonzo Ball led the team with 19 points and also grabbed eight rebounds . Chicago , meanwhile , saw its offensive struggles continue , shooting just 40 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The Bulls entered Tuesday 's matchup ranked last in the league in scoring at 101 points per game . In addition to Ball 's strong showing , the Lakers enjoyed stellar play from forwards Brandon Ingram and Kyle Kuzma . Ingram scored 16 points and dished seven assists , while Kuzma added an additional 16 points to go with 11 rebounds . Chicago , meanwhile , saw six different players score in double digits . Unfortunately for the Bulls , no player contributed more than 18 points in the loss . Forward Jabari Parker , whose play had seen him benched in recent games , led the way with 18 points in just 16 minutes on the court in the loss . On Thursday , the Bulls will visit Denver while the Lakers will travel to Oklahoma City .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 125 - 119 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Lakers ( 30 - 31 ) fought hard late in the game to avoid dropping three in a row , including another against New_Orleans ( 27 - 36 ) . After the Pelicans cut the deficit to only one point in the final minute , Brandon Ingram put the Lakers back up three by knocking down a contested floater . From there , it was the LeBron James show , as the four - time MVP sealed the win with a turnaround three - pointer to give the Lakers a six - point advantage with just over 30 seconds remaining . The win comes as revenge after the Pelicans trounced the Lakers this past Saturday . James led the Lakers with 33 points and 10 assists . Veteran Rajon Rondo notched another double - double , scoring 11 points while dishing out a team - high 16 assists . Ingram also impressed with his play , scoring 23 points to continue his hot stretch since the All-Star break . New_Orleans ' Julius Randle , a former Laker , led all scorers with 35 points . Jrue Holiday finished the night with 19 points and 10 assists , while Elfrid Payton pitched in another 10 rebounds and nine assists . Anthony Davis , still on a minutes restriction following his highly - publicized trade request , had 22 points and eight rebounds in 21 minutes on the floor . Los_Angeles will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Pelicans will visit Denver on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Sacramento Kings , 111 - 106 , at Staples Center on Sunday evening . LeBron James recorded his 81st career triple - double to help the Lakers ( 32 - 41 ) earn a narrow win over Sacramento ( 36 - 37 ) . The Kings jumped out to a quick lead in the second quarter , but the Lakers responded with a 39 - point third quarter after the halftime break . Sacramento was able to make it a close game after Bogdan Bogdanovic knocked down a three - pointer to cut the deficit to just two with under 20 second remaining . However , James knocked down a pair of free - throws to make it a two - possession game , giving the Lakers the cushion they needed to close out the win . James finished with 29 points , 11 rebounds , and 11 assists . Kyle Kuzma delivered another 29 points while knocking down five three - pointers . The win comes on the heels of a 1 - 9 stretch for the Lakers , who currently occupy 11th place in the Western Conference . For the Kings , Marvin Bagley III scored 25 points and grabbed 11 rebounds off the bench . Five of Bagley 's boards came on the offensive end in what proved to be a nice night for the rookie . Bogdanovic contributed another 17 , but the Kings shot a dismal 38 percent from the floor as a team in the loss . Both teams will suit up again on Tuesday , with the Kings visiting Dallas and the Lakers hosting the Washington Wizards .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Orlando Magic , 120 - 88 , at Amway Center on Friday . A 22 - 10 first quarter in advantage of Charlotte really set the tone in this game , as they held their lead for the final three quarters while winning each individual quarter . In fact , the Hornets held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Defense was the difference for Charlotte , holding Orlando to just 38 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was a huge factor as well , with Charlotte connecting on 17 - of - 20 and Orlando hitting just 10 - of - 14 from the charity stripe . The Hornets also dominated from long range , hitting 17 - of - 38 while the Magic connected on just 6 - of - 31 from three - point range . The Hornets ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 26 points , two rebounds and five assists . Nicolas Batum accumulated 15 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Miles Bridges led the bench with 15 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist also played well off the bench , providing 12 points , nine rebounds , five assists and two blocks . The Magic ( 1 - 1 ) had no player score more than 14 points , as Nikola Vucevic led their starters with 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists and four blocks . Evan Fournier totaled 12 points and two boards while Aaron Gordon collected five points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Terrence Ross led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 14 points . Both teams play road games on Saturday for their next outings , with Orlando facing the Philadelphia 76ers and Charlotte playing the Miami Heat .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Orlando Magic , 107 - 99 , at Amway Center on Tuesday evening . The Kings ( 4 - 3 ) came into the contest relishing in their newfound reputation as one of the fastest - paced and most offensively proficient teams in the NBA . However , they were also on the second game of a back - to - back swing through the Sunshine State after a big win in Miami on Monday , so it remained to be seen how they 'd respond . The Magic ( 2 - 5 ) appeared to catch the visitors a bit flat early , jumping out to a 31 - 26 first - quarter lead . However , Sacramento turned it on from that point , flashing the impressive offense that 's defined the early portion of their season by outscoring their hosts , 59 - 41 , over the second and third periods . That left them in the driver 's seat heading into the final 12 minutes , which eventually resulted in their second straight road victory . The Kings enjoyed a particularly expansive advantage in the shooting front , as they drained 49 percent of their attempts while limiting the Magic to a 40 percent success rate . Buddy Hield led the way for Sacramento with a 25 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Nemanja Bjelica supplied 21 points , eight rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Willie Cauley-Stein generated a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double of his own , while De'Aaron Fox matched the big man 's scoring total and added five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Troy Williams ( 12 points , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks ) and Marvin Bagley III ( 10 points , nine rebounds , two rebounds , one steal , one block ) were very productive off the bench . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 18 points , and he added 10 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Terrence Ross came off the bench to pour in 17 points . Nikola Vucevic contributed 15 points and a game - high 15 rebounds . He also dished out five assists . Jonathon Simmons supplied 12 points , five assists and three rebounds . Jonathan Isaac and Evan Fournier pitched in nine points apiece . The Kings remain on the road and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday night , while the Magic remain home and tangle with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 111 - 106 , at Amway Center on Wednesday night . The 76ers ( 9 - 7 ) featured Jimmy Butler for the first time since acquiring him from the Minnesota Timberwolves , but that was n't enough to secure the win on the road as the Magic ( 7 - 8 ) used a huge comeback to secure the win following their Monday loss against the Washington Wizards . But in reality , this game shifted leads time and time against . Philadelphia jumped to a 30 - 27 lead in the first quarter , but Orlando came back and finished the first half up by one ( 53 - 52 ) . Philly recovered control of the game with a 35 - 23 third quarter , but the Magic flipped the script in the fourth quarter and with a 35 - 19 lead in the final 12 minutes ( including a 210 scoring run ) and secured a huge win against one of the top contenders in the Eastern Conference . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with an impressive performance of 30 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Aaron Gordon had 17 points , six rebounds and six assists , while Wesley Iwundu contributed 11 points and two steals . Two bench players made a big impact , as Jonathon Simmons had 12 points and Terrence Ross added 15 , including a decisive three - pointer with less than 10 seconds on the clock . J.J. Redick was the top scorer for the 76ers with 22 points , but he also added six assists and four rebounds . Joel Embiid had a triple - double since he contributed with 19 points , 13 rebounds and 10 assists . Wilson Chandler had 14 points , and debutant Jimmy Butler chipped in with 14 points in 33 minutes . Ben Simmons only had nine points , six assists and three rebounds .
The Orlando Magic defeated the New_York Knicks , 131 - 117 , at Amway Center on Sunday evening . The Magic ( 9 - 8 ) have shown a penchant for some prolific tallies on the scoreboard this season , and Sunday shaped up as a possible scenario for another big offensive night . That much was confirmed from the opening tip , as Orlando racked up 44 first - quarter points and held a 67 - 66 halftime lead on the Knicks ( 4 - 13 ) . They tightened up their defense in the second half , limiting New_York to under 30 points in each of the final two periods while compiling another 64 to secure the victory . As their final point total implies , the home squad enjoyed a sharp shooting night , draining 57 percent of their attempts . The bench played a pivotal role for the Knicks , but it was Tim Hardaway , Jr. who led the way with 32 points . He added two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Trey Burke followed with 31 points in 29 minutes on the second unit . Enes Kanter provided a 21 - point , 19 - rebound double - double while playing 38 minutes off the bench . Emmanuel Mudiay was the only other double - digit scorer with 12 points . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 31 points , a total he supplemented with two assists , one rebound and one steal . Nikola Vucevic had a near triple - double with 28 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Evan Fournier totaled 19 points , six assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Jonathan Isaac delivered 16 points , four boards , three assists , two steals and one block . D.J. Augustin generated 12 points , seven assists and three rebounds . Terrance Ross poured in 10 points off the bench . The Knicks return home to take on the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday night , while the Magic remains home and tangles with the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 112 - 90 , at Amway Center on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 15 - 10 ) jumped out to a 57 - 45 halftime lead , and that proved to be enough cushion to for a comfortable win . Indiana prevailed in every quarter and won both the shooting and turnover battles over the Magic ( 11 - 13 ) by healthy margins . They drained a solid 47 percent of their attempts while limiting Orlando to a 40 percent figure , including 24 percent from three - point range . They also took the ball from their hosts on 14 occasions while only committing nine turnovers themselves . The Pacers ' bench saw some extended run due to the sizable second - half advantage and contributed 49 points . Bojan Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 26 points and added three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Cory Joseph followed with a bench - leading 15 points . Thaddeus Young supplied 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Kyle O'Quinn generated a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks over 27 minutes off the bench . Tyreke Evans poured in 11 points , while Myles Turner registered 10 points , six rebounds and one block . Nikola Vucevic paced the Magic with a 22 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Aaron Gordon posted a 20 - point , 14 - rebound double - double and added four assists , one steal and one block . Terrence Ross mustered 11 points to lead the second unit . Evan Fournier finished with nine points . The Pacers head back home and face the Sacramento Kings on Saturday evening , while the Magic pay a visit to the Dallas Mavericks on Monday night .
The San Ajntonio Spurs defeated the Orlando Magic , 129 - 90 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 17 - 15 ) came into the contest running hot , having claimed wins in five of their prior six times on the court . San_Antonio 's chances of extending that streak exponentially grew when it was revealed that star big man Nikola Vucevic would miss the game for the Magic ( 14 - 16 ) due to personal reasons . San_Antonio set the tone by forging a 66 - 44 halftime lead that essentially sealed the win for them in just two quarters . However , they put the final nail in the coffin in the third quarter by compiling 38 points , a prolific amount they accomplished with excellent shooting up and down the roster . The Spurs finished with a 64 percent success rate from the floor , including 63 percent from three - point range . They were just as effective on the other end by limiting Orlando to a meager 38 percent figure . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the Spurs with 20 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Marco Belinelli poured in 18 points to lead the bench . DeMar DeRozan and Bryn Forbes contributed matching 17 - point tallies . DeRozan added seven rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Forbes posted four boards . Rudy Gay supplied 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and one block . D.J. Augustin led the Magic with 17 points and added two assists and one steal . Aaron Gordon contributed 12 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Evan Fournier matched Gordon 's scoring total and also collected two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jonathan Isaac delivered 10 points , five rebounds and one assist . Mo Bamba drew the start for Vucevic and contributed seven points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . The Spurs head back home and take on the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday night , while the Magic pay a visit to the Chicago Bulls on Friday evening as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 105 - 103 , at Amway Center on Saturday . While Boston led by 10 points at the half , Orlando prevailed with a much - needed victory . In fact , they outscored the Celtics , 64 - 52 , in the second half , as they held the lead for the final six minutes of action . It was relatively close throughout though , as neither club led by more than 12 points . Orlando 's defense was key , as they held Boston to 42 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The Magic also went 22 - of - 24 from the free - throw line while the Celtics hit just 19 - of - 28 . The Celtics ( 25 - 17 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he tallied 25 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals . Marcus Morris amassed 17 points and eight boards . Jayson Tatum totaled 16 points and six boards while Al Horford accumulated 10 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three steals . Jaylen Brown led the bench with 13 points and four boards . The Magic ( 18 - 24 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , as he collected 29 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . Nikola Vucevic finished with 16 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Evan Fournier got out of his slump by generating 18 points , three rebounds and five assists . Terrence Ross was huge off the bench , providing 25 points , four rebounds and two assists . On deck for Orlando is a home matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Sunday . As for Boston , they return to action on Monday when they face the Brooklyn Nets on the road .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Orlando Magic , 118 - 108 , at Amway Center on Saturday evening . The Bucks got out to a great start on the road with a 33 - 24 lead after one quarter . They kept the upper hand through the second , where they outscored the Magic by four , to push their lead to 59 - 46 by halftime . The Magic came alive in the third quarter and managed to cut the deficit to five points , heading into the fourth . However , the Bucks managed to keep the upper hand and hung on for their fourth straight win . Eric Bledsoe led the Bucks with 30 points on 12 - of - 14 shooting , seven rebounds and two assists , in 30 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo followed up with 25 points , 13 rebounds , five assists and two steals , while Malcolm Brogdon tallied 18 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Bucks shot 55 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 27 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks , in 29 minutes . Terrence Ross followed up with 16 points , two assists , two steals and one rebound , in 29 minutes off the bench , while D.J. Augustin tallied 14 points , seven assists and two rebounds . The Magic shot 47 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 32 from long range . The Magic ( 19 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Monday . The Bucks ( 33 - 12 ) play host to the Mavericks on Monday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 106 , at Amway Center on Friday . While the five - point final margin makes this game look close , Orlando led throughout . In fact , the Magic led by 10 points after the first quarter , by 15 at the half and by 19 heading into the fourth quarter . Dallas responded with a 33 - 19 fourth quarter but they were simply too far behind at that point to come back . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Magic connecting on 14 - of - 29 and the Mavericks hitting just 10 - of - 34 . Rim protection was also key , with Orlando doubling up Dallas in blocks , 6 - 3 . The Mavericks ( 27 - 38 ) were led by Luka Doncic , as he provided 24 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Jalen Brunson finished with 19 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Dwight Powell amassed 13 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals while Dirk Nowitzki led the bench with 15 points and five boards . The Magic ( 31 - 36 ) were led by Terrence Ross , as he provided 22 points , three rebounds and two assists off the bench . Nikola Vucevic accrued 20 points , 13 rebounds , six assists , two steals and three blocks . Aaron Gordon finished with 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and three blocks while Jonathan Isaac totaled 14 points and nine boards . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Orlando traveling to face the Memphis Grizzlies and Dallas playing host to James Harden and the Houston Rockets .
The Orlando Magic defeated the New_York Knicks , 114 - 100 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . The Magic ( 39 - 40 ) are on the verge of the playoff bubble and they had their backs against the wall entering this game against a Knicks ( 15 - 63 ) team that keeps both eyes on the Draft Lottery and just want the season to end . The first quarter ended with a 26 - 26 score , but the Magic would pull away in the second quarter and they 'd never look back thanks to a 32 - 19 score . Even though the Knicks kept things close the rest of the way ( 29 - 27 win in the third and 26 - 29 loss in the fourth ) , they just could n't bounce back and ended losing deservedly . Meanwhile , Orlando kept themselves alive for one more day on the playoff race . And that 's all they could ask for at this stage . As it has been the trend during the entire season , Nikola Vucevic once again was Orlando 's best player since he finished with 29 points , 13 rebounds and three assists . Evan Fournier chipped in with 19 points , while Aaron Gordon filled the stat sheet with 19 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Terrence Ross delivered a strong performance off the bench since he scored 23 points while adding four rebounds and five assists in only 24 minutes . Only four Knicks scored in double digits although all of them were part of the starting lineup . Mario Hezonja led the way with 29 points , nine rebounds and five assists , while Kevin Knox chipped in with 21 points and four boards . Mitchell Robinson contributed 12 points , nine rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Emmanuel Mudiay had 13 points with 10 assists .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 112 - 109 , at American Airlines Center on Saturday evening . The Mavericks got out to a solid start at home , with an early 12 - 6 lead , which they were able to evolve into a 26 - 22 lead after one quarter . The Warriors made a push to start the second and took the lead within the first four minutes . However , the Mavericks hung around and trailed by just two , 59 - 57 , at halftime . The Warriors pulled ahead by six early in the third , but the Mavericks quickly closed the gap to just two again . Nonetheless , the Warriors kept pressing and took an 86 - 82 lead into the final frame . The Mavericks simply would not back down , as they stayed within reach through the fourth quarter , before they overtook the Warriors thanks to solid defense and some clutch play in the final minutes . This marks the fourth straight win for the Mavericks , and the fourth loss in the last six games for Golden_State . Luka Doncic led the way for Dallas , with 24 points , nine rebounds and four assists , including a couple super clutch plays down the stretch . Harrison Barns had a solid outing , with 23 points , eight rebounds and one assist , in 36 minutes , while DeAndre Jordan tallied 13 points , 10 rebounds , one steal and one block . The Mavericks shot 46 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , the Warriors were without Stephen Curry ( groin ) and Draymond Green ( toe ) . Kevin Durant led the way with 32 points , four rebounds , three assists and one block , in 36 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 22 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Warriors shot 45 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from deep . The Warriors ( 12 - 5 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Spurs in San Antonio on Sunday . The Mavericks ( 7 - 8 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Monday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 101 - 76 , at American Airlines Center on Monday . Dallas won this game in wire - to - wire fashion , as it was n't close in the second half . In fact , the Mavericks won all four individual quarters , as they led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Dallas ' defense was the difference , as they held Orlando to 36 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . Getting to the free - throw line was huge as well , with the Mavericks connecting on 21 - of - 25 while the Magic hit just 4 - of - 5 . Ball movement was also critical , with Dallas out - assisting Orlando , 28 - 18 . The Mavericks did a ton of damage down low too , outscoring the Magic in the paint , 44 - 30 . The Magic ( 12 - 15 ) had just two players reach double figures in scoring , as Jonathon Simmons led the team with 18 points and three rebounds . Aaron Gordon totaled 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . Nikola Vucevic finished with eight points , 16 rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Mavericks ( 14 - 11 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he accrued 19 points and five boards . Jalen Brunson started once again and provided 17 points , three rebounds and four assists . Wesley Matthews totaled 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . Luka Doncic fell just shy of a triple - double , as he accumulated seven points , 11 rebounds and nine assists . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday . As for Orlando , they play host to the Chicago Bulls on Thursday for their next fixture .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 99 - 93 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday evening . The Mavericks got out to a good start at home , with a 27 - 20 lead after one quarter . The Hornets battled through the second , but the Mavs managed to stay one step ahead , as the hosts took an eight - point lead into halftime . The Hornets pulled ahead early in the third , but the Mavericks rallied back to take a 74 - 71 lead by the start of the fourth . The Mavs held strong through the fourth , as they kept the lead for the entire quarter , en route to their second straight win . Dorian Finney-Smith added 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Dwight Powell tallied 10 points , 12 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , off the bench . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 107 - 105 , at Barclay 's Center on Friday . Nine ties and 13 lead changes show just how close this game was , as this crosstown rivalry was n't decided until the final shot . Caris LeVert played the hero , as he hit the game - winning lay - up with one second left to break a tied game . Rebounding was the difference in the game for Brooklyn , as they won that battle , 55 - 36 . Ball movement was also critical , with the Nets handing out 22 assists and New_York recording just 14 dimes . Brooklyn was lucky to win looking at the turnover differential though , as they recorded 22 turnovers while the Knicks turned the ball over only three times . The Nets ended up hitting 49 percent of their shots while the Knicks connected on just 41 percent from the field . The Knicks ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Enes Kanter , as he amassed 29 points and 10 boards on 12 - of - 19 shooting . Tim Hardaway Jr. matched those 29 points , adding two rebounds and three steals to his line . No other starter reached double figures in scoring . as Kevin Knox led the bench with 17 points and six boards . The Nets ( 1 - 1 ) got a fantastic performance out of Caris LeVert , as he collected 28 points , six rebounds and five assists on 8 - of - 13 shooting . D'Angelo Russell totaled 15 points , five rebounds and six assists . Jarrett Allen generated 15 points , 11 rebounds and four blocks . Spencer Dinwiddie was their best bench player , providing 10 points , three rebounds and six assists . Both teams play again on Saturday , with Brooklyn facing the Indiana Pacers on the road and New_York playing host to the Boston Celtics .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 114 , at Barclays Center on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 6 - 1 ) looked in absolute control of the game in this contest , the second of their three - game road trip , although things ended being far tighter than expected since the Nets ( 2 - 4 ) mounted a charge in the fourth quarter and came quite close to force an overtime . Golden_State jumped to a 32 - 29 lead in the first quarter , and were pretty consistent the rest of the way since they also won the subsequent two quarters , 31 - 20 and 30 - 28 , so they entered the final 12 minutes of action up by 16 points ( 93 - 77 ) . However , Brooklyn woke up in the fourth and improved drastically , but it was n't enough . The Nets won the final quarter 37 - 27 , but Golden_State held on and secured a tough win on the road . Stephen Curry was the top scorer for the Warriors with 35 points , seven rebounds and three assists , while Kevin Durant contributed with 34 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Klay Thompson chipped in with 18 points , and Draymond Green did an excellent job of filling out the stat sheet since he posted a line of eight points , four rebounds , 13 assists and five steals . Alfonzo McKinnie added with nine points and five boards . D'Angelo Russell was the best player for the Nets since he finished with 25 points , six rebounds and six assists , while Caris LeVert chipped in with 23 points and seven assists . Jarrett Allen had 11 points , three rebounds and four assists . Two players thrived off the bench , as Allen Crabbe finished with 14 points , and Spencer Dinwiddie added 12 of his own .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons in overtime , 120 - 119 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . While Detroit led for the majority of the second half , this game was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , the Nets missed four three - pointers in the final minute of regulation , with all of those attempts to either tie or take the lead . They eventually hit one with 20 seconds left to send the game into overtime , as Detroit scored just five points in the final three minutes of regulation . Spencer Dinwiddie was the one who nailed that three , as he also hit the game - winning three - pointer with 7 seconds left in overtime . Ball movement really decided the game for Brooklyn , as they out - assisted Detroit , 26 - 16 . In addition , the Nets really dominated down low , outscoring the Pistons in the paint , 62 - 38 . The Pistons ( 4 - 3 ) were led by Blake Griffin , as he collected 25 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Andre Drummond totaled 24 points , 23 rebounds and two blocks . Reggie Jackson finished with 21 points , four rebounds and two assists . Stanley Johnson accrued six points , 12 rebounds and two assists . The Nets ( 3 - 5 ) got a spectacular bench performance from Spencer Dinwiddie , as he led the team with 25 points , four rebounds and four assists . Ed Davis also played well off the bench , amassing 10 points and 10 boards . Joe Harris led the starters with 23 points and five boards . Caris LeVert accumulated 19 points , six rebounds and six assists . On deck for Brooklyn is a home matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Friday . As for Detroit , they travel to play the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday for their next outing .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 112 , at Barclays Center on Wednesday . Things were looking bleak for the visiting Thunder ( 16 - 7 ) , as they fell behind in the first half and faced an 18 - point deficit heading into the final quarter . Then , Paul George decided it was time to take over . The All-Star forward scored 24 points in the fourth quarter , including the Thunder 's final seven points and a game - winning three - pointer with 3 seconds left on the clock . In the end , George finished with a game - high 47 points ( 15 - 27 FG , 6 - 13 3Pt ) , 15 rebounds and four assists across 37 minutes . As a team , it was a poor shooting night in all facets of the game , as Oklahoma_City shot 34 percent from three , 43 percent from the field overall and just 58 percent from the free throw line . Fortunately , George came through to save the day over the final eight minutes . The Thunder 's next highest scorer was Russell Westbrook , who did n't score a single point in the fourth quarter but finished with 21 points , 15 rebounds and 17 assists in 40 minutes . As for the Nets ( 8 - 18 ) , they were on cruise control for 36 minutes Wednesday and looked to be well on their way to putting an end to their seven - game losing streak . However , just 19 points in the fourth quarter and failing to score in the final two and half minutes was not enough to get the job done . As a team , Brooklyn shot a fairly impressive 15 - of - 36 ( 42 percent ) from behind the arc , but shot just 43 percent from the field overall . Allen Crabbe led the way with a team - high 22 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting from behind the arc , while Joe Harris added 19 points of his own . Point guards D'Angelo Russell and Spencer Dinwiddie each dropped 17 points but combined for just six assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 144 - 127 , at Barclays Center on Sunday afternoon . The Nets ( 13 - 18 ) entered this game on the heels of a four - game winning streak , and managed to extend that positive run against a Hawks ( 6 - 23 ) squad that looked overmatched from start to finish . Brooklyn jumped to a 19 - point lead after the first quarter ( 42 - 23 ) and they never looked back in this one . Atlanta tried to turn things around and reduced the deficit to six points after a 43 - 30 second quarter . It seemed as if Atlanta were set to continue their push in the second half , but the Nets won the next two quarters ( 39 - 30 and 33 - 31 , respectively ) and secured a comfortable win by a 17 - point margin . Now Brooklyn have won their last five in a row , while Atlanta have now lost seven of their past eight . D'Angelo Russell was the star of the game for the Nets since he finished with 32 points , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals in only 29 minutes of action . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled the stat sheet as well thanks to 18 points , four boards , three assists and two steals , while Jeff Harris added 16 points with six assists . Jarrett Allen and Rodions Kurucs had 11 points , while Jared Dudley ( 16 points ) , DeMarre Carroll ( 15 points ) and Spencer Dinwiddie ( 15 points , five assists ) all reached double - digit scoring off the bench . Jared Collins was the best player for the Hawks since he finished with 29 points and eight rebounds . Trae Young had a double - double with 13 points and 10 assists , while Dewayne Dedmon also had one thanks to his 24 points and 12 rebounds , as well as three assists and one block . Kent Bazemore delivered 20 points and seven assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 103 , at Barclays Center on Sunday evening . The Nets ( 16 - 19 ) came into Sunday 's contest with a couple of built - in advantages , one of which was the fact they were on their home floor . The other was that they were catching the feisty Suns ( 8 - 26 ) less than 24 hours removed from a triple - overtime defeat against the Wizards . However , to its credit , Phoenix came out and stayed close in the first quarter , trailing just 38 - 31 after 12 minutes . By the third quarter , fatigue apparently was settling in , as they scored just 18 points while Brooklyn added 10 more points to what had been a 63 - 56 halftime edge . Deandre Ayton showed he still had plenty of life left in his legs by leading the Suns with a 26 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , three blocks and two steals . Devin Booker followed with 25 points , nine assists and two rebounds . Josh Jackson led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Malik Bridges mustered nine points , four assists , three rebounds , five steals and one block . T.J. Warren had just four points on 2 - for - 11 shooting . Spencer Dinwiddie paced the Nets with 24 points and added seven assists and two rebounds . D'Angelo Russell supplied 18 points , eight assists , six rebounds and two steals . Rodions Kurucs followed with a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Eric Davis posted 15 points , nine boards , three steals and one block . Joe Harris offered 13 points , three boards and two assists . Jarrett Allen just missed a double - double with 11 points , nine boards , two assists and one steal . The Suns remain on the road and visit the Orlando Magic on Wednesday evening , while the Nets remain home to face the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday night as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 135 - 130 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . While Denver made this game competitive late , Brooklyn rode the second and third quarters to victory . In fact , the Nets outscored the Nuggets , 78 - 52 , in the middle quarters . That allowed Brooklyn to lead by 21 points at times in the second half , as they led by at least five points for the final 28 minutes . The Nets bench came up big , as they outscored the Nuggets bench , 53 - 42 . Brooklyn 's offense was unstoppable , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range while recording 36 assists . The Nuggets ( 37 - 17 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , as he tallied 25 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists en route to a triple - double . Jamal Murray returned from an ankle injury to total 19 points , three rebounds and 11 assists . Mason Plumlee finished with 24 points , six rebounds and three blocks while Monte ' Morris led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Nets ( 29 - 27 ) got a spectacular performance from D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 27 points , six rebounds and 11 assists . Joe Harris accrued 17 points , five rebounds and two assists . DeMarre Carroll was huge off the bench , providing 18 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and four steals . Shabazz Napier also amassed 10 points and 11 assists off the bench . On deck for Denver is another tough road game , as they face the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday . As for Brooklyn , they play host to the Chicago Bulls on Friday as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 125 - 116 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . This was a rather dominating road victory for the Wizards despite the final scoreline , as they held the lead for the entirety of the second half . In fact , a 33 - 19 third quarter allowed Washington to lead by at least nine points for the whole of the fourth quarter , as a late run by Brooklyn made it look closer than it actually was . Rebounding was key for Washington , as they outrebounded Brooklyn , 57 - 41 . Ball movement was also huge , with the Wizards out - assisting the Nets , 34 - 20 . The Wizards ( 25 - 36 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 31 points , two rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Trevor Ariza finished with 23 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two steals . Bobby Portis amassed 10 points , 12 rebounds and two steals while Thomas Bryant led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Nets ( 32 - 31 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , as he collected 28 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Jarrett Allen totaled 12 points , six boards and three blocks . Shabazz Napier was the only other Net in double figures , as he provided 22 points off the bench . Caris LeVert had a game to forget , as he went scoreless in 20 minutes and grabbed just two rebounds with no other statistics . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Washington traveling to face the struggling Boston Celtics and Brooklyn playing host to the Charlotte Hornets .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 115 - 105 , at Barclays Center on Wednesday night . The Raptors ( 56 - 23 ) jumped on the Nets ( 39 - 40 ) quickly , opening a 34 - 22 lead through the first 12 minutes despite Brooklyn needing the win to keep itself in postseason contention . The home squad did start to show more urgency in the second quarter and had cut their deficit to seven by halftime . However , it was back to 12 by the time the final period began , and although the Nets got as close as 110 - 105 with 1:24 remaining , Toronto 's 50 run to finish off the contest sealed the win . Pascal Siakam led the way for the Raptors with 28 points , adding 10 rebounds and five assists . Kawhi Leonard furnished 26 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Serge Ibaka turned in a 23 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Kyle Lowry delivered 10 points , five boards and four assists . Marc Gasol filled out the stat sheet with eight points , nine rebounds , six assists and four steals . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 27 points and complemented them with seven rebounds , six assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie totaled 14 points , five assists and four rebounds . Jarrett Allen and DeMarre Carroll generated matching 12 - point tallies while also bringing down nine and five rebounds , respectively . Rodions Kurucks managed 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . The Raptors remain on the road and take on the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night , while the Nets pay a visit to the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday afternoon .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 109 - 98 , at Pepsi Center on Friday evening . The Nuggets got out to a solid start at home as they outscored the visitors , 39 - 32 , through the first quarter . The game tightened up in the second , but the Nuggets were able to keep the edge , as they took a 60 - 52 lead into halftime . The Thunder came out strong in the third and made it a one - point game halfway through the quarter , but the Nuggets bounced back to reclaim a six - point lead by the end of the quarter . The Nuggets pushed their lead to 11 in the fourth , but the Thunder cut it back down to three with 3:20 remaining . However , the Nuggets closed the contest on a 10 - 2 run , to secure their second straight win , and hand the Thunder their second straight loss . Nikola Jokic had a monster night for the Nuggets , with 24 points , 15 rebounds , nine assists and three steals , in 35 minutes . Jamal Murray followed up with 19 points , nine assists and one rebound , while Juancho Hernangomez added 16 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 33 minutes . The Nuggets shot 50 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Paul George was the high - point man for the Thunder , with 32 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 39 minutes . Russell Westbrook tallied 13 points , 14 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , while Steven Adams finished with 26 points , 14 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . The Thunder ( 17 - 10 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Saturday . The Nuggets ( 19 - 9 ) play host to the Raptors on Sunday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 119 - 110 , at Pepsi Center on Friday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start on the road , as they owned a 29 - 22 lead after one quarter . However , the Nuggets awoke in the second , where they outscored the visitors by 13 , to take six - point lead into halftime . The Trail_Blazers kept pushing and chipped away through the third quarter , to reclaim three - point lead heading into the final frame . Fittingly , the fourth quarter featured another swing , as the Nuggets immediately took the lead back and stayed in front the rest of the way for their second straight win . Paul Millsap led the Nuggets with 25 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a steal , in 30 minutes . Nikola Jokic tallied 22 points , 13 rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block , while Jamal Murray added 23 points , six assists , four rebounds and a steal . The Nuggets shot 51 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from deep . Enes Kanter led the Trail_Blazers with 24 points , seven rebounds and four assists , in 38 minutes . Al-Farouq Aminu finished with 12 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block , while Rodney Hood chipped in 17 points , three steals , two rebounds and an assist . The Blazers shot 49 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range . The Nuggets ( 53 - 26 ) and Trail_Blazers ( 50 - 29 ) will got at it again on Sunday in Portland .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 99 - 91 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Friday . While Miami got out to an eight - point lead after the first quarter , Indiana dominated from there . The second quarter was key , with the Pacers outscoring the Heat , 32 - 16 . Indiana held the lead for the entirety of the second half , as there were only three ties and two lead changes in total . The shooting disparity was also critical , with Indiana connecting on 44 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range while holding Miami to just 38 percent from the field and 39 percent from long range . The Heat ( 6 - 9 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 16 from the field . Hassan Whiteside finished with 12 points , 17 rebounds and two blocks . Rodney McGruder totaled 11 points and five rebounds while Tyler Johnson led the bench with 10 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Pacers ( 9 - 6 ) were led by Tyreke Evans , as he scored a season - high 23 points to lead the bench . He also provided 10 rebounds and went 5 - of - 7 from three - point range . Bojan Bogdanovic led the starters with 16 points and six boards . Myles Turner accrued 12 points , seven rebounds , four assists and three blocks . On deck for Indiana is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday . As for Miami , they 're off until Sunday when they play host to the Los Angeles Lakers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Washington Wizards , 105 - 89 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday evening . The Pacers ( 22 - 12 ) came into the contest with a well - earned reputation for suffocating defense , and they 'd use it frequently in their dominating win . The third quarter made all the difference , as Indiana outscored the Wizards ( 13 - 21 ) by a 31 - 18 margin during the period . Washington was clearly dealing with some fatigue in the second half , which was reflected in their 37 percent success rate from the field and 22 turnovers . They were also significantly out - hustled on the boards , losing the rebounding battle by a 57 - 37 margin . Markieff Morris paced the Wizards with 16 points and added six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Thomas Bryant produced 11 points and seven rebounds . Jeff Green tallied 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . Chasson Randle contributed 10 points off the bench . Bradley Beal ( seven points , five assists , four rebounds , one steal ) and John Wall ( seven points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal ) had underwhelming performances . Myles Turner led the Pacers with an 18 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two blocks and one steal . Domantas Sabonis followed with 15 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic finished with 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Darren Collison and Victor Oladipo generated matching 12 - point tallies , with Oladipo also dishing out nine assists . Aaron Holiday poured in 12 points off the bench as well . The Wizards are back in action at home on Wednesday night against the Pistons , while the Pacers visit the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 116 - 92 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Pacers ( 36 - 19 ) and the Clippers ( 30 - 26 ) were expected to be involved in a tight contest , but Indiana did n't have problems to dominate the game entirely and cruise to a huge win over Los_Angeles . The Pacers quickly jumped to a five - point lead in the first quarter ( 36 - 31 ) , but they ran away with the game in the second quarter where they opened up the gap to 18 points following a 35 - 22 run . Adding insult to the injury , the Clippers won the third quarter 27 - 20 and the game was essentially over from there . The Clippers won the final quarter 19 - 18 , but they could n't mount any sort of a comeback and Indiana cruised their way to a solid win . Bojan Bogdanovic was the top scorer for the Pacers since he finished with 29 points and seven rebounds . Myles Turner added 17 points with four blocks , and Darren Collison contributed 14 points and five assists . Thaddeus Young filled the stat sheet nicely since he ended the contest with 14 points , five rebounds , five steals and four assists . Cory Joseph chipped in with 13 points , nine boards and six assists off the bench . Montrezl Harrell was the top scorer for the Clippers since he contributed 19 points and four assists , but he also committed six turnovers . Danilo Gallinari had 12 points and also added five rebounds . No other Clipper in the starting lineup topped the 10 - point mark , but two bench players did it since both Lou Williams and Johnathan Motley had 10 points each .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 111 - 102 , at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 46 - 32 ) entered this game losing seven of their last eight matchups and things did n't start on a positive note for them since the Pistons ( 39 - 38 ) quickly jumped to a 10 - point lead following the first 12 minutes of action ( 33 - 23 ) . However , Indiana would n't stop fighting and recovered the lead by half - time thanks to a 36 - 22 second quarter that saw them jump on top by four points at the break . Detroit tried to turn things around in the second half , but the Pacers kept extending their lead and they 'd never look back : scores of 28 - 25 and 24 - 22 , respectively , allowed the Pacers to secure a huge nine - point win in front of their own crowd . Seven Indiana players scored in double digits and Thaddeus Young paved the way with 19 points , nine rebounds and five assists , while Bojan Bogdanovic filled the stat sheet thanks to 19 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three blocks . Myles Turner had 17 points with six boards , while Tyreke Evans added 13 . Andre Drummond had a strong outing as well and finished with 18 points , 17 rebounds , five assists , and four steals . Thon Maker had 14 points with four blocks .

Getting to the free - throw line was also huge , with the Nets hitting 17 - of - 22 and the Pacers hitting just 4 - of - 7 . The Pelicans turned it up a notch in the third and pushed their lead to 20 , 110 - 90 , heading into the fourth . They were able to cruise to the finish from there , earning their second straight win . Nicola Mirotic led New_Orleans with 36 points , nine rebounds and two assists , in 31 minutes . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 140 - 126 , at Smoothie King Center on Monday . It was all Spurs ( 8 - 8 ) in the early going on Monday 's contest , as the visitors managed to open up a nine - point lead after the first quarter . But from there , San_Antonio was unable to keep pace with the high - powered Pelicans ( 10 - 7 ) offense , as it was all New_Orleans for the final three periods . Anthony Davis led the way in the 140 - point effort , scoring a game - high 29 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting to go along with nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks in 32 minutes . The Pelican 's starting backcourt was n't too far behind , with E'Twaun Moore scoring a very efficient 24 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , while Jrue Holiday added 21 points and nine assists of his own . Julius Randle , however , might have had the key performance off the bench , notching a triple - double of 21 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists in just 25 minutes . In the end , New_Orleans hot shooting was simply too much for the Spurs to handle , as the home team shot a scorching 58 percent from the field Monday night . As for San_Antonio , its offensive performance was nothing to scoff at , as the Spurs shot 50 percent from three and 48 percent from the field overall . The team just did n't put together a strong enough defensive performance to keep the game close . DeMar DeRozan led the way with 21 points , while Bryn Forbes was close behind with 20 points on an efficient 7 - of - 8 shooting . Dante Cunningham was perfect from the field ( 7 - 7 FG , 5 - 5 3Pt ) on his way to a surprising 19 points , while Rudy Gay added 17 of his own . What really killed the Spurs on Monday was their inability to take care of the basketball , committing an uncharacteristic 15 turnovers .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Houston Rockets , 125 - 104 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . Fresh off a blowout loss to the Celtics , the Pelicans ( 11 - 11 ) bounced back in impressive fashion Wednesday to get back to .500 . Jrue Holiday got back to his scoring ways after starting at shooting guard , pouring in a game - high 29 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting to go along with seven rebounds and five assists , while Anthony Davis was close behind with 28 points and 15 rebounds in 34 minutes . Tim Frazier , who got the start at point guard as a result of a lineup switch from head coach Alvin Gentry , was very impressive as the team 's floor leader , posting 12 points and 12 assists in 37 minutes . Where the Pelicans really managed to separate themselves was on the glass , as they out - rebounded Washington 64 - 38 Wednesday night . As for those Wizards ( 8 - 13 ) , it was a bit of a letdown for them after a very impressive comeback overtime win against the Rockets on Monday . They shot just 43 percent from the field as a team and could n't take advantage of their limited trips to the free throw line , going just 9 - of - 16 from the charity stripe . The superstar backcourt of John Wall and Bradley Beal combined to go just 2 - of - 11 from behind the arc , as neither could get anything going offensively . Wall would finish with 17 points , while Beal posted just 16 . Kelly Oubre and Markieff Morris would lead the way for Washington , each scoring 22 points and going a combined 8 - of - 17 from three - point range .

While there were four ties and nine lead changes in the opening quarter , New_Orleans actually held the lead for the final three quarters . In fact , the Pelicans held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they led by 16 heading into the fourth . Bench production was the difference in the game , with New_Orleans outscoring Los_Angeles ' bench , 42 - 24 . The Pelicans defense was also critical , with New_Orleans recording 14 steals while winning the turnover differential , 23 - 17 . The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 113 - 102 , at Little Caesars Arena on Monday evening . Both teams started off well , while the Pistons led , 14 - 13 , halfway through the quarter . However , the Pistons outscored the visitors 24 - 14 , through the remainder of the quarter , to take a 38 - 27 lead into the second . They continued to dominate as they expanded their lead to start the quarter , and went on to outscore the Cavs by nine in the quarter , to take a 66 - 46 lead by halftime . The third quarter was not friendly to Cleveland either , as the Cavs could hardly get within 20 points of the tie , however , the managed to make it a 14 - point game early in the fourth . Despite their best efforts , the Pistons would not succumb , and cruised to their second consecutive win . This marks the second straight loss for the Cavs . Andre Drummond led the Pistons with 23 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and three blocks , in 38 minutes . Blake Griffin added 21 points , 12 rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , while Reggie Bullock tallied 21 points , four assists and one rebound . The Pistons shot 47 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 38 from long range . Meanwhile , Collin Sexton led the Cavaliers with 18 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal , in 23 minutes . Boston came into this matchup in the midst of an eight - game winning streak but Detroit snapped that here . The shooting disparity was critical , with the Pistons hitting 48 percent of their shots while holding the Celtics to 41 percent from the field . That can be attributed to the ball movement , with Detroit out - assisting Boston , 25 - 19 . Defensive rebounding was also huge , with the Pistons winning that battle , 38 - 32 . The Celtics really struggled from long range , connecting on just 9 - of - 33 of their three - pointers . The Celtics ( 18 - 11 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he tallied 26 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals .
