As for Detroit , they 're off until Monday when they play host to the Washington Wizards .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 108 - 89 , at Little Caesars Arena on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 47 - 32 ) wanted to earn a second - consecutive win over the Pistons ( 39 - 39 ) and that 's exactly what they accomplished , although they far more dominant in this one . Indiana quickly jumped ahead to a 18 - 15 lead in the first quarter , and they would never relinquish that advantage . In fact , the Pacers won every single quarter in this one so they managed to destroy Detroit completely . The Pacers won the remaining three quarters by 26 - 21 , 34 - 26 and 30 - 27 , respectively , on their to a comfortable 19 - point win away from home . Five Indiana players scored in double digits in this one , and the top scorer was Thaddeus Young who finished with 21 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic had 17 points , four rebounds and three assists , while Myles Turner chipped in with 17 points and five boards . Cory Joseph thrived with 12 assists as well as six points . Domantas Sabonis had 15 points and 13 rebounds coming off the bench , and Doug McDermott delivered 14 points despite not starting . The Pistons once again did n't have Blake Griffin but Andre Drummond was their most reliable scorer since he finished with 28 points , 19 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . Wayne Ellington delivered 24 points with four boards , while Reggie Jackson chipped in with 16 points , five boards and four assists . Luke Kennard had 10 points off the bench .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 112 - 105 , at Scotiabank Arena on Wednesday night . The Raptors ( 50 ) are showing early in the season why they should be considered as one of the top teams in the Eastern Conference and they had no problems to dismantle a combative Timberwolves ( 2 - 3 ) squad that fought this game until the very end . However , the Raptors were in control early on and they never let it go : they jumped to a 26 - 19 lead in the first quarter and increased their lead to nine points at the break following a 31 - 29 second quarter . Minnesota showed some fight in the third quarter ( 26 - 26 ) and they won the final 12 minutes of action ( 29 - 31 ) , but it was n't enough . The Canadian franchise closed things out when they needed to , and remained undefeated through their first five games of the season . Kawhi Leonard led the way for Toronto with 35 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , while Kyle Lowry once again posted a double - double with 13 points and 10 assists , while also adding six rebounds and four steals . Serge Ibaka contributed with 15 points , while Jonas Valanciunas came close to post another double - double off the bench with 16 points and nine rebounds in 20 minutes . Norman Powell added 10 points . Jimmy Butler once again led the Timberwolves with 23 points but he also filled the stat sheet with six steals , five assists and four rebounds . Taj Gibson had 13 points with six rebounds , and Jeff Teague finished with 12 points and nine assists . Karl-Anthony Towns disappointed , though , since he only had 12 points and eight boards .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 131 - 128 , at Air Canada Center on Thursday . While Golden_State only held the lead for a couple minutes of this game , it took an overtime session to determine a winner . In fact , Golden_State ended regulation on a 15 - 5 run to send the game into an extra session . With that said , the Raptors never trailed in the overtime , as their only deficit in the game came in the first five minutes of the first quarter . Toronto 's offense was on point , as they went 47 - of - 90 from the field and 15 - of - 38 from three - point range . They also dominated at the free - throw line , hitting 22 - of - 24 while Golden_State connected on 17 - of - 20 . It was a team effort from Toronto , as they had six players reach double figures in scoring while the Warriors had just three guys reach that threshold . The Warriors ( 15 - 8 ) got another gem from Kevin Durant , as he tallied 51 points , 11 rebounds and six assists . This was the first time in his career that he 's scored at least 40 points in three - straight games . Klay Thompson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 23 points , three rebounds and three assists . Jonas Jerebko led the bench with 20 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Kevon Looney also played well off the bench , amassing seven points and 10 boards . The Raptors ( 19 - 4 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he collected 37 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Pascal Siakam dropped a career - high 26 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting . Serge Ibaka finished with 20 points and four boards . Kyle Lowry accumulated 10 points , eight rebounds , 12 assists and three steals . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Golden_State traveling to play the Detroit Pistons and Toronto facing the Cleveland Cavaliers on the road .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 121 - 103 , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win for Toronto , they dominated throughout . In fact , a 42 - 28 second quarter really set the foundation , as the Raptors held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Rebounding was critical for the Raptors , as they outrebounded the Clippers , 56 - 36 . Toronto 's defense was also huge , as they held Los_Angeles to 43 percent from the field and 17 percent from three - point range . Ball movement was also imperative , with the Raptors out - assisting the Clippers , 21 - 15 . The Clippers ( 29 - 25 ) were led by Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , as he tallied 19 points , five rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Tobias Harris totaled 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Lou Williams led the bench with 18 points , two rebounds and three assists . Montrezl Harrell got a rare start and amassed 10 points , three rebounds and four blocks . The Raptors ( 38 - 16 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , as he collected 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Serge Ibaka accumulated 16 points and 12 rebounds . Pascal Siakam finished with 15 points and four boards while C.J. Miles led the bench with the same line . Delon Wright provided 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Toronto traveling to face the Philadelphia 76ers and Los_Angeles playing the Charlotte Hornets on the road as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Toronto Raptors , 113 - 98 , at Scotiabank Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Magic ( 28 - 33 ) figured they 'd have a substantial challenge on their hands coming into a road matchup against one of the Eastern Conference 's powerhouses in the Raptors ( 44 - 17 ) . However , their task was made significantly less daunting when they found out Kawhi Leonard would sit out the contest for rest purposes . A seemingly buoyed Orlando squad jumped out to a 25 - 15 first - quarter lead and still held a three - point advantage at halftime . Toronto managed to finally secure a tie at the 7:5 mark of the third quarter , but the visitors picked up the pace at that point . The Magic would go on to outscore their hosts by a 50 - 35 margin the rest of the way , leading to the double - digit victory . Among their various statistical advantages , Orlando enjoyed a 52 - 42 edge on the boards . Terrence Ross led the way for the Magic against his former squad with 28 points , adding nine rebounds and one assist . Nikola Vucevic generated a 23 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , two steals and one block . Jonathan Isaac furnished 16 points , six rebounds and two blocks . D.J. Augustin supplied 12 points , eight assists , five rebounds and one steal . Evan Fournier totaled 11 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Kyle Lowry paced the Raptors with 19 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and four blocks . Marc Gasol tallied 16 points , five rebounds and five assists . Serge Ibaka delivered 14 points and five rebounds . Pascal Siakam mustered a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two blocks . Danny Green and Jodie Meeks generated matching 10 - point tallies , with Green notably adding six rebounds and four assists . The Magic remain on the road and pay a visit to the New York Knicks on Tuesday evening , while the Raptors remain home and tangle with the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Boston Celtics , 118 - 95 , at Scotiabank Arena on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 45 - 17 ) have mostly dominated on their home court this season , but they figured to get a stiff challenge from the division - rival Celtics ( 37 - 24 ) . Accordingly , Boston built a slim two - point lead through the first quarter , but Toronto ensured that would be the last highlight the visitors would enjoy . The hosts won the second quarter by a 36 - 13 margin , giving them a 21 - point halftime lead that they 'd expand to 27 by the end of the third . Among the Raptors ' numerous statistical triumphs was a 49 percent - 38 percent edge in shooting and a 14 - 8 advantage in turnovers committed . Marcus Morris paced the Celtics with 17 points , adding six rebounds and one assist . Jayson Tatum and Terry Rozier generated matching 11 - point tallies , with Tatum notably bringing in seven boards . Jaylen Brown was the only other player in double digits , posting 10 points , eight rebounds , four assists and four steals . Gordon Hayward tallied nine points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . Al Horford and Robert Williams contributed eight points apiece . Pascal Siakam led the Raptors with 25 points , supplementing them with eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Kawhi Leonard followed with 21 points and added six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Serge Ibaka generated 14 points and two rebounds . Norman Powell poured in 11 points . Kyle Lowry mustered just seven points , but he also dished out 11 assists , hauled in six rebounds and recorded one steal . The Celtics head back home to tangle with the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday night , while the Raptors remain home and take on the Trail Blazers as well on Saturday evening .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 98 , on Thursday at Air Canada Centre . The Raptors ( 49 - 20 ) came into Thursday 's contest without two key players , with Kyle Lowry ( ankle ) and Serge Ibaka ( suspension ) both sidelined , but that did n't have much of an impact when it came to beating up on the lowly Lakers . Mostly because they still had star player Kawhi Leonard , who scored a team - high 25 points to go along with eight rebounds , four assists and two steals in the wire - to - wire victory . Pascal Siakam struggled mightily from the floor , going just 3 - of - 16 , but he still managed to finish with 16 points thanks to his ability to get to the free throw line . Lastly , Normal Powell came up with a huge performance off the bench , scoring 20 points and grabbing eight rebounds in 24 key minutes as a reserve . It was n't the most efficient offensive performance for the Raptors , however , as they shot 40 percent from the field , but the 16 threes they hit helped overcome that and propel them to victory . As for the Lakers ( 31 - 37 ) , they have now lost six of their last seven games , and injuries have left them with a real lack of quality depth . Los_Angeles only had three guys who played double - digit minutes off the bench , and only one , Alex Caruso , scored in double figures with an impressive 16 - point outing . LeBron James , of course , scored a game - high 29 points to go along with four rebounds and six assists across 32 minutes , while Rajon Rondo 's 13 points made him the third and final Laker player to score in double figures . As a team , what killed Los_Angeles was its inability to hit a shot from behind the arc , as the team shot a miserable 7 - of - 31 ( 23 percent ) from three Thursday night .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 117 - 109 in OT , at Air Canada Centre on Sunday . While the Raptors ( 57 - 24 ) have already secured their postseason berth , the Heat ( 38 - 42 ) remain on the bubble and needed a win here to keep their playoff chances alive . However , Miami could n't deliver here and while they forced an overtime , in the end Toronto were just too strong for them . The Canadian franchise struggled in the first half , however , as they lost the first two quarters 26 - 25 and 31 - 25 respectively , but they turned things around in the second half with 28 - 22 and 25 - 24 scores . The Raptors were dominant in OT , though , and a 14 - 6 win over the extra five minutes was enough to give the Raptors a huge comeback win in front of their fans . Surprisingly , Norman Powell co - led the Raptors offensively with 23 points in only 21 minutes , while Pascal Siakam also added 23 points with 10 rebounds . Kawhi Leonard had 22 points , four rebounds and four assists , while Danny Green chipped in with 21 points . Serge Ibaka had 12 points off the bench , and Marc Gasol filled the stat sheet with eight points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Dwyane Wade went vintage in this game and even though he came off the bench , he still led the team offensively with 21 points , five assists and three boards . Justise Winslow had 15 points with seven rebounds and six assists . Dion Waiters delivered 17 points , and Bam Adebayo contributed just seven points but 13 rebounds . James Johnson had 18 points and five assists off the bench .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Sacramento Kings,132-112 , at Toyota Center on Saturday night . The Rockets ( 8 - 7 ) came into the contest looking to put their uncharacteristic early - season struggles even further in the rearview mirror against an improved Kings ( 8 - 8 ) squad . Houston got off to a good start in that regard by building a solid 71 - 59 halftime lead on the strength of red - hot shooting . They kept their foot on the gas in the third quarter , racking up another 38 points and adding 11 points to their advantage in the process . That sealed the win for Houston , which shot 57 percent from the field , including 43 percent from three - point range . Buddy Hield led the way for the Kings with 23 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . De'Aaron Fox posted 19 points , three assists , one rebound and one steal . Marvin Bagley III was extended time during the blowout defeat and posted 16 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block over 27 minutes . Bogdan Bogdanovic poured in 14 points . James Harden paced the Rockets with 34 points and added eight assists , four rebounds and three steals . Chris Paul supplied 24 points , nine assists , four rebounds and one steal . Clint Capela followed with a 23 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five blocks . Gerald Green led the bench with 17 points , while Eric Gordon contributed 11 . The Kings return home to tangle with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday evening , while the Rockets remain home and take on the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 112 - 109 , at Toyota Center on Tuesday afternoon . The Christmas Day showdown opened as tightly contested as expected , with the two teams deadlocked at 22 after one quarter . However , the Thunder ( 21 - 12 ) created some important distance in the second and took a 60 - 52 lead into halftime . The light went on for the Rockets ( 18 - 15 ) coming out of intermission , however , leading to a 61 - point second half that allowed them to hold off a strong push by OKC . Ultimately , a James Harden floater with 20 seconds remaining gave Houston some valuable space after the visitors had closed to within 110 - 108 . As expected , each team 's star - studded starting five provided the bulk of the production , with the Thunder and Rockets benches generating just 20 and 19 points , respectively . Paul George led the way for the Thunder with a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three steals . Russell Westbrook posted a near triple - double with 21 points , nine rebounds and nine assists , also tallying four steals and one block . Steven Adams managed 17 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jerami Grant supplied 15 points , nine rebounds , three blocks and two steals . Dennis Schroder paced the bench with 10 points , six assists and five rebounds . James Harden paced the Rockets with 41 points , a total he supplemented with seven assists , six rebounds , two steals and one block . Eric Gordon totaled 17 points , six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Clint Capela contributed a 16 - point , 23 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , one steal and one block . PJ Tucker followed with 11 points , seven rebounds and two steals . Austin Rivers led the Houston second unit with 10 points . The Thunder next pay a visit to the Phoenix Suns on Friday night , while the Rockets remain home and tangle with the Boston Celtics on Thursday evening .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 109 - 95 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs ( 6 - 2 ) came into the day not knowing if they 'd have to tangle with All-Star Anthony Davis ( elbow ) who was highly questionable due to the injury that had already cost him three of the previous four games . As it turned out , the big man was healthy enough to suit up , but it hardly seemed to matter during the first half . San_Antonio built a seemingly commanding 58 - 39 halftime lead over the Pelicans ( 4 - 5 ) , but the visitors would regroup at intermission . New_Orleans bounced back to outscore their hosts by a 56 - 51 margin in the second half , but it ultimately was n't close to enough . Both teams shot in excess of 46 percent , although Davis was still clearly not at 100 percent while scoring a modest 17 points over 40 minutes . Jrue Holiday led the way for the Pelicans with 29 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists and four rebounds . Nikola Mirotic generated a 22 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Davis supplemented his aforementioned scoring total with eight rebounds , three assists , five blocks and two steals . E'Twaun Moore registered 11 points . DeMar DeRozan paced the Spurs with 26 points and added four assists and three rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge followed with a 22 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included six assists . Former Pelican Dante Cunningham and Patty Mills contributed matching 15 - point tallies from the starting five and the bench , respectively . Marco Belinelli poured in 14 off the second unit . Bryn Forbes ( seven points ) and Rudy Gay ( six points ) had quiet nights as starters . The Pelicans next pay a visit to the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday night , while the Spurs remain home and take on the Magic in a Sunday evening battle .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 96 - 89 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The game got out to an interesting start , as the Spurs led , 17 - 8 , six and a half minutes in , but then did not score for the next five minutes , as the Rockets caught up and managed to close the quarter with a 21 - 20 advantage . The game stayed close through the second , but the Spurs managed to pull back ahead , taking a 52 - 50 lead into halftime . The Spurs kept the momentum in the third , as they pulled ahead by seven halfway through the quarter , but the Rockets rallied back again , to make it a one - point game , as they trailed , 72 - 71 , heading into the final frame . The fourth quarter featured more back - and - forth action , as the Spurs led , 86 - 85 , with just over three minutes left . The Spurs held on and closed the game , as they outscored the Rockets 10 - 4 in the final minutes , to earn the impressive home win . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 27 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one block , in 35 minutes . DeMar DeRozan tallied 13 points , 11 rebounds and three assists , while Derrick White tallied 14 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 29 minutes . The Spurs shot 45 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 25 points , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks , in 38 minutes . Clint Capela tallied 12 points , 17 rebounds , two blocks and an assist , while Eric Gordon added 23 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 30 minutes off the bench . Carmelo Anthony ( illness ) did not suit up . The Rockets ( 4 - 7 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss as they play host to the Pacers on Sunday . The Spurs ( 7 - 4 ) take on the Kings in Sacramento on Monday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 111 - 105 , at AT & T Center on Monday . The Spurs ( 42 - 29 ) continue to roll , as despite playing their third game in four nights , the team managed to post a wire - to - wire victory over the NBA 's best team . DeMar DeRozan led the way with a terrific all - around performance , recording a game - high 26 points , nine rebounds and eight assists across 38 minutes . His 25th and 26th points were the most important , as they came on a heavily contested jumper over Klay Thompson with just over a minute left that put the Spurs up six , and up for good . LaMarcus Aldridge was close behind with a double - double of 23 points and 13 rebounds on 8 - of - 12 shooting , while Rudy Gay came off the bench to score 17 points . As for the Warriors ( 47 - 22 ) , it was a night to forget for their star backcourt , with Steph Curry and Thompson going a combined 14 - of - 43 from the field Monday night . Curry still managed to finish with a team - high 25 points thanks to making six threes , and he added seven rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Meanwhile , Thompson still hit four threes and finished with 14 points in 38 minutes . Kevin Durant did n't hit a single shot from behind the arc , going 0 - of - 4 , but he still went 9 - of - 18 from the field and finished with 24 points . As a team , the Warriors shot a respectable 47 percent from the floor , but their lack of aggression resulted in few trips to the free throw line , and that may have cost them the victory , as they were just 10 - of - 12 from the stripe while the Spurs were 19 - of - 22 .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns 131 - 113 at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday . The Lakers found their first win of the season against one of the leagues youngest teams in the Suns . LeBron James quickly put behind him the free throw woes that resulted in a brutal OT loss to the Spurs earlier in the week and bounced back to lead Los_Angeles ( 1 - 3 ) to their first win . A close first quarter that saw the Lakers end with a two point lead was overshadowed by an explosive 44 points in the second quarter . Javale McGree was at the heart of the action in that period , as he finished dunks ( unlike his failed dunk in the first quarter , quickly shared on social media ) and got to the free throw line in the twenty point rout to end the half . Phoenix ( 1 - 3 ) played from behind for the majority of the game , however , they saw a strong outing from their No . 1 overall pick DeAndre Ayton . LeBron James finished with 19 points , 10 assists , seven rebounds and three steals , while Lance Stephenson led all scorers with 23 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . All five Lakers starters finished in double figures , including Josh Hart , who started in place of Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . Ayton finished with 22 points and 11 rebounds on 11 - of - 14 shooting and Devin Booker added 23 points , seven rebounds and seven assists in the loss . The Lakers will play the second game of a back - to - back at home against the Nuggets on Thursday , while the Suns will head to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Saturday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Phoenix Suns in overtime , 116 - 109 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Thursday evening . Matters looked grim for the Celtics ( 7 - 4 ) for the majority of the night , as they surprisingly fell behind , 32 - 13 , after one quarter . Although they were able to cut into their sizable deficit during the middle periods while outscoring the Suns ( 2 - 9 ) by 52 - 48 margin , they still entered the final 12 minutes trailing by 15 . However , a 17 - 4 run by Boston over a 3:23 period late in the fourth quarter left them within one point of Phoenix . Following a pair of clutch T.J. Warren free throws , the Celtics were able to get the ball into the hands of Marcus Morris , who burned one of his old franchises with a three - pointer with 1 seconds on the clock . The visitors then took control in overtime , snapping a 109 - 109 tie with a 70 run over the final 2:5 of the extra period . Kyrie Irving keyed the Celtics with 39 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block . He also provided the assist on Morris ' game - tying three . Jaylen Brown and Morris each provided 17 points overall . They also hauled in six and eight rebounds , respectively . Terry Rozier provided 10 points , six boards and one assist off the bench . Gordon Hayward ( eight points ) , Al Horford ( seven points ) and Jayson Tatum ( four points ) all had underwhelming performances . Devin Booker enjoyed another productive night versus the Celtics , leading the Suns with 38 points and adding nine assists , three rebounds and three steals . Warren supplied 29 points , seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Deandre Ayton posted a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Trevor Ariza filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one block . The Celtics remain on their road trip and pay a visit to the Utah Jazz on Friday night , while the Suns hit the road as well and face the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday evening .
The visiting Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 123 - 119 , in overtime at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Monday evening . It seemed as though Phoenix ( 4 - 23 ) had the game under control , holding a nine lead with just six minutes remaining . Los_Angeles ( 17 - 9 ) , though , fought hard to tie the game up in the final minutes . Overtime proved to be a back - and - forth affair , but the Clippers were able to take the lead in the final 40 seconds after Patrick Beverly drew a clutch foul . The win keeps LA in fourth place in the Western Conference . The team has enjoyed a successful start to its 2018 - 19 campaign , thanks in no small part to star forward Tobias Harris . Harris was as dominant as ever on Monday , leading all scorers with 33 points and grabbing eight rebounds . Danilo Gallinari added another 25 points and shot an impressive 11 - of - 12 at the free - throw line in the win . The loss makes nine straight for the last - place Suns , who are on pace for their worst season in franchise history . It was a hard - fought loss , though , as the team shot 50 percent from the field and had seven double - digit scorers . DeAndre Ayton led the team with 20 points , 12 rebounds , and three blocks in the narrow loss . The Clippers will return home to host the Raptors on Tuesday , while the Suns will visit San Antonio .

A 14 - 4 run to start the fourth quarter helped Phoenix ( 18 - 60 ) snap its six - game losing streak . The Suns had established an early double - digit lead thanks to a 40 - point second quarter , but the late run helped seal the much - needed win for the last place squad . The Celtics ( 3 - 2 ) will surely feel happy following this win on the road , as they had to come from behind to defeat a Thunder ( 0 - 4 ) team that crumbled in the second half and wasted a huge lead in the final 24 minutes of action . The Thunder went up by 16 points ( 50 - 34 ) in the first half of action , but Boston turned things around and a huge 40 - 23 win in the third quarter gave them a one - point lead leading into the fourth quarter . The Thunder tried to come back , but Boston closed things out in the final seconds and the win put them one game over .500 , while the Thunder remain winless after their first four games . Jayson Tatum was Boston 's top scorer since he finished with 24 points and six rebounds , while Al Horford ( 19 points and nine rebounds ) and Kyrie Irving ( 15 points , five rebounds and five assists ) also logged double - figure points the Celtics .
