The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 116 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Monday evening . The Thunder ( 5 - 4 ) came into the contest looking to build on the significant momentum they 'd begun generating after an 0 - 4 start , but they knew they 'd be facing a Pelicans ( 4 - 6 ) squad at full strength . Anthony Davis was announced as active for the game shortly before tip - off , although OKC did n't seem the least bit bothered on their way to building a 36 - 28 first - half lead . It would prove to be a game of alternating advantages , however , as New_Orleans came back to forge a 63 - 62 halftime edge . The home squad did come out of intermission with the hot hand , and the 100 - 86 edge they carried into the final 12 minutes would hold up when the visitors closed out the game with a 30 - point fourth quarter . Turnovers were key , as the Pelicans gave the ball up on 20 occasions while only taking it away 12 times from the Thunder . OKC notably pulled out the victory despite losing Russell Westbrook to a sprained left ankle in the second half . Julius Randle led the Pelicans with 26 points off the bench , and he added eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and two blocks . Jrue Holiday followed with a 22 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and one block . Davis provided 20 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block . Nikola Mirotic generated a 16 - point , 16 - rebound double - double . Paul George paced the Thunder with 23 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists , six rebounds and four steals . Dennis Schroder followed with a bench - leading 22 points and also contributed three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Steven Adams went for 18 points , eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Westbrook delivered 17 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal before exiting . Jerami Grant finished with 13 points , six rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . The Pelicans head back home and face the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday night , while the Thunder pay a visit to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday evening as well .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 124 - 109 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Friday . While the first quarter was competitive , Oklahoma_City dominated from there . In fact , they rode a 38 - 20 second quarter to victory , as Atlanta never got the game within a 10 - point margin in the second half . The shooting disparity was the difference , with the Thunder connecting on 52 percent from the field , 44 percent from three - point range and 93 percent from the free - throw line . The Hawks hit just 45 percent from the field , 31 percent from long range and 60 percent from the charity stripe . Rim protection was also critical , with Oklahoma_City out - blocking Atlanta , 7 - 3 . The Hawks ( 5 - 18 ) were led by John Collins , as he totaled 19 points and 11 rebounds . Tauren Prince amassed 15 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Trae Young went just 4 - of - 15 from the field to accrue nine points , four rebounds and eight assists . Alex Len was huge off the bench , providing 19 points and five boards . The Thunder ( 14 - 7 ) got a near triple - double from Russell Westbrook , as he collected 23 points , nine rebounds and 10 assists . Alex Abrines hit seven three - pointers to finish with 21 points . Paul George tallied 20 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Steven Adams scored just six points but still provided 13 points , three assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder hurt his old team , as he led the bench with 18 points , three rebounds , eight assists and two blocks . Nerlens Noel also played well off the bench , generating 14 points , seven rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Both teams are off until Monday when Atlanta plays host to the Golden State Warriors and Oklahoma_City welcomes the Detroit Pistons to Chesapeake Energy Arena .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 116 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Thursday evening . To say the Pelicans ( 22 - 27 ) faced an uphill battle Thursday would have been one of the bigger understatements of the season . Already down perennial MVP candidate Anthony Davis ( finger ) , New_Orleans was further decimated by the absences of Julius Randle ( ankle ) , Nikola Mirotic ( calf ) and E'Twaun Moore ( rest ) . Nevertheless , the Pels came out swinging versus the Thunder ( 30 - 18 ) , battling them to a 28 - 28 draw through the first 12 minutes . OKC did gain some distance by outscoring the visitors by a 70 - 54 margin during the middle periods , but the Pelicans managed to keep things interesting by getting as close as 121 - 116 with 1:38 remaining . However , they were unable to score the remainder of the way , and Darius Miller 's misfire on a 27 - foot three - point attempt with 2 seconds remaining sealed the win for the home squad . Jrue Holiday paced the Pelicans with a 22 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included nine rebounds , four steals and one block . Miller followed with 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Jahlil Okafor turned in 18 points and eight boards . Cheick Diallo furnished 16 points , four boards , one steal and one block . Elfrid Payton stepped up with a 15 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also featured four rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Frank Jackson supplied 12 points , two assists and one rebound . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with a 23 - point , 17 - rebound , 16 - assist triple - double that also included two steals . Paul George matched Westbrook 's scoring total and added 11 rebounds , seven assists , one steal and one block . Steven Adams generated 20 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and one steal . Terrance Ferguson and Jerami Grant contributed matching 14 - point , three - rebound tallies . Dennis Schroder led the bench with 10 points . The Pelicans head back home to face the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday evening , while the Thunder remain home for an interconference showdown with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday evening .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 132 - 122 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Tuesday . There were 10 ties and 12 lead changes in this tightly - contested game , as a 36 - 23 third quarter grabbed Oklahoma_City their win . The shooting disparity was critical , with the Thunder shooting 50 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range while holding the Magic to 47 percent from the field and 30 percent from long range . Rebounding was also huge , with Oklahoma_City winning that battle , 49 - 40 . Oklahoma_City did most of their damage down low , outscoring Orlando in the paint , 58 - 38 . The Magic ( 22 - 31 ) were led by Terrence Ross , as he provided 26 points , five rebounds and three steals off the bench . Evan Fournier led the starters with 25 points . five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon collected 18 points , six rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . Nikola Vucevic finished with 17 points , nine rebounds and five assists . The Thunder ( 34 - 19 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 39 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Russell Westbrook accumulated 16 points , 15 rebounds and 16 assists . Jerami Grant totaled 19 points and 11 rebounds while Dennis Schroder led the bench with 20 points and two boards . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Oklahoma_City playing host to the struggling Memphis Grizzlies and Orlando welcoming the Minnesota Timberwolves to Amway Center .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 148 - 147 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Friday . In this potential playoff preview , it took two overtime sessions to determine a winner . Paul George played the hero , as he hit a game - winning floater with 1 seconds left to capture the win for the Thunder . The number of swings was unbelievable , as there were 21 ties and 23 lead changes in this game , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Defense was key for the Thunder , as they recorded 13 steals while winning the turnover differential , 20 - 7 . That allowed Oklahoma_City to win the points off turnover battle , 30 - 10 . The Jazz ( 32 - 25 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 38 points , four rebounds and five assists . Rudy Gobert collected 26 points , 16 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Derrick Favors totaled 24 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three blocks while Jae Crowder led the bench with 20 points , eight rebounds and three assists . The Thunder ( 37 - 20 ) got a gem from George , as he accumulated 45 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Russell Westbrook finished with 43 points , 15 rebounds and eight assists . Jerami Grant amassed 18 points , four rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Steven Adams accrued 16 points , 10 rebounds . three assists and five steals . Both teams will have to play the second half of a back - to - back set on Saturday , with Utah playing host to the Dallas Mavericks and Oklahoma_City welcoming the Sacramento Kings to OKC .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 124 - 120 , at Target Center on Monday evening . The two teams squared off in front of a packed house , with Minnesota fans getting their fist look at LeBron James and the new - look Lakers . Those in attendance were treated to a tight , back - and - forth game . From the second quarter until the final four minutes of regulation , neither team led by more than five points . That changed in the final minutes , as the Wolves answered a lay - up from Rajon Rondo with an 110 run . Six of those points came from All-Star wing Jimmy Butler , who knocked down consecutive three - pointers . Minnesota was able to grab a nine - point lead , which provided the cushion necessary to stave off a last - minute comeback effort from Los_Angeles . Butler led Minnesota ( 3 - 4 ) with 32 points , which he paired with six rebounds and four assists . Butler delivered at the right time , knocking down four three - pointers in the fourth quarter to help fuel Minnesota 's late push . The veteran wing was 6 - of - 7 from three - point range on the night . All-Star big man Karl-Anthony Towns added another 25 points and also led all players with 16 rebounds . Towns also delivered four blocks in the win . For the Lakers ( 2 - 5 ) , LeBron James delivered a characteristically dominant performance . James scored 29 points , grabbed 10 rebounds , and dished out seven assists . Like Butler , the bulk of James ' production came late , as he scored 12 of his 29 points in the fourth quarter . James , however , committed a costly turnover with under a minute remaining and his team down two , losing the ball into the backcourt and allowing Minnesota to seal the win . Also of note for the Lakers was the performance of Lonzo Ball . The highly - touted sophomore saw 24 minutes of play time but managed only four points , one rebound , and one assist , continuing what has been a lackluster second season thus far . On Wednesday , Los_Angeles will host the Dallas Mavericks while Minnesota will take on the Utah Jazz .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 113 , at Target Center on Monday evening . The Timberwolves ( 5 - 9 ) entered the contest looking to put together a successful opening chapter to the post - Jimmy Butler era . They would get help with the return to action of Jeff Teague , who 'd missed seven games with a knee injury . Additionally , they also saw Andrew Wiggins overcome a questionable designation due to a quadriceps injury to also suit up , giving Minnesota a full starting five . However , the Nets ( 6 - 8 ) were more than game , forging a 31 - 30 first - quarter lead before the home squad pulled ahead and enjoyed a seven - point halftime advantage . The second half would be just as tightly contested , but the T-Wolves would outscore the Nets by a 63 - 60 margin over the final two periods to seal the win . A gruesome ankle injury suffered by the Nets ' Caris LeVert certainly hurt the visitors ' chances , and the emerging wing had to exit the court in a wheelchair . Shooting also made a key difference , as Minnesota posted a 52 percent success rate , including 44 percent from three - point range . In turn , they limited Brooklyn to 40 percent shooting , which was key to them securing a win despite committing 23 turnovers . D'Angelo Russell paced the Nets with 31 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson posted 14 points , six rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . Spencer Dinwiddie matched RHJ 's scoring total off the bench and added three assists and one steal . DeMarre Carroll provided 11 points , five rebounds and two assists . LeVert pitched in 10 points , five rebounds and four assists over 17 minutes before his injury . Joe Harris and Jared Dudley generated matching eight - point tallies . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves with 25 points , and he added 21 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . However , he also committed a game - high 10 turnovers . Teague excelled in his return , posting a 24 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included one rebound and three steals . Derrick Rose delivered 23 points , six assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Taj Gibson managed a near double - double of 17 points , nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Wiggins totaled 13 points , six boards , three assists , one steal and one block . The Nets head back home and await a visit from the Miami Heat on Wednesday evening , while the Timberwolves remain home and take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night as well .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Chicago Bulls , 111 - 96 , at Target Center on Saturday night . The Timberwolves ( 9 - 11 ) have plenty of Chicago flavor on their roster and coaching staff , but it 's also true they have significantly more talent than the Bulls ( 5 - 15 ) at present . However , it was the visiting squad that came out strongest Saturday , establishing a 22 - 20 lead after one quarter . However , Minnesota progressively came back over the subsequent three periods and established their superiority , culminating in a fourth quarter where they posted 27 points and limited Chicago to 17 . The biggest advantage besides the scoreboard came on the boards , as the Timberwolves won the rebounding battle by a 58 - 40 margin . Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 28 points and added eight rebounds and four assists . Jabari Parker followed with 27 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Justin Holiday generated a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , one steal and one block . Wendell Carter , Jr. totaled 12 points , eight boards , one assist and one steal . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 35 - point , 22 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . Derrick Rose delivered 22 points , four assists and two rebounds . Dario Saric managed a 19 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included a steal . Jeff Teague finished with 18 points , five assists and four rebounds . The Bulls return home and take on the San Antonio Spurs on Monday night , while the Timberwolves pay a visit to the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday evening as well .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Sacramento Kings , 112 - 105 , at Target Center on Monday . In their first home game since the All-Star break , the Timberwolves came out very flat . After the first 12 minutes , the Kings led the lethargic Wolves 30 - 19 and looked to be in full control of the game . Then , Karl-Anthony Towns , who had missed the last two games due to a concussion he sustained in a car accident , decided it was time to take over . Towns was the catalyst behind a 20 - 1 run for Minnesota , and the team would end up taking a 10 - point lead into halftime . After trailing by double - digits for majority of the second half , Sacramento did make one final push in the fourth quarter and reduce the deficit to four , but that was as close as the Kings would get . Towns was a force down low in his return to the floor , posting a game - high 34 points , 21 rebounds , five assists and two blocks despite playing just 31 minutes due to foul trouble . Every point was needed from Towns too , as he did n't have much support other than Derrick Rose 's 20 points off the bench and starting point guard Tyus Jones ' 16 points . Minnesota had to do most of its work inside , as nobody except Towns could get it going from deep , with the team going a very poor 8 - of - 31 ( 26 percent ) from behind the arc . As for the Kings , Marvin Bagley continues to impress in his rookie season , as he went head - to - head with Towns on the offensive end . Bagley finished with a team - high 25 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds and a pair of blocks . De'Aaron Fox was close behind with 23 points of his own , but it was n't a very efficient night for the point guard , as he shot just 8 - of - 24 from the floor . Buddy Hield and Corey Brewer were the only other Kings players to score in double figures with 18 and 12 points , respectively .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 131 - 120 , at Target Center on Tuesday evening . A blisteringly hot first half put Minnesota ( 30 - 34 ) in the driver 's seat for the rest of the game . The Timberwolves opened up a big lead in the second quarter , where they poured in 41 points as a team . The Thunder ( 39 - 25 ) , meanwhile , had a hard time keeping up despite the return of All-Star forward Paul George . Minnesota 's offense was wildly efficient , shooting 53 percent from the floor and a solid 11 - of - 22 from three - point range . Karl-Anthony Towns paved the way to victory for the Timberwolves with 41 points and 14 rebounds . Towns shot an impressive 15 - of - 27 from the field in the win . His strong play was complemented by another double - double from Jeff Teague , who finished with 16 points and 12 assists on the night . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for Minnesota . Oklahoma_City , meanwhile , was led by 38 points and 13 rebounds from former MVP Russell Westbrook . Westbrook shot a stellar 15 - of - 28 from the field , but it was not enough to get the job done . Paul George , returning from a two - game absence with shoulder soreness , scored 25 points but shot just 8 - of - 25 in the tough loss . The Timberwolves will take to the road to visit Detroit on Thursday . Meanwhile , the Thunder next suit up on Friday in Portland .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 132 - 126 , at Target Center on Sunday afternoon . The Thunder ( 47 - 33 ) came into the game looking to build some positive momentum ahead of the postseason after a recent extended stretch of sub - par play . OKC got off to a strong start in that regard , racking up 38 first - quarter points . However , the Timberwolves ( 36 - 44 ) did a good job keeping pace and were only down by two at halftime . Minnesota continued coming on in the third , outscoring the visitors by a 37 - 33 margin in the third to carry a slim two - point advantage into the final period . The Thunder then found their stride again , opening the fourth quarter on a 14 - 2 run over the first 3:57 to regain a lead they would n't relinquish . Russell Westbrook and Paul George co - led the Thunder with 27 points , with Westbrook also dishing out 15 assists and pulling down 10 rebounds . George added seven rebounds , six dimes and three steals . Dennis Schroder followed with 21 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jerami Grant produced 15 points , five boards and two blocks . Markieff Morris poured in 14 points and added six boards . Terrance Ferguson netted 11 points , four rebounds and two assists . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the Timberwolves with 35 points , adding seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Andrew Wiggins furnished 24 points , five boards , four assists and two steals . Dario Saric managed 23 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Tyus Jones generated a 10 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds . Gorgui Dieng matched Jones ' scoring total and posted four rebounds . The Thunder head back home to tangle with the Houston Rockets on Tuesday night , while the Timberwolves remain home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 116 - 105 , at Moda Center on Thursday . The Trail_Blazers ( 9 - 3 ) continue to play great basketball , as they have now won five of their last six games . As it typically does , Thursday 's win started with the production from the team 's backcourt . Damian Lillard led the way for the home team , scoring a game - high 25 points , but he struggled a bit from the field , shooting just 11 - of - 25 . Additionally , in what may be the most surprising stat of the night , Lillard did not attempt a single free throw in in 35 minutes of play . C.J. McCollum was n't too far behind Lillard , scoring 23 points and grabbing seven rebounds in 35 minutes of his own . Jusuf Nurkic had another efficient night , but he fell one rebound short of a double - double with 16 points and nine boards in just 23 minutes . As a team , while Portland did not shoot particularly well from the field ( 41 percent ) , the team made the most of its trips to the charity stripe , hitting 26 - of - 28 free throws Thursday night . As for the Clippers ( 6 - 5 ) , their loss put an end to a two - game winning streak . The main difference for Los_Angeles in the loss was their inability to close out defensive possessions , as they allowed the Trail_Blazers to get 14 offensive rebounds and they took eight more shots as a result . Lou Williams and Danilo Gallinari led the way for the Clippers on Thursday as each dropped 20 points . It was a rough night shooting the ball for Tobias Harris , who has emerged as the team 's No . 1 option on offense this season , but he still managed to finish with a double - double of 15 points and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes . Rookie Shai Gilgeous-Alexander continues to impress in his first NBA season , scoring 19 points in 35 minutes as the starting point guard .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 113 - 112 , at Moda Center on Friday . While Denver led for nearly every second of this game , it was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , the Nuggets led by 15 points at the half thanks to a 38 - 26 first quarter . The Trail_Blazers then responded by outscoring Denver in the second half , 59 - 45 . That math adds up to Portland losing by a single point , as C.J. McCollum missed a baseline jumper to win the game at the buzzer . The Nuggets ended up leading for 47 minutes of this game , as the Blazers largest lead was one - point in the first quarter for less than a minute . Ball movement was key for Denver , as they out - assisted Portland , 28 - 19 , while committing three fewer turnovers . Three-point shooting was also critical , with the Nuggets connecting on 14 - of - 30 while the Trail_Blazers hit just 6 - of - 22 . The Nuggets ( 14 - 7 ) were led by Gary Harris , as he tallied 27 points , three rebounds and three assists . He technically hit the game - winner too , as he hit a three with 14 seconds left to break a tied game . Nikola Jokic collected 15 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Paul Millsap finished with 22 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and four steals . Monte Morris played well off the bench , providing 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 8 ) were led by C.J. McCollum , as he totaled 33 points and four rebounds on 14 - of - 21 from the field . Al-Farouq Aminu amassed 20 points and seven boards . Jusuf Nurkic accrued 17 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Damian Lillard went just 6 - of - 16 from the field but finished with 15 points and eight assists . On deck for Portland is a road matchup against the struggling San Antonio Spurs on Sunday . As for Denver , they 're off until Monday when they travel to Canada to play the Toronto Raptors .
The Portland trail Blazers defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 128 - 122 , at Moda Center on Friday evening . The home team got out to a strong start , as the Trail_Blazers outscored the Raptors , 28 - 23 , int he first quarter . They managed to keep their lead in tact through the second , and took a 58 - 50 lead into halftime . The Raptors came out strong in the second half and chipped away until they trailed by just two points , 91 - 89 , by the end of the third quarter . The Trail_Blazers managed to pull back ahead mid way through the fourth , but the Raptors kept fighting and cut it back to a two - point game with 1:25 to go . However , the Trail_Blazers closed on an 8 - 4 run , to seal the win and end a two - game slide . Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 24 points , four assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block , in 29 minutes . C.J. McCollum followed up with 14 points , four assists , three steals and one rebound , while Al-Farouq Aminu added 13 points and seven rebounds . The Blazers shot 51 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , the Raptors were without Kyle Lowry ( thigh ) and Jonas Valanciunas ( thumb ) . Fred Van Vleet got the start in place of Lowry , and finished with 21 points , eight assists and four rebounds , in 37 minutes . Kawhi Leonard led the team with 28 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal , while Serge Ibaka finished with 18 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . The Raptors ( 23 - 8 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nuggets in Denver on Sunday . The Trail_Blazers ( 16 - 13 ) take on the Clippers in Los Angeles on Monday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 120 - 90 , at Moda Center on Friday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start on the road with a 33 - 26 lead after one . They held most of their cushion through the second , while the home team battled , and led 55 - 49 at halftime . The Jazz came out strong again in the third and outscored the Trail_Blazers by nine in the quarter to push their lead to 15 heading into the final frame . The Jazz did not leave anything to chance , as they pulverized the Trail_Blazers down the stretch , outscoring them by 15 in the quarter , to complete the 30 - point road win . Ricky Rubio led the Jazz with 24 points , eight assists , two rebounds , one block and one steal , in 26 minutes . Kyle Korver followed up with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal , in 25 minutes off the bench , while Joe Ingles finished with 15 points , seven assists , five rebounds and one steal . The Jazz shot 55 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the Blazers with 19 points , four rebounds , three steals , two assists and two blocks , in 34 minutes . C.J. McCollum and Evan Turner chipped in 12 points each , while Jusuf Nurkic finished with 10 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , two blocks and a steal . The Trail_Blazers shot 40 percent from the field . The Trail_Blazers ( 18 - 14 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Mavericks on Sunday . The Jazz ( 16 - 17 ) play host to the Thunder on Saturday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 110 - 101 , at Moda Center on Saturday evening . The contest got out to an evenly matched start , as the Rockets and Trail_Blazers poured in 30 points in the first quarter . The Trail_Blazers picked up the intensity in the second , where they outscored the visitors by 13 points , to take a 59 - 46 lead into halftime . The Blazers stayed in front through the third , but the Rockets were able to cut the deficit to nine by the start of the fourth quarter . The Rockets cut the deficit to five early in the fourth , but the Trail_Blazers retaliated by reclaiming a double - digit lead , which they were able to ride to the finish . Jusuf Nurkic led the Blazers with 25 points , 15 rebounds and three assists , in 31 minutes . C.J. McCollum followed up with 24 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Damian Lillard tallied 17 points , 12 assists , five rebounds and two steals . The Trail_Blazers shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , James Harden led the Rockets with 38 points , seven assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Austin Rivers followed up with 21 points , one rebound and one assist , while Clint Capela tallied 13 points , 21 rebounds , two assists and one block . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 38 from long range . The Rockets ( 22 - 16 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nuggets on Monday . The Trail_Blazers ( 23 - 17 ) play host to the Knicks on Monday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers blew out the Utah Jazz , 132 - 105 , at Moda Center on Wednesday evening . The Jazz ( 29 - 22 ) entered Wednesday 's matchup with a full head of steam , having won nine of their last ten games . Utah had blown Portland ( 32 - 20 ) out in their first two meetings before giving up a narrow 104 - 109 loss to the Blazers last week . On Wednesday , however , Utah looked like a different team than the one that had confidently handled Portland earlier in the season . The Blazers got off to a blisteringly hot start , scoring 45 first - quarter points . C.J. McCollum helped fuel the team 's impressive offensive night , pouring in 21 points in the first . From there , everything seemed to go Portland 's way . Portland went on a 170 run early in the third quarter to help secure the win , allowing McCollum and the other starters to hit the bench early . Damian Lillard finished the game as the leading scorer , notching 36 points to go along with 11 assists and eight rebounds . McCollum added another 30 points , including three three - pointers . Star center Jusuf Nurkic ( knee ) was a late scratch for the Trail_Blazers , allowing Meyers Leonard to slide into the starting lineup . In Nurkic 's stead , Leonard tallied 16 points and four assists . Utah saw double - digit scoring from all five starters , but it was not enough to get the job done . The Jazz allowed Portland to hit 16 three - pointers and knock down over 53 percent of its shots . Utah simply could not keep up , hitting just 45 percent of its field goal attempts . The Jazz will take the floor again on Friday , when they host the Houston Rockets . Portland , meanwhile , has nearly a week off before hosting the Miami Heat on Tuesday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Portland Trail_Blazers , 129 - 121 , in an overtime thriller at Moda Center on Thursday . Portland ( 39 - 26 ) and OKC ( 40 - 25 ) entered the game tied for third in the Western Conference , making it a key game for both teams . Thursday 's matchup lived up to its potential with a wild overtime finish . Regulation finished in memorable fashion , with Portland narrowly succeeding in forcing OT . Oklahoma_City took the lead when , with only 13 seconds left , Terrance Ferguson scored on a put - back layup after a collision between Paul George and Jusuf Nurkic . Tensions began to flare after the referees declined to review the incident . With tempers still running high , Nurkic drew a foul with 4 seconds remaining in regulation , but immediately picked up a technical foul after another dust - up with George . The tech was his second of the game , leading to an ejection . With Nurkic unable to shoot his free - throws , the Thunder elected to have Portland 's Skal Labissiere take the shots in his stead . Labissiere missed both shots , but Markieff Morris committed a loose ball foul that sent Al-Faroq Aminu to the line to tie the game and send it to overtime . Overtime , though , proved to be less exhilarating as the Thunder quickly began to run away with the game . Russell Westbrook scored eight of the team 's overtime points , including three on free - throws . OKC was able to exploit Nurkic 's absence and attack the rim with success in OT . Westbrook finished with a team - high 37 points . Fellow All-Star Paul George also had a big contribution , scoring 32 points while grabbing 14 rebounds . For Portland , star point guard Damian Lillard delivered a season - high 51 points . Lillard was wildly efficient , shooting 15 - of - 28 from the field and 18 - of - 20 at the free - throw line . However , it was not enough to pick up the win , as the Trail_Blazers shot just 39 percent overall from the field en route to the late - season loss . The Thunder will visit Los Angeles to take on the Clippers on Friday , while Portland will play host to the Phoenix Suns on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 147 - 140 , at Oracle Arena on Wednesday . On the second game of a back - to - back , the Warriors ( 31 - 14 ) came out sluggish and seemed to be a bit hungover from their throttling of the Nuggets on Tuesday night . They fell behind early to the visiting , and surging , Pelicans ( 21 - 24 ) , who opened up a lead as large as 16 points in the third quarter and appeared to be pulling away . Then , Steph Curry happened . The two - time MVP hit seven threes in the third period on his way to scoring 23 points and leading a furious comeback that had the Warriors miraculously up by one point heading into the final 12 minutes . From there , while the Pelicans kept fighting , it was business as usual for the defending champions , as Curry and company were n't going to let it slip away at that point . Curry finished with a game - high 41 points while shooting 9 - of - 17 from three , while Kevin Durant added 30 points and 15 assists . As a team , Golden_State shot a ridiculous 24 - of - 49 ( 49 percent ) from three in the winning effort . The Pelicans , on the other hand , were even more impressive with their arial assault , as they shot a scorching 19 - of - 37 ( 51 percent ) from the field , but it would n't be enough . Anthony Davis led the way as usual with 30 points , 18 rebounds and seven assists in 41 minutes , while Nikola Mirotic was close behind with 29 points in 29 minutes off the bench . New_Orleans ' third frontcourt star , Julius Randle , shot just 6 - of - 8 from the field , but still managed to finish with 23 points in 22 minutes .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 113 - 104 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday evening . The Warriors got out to a good start at home , with a 35 - 30 lead after one quarter . The Sixers rallied ahead early in the second and kept it close through the quarter , but the Warriors regained control and brought a 60 - 53 lead into halftime . The 76ers came out on fire in the third and outscored the Warriors 42 - 26 in the quarter , to take a 95 - 86 lead into the final frame . Things slowed down in the fourth , as the teams matched each other with 18 points , while the 76ers managed to hover around a double - digit lead , en route to their second straight win . This marks the end of an 11 - game winning streak for the Warriors . Joel Embiid led the 76ers with 26 points , 20 rebounds , five assists , and two steals , in 33 minutes . Ben Simmons tallied 26 points , eight rebounds , six assists , three steals and a block , while J.J. Redick added 15 points , three assists and two rebounds . The 76ers shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 41 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 25 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , four rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 37 minutes , while Kevon Looney added 14 points , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks . The Warriors shot 47 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 38 from long range . The Warriors ( 36 - 15 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Lakers on Saturday . The 76ers ( 34 - 18 ) take on the Kings in Sacramento on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 122 - 105 , at Oracle Arena on Friday evening . The Warriors got out to a strong start at home , as they built a 10 - point lead through the first quarter . They kept the pressure on and pushed their lead to 17 , leading 67 - 50 by halftime . The Nuggets picked it up in the third , as they cut the deficit to single digits by the halfway mark in the quarter . However , the Warriors rallied to push their lead back to 15 , heading into the fourth . The Warriors maintained a comfortable cushion through the fourth , as they cruised to their 24th home win of the season . Klay Thompson led the Warriors with 39 points , four assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 26 points , six assists , four rebounds and two blocks , while Stephen Curry added 17 points , seven assists and four rebounds . The Warriors shot 54 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Monte Morris and Malik Beasley led the Nuggets with 17 points each , while both coming off the bench . Nikola Jokic followed up with 16 points , six rebounds , four assists , four steals and one block , while Jamal Murray was quiet with 11 points and three assists . The Nuggets shot 38 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from deep . The Nuggets ( 43 - 22 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Timberwolves on Tuesday . The Warriors ( 45 - 20 ) play host to the Suns on Sunday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 120 - 114 , at Oracle Arena on Friday night . The Warriors ( 55 - 24 ) gave DeMarcus Cousins the night off , but they were otherwise at full strength . The talent gap between them and the Cavaliers ( 19 - 61 ) was evident in the first half , when Golden_State forged a 68 - 49 halftime lead . However , Cleveland did n't lay down despite their lack of postseason aspirations and sizable deficit , outscoring their hosts by a 65 - 52 margin in the third and fourth quarters but falling just short . The Warriors simply were too sharp , shooting 53 percent , including 54 percent from three - point range . Collin Sexton led the way for the Cavaliers with 27 points , adding four assists , one rebound and two steals . Cedi Osman managed 15 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Larry Nance , Jr. generated a 13 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , three steals and one block . David Nwaba matched Nance 's scoring tally off the bench and also pulled down seven boards . Tristan Thompson and Ante Zizic produced matching 12 - point , six - rebound efforts . Stephen Curry bounced back from a poor shooting night Thursday to pace the Warriors with 40 points . He complemented them with seven assists , six rebounds and one block . Draymond Green tallied 20 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Kevin Durant managed 15 points , eight assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Quinn Cook led the bench with 14 points . Klay Thompson furnished 11 points , four rebounds , three assists and one block . The Cavaliers return home to face the San Antonio Spurs on Sunday afternoon , while the Warriors remain home to tangle with the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday night .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Washington Wizards , 117 - 113 , at Capital One Arena on Saturday evening . Despite missing Kawhi Leonard ( rest ) the Raptors earned an impressive win in Washington . The Wizards started out well , but the Raptors overtook them late in the quarter to hold a 24 - 22 advantage heading into the second . The second quarter stayed close until Toronto pulled away late to amass a 10 - point . However , the Wizards came right back with an 11 - 4 run , to cut the deficit to just three , heading into halftime . The Wizards continued their push into the third quarter , where they squeezed ahead and held a three - point lead with 5:27 to go in the quarter . The Raptors turned it around again as they closed the quarter on a 20 - 9 run , to take a 90 - 82 advantage into the final frame . The Raptors pushed their lead to 13 , midway through the fourth , but the Wizards were not done yet , as they made it a two - point game with just 38 seconds left . However , a clutch shot by Fred VanVleet ensured the Raptors remain undefeated on the season , with their third straight win . Kyle Lowry led the Raptors with 28 points , 12 assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block , in 34 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas and Serge Ibaka chipped in 16 points each , as well as provided a combined16 rebounds . Fred VanVleet added 13 points , five assists and four rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Raptors shot 44 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Bradley Beal had a big night with 32 points , six assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block , while John Wall followed up with 25 points , six assists , four rebounds , four steals and one block . The Wizards ( 0 - 2 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Trail Blazers in Portland on Monday . The Raptors ( 30 ) host the Hornets on Monday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Washington Wizards , 134 - 111 , at Capital One Arena on Friday . These teams are heading in opposite directions and this 23 - point final spread shows exactly which way they 're headed . While Washington led for the majority of the first quarter , a 44 - 20 second quarter in advantage of Oklahoma_City was simply too much for the Wizards to overcome . In fact , the Thunder led by at least 19 points for the entirety of the second half . Oklahoma_City 's offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 57 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . The 34 assists recorded by the Thunder was a huge part of that , as they also won the turnover differential , 18 - 13 . The Thunder ( 4 - 4 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 23 points , three rebounds , 12 assists and four steals on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Jerami Grant finished with 22 points , four rebounds and four assists on 9 - of - 11 from the field . Paul George accrued 17 points , four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Dennis Schroder led the bench with 16 points , six rebounds and five assists . The Wizards ( 1 - 7 ) best player was Bradley Beal , as he amassed 27 points , two rebounds and four assists on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Dwight Howard scored 20 points on 7 - of - 8 from the field in his Washington debut . John Wall accumulated 19 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 14 points , four boards and two blocks . On deck for Washington is a home matchup versus the New York Knicks on Sunday . As for Oklahoma_City , they 're off until Monday when they welcome the New Orleans Pelicans to OKC .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 125 - 118 , at Capital One Arena on Tuesday evening . The Wizards ( 6 - 11 ) came into the contest with controversy swirling around them , given recent rumors that no current player is untouchable in a trade and plenty of rumblings about infighting among some of the team 's stars . Therefore , when the Clippers ( 11 - 6 ) opened up a 40 - 21 first - quarter lead , it was n't likely to much of anyone 's surprise and normally would have set the tone for a blowout win for the visitors . That was n't to be Tuesday , however , as Washington clawed back by outscoring Los_Angeles , 65 - 55 , in the middle periods . That allowed them to enter the final 12 minutes with a 95 - 86 lead , one that they 'd preserve by showing some impressive killer instinct while outpacing their visitors by a 39 - 23 fourth - quarter margin . Tobias Harris led the way for the Clippers with 29 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds and one assist . Montrezl Harrell managed 20 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one block . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Lou Williams each provided 17 points . Marcin Gortat posted nine points and seven rebounds against his old Wizards teammates . John Wall paced the Wizards with 30 points and added eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Bradley Beal generated 27 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one block . Jeff Green followed with a bench - leading 20 points and complemented them with seven boards , three assists , one steal and one block . Tomas Satoransky turned in 13 points , seven rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block . Markieff Morris poured in 12 points and added five rebounds and a pair of assists off the bench . The Clippers return home to take on the Grizzlies on Friday afternoon , while the Wizards remain home and tangle with the Toronto Raptors on Friday night .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 128 - 110 , at Capital One Arena on Sunday . While Los_Angeles came into this game as the favorite , Washington looked like the much better team on this night . A 33 - 23 first quarter really set the tone , as the Wizards held the lead for the final 45 minutes of action . In fact , Washington led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the second half , as they led by 23 points heading into the fourth quarter . The Wizards offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range while recording 30 assists . Their defense was huge as well , as they won the rebounding battle , 51 - 43 while picking up 14 steals . The Lakers ( 18 - 12 ) were led by Kyle Kuzma , as he tallied 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . LeBron James finished with just 13 points , six rebounds and three assists . Lonzo Ball collected 10 points , five rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the bench with 25 points , six rebounds and five assists . The Wizards ( 12 - 18 ) got a vintage performance from John Wall , as he accumulated 40 points , six rebounds , 14 assists , three steals and two blocks . Bradley Beal accrued 25 points , 12 rebounds and three assists . Jeff Green started and totaled 20 points and seven boards . Sam Dekker had a season - high 20 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals to lead the bench . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Washington traveling to face the Atlanta Hawks and Los_Angeles playing the Brooklyn Nets on the road as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 107 - 89 , at Capital One Arena on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 22 - 29 ) have had a largely disappointing season to say the least , but their home record has been a source of pride . Washington came into Wednesday 's contest with a solid 15 - 9 mark at Capital One Arena , and their first half effort against the short - handed Pacers ( 32 - 18 ) was a testament to why . The hosts built an impressive 59 - 45 lead by halftime , and they won the second half by a slightly less commanding 48 - 44 margin as well . The Wizards were strong on both ends of the floor , draining 53 percent of their attempts while limiting Indiana to a 39 percent success rate . Thaddeus Young led the Pacers with 13 points , adding seven rebounds , five assists and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic supplied 12 points , two boards and two assists . T.J. Leaf and Doug McDermott generated matching 12 - point tallies off the bench . Aaron Holiday poured in 10 points and added three rebounds . Domantas Sabonis matched Holiday 's scoring total and also posted eight rebounds , three assists and one steal . Myles Turner furnished nine points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal over 27 minutes . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards with 25 points , six rebounds , six assists and one steal . Jeff Green tallied 23 points , six assists , five rebounds and two blocks . Chasson Randle generated 13 points , Trevor Ariza and Jordan McCrae pitched in matching 12 - point efforts while hauling in three and two rebounds , respectively . The Pacers remain on the road and tangle with the Orlando Magic on Thursday night , while the Wizards remain home and take on the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday evening .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 119 - 106 , at Capital One Arena on Friday night . The game between two teams with losing records nevertheless had plenty of buzz surrounding it due to multiple debuts or injury returns of note . For the Wizards ( 23 - 32 ) , it was the just - acquired Jabari Parker and Bobby Portis hitting the floor for the first time in their new uniforms , while the Cavaliers ( 11 - 44 ) saw Kevin Love return from his extended absence due to a foot injury and rookie Deng Adel enter the starting lineup . It was Washington who came out of the gates hot , building a 41 - 27 first - quarter lead that was 66 - 52 by halftime . Cleveland shaved eight points off their deficit in the third , but the home squad outscored them by a 27 - 20 margin in the final period to secure the double - digit win . Collin Sexton led the way for the Cavaliers with 27 points , adding four assists and three rebounds . Jordan Clarkson supplied 24 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . David Nwaba turned in 17 points , eight boards , two assists and two steals . Marquese Chriss furnished 13 points and eight rebounds . Larry Nance , Jr. generated a 10 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and three steals . Love totaled four points , one rebound and one assist in just six minutes , his predetermined playing time limit . Portis paced the Wizards in his debut , racking up 30 points and supplementing them with six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Bradley Beal posted a 25 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds and two steals . Jeff Green registered 15 points , eight boards , four assists and one block . Trevor Ariza managed 14 points , three rebounds , one assist and three steals . Thomas Bryant delivered 13 points , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Jabari Parker , Portis ' former Bulls teammate , also had a strong first game with the Wizards , pitching seven points , 11 rebounds , nine assists , three steals and one block . The Cavaliers remain on the road and take on the Indiana Pacers on Saturday night , while the Wizards tangle with the Chicago Bulls on the road Saturday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 119 - 112 , at Capital One Arena on Saturday evening . The Pacers got out to a strong start on the road , as they pulled ahead with an eight - point lead after one quarter . They kept up the intensity through the second , where they outscored the Wizards by seven , to take a 15 - point lead by halftime . The Wizards picked it up in the third quarter , as they managed to cut into the deficit , so as to trail by nine heading into the fourth . They kept fighting in the fourth and cut the lead to just four points with 3:30 to go in the contest . However , the Pacers maintained focus and closed strong to secure their second straight win . This marks the fourth straight loss for the Wizards . Thaddeus Young led the Pacers with 22 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic followed up with 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Darren Collison tallied 15 points six rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Pacers shot 57 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from deep . Meanwhile , Bradley Beal led the Wizards with 35 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 41 minutes . Thomas Bryant followed up with 23 points , 12 rebounds , four assists , three blocks and two steals , while Jabari Parker chipped in 12 points , four rebounds , two steals and a block . The Wizard shot 53 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 35 from long range . The Wizards ( 24 - 36 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 40 - 20 ) take on the Pistons in Detroit on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 132 - 123 , at Capital One Arena on Wednesday night . The Wizards ( 27 - 37 ) dug themselves an early hole , allowing the visiting Mavericks ( 27 - 37 ) to take a 43 - 33 first - quarter lead . Washington then clamped down enough on defense in the second to erase their deficit and actually head into intermission with a four - point advantage . After essentially matching Dallas bucket for bucket in the third , the home squad sealed the victory by finishing on a 16 - 8 run over the final 3:8 after the visitors had closed to within one . Luka Doncic led the way for the Mavericks with 31 points , adding 11 rebounds , seven assists and four steals . Dwight Powell contributed a 26 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Justin Jackson followed with a bench - leading 18 points and supplemented them with five boards and one assist . Tim Hardaway , Jr. supplied 17 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jalen Brunson pitched in 11 points , eight assists , one rebound and one steal , while Dorian Finney-Smith turned in 10 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards with 30 points and supplemented them with eight assists and seven rebounds . Trevor Ariza compiled 22 points , six boards and three assists . Jabari Parker furnished 20 points , nine rebounds and three assists across 28 minutes on the second unit . Jeff Green poured in 16 points , while Tomas Satoransky generated a 14 - point , 11 - assist double - double and also pulled down eight rebounds . Bobby Portis managed 12 points and eight rebounds while drawing the start . The Mavericks next pay a visit to the Orlando Magic on Friday night , while the Wizards also hit the road and tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on Friday evening as well .
